review: My friends and I did the space sector room last weekend, we had an amazing experience! The room had some pretty interactive puzzles and the props were perfect. Can't wait to try Crematory next!

room_title: Escape room "Space Sector" by California State Escape in Sacramento
review: Very fun. Fantastic way to celebrate my son's birthday as a family. We solved Space Sector in 45 minutes. Whoop whoop!

room_title: Escape room "Space Sector" by California State Escape in Sacramento
review: We had so much fun today escaping our room! Our family did the Space Sector and it was very challenging. We have done other escape rooms at different locations and this was our favorite! We can't wait to try another room soon!

room_title: Escape room "Space Sector" by California State Escape in Sacramento
review: I’ve been here twice and have enjoyed both times! I did The Crematory first and Space Sector second. Space Sector was easier, in my opinion, and I was with only 4 other people in my group. We passed it with just seconds left which was really exciting! The rooms were super fun and would recommend Space Sector if it’s your very first time doing an escape room and don’t really know what to expect. What I love most about this place is how nice and friendly the owners are. They’re super chill and will make you want to go back! Definitely go here if you’re looking for something exciting to do.

room_title: Escape room "The Millionaire's Loft" by Escape House Mesa in Phoenix
review: We had such a great time doing the millionaires loft here!  We have done escape rooms in multiple cities around the US and this was one of the best!  The staff made us feel so welcome and made sure we had a great time!  The room was very unique and challenging and we were able to finish it with only a minute to spare. We used a couple hints and they were well thought out giving just enough to point us in the right direction but not just giving away free information. I recommend this place to anyone that enjoys an hour of great family friendly fun!  We will definitely be back to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Millionaire's Loft" by Escape House Mesa in Phoenix
review: Had a great experience at the Escape House Mesa! Did the Millionaire's Lounge and escaped with 8 minutes left! The staff was AWESOME!! I highly recommend escaping or trying to escape from their rooms!! We had a blast and are looking forward to escaping their other rooms soon!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Millionaire's Loft" by Escape House Mesa in Phoenix
review: We had a great anniversary at Escape House Mesa. One of the owners, Adam, was our gamemaster, and he showed us a super time. (Thanks, Adam!) We did "The Millionaire's Loft" and had a blast! Adam gave us just the right amount of help when needed. We escaped with 38 seconds left. We had such fun, we signed up for "The Detective's Office" immediately afterward. We can't wait to do "Flood the City". I would say that this business is a "must-do" escape room experience for newbies and experienced pros alike. If you like puzzles, you will like Escape House Mesa.

room_title: Escape room "Operation North Pole" by iPanic Escape Room in Lakeland
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Escape Pirate Island" by Escape Savannah in Savannah
review: Our group did the Pirates Room and had a great time. We had been in other escape rooms before, but this was the first one with an interactive staff (other than the faceless hints over an intercom). The staff interaction added a nice touch and made the escape much more enjoyable, especially for the children in the group.We would give Escape Savannah another go on our next visit to the city.

room_title: Escape room "Escape Pirate Island" by Escape Savannah in Savannah
review: We are obsessed with escape rooms and have done some in several different states. We really enjoyed the puzzles in the pirate escape room. They were uniquely different than the others we have been to. We made it out in less than 32 minutes without any hints or help from the pirates.

room_title: Escape room "Escape Pirate Island" by Escape Savannah in Savannah
review: Super fun time in the Pirate room and a great team building event for our group. We worked together to figure out how to escape the room using a wide variety of clues (maps, keys, etc). Although there was a time constraint, we never felt rushed.

room_title: Escape room "Escape Pirate Island" by Escape Savannah in Savannah
review: We visited with our 9-year-old son and did the Pirate Room. We escaped just at the last moment and really enjoyed our time. It was a great rainy day afternoon activity!

room_title: Escape room "Escape Pirate Island" by Escape Savannah in Savannah
review: Our group had a great time escaping from the Pirate Room...yes...we did it!!! This was a very challenging room yet not impossible. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Setup" by Room With A Clue in Hartford
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Honky Tonk" by Beach Escape Game in Tampa
review: Meh, It's ok. This is your standard small escape room. Some of the puzzles were unique. There was one I particularly enjoyed, it dealt with a magnet on a stick. Having done countless games this one is low on my list. There are no surprises here but you will probably enjoy it. Not recommend for enthusiasts like myself.

room_title: Escape room "The Honky Tonk" by Beach Escape Game in Tampa
review: Our group of six had the best time in the Honky Tonk room! Did this for my birthday and we are coming back for more! So well thought-out and I don't know how they come up with this stuff!

room_title: Escape room "The Honky Tonk" by Beach Escape Game in Tampa
review: What a great way to spend an hour! There were 6 of us in the Honky Tonk and we were able to escape with a few minutes left. There is a good variety of challenges and they definitely take some team work! Highly recommend this for anyone looking for a unique & fun experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Honky Tonk" by Beach Escape Game in Tampa
review: Our family of 8 (ages 18 thru 80+) had an absolute blast! We conquered the Honky Tonk room (with a few helpful clues) with about 9 minutes to spare. Highly recommend this for a fun family outing!

room_title: Escape room "The Honky Tonk" by Beach Escape Game in Tampa
review: First time ever going to an Escape room challenge. It was a blast looking for clues and solving puzzles to escape the room within 60 mins. Tons a fun! I highly recommend fun for all!

room_title: Escape room "The Warden's Ruse" by Cluemaster Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: We had a great time! Staff is awesome! One of the better escape rooms I've been to for sure. Our group has been twice and will be back again!

room_title: Escape room "The Warden's Ruse" by Cluemaster Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: Very well thought out rooms. Challenging but very fun.

room_title: Escape room "The Warden's Ruse" by Cluemaster Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: This place was awesome. Even though we failed miserably the staff walked us through the steps as if we would have succeeded.. which was much more fun than going home feeling defeated!! The room we did "the Warden's Ruse" had a lot more high tech features than the escape rooms I've done in the past. 10/10 would recommend to others!!

room_title: Escape room "Quest for the Throne" by Escape Eureka in Eureka
review: Had an amazing time doing the The Quest for the Throne escape room. The room was pretty challenging; our group of 6 didn't quite make it in one hour. It was super fun and I'd love to go back and try their other room options!

room_title: Escape room "Quest for the Throne" by Escape Eureka in Eureka
review: Amazing! The owner(s) are so incredibly nice and helpful! We did Quest for the Throne and it was so much fun! We are doing DaVinci’s Office next week!

room_title: Escape room "Quest for the Throne" by Escape Eureka in Eureka
review: Highly recommend! It was so much fun. My friends and I tried the Throne room, all the puzzles were very well thought out and some of them definitely took some time to think through. We will definitely be back to try the other room and hope that more rooms will open up in the future.

room_title: Escape room "The Breakout Club" by Crimson Key in San Jose
review: Played both their rooms and had a great time!

room_title: Escape room "The Breakout Club" by Crimson Key in San Jose
review: We book The Breakout Club for our work team - two newbies and one person who had only done 3 rooms before. We had a blast!! You could feel the tension at certain points, but it was really fun to see how everything in the room came together in order to escape. It was challenging, fun and Will was great to talk to. We will be back to do the 408 challenge!

room_title: Escape room "The Breakout Club" by Crimson Key in San Jose
review: Really like this company. Did breakout club with my husband and did 408 with my husband and another couple.  Really enjoyed both.The rooms were immersive and unique and cleverly designed.The owner is very nice and and seems passionate about what he does. Please make another room!!

room_title: Escape room "Submarine Survival" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: We had a great time as a group, working together to try and solve the clues! While we weren't successful in escaping before the time was up, we still had fun and have continued to talk about the rooms long after our visit was over!

room_title: Escape room "Submarine Survival" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: We went to Breakout Games Buckhead location for our IT Department Team Building activity, and had a great experience, which included a group picture at the end. This type of activity is perfect for individuals who are natural problem solvers/thinkers/inventors/math minded. It provided an excellent way to work on our communication, critical system analysis, problem resolution, and time management strategies/skills and integrate a new member to the team. WIFI and phone access was available. We allowed 2 hours and 30 minutes for activity and lunch. We chose the Submarine Venue and it was a fun challenge with unexpected twists and surprises. Breakout games provided a good description of the venue on their website and thought provoking warm up activities. Directions were easy to follow, and there was ample parking. The facility was clean and neat. We used the large Party room and they had plenty of tables and chairs so that we could have a buffet, put up signage, etc. We could have catered with local vendors at reasonable rates, but chose to use our own catering.

room_title: Escape room "Submarine Survival" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: I went to Breakout last week with some friends to do their newest room, Submarine Survival. The room was an absolute blast and our Gamemaster Elijah was super helpful and gave us the best experience we could have asked for. 10/10 Would recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Villian's Lair" by Exit Game in Los Angeles
review: Very unique! It was lots of fun and definitely challenged our minds. Can't wait for other rooms to be done!

room_title: Escape room "The Villian's Lair" by Exit Game in Los Angeles
review: Very pleased with the experience I had at The Exit Game. It's definitely innovative, fun, and going to be the latest trend for game centers. I definitely recommend visiting The Exit Game, make sure you book in advance!!

room_title: Escape room "The Villian's Lair" by Exit Game in Los Angeles
review: I played mission 2 with friends and it was just the right mix of challenge for us to finish it with only a couple of mins left on the clock!

room_title: Escape room "The Villian's Lair" by Exit Game in Los Angeles
review: Amazing venue to explore and challenge your brain with friends. Definitely exceeded my expectations with their puzzles! Who knew something like this existed in the SGV. Something I would highly recommend trying. Not to mention the owner is amazing and great to work with.

room_title: Escape room "The Villian's Lair" by Exit Game in Los Angeles
review: Their Villain's Lair room was amazing! Technology like I haven't seen in most other rooms. Really unique and fun puzzles. Really great quality, time, effort, thought and love went into making these rooms. Total immersion and true teamwork required! I am looking forward to checking out their other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Villian's Lair" by Exit Game in Los Angeles
review: Very well constructed puzzles and challenges, lots of varieties, and allow different people with different skills to solve. Definitely worth trying all the challenges because they are all different! Mechanical, physical, logical, mathematical, deceptional, sequential, tag-team-working ones, all the classic room-escape genre puzzles are there! The best part is they listen to the people's responses and improves on their puzzles. Love this team of builders and designers!

room_title: Escape room "The Villian's Lair" by Exit Game in Los Angeles
review: Their Villain's Lair room was amazing! Technology like I haven't seen in most other rooms. Really unique and fun puzzles. Really great quality, time, effort, thought and love went into making these rooms. Total immersion and true teamwork required! I am looking forward to checking out their other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Twisted" by New Smyrna Beach Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: Oh so awesome! Not what I was expecting at all! My kids and I had a blast - we worked together as a team, which was an amazing experience. We have never done this before and did the Twisted room. "O" was great as was all the staff :)

room_title: Escape room "Twisted" by New Smyrna Beach Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: Amazing time with the family in the Twisted Room!! One of the most fun things the entire family has done!! Definitely coming back for more!!

room_title: Escape room "Egyptian Heist" by Mystery Quests in Colorado Springs
review: We used two rooms with our large family group during our recent trip to CO Springs. The rooms were both well thought out and challenging for escape room newbies as well as veterans. We would absolutely return to take on the remaining rooms. Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Egyptian Heist" by Mystery Quests in Colorado Springs
review: Great room, well thought out. We attend MANY escape rooms per month, and we will be back to Mystery-Quests!

room_title: Escape room "Egyptian Heist" by Mystery Quests in Colorado Springs
review: Amazing experience. We did the Egyptian Heist. Well put together and challenging. We will definitely be doing this again. Can't wait to do the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Informant" by The Unlockables in San Diego
review: Fun room! We did the Informant room which had a fun spy theme. I enjoyed the atmosphere and the way they tied hints and emergency stuff into the story of the room so it kept the story alive. Very fun place, and one of my favorite staff interactions! The owner was very friendly and talked to us about games and other escape rooms. I can’t wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "The Informant" by The Unlockables in San Diego
review: We had a great time with our group of 4! The challenge was intense, from start to finish. Definitely recommend this experience to others!

room_title: Escape room "The Informant" by The Unlockables in San Diego
review: Had a amazing time! The kids loved Edwin and staff, we will be telling everyone to go there! Thank you so much for making Natasha's 16th birthday a hit! They didn't stop talking about all night and then woke up talking about it.See you in may

room_title: Escape room "Budapest Express" by Escapology Denver in Denver
review: This was our 26th escape room. We had a great time at the Budapest Express. Really high quality room, great puzzles, then great drinks & eats afterwards. We will be back to try every room here.

room_title: Escape room "Budapest Express" by Escapology Denver in Denver
review: My boyfriend and I have done close to 20 escape rooms, primarily in the Denver area. Escapology is the place to go if you’re looking for the whole package: awesome, high-quality games, delicious food and drink, and friendly, knowledgeable staff. We played the Budapest Express, and can’t wait to go back for more. We got there early for drinks and appetizers at the bar. The food came out quickly (try the bacon mac and cheese!) and they had a super cool cocktail menu!

room_title: Escape room "Budapest Express" by Escapology Denver in Denver
review: We were warmly greeted by hosts who led us to our escape room, the "Budapest Express." She gave us a briefing of what to expect and wished us luck on our adventure. The details of the room were well thought out and put together. They matched the time period of the adventure with clever touches throughout. Location was off-downtown with plenty of parking options. The indoor "Steampunk" decor, food/drink themed-offerings and escape rooms make me want to go back and take friends. Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Shipwrecked with St. Paul" by Bible Treks Christian Escape Room in Denver
review: We happened to stumble on this escape room by chance only to find out it was meant to be.  Our group has never done an escape room before and it turned out we got put into the hardest one with a 10% success rate.  Collin took about 20 minutes to go through an explanation of the mechanics and set the tone for the room.  The room was masterfully created and our challenges really allowed everyone to participate, each of our individual strengths were allowed to shine in order to get our team through the puzzles.  This is a great team building event.  Collin was an amazing host and we had the best time.

room_title: Escape room "Shipwrecked with St. Paul" by Bible Treks Christian Escape Room in Denver
review: We took 6 girls for my daughters 15th birthday party. It was an absolute hit! We loved the idea of a christian themed room too. The whole experience was great. The clues and the game were a fun and exciting challenge. I'd highly recommend Bible Treks. Thanks for the memories!

room_title: Escape room "Shipwrecked with St. Paul" by Bible Treks Christian Escape Room in Denver
review: What an amazing experience! It challenges your thinking skills but doesn’t make you feel like you don’t know enough about the Bible to solve it. It’s very exhilarating!

room_title: Escape room "The Sol Solution" by Digital Escape Rooms in Orlando
review: The team here is so accommodating and engaging, made for a great experience!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Sol Solution" by Digital Escape Rooms in Orlando
review: The best escape room I have ever seen! I recommend this adventure to everyone!

room_title: Escape room "The Sol Solution" by Digital Escape Rooms in Orlando
review: So much fun. There is nothing like it and truly a must. Talking to the guy there is so much to come on the way as well

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: We had a blast. Mom and Dad, our Adult daughter, son-in-law and our grandaughters. The rooms were challenging and filled with puzzles to solve. Great decor and theme. We escaped "the Dig"!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: We went yesterday and we had a blast! We did Dig and Prison Escape!!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: Had a great time on The Dig. Our guide Ellis did a great job on our first escape the room. The puzzles mixed with time makes it the fastest hour of fun. You learn about yourself and family when under pressure. Lots of fun. I recommend them

room_title: Escape room "Voices" by Twisted Exit in Lancaster (CA)
review: We had a great time in the Voices room. It's nice having fun places like this in the AV. I recommend the experience and will go back to try other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Voices" by Twisted Exit in Lancaster (CA)
review: Did the Voices room and it was a blast! Will definitely be going back again!

room_title: Escape room "The Mayfield Manor" by Unlocked Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Coolest thing ever! We had so much fun with all of our family of 11 doing the Mansion room! All we can say is communication is key!

room_title: Escape room "The Mayfield Manor" by Unlocked Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We escaped! This was my first experience and we had a larger group so we did the Mayfield Manor room (up to 14 people). Great puzzles and amazing owners who explained everything and were incredibly patient. I highly recommend this place and will definitely be back!! Thanks you guys!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Mayfield Manor" by Unlocked Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Unlocked Escape Rooms is so much fun!! Me and my awesome team passed with like 30 seconds to spare! Haha highly recommended!! Such a great team building activity!

room_title: Escape room "Pikes Peak or Bust: Colorado’s Gold Rush" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: That was awesome! What a super fun and exciting idea for a game. Totally LOVED it! Absolutely worth it...give it a try...you'll be glad you did!!!

room_title: Escape room "Pikes Peak or Bust: Colorado’s Gold Rush" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: We had such a wonderful time and can't wait to go again. This is a great activity for families

room_title: Escape room "Pikes Peak or Bust: Colorado’s Gold Rush" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: So much fun!!! Staff was very friendly, and offered to accommodate our group of 9 last minute (8 is the usual max), suggesting we do Dorm of the Dead. All of us were escape room "virgins" but we had a great time, even though we didn't quite find the zombie antidote in time! (This is apparently their 2nd most difficult room.) I would definitely go back! It's such a cool concept, and they do a great job making it fun and challenging! They even helped us work through the last couple clues after out time ran out. I highly recommend you get your friends, family, coworkers, whoever together ASAP and try an Epic Escape Game!

room_title: Escape room "Pikes Peak or Bust: Colorado’s Gold Rush" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: What a great time! We went for a friends birthday. We did one of the "easier" rooms and it was a blast! The price was fair, the employees were awesome, and the puzzles fun. DO THIS! you will enjoy it!

room_title: Escape room "Pikes Peak or Bust: Colorado’s Gold Rush" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: If you're looking for a great way to spend time with your family, you'd be hard pressed to find something better than this. The puzzles are very clever and everyone is completely involved. As you solve one puzzle, you'll find yourself racing to the next, your pace increasing with each success as the clock relentlessly marches to zero. The pressure is intensely fun! Like others, we enjoyed it so much we did it two more times that week! BTW, we tried Puzzah, and Epic is much better. The rooms are tiny at Puzzah.

room_title: Escape room "Pikes Peak or Bust: Colorado’s Gold Rush" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Great Experience.....we will be back to try a more challenging room in the future.

room_title: Escape room "Pikes Peak or Bust: Colorado’s Gold Rush" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: One of the most fun yet frustrating nights we've had. We will certainly be back!

room_title: Escape room "Ala Moana Stock Exchange" by Breakout Waikiki in Honolulu
review: it was AWESOME!! definitely going back!! must try!

room_title: Escape room "Ala Moana Stock Exchange" by Breakout Waikiki in Honolulu
review: Fun for the whole family!!! Made for an amazing family game night... Already planning our next challenge!

room_title: Escape room "Ala Moana Stock Exchange" by Breakout Waikiki in Honolulu
review: We had an awesome time! I definitely expected it to be fun, but our experience was made even more great by the super fun and interactive host Savannah!!

room_title: Escape room "Ala Moana Stock Exchange" by Breakout Waikiki in Honolulu
review: This place was awesome. I would definitely try another room in a heartbeat.

room_title: Escape room "Ala Moana Stock Exchange" by Breakout Waikiki in Honolulu
review: I think I can speak for our entire group that we had SUCH a great time. We did one room, then after having so much fun, had to do the other. Both had a few "holy crap" moments (I'm carefully trying not to spoil) that turned a simple puzzler into a true experience. I would completely recommend it to others, and plan to be back when their next room is set up.

room_title: Escape room "The Mafia Heist" by Escape This Live: Columbus in Columbus (GA)
review: This was an awesome experience! So much fun for my team and I that went for team building. The room was challenging, but we made it out of the Mafia Heist room!! The adrenaline rush you get makes you feel alive. I strongly suggest you come on and give it a try if you've been thinking about it. Worth the money!

room_title: Escape room "The Mafia Heist" by Escape This Live: Columbus in Columbus (GA)
review: Did the Mafia room with my family and it was worth every minute literally! Had a blast and can only think of when I'm going back to do another experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Mafia Heist" by Escape This Live: Columbus in Columbus (GA)
review: We had a blast! We did the Mafia Heist and finished with 2 mins to spare, and it's definitely wasn't easy! Can't wait to do it again!

room_title: Escape room "The Mafia Heist" by Escape This Live: Columbus in Columbus (GA)
review: Went here for a team-building experience. We were in the Mafia Heist Room and we had a blast. Complete teamwork and fun. We escaped with only 9 minutes and 11 seconds left. My sincere thanks to all my employees who participated and most of all thank you Escape This Live staff. AWESOME!

room_title: Escape room "The Mafia Heist" by Escape This Live: Columbus in Columbus (GA)
review: Very fun! We did not make it put of Mafia Heist (4 of us) but we had fun laughing with each other. Much more complicated than I thought it would be. Would definitely go back!

room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent Rescue" by Colorado Escape in Denver
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Death Row" by Xtreme Escape Games in Marco Island
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Mad Rapper" by Scenario Escape Room in Orange County
review: I've played close to 100 escape rooms and Scenario Escape Room is a MUST GO. I'm all about this room- The Mad Rapper...the graffiti artwork, the music, the games, the hip hop themed room - all of it made this room hella FUN. I felt the games were different from other rooms we played which made it really unique. Not to give away too much, but there's this one room where you play a game that reminds me of one of those carni games. Loved it!!  My son who's 11 enjoyed the room and he was super helpful. If you're in SoCal, you gotta go to Scenario Escape Room and play The Mad Rapper.

room_title: Escape room "The Theft" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: Would recommend if you have kids or novice players. Avoid if you have escape room connoisseurs. 5/5 for room design - it sets the mood for a break in. 1/5 puzzle difficulty - most of the puzzles were ultra easy to figure out. I could be that I'm a little more experienced and should have opted for a more challenging room. (We were out in less than 20 minutes, so understandably, I didn't feel like we received our money's worth).

room_title: Escape room "The Theft" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: Nice backstory and immersive room. A mix of modern and unique traditional puzzles that fit the theme nicely. Good room for newbies. I highly recommend any of the Lock Down rooms. The staff was friendly and very accommodating with the booking process. The game master was tracking our progress carefully and gave hints promptly.

room_title: Escape room "The Theft" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: Escaped the Theft room with my family on 5-14-17 (with 3 seconds to spare). We had an absolute blast! The escape room was challenging (which is the point) and so well created. The staff was fantastic. It was a thoroughly enjoyable time. We will definitely be back to conquer another room.

room_title: Escape room "The Theft" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: Five of us members of the same family had a ball figuring out how to get out of The Theft with little time to spare! Thinking seriously about doing it again in another room. Definitely recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "The Theft" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: Had a great time, almost broke a record in the theft room, great service, and all around fantastic experience! I've already convinced my closest friends to try it out!

room_title: Escape room "The Theft" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: We had a great time doing the Thief room but got stuck a few times. We did end up figuring it out in the end and beating the time but only with a lot of help. Overall it was a great experience but the North Valley Escape Room in Anthem is so far the best we've been too.

room_title: Escape room "The Theft" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: Did the Theft room and we loved it!! Can't wait to try the other rooms!!

room_title: Escape room "Flagler's Runaway Train" by Key West Room Escape in Key West
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by The Ultimate Escape Rooms in Ventura
review: Did the Attic room. It was a great room. Lots of fun.

room_title: Escape room "Pipe Works" by Puzzle Effect Phoenix in Phoenix
review: Really fun with a group of people. You are locked in a room and have to use the clues and riddles given to you in order to escape. I enjoyed it and you will too.

room_title: Escape room "Pipe Works" by Puzzle Effect Phoenix in Phoenix
review: My daughter and I had a great time at this place.  We had so much fun solving the riddles that we went back and did another room.  We really enjoyed working with the other people to figure out the riddles and unlock the clues.  It was really fun and interesting.

room_title: Escape room "Pipe Works" by Puzzle Effect Phoenix in Phoenix
review: We went to the new location (and newly renamed) Puzzle Effect and found the same Top Notch customer service as the original location. The manager, Marian, who was also our gamemaster, was super nice and welcoming. We did the Pipe Works, which turned out to be a good, solid escape room. This room could be divided into 2 teams racing against each other, or as we did it, one team. This was a fun room, run by a fun staff. Marian was a great gamemaster, and she knew exactly when we needed nudges and help. (Thx, Marian!) We highly recommend this location to beginners and experienced gamers alike.

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: Cannot wait to be open!!! Yeeee

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: Super game! Top hosts. Highly recommend it to everyone visiting LA. Fun fun fun

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: I loved it. Can't wait to go back my team and I had a fantastic time.

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: This game brought out all my competitive side!!! I had so much fun!!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: These rooms are the most fun you'll ever have, they can't make them fast enough!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: Our second visit, we played both of the new rooms, and enjoyed them both immensely! Very tough, especially the zombie room, but also really clever and well thought out. I love these rooms!!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: Such a great experience, we've been twice (bunker and zombie) and can't wait to go again! The rooms have great production quality, a wide variety of clues, and are interactive so the whole group can participate and enjoy. The theming is great and the staff is friendly and helpful. The zombie room was harder than the bunker, so I'd suggest starting with the bunker or asking the staff which room to book if you haven't played before. They're very helpful and will help you find a room that's a good fit for your group.

room_title: Escape room "Save The Mountain!" by Vail Valley Escape Room in Avon
review: We had the best time! It was hard but not impossible. Our working together was hysterical.

room_title: Escape room "Save The Mountain!" by Vail Valley Escape Room in Avon
review: The rooms were very creative and a ton of fun! Two adults were able to complete two of the rooms with time left over.

room_title: Escape room "The Curse of the Black Knight" by EscapeX Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Having done all of EscapeX's other rooms we were very excited to try out their new room, The Curse of the Black Knight.As with all their other rooms, they did not disappoint with the amount of detail and storytelling that is intricately and meticulously built into the rooms.  We were able to escape but the puzzles were definitely challenging and keep you on your toes.The tech in this room was fantastic and seamless, anytime something would be completed or unlocked the transitions were seamless and very well designed.Our game master, Anthony, did a fantastic job setting the stage and environment for the room.  That is the one thing I've always truly enjoyed about EscapeX is the effort they put not only in their rooms but the stories and introductions.Fantastic job as always, we can't wait for your next new room in the future!

room_title: Escape room "The Curse of the Black Knight" by EscapeX Rooms in Los Angeles
review: This place is amazing! I tried the Mafia Heist room months ago, and had a blast. However, today I had the pleasure to help beta test the new Curse of the Black Knight room, and it exceeded every expectation I had. The attention to detail not only with the puzzles but also the immersion and decor was outstanding, and my friends and I felt a real sense of accomplishment after finishing each puzzle. Watch your step, keep your eyes open, and prepare for an adventure, because the rooms here pack a serious punch!

room_title: Escape room "The Curse of the Black Knight" by EscapeX Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I've done all the rooms from this company including the games at their previous location, and I've gotta say, they have really improved over the years.  Their newest game, the Cursed Knight is a perfect example of something new and innovative while still being approachable by newer player.  Definitely check this escape room out.

room_title: Escape room "Swiss Original" by Adventure Rooms in Hartford
review: Had a blast for an all-girls day! We did the Swiss Original room and had a lot of fun. We did not make it out but the staff was super friendly and gave us a little extra time! Will definitely return.

room_title: Escape room "Swiss Original" by Adventure Rooms in Hartford
review: This was so much fun, as a group of 10, we split up into two groups to race against each other and the clock, a diverse mix of age and background we were able to figure things out, laughed out loud quite a bit, the hour flew by, would definitely recommend it to friends!

room_title: Escape room "Swiss Original" by Adventure Rooms in Hartford
review: I went with my friend as a girls' night and to do something new. We only had to wait a few minutes to begin and the staff member explained everything well. It's hard to compare this to anything-the puzzles were a great mix of easy-hard, with multiple puzzles per room (3 rooms to finish). My friend and I made it 1/2 way through the last room before the we ran out of time. (We did the Swiss Original room). What was nice was the staff member at the end told us what we would have had to do to finish, so we got closure!

room_title: Escape room "Swiss Original" by Adventure Rooms in Hartford
review: This was a great time!!!! We did the remedy room and wanted to go back in immediately after we finished to do the swiss room-highly recommend for a group of friends!

room_title: Escape room "Swiss Original" by Adventure Rooms in Hartford
review: Got engaged at this place! Alex is amazing and the entire team made the day so awesome! The puzzles are on point and the crew that works there is the best! Everyone should go here

room_title: Escape room "The Ancient Temple" by Sly Fox Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: We had a great time in the Ancient Temple. The puzzles were difficult and the hints very helpful. Very creative activity. We will be back for another fun experience. Would definitely recommend.

room_title: Escape room "The Ancient Temple" by Sly Fox Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: Great puzzles and escape in the Ancient Temple today! Really enjoyed it!! Thanks for a great time!

room_title: Escape room "The Ancient Temple" by Sly Fox Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: This was my first escape adventure. We went to The Ancient Temple. It was a very well thought out design. Great staff. A nice balance of fun and challenge. Can’t wait for the next escape!

room_title: Escape room "The Ancient Temple" by Sly Fox Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: My friend and I decided to give Slyfox escapes a try for a girls night out. We did the hidden temple room and had an absolute blast! I've done 5 escape rooms and this would was definitely high on my list of favorites! The owner was so nice and helpful and we had the best time. Highly recommend this to anyone who enjoys fun puzzles and wants to try something new.

room_title: Escape room "The Ancient Temple" by Sly Fox Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: What a fun experience! The puzzles were challenging and fun to think through and discover. I appreciated the variety of riddles and puzzles mixed with the locks and key challenges. We had a group of 8 adults with a variety of backgrounds and talents and The Ancient Temple puzzle room was the perfect match for everyone's differing skills. I appreciate the style and creativity of the pre-room presentation and the detail to decor. of the actual puzzle room added to the experience. I love that the Puzzle Master's career backgrounds help them with the levels of creativity of this experience! Looking forward to the new room experiences!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Going Insane" by Escape 101 in Danbury
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: Took my family for an evening out - did the Do Not Disturb room. It was tons of fun!!! Much harder than the rooms we've done before, but we still made it out and had a good time. Josh was an excellent games master! We'll definitely be back next time we're in town.

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: This was our first time doing an escape room, we chose the Do Not Disturb room and it was super challenging and fun. Our game master, Isabel, was really sweet and helped us out with clues when we needed them. We’ll definitely be back to do another one!

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: This place was awesome! Even though we were so close we still had a blast. Love how our group in the beginning refuses to ask for clues but the game master kept giving it to is anyways lol. She said that she had to keep giving us clues even though we never asked for it lol. Also, love how its unlimited clues! Will have to try this again but with a different room!

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: This was so fun my coworkers and I went as our team builder and Adam was so fun! His personality made the breakout room awesome! The room is a little small but you'll be having so much fun that it's not as noticeable. I'll definitely be back this was so worth it!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: Our team of 4 had a great time doing the Do Not Disturb room!! Game master was entertaining, helpful, overall great. Would definitely come again!

room_title: Escape room "Save Christmas!" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Arcade" by Escape Era in San Diego
review: Definitely one of the best and most memorable escape rooms in the SD area. A mix of really good set design and fun, interesting puzzles made it an unforgettable experience.

room_title: Escape room "Arcade" by Escape Era in San Diego
review: This was a really fun escape room once we were there. The puzzles were great and creative and it was good for a big group. May not be ideal for someone with mobility challenges. Very fun time all the kids loved it. The booking was complicated as no one could really answer questions. I booked for a teen party. Things weren't transmitted from the booking to the facility. A little frustrating but the puzzles were great.

room_title: Escape room "Arcade" by Escape Era in San Diego
review: Came to this place after searching which had the highest ratings around town and I'm so glad I came to this place! I came here with 5 of my friends for some fun, and boy did we find it. The building is quietly tucked away in Sorrento Valley and pretty easy to get to. Upon arrival, we were very happily greeted by Zoe and her partner in crime. They gave us the full disclosure and all of the info we needed to fully enter the room we were going to escape from. We had an hour like most folks and that was just enough time for the 6 of us to find our way through the various puzzles (with several hints from the awesome duo up front). Highly recommend the arcade room while they still have it!

room_title: Escape room "Arcade" by Escape Era in San Diego
review: Arcade is a very tricky room but loads of fun.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Naughty List" by Escape Room Adventure in Daytona Beach
review: Had 8 teenagers do the Naughty List room and they loved it! The gentleman was so nice explaining how it works and the rules. We will definitely be back. Fun safe time.

room_title: Escape room "Antigravity" by Race 2 Escape in Albany (GA)
review: Excellent! The best escape room I've done so far! The Antigravity room is a must!

room_title: Escape room "Antigravity" by Race 2 Escape in Albany (GA)
review: We had a great time in the Antigravity escape room. The staff was supportive and helped us with any questions we had. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Antigravity" by Race 2 Escape in Albany (GA)
review: We escaped Antigravity! Well done and fun for everyone!

room_title: Escape room "The Hatch" by Escape FLA in Tampa
review: We have now played Operation Blackstone and The Hatch. We have played many games around the area and Escape Fla is in our top three. Ryan and the team made the experience a lot of fun and the games were very challenging. I recommend you make plans to go if you haven’t already.

room_title: Escape room "The Hatch" by Escape FLA in Tampa
review: This was our first time doing an escape room. We did The Hatch and we all enjoyed it thoroughly!!! Definitely going back for the other rooms!!

room_title: Escape room "The Hatch" by Escape FLA in Tampa
review: My husband and I went last night along with some family and friends last night to do The Hatch room. We were somewhat slow to start, but once we got into the groove of the room and proceeded with the clues, we had a blast! It felt like we were in the simulated situation while in the room. The owner was very helpful with clues to guide us without giving too much away. It was the best escape room I've been to in the Tampa Bay Area thus far. A huge bonus, you get a "secret beer" as part of the Secret Ale Society for completing your escape room. All around great experience! We will return!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: Set the course record! Cant wait to come back!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: Great room, very challenging, had a lot of fun with the family and barely escaped in time!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: First time and I Loved it!!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: Amazing time.

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE! Had a blast! Will def come again !!!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: Had a great time during the escape room. It was interesting and fun to solve puzzles. Definitely coming back!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: My friends and I had our very first Escape the Room game and we did the hardest difficulty mission which was Outbreak. I thought if I didn't finish the game I would feel really bummed out but I actually had an awesome time even though we didn't complete the room on our own! 10/10 fully intend to come back! And shoutout to Viola for giving us awesome hints!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: For my first time doing an escape room, it was fantastic! We had lots of fun and worked well with our group!! Viola was a great hostess and made the experience feel real. Definitely will come back! A+ from me.

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: Viola was great! The room itself was amazing (we did Outbreak), and I definitely recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: Loved the Outbreak Room hardest in the state and my group was apart of the top 9% to make it out within the last 30seconds........ can't wait for the bank hiest

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: We did the Outbreak Room and solved it with a few minutes to spare. We lost a few minutes to a broken lock, but they were helpful when that happened. The room is the best I have seen- lots of real clues and not red herrings. I would not suggest this for your first experience, though. First-timers are overwhelmed by the pace and the complexity of the concept, so doing this room will be frustrating for some. I would also suggest getting a Groupon or other discount, as it can get expensive to do escape rooms without when you have a group of people. Lastly, we had 10 people- our group of 6 and 4 strangers. That was too many. I think a group of 6 would have been perfect. You simply can't strategize or communicate the way you need to when you can't hear or come up with a plan for who does what because of chaos. Overall, I would highly recommend this for experienced escape room fanatics and teams who work well together and can delegate.

room_title: Escape room "An Evening In Paris" by Escape Countdown in Sarasota
review: My husband and I did the Paris room for couples and loved it! I thought it was going to be easier and I was pleasantly surprised that it was just difficult enough. We really enjoyed it! Super friendly and funny staff as well! I recommend it for date night!

room_title: Escape room "An Evening In Paris" by Escape Countdown in Sarasota
review: My wife and I had a blast again at Escape Countdown. We did the Evening in Paris and made it out with a minute to spare. We will definitely return very soon for another escape.

room_title: Escape room "An Evening In Paris" by Escape Countdown in Sarasota
review: Valentine's Day started off rough with my husband getting out of work late. We missed our reservation but the staff was so wonderful to put us into another room later even though they were almost booked up. My husband was sceptical about coming but he absolutely loved the experience when we were done. Thank you Escape Countdown for helping Valentine's Day not turn into a total disaster for us and helping us to make a memory that we will cherish!

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Bunker" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: We saved the world! Lol great time in the cold war bunker ... Amazing staff! Luca was awesome! We can't wait to rob the bank! What an adrenaline rush!

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Bunker" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: Loved This! Great series of puzzles and good use of the space to tie the whole room together. Really enjoyed the Bunker and will return for the Bank Vault. Really enjoyed having Noah for the hints. He was able to provide just enough of a push in the right direction. Can't wait for the next visit! Also, extremely easy to get to and find.

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Bunker" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: Very rarely do I leave reviews for places, but my experience here last weekend absolutely justifies one. I had a chance to try to escape the Cold War Bunker, and quite simply it was one of the most fun things I have ever done. The staff are incredibly friendly, the rooms are built and themed like mini soundstages, and the puzzles are genuinely difficult, but not impossible. It all adds to an awesome hour of puzzle solving and team building. I paid $33 to spend an hour frustrated and failing, and I can't wait to go back for more. If you derive any sort of joy from problem solving and working a riddle over and over until you finally solve it, you NEED to check this place out.RoomEscape LA, I will be back.

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Bunker" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: My group did both rooms, and BOTH are so perfect. The exact level of difficulty and ingenuity that you want in an escape room.We liked the bunker more -- escaped with ten minutes to go. It was impeccably decorated and had a good mix of logic and physical challenges. The bank was also so fun -- the flashlights were a good touch, and this room had a great multi-section layout. Escaped with ZERO seconds left on the clock!! Challenging but not undoable!

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Bunker" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: I've never tried anything like this. I'm not the least bit into video games but this was one of the coolest experience I've had in recent weeks. Just go with an open mind and be ready to think. My team did the cold war bunker. Allegedly, that's the easier of the two rooms, but we certainly found it challenging! One hour went by way too fast! The cool thing about doing this, is that for one hour you are completely immersed in what's going on around you. No phone or outside distraction competing for your attention. I thought of nothing but the task at hand the entire time we were locked in there and it was a very nice change of pace. The crew there is fabulous! Jo is so sweet and gave a nice little pep talk before you enter the bunker. Listen to what she says - she gives a few helpful hints that you're likely to forget once the action starts. I had a slight problem signing up online but she was more than helpful and took care of everything right away. Looking forward to going back and trying the bank vault!

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Bunker" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: I've watched a lot of James Bond movies, and I've always asked myself "I wonder if I can do what he does" - Now I know I can.I got together with a group of friends and did the Bunker. It was one of the best exhibitions of teamwork I had ever seen. We each had different positions, 1 person was a scribe, another would organize clues and process them, another would focus on the puzzles, one person was the leader making executive decisions, another person was constantly scouting the room for things others missed or things that changed in the room etc. We all had a lot of fun, and each person contributed something that helped us get to the next level, it wasn't just 1 person solving everything. Believe me when I say, every single position matters. Irene was a great host. (I think that was her name). She had a great sense of humor, and even joked with us when we we're doing something wrong. As the last 10 minutes hit the clock things got intense with the last puzzle. Finally we solved it, and saved the world! You're welcome.

room_title: Escape room "Flood The City" by Escape House Mesa in Phoenix
review: We played the room "flood the city" - it was very difficult! However we had the best time! It was a clean room, an intriguing and it kept us engaged the entire time. Brian helped us out with three clues and was great in setting the stage for the story! We'll definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "Flood The City" by Escape House Mesa in Phoenix
review: This was our first experience with an escape room and we had the most amazing time!  We decided to go as a family for my daughter's 16th birthday and we let her choose the room. She chose Flood the City because she said it sounded the most "interesting."  After booking the room, we realized it was also the most difficult, but we decided we were up for the challenge.  The staff here was also great!  Since we were newbies, he spent some time letting us know how it works and then went on to tell us the back story of our game. We were to discover the clues to unlock our door and to save the city from being flooded.  We were allowed 3 hints during our hour game, which we did use.  There were five of us and the game was definitely difficult but we escaped with only minutes to spare.  So much fun and we can't wait to return and try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Flood The City" by Escape House Mesa in Phoenix
review: Thank you Ryan for making our experience a great one. This was our family's 2nd time at Escape House Mesa, we did Flood the City and had a great time. Thanks again!

room_title: Escape room "Cartman's Escape Room" by Escape the Room LA in Los Angeles
review: Devin our games master was great... had a blast doing the South Park room that we stayed to do clock tower too... can’t wait to go back an do the other 2 rooms... great job escape the room la...

room_title: Escape room "Cartman's Escape Room" by Escape the Room LA in Los Angeles
review: My wife and I experienced the South Park and Jurassic-themed rooms, both of which had incredible production value. While we agreed that Cartman's room had the more interesting puzzles, both games were top notch. Staff was friendly, hints were helpful and plentiful, and we will likely return to experiences their two other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Totally 80’s" by Time Escape Loveland in Fort Collins
review: Great escape room! Totally 80's room was totally awesome.

room_title: Escape room "Totally 80’s" by Time Escape Loveland in Fort Collins
review: We did the 80's room. We had 4 adults and 5 kids in the room. We were able to find the Bad tickets and open the door with less than a minute left. It was a lot of fun for our whole family, including the kids.

room_title: Escape room "Totally 80’s" by Time Escape Loveland in Fort Collins
review: We just had the pleasure of playing the 80's room at Time Escape and WOW! We have played nearly every escape room in northern Co and were blown away with the entire experience. They built out a beautiful classic property in downtown Loveland and filled it with challenging and very well thought out games and an awesome staff! We were laughing and having fun with the 80's memorabilia and rocking out with authentic music and props! Rob and Krista are awesome and run one of the very best Rooms around! 10 stars!

room_title: Escape room "Totally 80’s" by Time Escape Loveland in Fort Collins
review: Time Escape Loveland is Ah-Mazing! We were treated so kindly at the door and everything was perfectly explained! Our experience in the 80's Escape Room was a blast! When you walk in the door, it's like stepping into your high school bedroom with all things '80s that you can imagine!! The riddles and clues kept us on our toes right to the very end...but we escaped with 4 minutes left!! We'll be back!!!A big shout out to Miss Hadley, our hostess! She was a hoot and very helpful & accommodating!! We loved her as much as our first Escape Room experience!!Time Escape is a great addition to the Loveland Community and definitely worth your time!!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Prison" by Escape Folsom in Sacramento
review: My group and I had a blast doing the prison escape. Puzzles were challenging but not impossibly difficult. Next time we'll eat and drink there too!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Prison" by Escape Folsom in Sacramento
review: We came to do the prison escape room and it was so much fun! Arrived early enough to enjoy some drinks and then dived into our game!The manager Philip was also great and super accommodating. Would definitely return to try and solve another room!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Prison" by Escape Folsom in Sacramento
review: We were not able to escape the prison but had such a blast. The service was great and the food was good. This place rocks!

room_title: Escape room "The Golden-Bug" by Smart Escape in Washington, D.C.
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Lighthouse" by Golden Puzzle Room in Denver
review: So much fun!! Really challenging, great staff - highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Lighthouse" by Golden Puzzle Room in Denver
review: This was our first time doing the puzzle room. It was just my husband and I and it was so much fun, even though we went over the cliff... LOL

room_title: Escape room "The Lighthouse" by Golden Puzzle Room in Denver
review: My husband and I were so late to solving The Lighthouse. Unfortunately we remained on the island! It was our first Escape Room and we loved every minute of it. It was fun to work together and all the details and cute additional made it more thrilling. We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tok" by Panic Room CT in Stamford
review: What a day! The Tick Tok room was great, and the staff was fantastic! A birthday I will never forget.

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tok" by Panic Room CT in Stamford
review: This was our first escape room. We did Tik Tok and loved it, came very close to solving it with only two locks left. I was worried it might not be something we all would enjoy, but that was not the case. Our group ranged from 16-21 and we all agreed we will definitely do it again! Super fun and challenging!

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tok" by Panic Room CT in Stamford
review: What a fun, unique time! Great couples night out! Would highly recommend!! Can't wait to do it again! (And break the record again!!!)

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tok" by Panic Room CT in Stamford
review: My husband and I took our children (16-21) and their friends. We had a great time! This is a wonderful "game" to play where the cell phones are not just put away but you don't even think about them. We can't wait to book a different room and do it all over again! Thanks Panic Room!

room_title: Escape room "Shanghaied" by Escapology Denver in Denver
review: The professionalism at this space was wonderful. Everything from our friendly GM (Go Luke!) to the props and puzzles. It was all great. We completed the Shanghaied room in time with a couple clues from Luke. He did a great job giving clues that made us think in a different direction without giving anything away!

room_title: Escape room "Shanghaied" by Escapology Denver in Denver
review: We did the room Shanghaied. We had to escape before our ship left. We found several clues but unfortunately did not succeed. We did have a lot of fun figuring out the clues we did find. We found it very fun and look forward to trying another room.

room_title: Escape room "Shanghaied" by Escapology Denver in Denver
review: We had a great time for my friend's b-day trying to escape Shangheid. Great food, drinks, and games in the lounge area.

room_title: Escape room "Foster's Fortune" by Mystery Mansion in Little Rock
review: We did the beautiful Foster's Fortune room today. We found out some highly interesting information about Arkansas leading up to the room and then began the "most challenging" room in the Mansion. There was a LOT to do in the room, and that's about all I can say without giving away too much information. At the end, we didn't quite finish in time but we were allowed to go slightly over the allotted 60 minutes and complete it. I recommend definitely giving this place a try if you want a fun way to work your brain for an hour!

room_title: Escape room "Foster's Fortune" by Mystery Mansion in Little Rock
review: I went with a group to celebrate a birthday and it was so fun! We did the Foster Fortune room and it had tons of challenging riddles and clues that eventually led us to find hidden and "illegal" coins as well as the key to escape! A moderator watched on camera and gently nudged us in the right direction when we were struggling with the riddle or locks. My team finished in 1 hour and 2 minutes, the best time yet!

room_title: Escape room "Foster's Fortune" by Mystery Mansion in Little Rock
review: We did the Foster's Fortune room. You don't have to be a genius to have fun at this! Definitely a group exercise. Great staff very friendly! would absolutely do again!

room_title: Escape room "Foster's Fortune" by Mystery Mansion in Little Rock
review: Foster's fortune was really hard and the theme was intriguing and the setting was immersive. Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Dracula" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I loved *other* 60Out rooms, but didn't enjoy this one even though we escaped. This was my 36th room I've escaped, and a lot of the puzzles didn't seem super logical. So when you find two components of a puzzle, it's not clear that they go together, let alone how to use them. We were a bit disappointed that the game masters gave us hints that we didn't ask for, but they were just trying to make sure we maintain a good pace in order to escape the room.

room_title: Escape room "Dracula" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We played the Dracula room and Chris was an amazing escape room runner! Very attentive and fun! I highly recommend booking here. Chris will show you a really fun time!

room_title: Escape room "Dracula" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We had an amazing time getting to preview Dracula’s room before it opened. It was the first experience for everyone in our group and WE LOVED IT! The staff is also super great.

room_title: Escape room "Dracula" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: The Dracula room was great. It's  definitely on the hard side as the room has great puzzles that involve every aspect of the room. Gamemaster Valerie was very helpful. She gave us hints when we needed it. Overall we had a great time.

room_title: Escape room "Dracula" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: One of my favorite 60OUT locations! We've done Grandma's Masterplan, Dracula, and Alice in Wonderland! All rooms are fantastic and the puzzles make you think in a different and new way. Of course, the sets are always amazing and it is a big part of the appeal. Love it when I get fully immersed in the theme!

room_title: Escape room "The Secret at Whitmore Estate" by Breaking Point Escape Rooms in Pomona
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Silo" by The Escapery in Atlanta
review: We chose the Silo room and it was great. This was my first time and I will definitely be back to try the other rooms. It was very challenging and the hour just flew by. I would recommend this to anyone that wants to try something a bit different.

room_title: Escape room "Silo" by The Escapery in Atlanta
review: We had an awesome work outing here! Highly recommend! Olivia was an excellent guide and made 110% sure we had a fantastic experience. Couldn't be happier.

room_title: Escape room "Silo" by The Escapery in Atlanta
review: Went in with my family shortly after Christmas. Not only was it open, we had a blast! The room was difficult and a very fun challenge. Jacob was a great host and was happy to help when we needed it. He also stayed in character which is a huge plus. We all had a great time and we escaped!

room_title: Escape room "The Witch's Cauldron" by Quest Tavern Escape Room in Pomona
review: The witch theme escape room was fun. The game host did a great job with setting the mood of the theme. Their were a good mixture of different types of puzzles. Can't wait to try the next escape room when it comes out.

room_title: Escape room "The Witch's Cauldron" by Quest Tavern Escape Room in Pomona
review: We did the witch's cauldron. We had 6. I feel that was an appropriate team size for the room. It was fun. We escaped. We have done many escapes and we needed some hints. Don't be afraid to ask for hints. Jordan was our host. He was friendly and told a great story. Thanks for an awesome time!

room_title: Escape room "Hollywood Premiere - Destination Los Angeles" by ALL IN Adventures Orange Park in Jacksonville
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Never Ending Night" by The Game Fort Collins in Fort Collins
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Chronostopia" by Chronos Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: So much mechanical and magnetic work, best escape room I've done yet! Did chronostopia and didn't escape but definitely want to come back and try inception lol

room_title: Escape room "Chronostopia" by Chronos Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: We had a great time. This was our first escape room experience and It was a really fun. We did Chronostopia room. It was very well decorated will decent amount of technology we will definitely come back and look forward to the next time!!!

room_title: Escape room "Chronostopia" by Chronos Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Hi I came here on weekend and did Chronostopia room. It was amazing and rewarding. We enjoyed it. Recommend wearing comfortable clothes. No cell phones or anything it all stays in a locker. Very fun though definitely recommend on a hot day!

room_title: Escape room "The Royal Suite" by Escape This in Hesperia
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Agency" by Escape the Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: Had my bachelorette party here - so much fun! We had a group of 5. Such a unique and fun experience. The staff are all super nice, and the place is so cozy. Kind of hard to find - it's in the same building as the Starbucks but down the sidewalk to the left of Starbucks main entrance.

room_title: Escape room "Agency" by Escape the Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: We had a great time at the Washington DC location! The staff was friendly and helpful, the clues were challenging enough and the rooms are themed.

room_title: Escape room "Agency" by Escape the Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: We just went for the first time. It's a good time and we met some nice people from France and California that was in our group. We will be back to do other rooms - so, I recommend. I would have put 5 stars, but for me, it's not "my cup of tea". But it is my spouses and she absolutely LOVED it. So, for her, 5 stars for sure. If this is your sort of fun, it's worth it.

room_title: Escape room "Agency" by Escape the Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: Great pulse pounding 45 minutes! We escaped double agents digs!

room_title: Escape room "Agency" by Escape the Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: Such a unique experience! The Agency exceeded my expectations and completely sucked me in. The clues and puzzles were so clever...mad props to whoever comes up with this stuff! Can't wait to try the other room(s). If you're looking for something different and fun to do in DC...go Escape The Room!

room_title: Escape room "Agency" by Escape the Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: We just went tonight for my birthday. We were 15 seconds from escape, but we felt accomplished because we actually found the key. We had the best time. You've GOT to go!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Escape The Room Chandler in Phoenix
review: I have done 21 one escape rooms with my fiance! We love them; we came here and played The Theater room, which was fun, and a little challenging. We recently came back to do OutBreak, which we knew was the hardest room, but this room is specifically meant as a money grab room, which I have played a few rooms like this, elsewhere; before! What I mean by that is the room is designed so you don't make it out, and they take your $100 bucks that is costed you to book it! There is a difference between challenging and just making it so hard that you spend the whole time on one set of puzzles starting at screens which hurt your eyes! I thought the concept of the room was awesome but the way the room was laid out, game wise was not good at all! This room in my opinion needs to be reworked; I will not becoming back here again, and I will not be doing another escape room in general, for a long time as this room left me with a very bad, and annoyed feeling, of being taken advantage of money wise! I can no longer recommend this place to anyone that I know or that asks me!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Escape The Room Chandler in Phoenix
review: There were 7 of us and we needed everyone! Wasn't easy at all but with the clues we made it thru! Will definitely be going back to try the other rooms. It is kinda pricey so it would be for another special occasion. The people working there were GREAT!!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Escape The Room Chandler in Phoenix
review: Staff was so beyond sweet & welcoming. Went for part of my fiancé's 21st birthday. We did the Outbreak room. It was honestly pretty challenging! Staff said that's their hardest room. We didn't finish the whole room in time but we only had two steps left before we could've won so I think we did pretty well!! Overall we had a great time & we are excited to do the other two rooms soon!! We found a 50% off coupon online so definitely look for coupons or sign up for emails for them to send you coupons every now & then!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Escape The Room Chandler in Phoenix
review: We did a team build event here and it was so much fun. Most of the group had never done one before and we managed to save the world from a virus in the Outbreak room and escaped in about 55 minutes. This is new to the Chandler Mall (right by BJ's Brewery and where Cold Stone Creamery used to be). Super clean and really nice inside. Our host was super nice too. The staff was very friendly. I'm definitely going back with a group of friends.

room_title: Escape room "Abandoned Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: Terrible venue. They start the clock exactly on the hour and end the room exactly on the hour. Get caught in a Florida thunderstorm while driving an hour to visit the venue? Too bad, you lose 10 minutes. The hour is up and you're literally 5 minutes from finishing the room? Too bad, you need to stop playing immediately even if they don't have another group scheduled after you. After 25+ escape rooms I've been to I've never seen such disgusting customer service.

room_title: Escape room "Abandoned Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: Today was my first time doing an escape room. My friends and I had a really good time. This place uses technology to make the overall experience very creative and interactive. We did the Abandoned Zombie Lab, and it was such a fun experience. I would definitely do another room at this location.

room_title: Escape room "Abandoned Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: We choose to do the Abandoned Zombie Lab. This was definitely a fun time we had to analyze, search and use quick thinking to beat the 1 hour clock. We won with 3 mins to spear and only needed to ask Jo for 1 clue. Our team consisted of myself (The mom), my two sons who are 18 and 21 years old and my sister.

room_title: Escape room "Abandoned Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: I've completed all four rooms avaliable, and I can say they were the best I've ever played! Hard to choose a favorite between the zombie and prison. The decorations support the story, and the zombie lab also has creepy music that keeps you on your toes! The puzzles are challenging, but not impossible, and the staff are always ready to help out with a clue when you've hit a tough spot. Overall a great experience, and I will be back when the new rooms open!

room_title: Escape room "Abandoned Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: We had a blast. It was challenging and fun. We did the zombie room with 4 people and it was a perfectly fun evening! I highly recommend it. Thanks Nicky, you were a great host.

room_title: Escape room "Abandoned Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: Jo was the best host!! It was amazing, fun and a great mental workout! We saved the world in the Abandoned Zombie Lab and next we are going back for the Bunker!

room_title: Escape room "Sanctum VR" by VR Tech Lounge in Boise
review: Amazing!!!!!! Not just for kids!!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Sanctum VR" by VR Tech Lounge in Boise
review: Really cool! Great owners helping us out on our first time. It was really fun! We will be back

room_title: Escape room "Sanctum VR" by VR Tech Lounge in Boise
review: Great place, excellent staff & very reasonable prices! We had a wonderful time.

room_title: Escape room "Darkness Falls" by Locked In Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: Had an awesome time! Darkness Falls was difficult but we were able to do it with 5 others with 3 minutes left. Will be doing this again!

room_title: Escape room "Darkness Falls" by Locked In Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: Had so much fun in Darkness Falls. We did it with just two people. Definitely don't give up and bring 3-4 smart people. Highly recommend. We will be back to try the rest of the rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Darkness Falls" by Locked In Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: My husband and I did the Darkness Falls room and loved it! We travel all over the country to do escape rooms, as we also own one and it was such a fun experience! Definitely recommend this room! We will be back for helter skelter!

room_title: Escape room "Darkness Falls" by Locked In Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: My son and his friends chose Darkness Falls. They had a blast working together to solve the clues and they actually completed it with 1 second to spare.

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Manor in Panama City
review: Escape manor's "Asylum" room is so much fun! Definitely going back to escape from a different room! Money well spent.

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Manor in Panama City
review: Had an excellent day in the Asylum. It was HARD to figure everything out. Super fun and challenging. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Manor in Panama City
review: The staff was great and made us feel super pumped to be there! The Asylum was fun and had the right amount of stumps to challenge you. Great place to spend time with friends and learn some teamwork!

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Manor in Panama City
review: This was the best one I have done. It was well decorated and had great mysteries and an awesome story. I loved it. Everyone has to try it.

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Manor in Panama City
review: This is the third location I've done an escape room at, and it was by far the best. If you're on the fence and considering it, I would strongly urge you to take a leap & give it a try. Everyone from my fiancé, to friends, and even my mother has loved it. I can't recommend it enough.

room_title: Escape room "Jigsaw" by Rooms of No Return in Bakersfield
review: Employees are nice although room felt like it was more of a matter of finding numbers not puzzle solving and teamwork

room_title: Escape room "Jigsaw" by Rooms of No Return in Bakersfield
review: The room was great they really challenged you in this jigsaw escape. 4 rooms, the first room ,my group, found the most difficult because we over thought it;however, the other 3 rooms were great you must work together

room_title: Escape room "Jigsaw" by Rooms of No Return in Bakersfield
review: My friends and I decided to try the Jigsaw themed escape room here, after work today. It was fun and challenging. It definitely requires everyone working together to get through all the clues. There were four rooms connected, and some were more challenging than others. Although we didn't make it out (just needed like 3 more minutes),  we all had a blast . I'd definitely recommend this, especially if you want to try something different.

room_title: Escape room "Jigsaw" by Rooms of No Return in Bakersfield
review: Best escape game I've played in the Bakersfield area. This is a fun multi-room live escape game. It is well decorated. There is more "stuff" than you need to solve the puzzles, but it adds to the feel of the room. There is both searching and puzzles. It's a bit like a home haunt and an escape room had a baby. I recommend playing if you are in the Bakersfield area. The owners seem quite nice and passionate about the escape game industry.

room_title: Escape room "Jigsaw" by Rooms of No Return in Bakersfield
review: The staff is always very polite, and there are always just enough nudges in the right direction to feasibly escape in the nick of time. That being said, these are still some of the most challenging (and well decorated) rooms in town.

room_title: Escape room "The Crematorium" by 101 Escape Rooms in Ventura
review: None

room_title: Escape room "We Are All Mad Here" by The Ultimate Escape Rooms in Ventura
review: Myself, my two teenage daughters and one of their friends escaped from "We are all mad here" with less than a minute to spare. It was a blast. We can't wait to check out the others!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Lab" by Extreme Escape Redding in Redding
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Christmas Blackout" by Escape Room Entertainment in Melbourne
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Lake Elsinore in Temecula
review: We were one of the lucky ones to test out the Antidote room before the Grand Opening... It was such a great experience. The staff was great! Can’t wait to try out the other rooms..

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Lake Elsinore in Temecula
review: I'm sooooo surprised at how nicely this was done! The lounge and bar area is beautiful! Took three 14 year old boys and one other Adult to the "Antidote" room. The boys had so much fun they asked if we could come back tomorrow morning and do another one! We've been to another escape room in Temecula and this one is so much better. Only complaint is maybe 90 mins would be better than 60 and the intercoms they use to talk to you are really hard to understand what they're saying. Overall great experience!

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Lake Elsinore in Temecula
review: Such a fun time! I surprised my husband and went with him and our 9 and 12 year old children. We were in the Antidote room, which was perfect for first-timers like us. We all had a blast. Our game host Nick, and Game Master Ferd did an excellent job of helping us keep the game moving along. We were always engaged and working towards our next clue. Definitely worth the price.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
