review: Our family had so much fun we went back the next day and did another room!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: We had a great time. It was just two of us in the Hostage room. We were truly soooooo close - but no cigar!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: The Hostage room was fun! I've played a lot of escape games with a better room design but I gotta say that they got some really cool puzzles in there!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: This was our first Escape room experience and it was definitely a good one! We had 7 people which seemed to be a good amount but definitely wouldn't add any more. Staff were friendly and knowledgeable!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: It was hard but fun!!My friends and I were overly excited but the kidnap room was tight and way too many locks!

room_title: Escape room "The Jewel Heist" by Mind Bender Escape Rooms in Jacksonville
review: My husband and I just experienced the Jewel Heist. It was a ton of fun! The puzzles are well thought out and just challenging enough to leave you with a sense of accomplishment no matter where you finish. I would totally do this again and bring friends!

room_title: Escape room "The Jewel Heist" by Mind Bender Escape Rooms in Jacksonville
review: My friends and I got paired up with a family and we all had so much fun working together to escape Jewel Heist! I would definitely recommend to anyone who likes to exercise their brain. Can't wait to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "The Jewel Heist" by Mind Bender Escape Rooms in Jacksonville
review: We had so much fun!!! Thank you to Chris and his Mindbender team! This is a really fun place to take a group for team building, problem solving, or a good time! We did the Jewel Heist and it was a challenge we all got to work on!

room_title: Escape room "The Jewel Heist" by Mind Bender Escape Rooms in Jacksonville
review: Had a blast today in the jewel heist! I took my 14-year-old son and 3 of his friends. The room was challenging but not impossible. I helped when they got stuck but they didn't make it out. My husband and I are already planning on going back. The staff was super friendly and helpful, the rooms are set up very nicely, clean and safe facility. Definitely worth the cost for a fun adventure!

room_title: Escape room "Camelot" by Hourglass Escape Rooms in Russellville
review: We went as a big group and had a blast doing the Camelot room! Samuel was helpful and very friendly! It’s a fun time for big groups. I recommend everybody to go and try it out.

room_title: Escape room "Camelot" by Hourglass Escape Rooms in Russellville
review: We did the Camelot room. It was fun and very cleverly done. We ran out of time butt it was our first time. We didn’t realize that some steps had multiple steps. We were trying not to use hints. We finally used one... we got to the last step. I will say that it would have been better to say...10 steps, and spend less than 6 minutes per step. That budgeting would have helped...then, if we got stuck after 4 minutes, then use a hint. So, we want to go back and try that logic next time.

room_title: Escape room "Camelot" by Hourglass Escape Rooms in Russellville
review: We tried the Camelot Room on a recent Friday evening (along with my youngest son’s college roommate). We called and reserved the room in advance.The 2 staff we encountered were very friendly and helpful. After paying and signing waivers, we were shown a short video explaining the “Do’s & Dont’s” and how to use the iPad.They have lockers where you store your cell phones (& other items if you choose), as they do not allow phones in the rooms.This escape room does not use interactive game masters that we were used to. Instead, your hints are delivered by scanning QR codes around the room with the iPad. When you use the hints, it deducts from your time. There is also a bell in the room that you can ring at any time to have a game master come in and help if needed.We found the Camelot room to be challenging, but not to the point that it was frustrating. It wasn’t easy, but it also wasn’t so hard that it was unsolvable. The theme, layout, and props were all thought out very well.Without using any hints, we did escape with a couple of minutes to spare. Although I must admit, had it not been for our kids, my wife and I probably would’ve struggled a little more to make it out in time.After you escape, they take a group photo, which they post to their Facebook page.Overall, we had a great experience and will definitely try one of the other rooms next time!The only negative thing I can say (and it’s not that big of a deal) is that their sign and parking area were not very well lit and we actually passed the place when we first drove by.

room_title: Escape room "The Classroom" by Locked In in Birmingham
review: Had a great time as we worked to escape the Classroom. Definitely recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "The Classroom" by Locked In in Birmingham
review: What a great experience we had doing the Classroom at Locked In! It was challenging, unique and tons of fun! We had a blast and got out with 2 minutes to spare! The staff members were friendly and welcoming! Highly recommended for a night out!

room_title: Escape room "The Classroom" by Locked In in Birmingham
review: We went this past Saturday to celebrate my birthday that was on Monday. We did the classroom (the one with the least success rate) and to my surprise, we made it out with 5:25 left! We had an awesome time and can't wait to try the other rooms! So glad we went and tried it!

room_title: Escape room "The Classroom" by Locked In in Birmingham
review: Had a great time as we worked to escape 'the Classroom.' Definitely recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "Wizard's Keep" by Tampa Bay Escape Room in Tampa
review: My girlfriend and I did the Wizard's Keep. It was amazing. Our gamemaster, Jean, did an outstanding job! The clues seamlessly flowed together and the storyline of the room moved with you. Great room, great staff and we will definitely be back for another. We both would highly recommend this place!

room_title: Escape room "Wizard's Keep" by Tampa Bay Escape Room in Tampa
review: This was a great activity for the whole family! We did this for my husband’s birthday with our grown kids and grandson. We did the Wizards Keep and it was a great way to interact and enjoy an hour together - well, 45 minutes anyway! Everyone got involved and had fun solving the clues. I would do this again.

room_title: Escape room "Wizard's Keep" by Tampa Bay Escape Room in Tampa
review: we had a lot of fun! We decided to do the wizard escape room on a whim for my son's birthday as we were next door at the arcade. Even Nana had a blast! I highly recommend you check out this place the staff and the setup are fabulous

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Ship" by Maui Escape Rooms in Maui
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Detention Bay" by Method of Escape in Fresno
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Masquerade Manor" by Exodus Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: This was my first experience with escape rooms, and I couldn't have asked for a better introduction! I brought a group here yesterday for my birthday party and we ALL had a blast! The staff was wonderful, funny and incredibly sweet. We are definitely coming back for the Sherlock room!

room_title: Escape room "Masquerade Manor" by Exodus Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: We decided to stop in on our honeymoon and check out Exodus. On the drive over we were nervous and not sure what to expect. When we arrived we signed our waiver and we're lurched up in our room. With teamwork and focusing on each others strengths we were able to escape with just 5 mins to spare. We had an incredible time and are definitely coming back to visit and try the other rooms! Thank you for making our honeymoon unique and unforgettable!

room_title: Escape room "Masquerade Manor" by Exodus Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: So much fun!!! Don't wait! Even if you don't solve it you'll have a great trying!

room_title: Escape room "Masquerade Manor" by Exodus Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: This is a fun venue and it was a perfect birthday event for my husband. The staff is great. Can't wait to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Masquerade Manor" by Exodus Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: The puzzles were challenging and the atmosphere was fine but the decor was a bit bland for the story. The price was good though.

room_title: Escape room "Masquerade Manor" by Exodus Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Took a party of ten to the Masquerade! So hard and soooo much fun! Everyone said they would love to go back and try their other rooms...totally great experience!

room_title: Escape room "Captain’s Quarters" by Beat the Room in Sacramento
review: My husband and I took four 13-year-olds for a birthday activity and we had so much fun in the pirate themed room! It was challenging and it was great seeing the kids put their heads together. This was our first time doing anything like this and we are looking forward to trying another one soon! Thanks for making our day special!

room_title: Escape room "Captain’s Quarters" by Beat the Room in Sacramento
review: We had fun! We escaped the pirates in 58 minutes and 30 seconds. Yay for us! Rooms were small however challenging.

room_title: Escape room "Captain’s Quarters" by Beat the Room in Sacramento
review: This was so fun! The staff of as helpful and friendly! We did the Pirate room and escaped. An hour well spent! It's not easy so go with your smartest friends. You need to be creative and clever.

room_title: Escape room "Captain’s Quarters" by Beat the Room in Sacramento
review: I will definitely be back to play the other rooms! Such a great night! The staff was fabulous and the room was challenging!

room_title: Escape room "Captain’s Quarters" by Beat the Room in Sacramento
review: This place was great! The staff was awesome, the room was difficult but oodles of fun, and it made the perfect date night for my boyfriend and I! We will definitely be returning next time we're in the area to try our luck again!

room_title: Escape room "The Murder Mystery" by Pacifica Escape Zone in San Francisco
review: Super fun! My husband and I have probably done 25+ escape rooms both in the Bay and in other states and countries. (You would think we're really good at them, but no we just enjoy them .) We did the Mystery Room and didn't escape in time (got out in just over an hour). The host was really attentive (he wasn't in the room, but I guess from the monitors he could tell when we were struggling) and asked if we wanted clues at just the right times. He was super nice and friendly too and is why I give this place five stars instead of the four I would probably give just for the room itself.Storyline and theme was just okay, but it was still an overall good time. Would recommend this for a fun little date, the room is doable by two people.

room_title: Escape room "The Murder Mystery" by Pacifica Escape Zone in San Francisco
review: I did the murder room with a group of my friends.  We worked out butts off to figure out the puzzles and beat the room with 1 minute and 30 seconds left before the hour expired.  The room as challenging but totally doable.  Keep yourself organized and have fun!  Great way to build team spirit and have a fun group date.  Best tip is to embrace the experience, lose yourself in the game and you'll have a great time.The PEZ crew was very helpful and the rooms were very well done.5/5 would recommend.

room_title: Escape room "The Murder Mystery" by Pacifica Escape Zone in San Francisco
review: A fun way to spend time with a small group of friends or colleagues, solving a murder! Get a diverse group of buddies and each can work on a different clue or puzzle - we solved the "crime" and escaped with only a few moments to spare. If you're looking for a team building exercise - look no further.

room_title: Escape room "The Expedition" by Fort Smith Escape Room in Fort Smith
review: We had some much fun and an awesome experience! We did the expedition room and it was a tough but totally fun experience!

room_title: Escape room "John Smith's Speakeasy" by Escape Room 13 in Eureka Springs
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Locked Up" by Exithis Pensacola in Pensacola
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Escape Arcadia" by Bet You Can't Escape in Tampa
review: Did the arcade room tonight and my family and I had an absolute blast! This was such a fun way to have a family night with my parents, and my children. I will definitely be coming back!

room_title: Escape room "Escape Arcadia" by Bet You Can't Escape in Tampa
review: My group had a blast! Great activity. We did the Escape Arcadia room, it was very challenging but full of surprises. Staff was very friendly. Can't wait to try the rest of the rooms. Definitely will do again!

room_title: Escape room "Escape Arcadia" by Bet You Can't Escape in Tampa
review: Awesome time in the game room. Will return to do the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Escape Arcadia" by Bet You Can't Escape in Tampa
review: The Game room was a nice flashback to the 90's. Thanks guys. Great employees.

room_title: Escape room "Captain Madok's Treasure" by Society of Curiosities in Kauai
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Montgomery in Montgomery
review: This was my first Breakout experience. We booked The Kidnapping. Lot's of fun and I'm looking forward to returning.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Montgomery in Montgomery
review: Had a great time escaping the kidnapping room for a friend's birthday party. Will definitely be back to do the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Montgomery in Montgomery
review: So much fun! By far one of the best ways to have a good time in the area. The staff was so sweet and the place is really clean. We did the kidnapping with 2 adults and 2 kids (a teen and tween). They had a blast and I can't wait to go back for the other rooms. This would be a great place to take a group for a birthday celebration too!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Montgomery in Montgomery
review: It was so much fun. We did the kid napping and Katie (thank god we had her) was so patient with us. But we escaped on our first time doing it. Thank you so much for a memorable experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Montgomery in Montgomery
review: Best escape room I've ever done. We did the Kidnapping room and we loved all the variety of clues and puzzles. Best escape room by far and I've done 10+ different rooms in different cities.

room_title: Escape room "Th3 C0d3" by Escapology Destin in Destin
review: This was my first escape room and I'm hooked! We did the Code room with the whole family (ages 14-70). The lounge area and room decorations are top notch. Very professional, clean and upscale. Would also like to mention we escaped, but barely. Love that it's locally owned. Super nice setup. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Alcatraz" by EscapeSF in San Francisco
review: This place is amazing! All the puzzles/challenges really fit the Alcatraz theme and the environment is very realistic. A group of 4 (old friends in mid 30s) did this at the weekend. We played the Escape from Alcatraz Escape and LOVED every minute. So much that we booked the Antique game right after and already planning to try the 3rd. Highly recommended and great fun...

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Alcatraz" by EscapeSF in San Francisco
review: Great planning put into the Alcatraz room! I liked that there wasn't a ton of confusing and excess props used for staging because it's hard to find importance in each clue when only 4/25 matter! Also really liked the electronic aspect of it and the puzzle of thing popping open! Will definitely be back for more adventures with our groupon!

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Alcatraz" by EscapeSF in San Francisco
review: Just Did the Escape from Alcatraz! We had a blast! I highly recommend doing it! The staff are super friendly and they make the adventure fun. This was a very unique and memorable experience and I am so glad a friend told me about Escape SF!

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Alcatraz" by EscapeSF in San Francisco
review: This was one of the best family excursions that we've had. We broke up into two groups and did Escape Alcatraz and the Antique Room. You really need to follow the clues and work together to get to the second phase. The staff was extremely friendly and readily available to give hints when stuck. What was nice was the offering of a cold drink since San Francisco was actually hot. We loved it and plan on going again . They are in the process of adding another room so we're ready!

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Alcatraz" by EscapeSF in San Francisco
review: Came here with my dad, boyfriend and brother after trying an escape room in San Diego. We were unsuccessful at that place so we were determined to try and escape to one in SF. We tried the Alcatraz room and finished with 18 min left on the clock. Not going to spoil this with hints but all I can tell you is everyone needs to work together and also separately so you have adequate time to complete this. Its part physical and the rest mental. Most of the clues are right in front of you so don't sweat it and overthink too much. Think and act like a prisoner ;)

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Alcatraz" by EscapeSF in San Francisco
review: It was my first time playing the escape games so I didn't really know what to expect! I assume it was a Monk/ Sherlock Homes kinda game. The staff  were very nice & give very clear instructions. We did the Alcatraz one. We managed to escape with 3 mins & 26 seconds left to spare. It was challenging but fun at the same time. Literally THINK outside the BOX!! I highly recommend this game! I can't wait to play more of these escape games in the future. BIG TIP; make sure your teammates are smart. Seriously. The place kinda hard to find because it's not hella obvious where the location is at, but it's across the street from the 1 bus stop next to the sushi restaurant on the corner of Kerney & Sacramento Street.

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Alcatraz" by EscapeSF in San Francisco
review: Something new and exciting to do with friends! We escaped from Alcatraz with our group of 5 and could not have had a better experience. The rules were clear and the game was well-designed and thought-provoking! We came out SOOO excited and talked about it for days! It will animate you! Give it a try!Close to a ton of restaurants and bars to re-hash your escape techniques over cocktails. We can't wait to come back and do the Antique Room!

room_title: Escape room "Nightmare" by Gone In 60 Minutes in Longmont
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Arizona Shootout" by Escapology Lakeland in Lakeland
review: What a fun experience! I would highly recommend Escapology Lakeland. Good story and high quality props and clues. We’ll definitely return.

room_title: Escape room "Arizona Shootout" by Escapology Lakeland in Lakeland
review: Tonight was our second time visiting this escape room place and we will be back again. They are always so welcoming. This time our game host was Jordan and she was the best we have ever had. We have been to many escapology locations and she was by far the best front desk staff and game host. She was just excited as we were and understood our skill level. All of the rooms were decorated in depth as well as the lobby to create the full experience. If you are in Lakeland we highly recommend you visit here for a good time.

room_title: Escape room "Arizona Shootout" by Escapology Lakeland in Lakeland
review: This was my favorite escape room so far. Me and the family had fun and they give very helpful hints. The puzzles aren't impossible. We will definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "Lost Cabin" by Puzzle Room Tahoe in South Lake Tahoe
review: We played Valley of The Kings and Lost Cabin at Puzzle Room Tahoe. It was a great activity to do in Tahoe and very fun for the entire family. My favorite room at this location is the Egyptian theme but we still very much enjoyed Lost Cabin.

room_title: Escape room "Lost Cabin" by Puzzle Room Tahoe in South Lake Tahoe
review: Awesome escape room. We had a blast with the family

room_title: Escape room "Lost Cabin" by Puzzle Room Tahoe in South Lake Tahoe
review: First time playing an escape room- we loved it. The place was big and they have a bar. We had a drink while waiting to play our rooms. It was great

room_title: Escape room "Lost Cabin" by Puzzle Room Tahoe in South Lake Tahoe
review: Absolutely amazing. the decoration were based off of a Tahoe cabin where some paranormal activities are happening... or so what they tell you in the briefing stories. but it was really cool to see some of the puzzles magically opening drawers. Lot of fun!!!

room_title: Escape room "Spaceship Escape" by Royal Escape Rooms in Panama City
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Night Bandit Treasure" by Fairhope Escape Rooms in Mobile
review: We visited the Fairhope Escape room with a family group of people with ages between 9 and 78 years. Everybody had a great time playing the Night Bandit Pirate treasure hunt. We will be back next time we are in the area!

room_title: Escape room "Captured (Area 51)" by Legends of Xscape in West Palm Beach
review: We had a party of 5 and we did the Area 51 room. We really had soooooo much fun and I was pessimistic going in!  Special Agent Ryan was terrific.  He gave us great explanation and didn't even make fun of us when we didn't make it out in time(which we really deserved).  Can't wait to go again.

room_title: Escape room "Captured (Area 51)" by Legends of Xscape in West Palm Beach
review: We did Area 51 and had so much fun. Not going to lie we didn't finish it. But it wasn't for a lack of help. Sam was amazing. We will definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "Captured (Area 51)" by Legends of Xscape in West Palm Beach
review: The Area 51 room is lots of fun! Many puzzles to solve, and the clues given when asked for are spot on in helping out when you're stumped. I would definitely suggest for anyone looking for something different and entertaining.

room_title: Escape room "Warden's Office 2" by New Smyrna Beach Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: So creative and a load of fun! Our group had 4 adults, two teenagers and an 11 & 10-year-old. First time going and we get locked into The Warden's room. Didn't make it out in time but will definitely be going back to try again! Great prices and awesome staff. Something new and fun for all ages. Try it!

room_title: Escape room "Warden's Office 2" by New Smyrna Beach Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: Second visit to NSB Escape Room. This time with five ten/eleven-year-olds. They had a blast in the Warden's Office and did a great job. Thank you for making my son's and his buddies' day!

room_title: Escape room "Warden's Office 2" by New Smyrna Beach Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: Very fun, we were a group of 4 in wardens room, and we escaped! It was difficult tasks that make you think and if you don't know something you have a guide to give you 3 hints (use them wisely). We had a blast, the guy was super nice and I would highly recommend because the business actually has several rooms so you can keep coming back!

room_title: Escape room "Warden's Office 2" by New Smyrna Beach Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: It was really challenging, take people with you that are really good at solving crazy puzzles. It keeps your mind going for sure. But that's what the game was about. I needed the guy from Prison Break there...lol, the people are super friendly and very helpful. It was a lot of fun.

room_title: Escape room "Warden's Office 2" by New Smyrna Beach Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: We had a blast! Jim, the owner, was very nice and enthusiastic. Great atmosphere, the puzzles weren't too hard but not easy neither, which is a good thing lol that's the point. We did the Wardens Office and we are already making plans and soo excited to come back and try the other rooms! Thank you Jim!!!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock Holmes’ Library" by The Great Escape Room in Washington, D.C.
review: It was a lot of fun! The host for the hunt was the right amount of helpful and efficient. It was definitely a harder challenge but it was also the first escape room I had ever done. I would definitely recommend this to a friend!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock Holmes’ Library" by The Great Escape Room in Washington, D.C.
review: Participated in their Sherlock Holmes room last weekend with a large group of friends and it was so much fun! This was my first escape room experience, so I didn't really know what to expect. The room was definitely challenging- and a ton do fun for the whole group! Service was great- the facilitators were super nice and accommodating. Thanks, Great Escape Room!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock Holmes’ Library" by The Great Escape Room in Washington, D.C.
review: We did Sherlock's Library and had a really good time! It was actually quite a tough room. We were 10 seconds over the allotted 60 mins. Would definitely come again for another room.

room_title: Escape room "FBI Academy" by Great Escape Mystery Rooms in Fort Smith
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Brainstorm Escape Room Bonita Springs in Fort Myers
review: Had an amazing time. It was super fun!!!! Will definitely return. 🤗🤗🤗

room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Brainstorm Escape Room Bonita Springs in Fort Myers
review: Trying to retrieve our inheritance from our aunt was unsuccessful (the room we played was called The Inheritance) but the process doing it was great! We all had a blast looking for clues and trying to solve the room. I highly recommend Brainstorm Escape Room for an hour of fun being locked in a room with your friends or family. The owner was so nice and really helped us to have a great experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Brainstorm Escape Room Bonita Springs in Fort Myers
review: Had a ton of fun trying to escape the Inheritance room. It was extremely challenging but fun trying! We were glad they offered clues to help us along the way. We would definitely return to try another room.

room_title: Escape room "Bunker" by PanIQ Escape Room Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: I loved it, it was 5 of us, it was supposed to only be me and my boyfriend at first, but I'm glad we went with Friends Because had it of just been me and him I doubt that we would have even be able to make it as far as we did. We had a blast and although my group wasn't able to make it out in time, we still wanna try the other room on our next trip.

room_title: Escape room "Bunker" by PanIQ Escape Room Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: Went tonight and loved it. I did The Bunker, going back to try Asylum. Great idea. It kept me thinking from the time I started. I'd definitely recommend going with 3 or 4 people. I went with one other person and we ran out of time, but we still had a great time. It's a must try. Also, it was a laid back environment. The person working there was really cool.

room_title: Escape room "Bunker" by PanIQ Escape Room Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: First time here it was a awesome experience. Can't wait to try a different room.

room_title: Escape room "Bunker" by PanIQ Escape Room Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: Great group experience for working as a team, flexing your mental muscle, and staying on your feet hunting for new clues! Our group beat The Bunker with only 3 seconds left and no hints, definitely love the pressure to make it out and looking forward to trying the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Bunker" by PanIQ Escape Room Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: It was our first time and we got hooked! It's a very exciting experience. This validated how well me and my best friends work together. Teamwork is a big deal! It really gets your mind going and once you figure things out, it's such a great feeling. Be able to get out before time runs out and you'll feel like you're on top of the world! Definitely a must do!

room_title: Escape room "Bunker" by PanIQ Escape Room Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: This was truly a fun and unique experience. I purchased 4 tickets through Groupon for the Bunker Room. I made a reservation through their website and shortly after I received an email confirmation. We really had no idea what to expect. As you may already know, you get locked in a themed room for an hour and you have to try and escape by overcoming a number of different physical and mental challenges. It's an experience like no other. My entire group had a really great time and we are looking forward to experiencing the Insane Asylum.  They like to have 6 people per session so if your party is less then 6 you may get paired up with people you don't know. They also don't serve food or alcohol so get your drink on before you come.

room_title: Escape room "Bunker" by PanIQ Escape Room Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: Experienced "The Bunker" with my cousins and sister and we had a BLAST!  It really challenges your logic skills and forces you to exercise teamwork - LOVED IT!Parking can get pretty challenging.  Luckily, we reserved a later time slot so parking wasn't bad, but, I would suggest arriving early, to lock up a parking spot.Susie was a great hostess!  My team (Team Adobo) and I only needed ONE hint to escape and Susie was on the other end of the walkie-talkie ready to help us without giving away too much.  Made the experience more satisfying for us to be able to get through it mostly on our own...

room_title: Escape room "Molly’s Horror Room" by Room Escape DC in Washington, D.C.
review: We did Molly's room. Loved the mixture of cute and creepy. We had a lot of fun! Ovi was a GREAT host! very helpful. We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Molly’s Horror Room" by Room Escape DC in Washington, D.C.
review: Had a blast on Sunday. The staff was great and Molly's room was spooky and mysterious. We had to use all 6 of our brains to make it out before time was up.Thank you for an enjoyable night for us girls!

room_title: Escape room "Molly’s Horror Room" by Room Escape DC in Washington, D.C.
review: I had a fantastic time. I wasn't sure how it was going to be but my friends and I worked together to solve Molly's Horror room and we all had a blast. I'm so glad we did it and I would highly recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "Molly’s Horror Room" by Room Escape DC in Washington, D.C.
review: We did Molly's Room. We were able to escape with 1 minute and change left. It was very challenging. It was a true group effort! This is one of the hardest and best ones we have done so far. I would recommend this room anytime!

room_title: Escape room "Molly’s Horror Room" by Room Escape DC in Washington, D.C.
review: A friend and I decided to do this last minute, and so we were paired with two random people. It turns out that it was the best experience! The fact that we didn't know each other was irrelevant because we were able to escape with seven minutes left. Molly's Horror Room was definitely a challenge and may not be suitable for younger children as it has a few jump scares. Ovi was our game master and was great with setting us up and providing us with gentle nudges when we weren't quite on the right track. Overall, I would definitely do it again!

room_title: Escape room "Crisis at 1600" by America's Escape Game Gainesville in Gainesville
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Hollywood Premiere - Destination Los Angeles" by ALL IN Adventures Lawrenceville in Atlanta
review: We recently tried the Mystery Room on a trip to visit family in Georgia, and it was so much fun! We honestly thought it was going to be super easy, and maybe a little hokey, but it was neither! It was really challenging, and not at all cheesy! We did the Royal room and Hollywood room, both were excellent! Make sure to come with your brain prepared to think outside the box! Definitely recommend, if we lived closer I would go back and try all of the other 4 rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Hollywood Premiere - Destination Los Angeles" by ALL IN Adventures Lawrenceville in Atlanta
review: This a great family experience and bonding. We did both the Hollywood and sports room. The sports room should be done with at least six people. We have a 12 and 11 year old who enjoyed every minute of it and said can we do it again. The staff is very nice and knowledgeable. We loved it. It is worth a try.

room_title: Escape room "Hollywood Premiere - Destination Los Angeles" by ALL IN Adventures Lawrenceville in Atlanta
review: Had a great time with my coworkers. Lots of fun in the Hollywood Room. Going again to try black ops room with friends this time.

room_title: Escape room "Stellar" by Situation Room in Macon
review: It was a blast! If you haven't been, make plans to go. Fun for everyone!

room_title: Escape room "Stellar" by Situation Room in Macon
review: Had a blast! We will get out next time! Good for all ages!

room_title: Escape room "Stellar" by Situation Room in Macon
review: Did both rooms, very different from each other and each was great in its own way. Challenging while still remaining logical and very doable.

room_title: Escape room "Stellar" by Situation Room in Macon
review: Definitely a cool experience, but you also have to bring your A+ game because it is extremely challenging!

room_title: Escape room "Stellar" by Situation Room in Macon
review: I went with my son and his family yesterday. Sure was a different experience. I think EVERYONE needs to go. Very friendly helpful gentlemen. Time to get back into thinking games!

room_title: Escape room "Lola in Space" by Reason in San Francisco
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Sheriff’s Office" by Way Out Games in Carrollton
review: Excellent customer service and GREAT TIME HAD BY ALL!!!! It was my Birthday and first escape room experience. We did the Sheriff’s Room and thoroughly enjoyed it. Nicely configured and planned out. Will definitely plan to go back.

room_title: Escape room "Sheriff’s Office" by Way Out Games in Carrollton
review: Went with a group of 6 tonight. We escaped The Sherriff's Office with 18 minutes left to go. It wasn't easy, but it wasn't impossible. We had so much fun, and the free pizza for a group of six was nice too!

room_title: Escape room "Sheriff’s Office" by Way Out Games in Carrollton
review: My friend and I enjoyed successfully escaping the sheriff's office. Zac Parker was great and I will definitely be going back!

room_title: Escape room "Sheriff’s Office" by Way Out Games in Carrollton
review: That was fun. We did the Sheriff's cell scenario. Zach was a great host.

room_title: Escape room "Old Sparky" by 101 Escape Rooms in Ventura
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Raven's Eye" by Alaska Escape Rooms in Anchorage
review: Great job on the story and clues Seriously.. choose this place.  The multiple rooms made this an even better experience.  The staff was extremely helpful and supportive.

room_title: Escape room "Raven's Eye" by Alaska Escape Rooms in Anchorage
review: I went with my family and a couple of friends, so there were 8 of us.  We all had a great time.  The whole thing was a ton of fun.  The multiple rooms, the different types of puzzles, the theme/story - was all incredible.  Most of us had never done an escape room before, so it was an excellent first experience.  Immediately upon completing the game everyone was ready to book another game.  We will definitely be back when the new room opens!

room_title: Escape room "Raven's Eye" by Alaska Escape Rooms in Anchorage
review: I went to the escape room with 5 other friends to celebrate school getting out and we had a blast going through the Raven’s Eye! Graham was really nice and accommodating and made the whole experience super relaxing for us first-timers. I’d definitely recommend to anyone with an hour to kill who’s looking for a good time :)

room_title: Escape room "Raven's Eye" by Alaska Escape Rooms in Anchorage
review: This was my first escape room experience and it was exciting. Went with my coworkers for a night out and had a blast solving puzzles together. The story line worked well with each room we unlocked. The owner/creator helped to make this a rewarding experience and we were able to save the girl! Definitely recommend to anyone who is curious, great for parties/events!

room_title: Escape room "Raven's Eye" by Alaska Escape Rooms in Anchorage
review: Had such a great time at the Alaska Escape Rooms with my coworkers. Definitely recommend this experience to all.

room_title: Escape room "Raven's Eye" by Alaska Escape Rooms in Anchorage
review: This was super fun and challenging. A great way to spend a night out with your friends!

room_title: Escape room "Raven's Eye" by Alaska Escape Rooms in Anchorage
review: This was a great time! The puzzles were challenging and it was a lot of fun! This was our first escape room experience and now we’re hooked!

room_title: Escape room "Raven's Eye" by Alaska Escape Rooms in Anchorage
review: We had such a fun time! We're so glad that Graeme and his family decided to create this amazing adventure. If you like games and you're in Anchorage, be sure to take the time to go over and play.

room_title: Escape room "Raven's Eye" by Alaska Escape Rooms in Anchorage
review: We went to the Alaska Escape Rooms as a team building excercise for work. We had so much fun, and really enjoyed the experience. Graeme, the owner, game master, etc, was super helpful and really contributed to a successful afternoon. I would definitely recommend this for anyone looking to test their wits and have fun doing it.

room_title: Escape room "Dragon Tower VR" by Time Travel Escapes in West Palm Beach
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Greatest Escape in Lancaster (CA)
review: I absolutely enjoyed doing The Apartment! We got out in 57 minutes.

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Greatest Escape in Lancaster (CA)
review: The Apartment was amazing! We didn't make it out but had a great time solving puzzles and looking for clues. The staff was amazing and friendly. Would recommend d as a must try to anyone and everyone! Had a blast.

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Greatest Escape in Lancaster (CA)
review: We had a great time in the Apartment! This was our 4th escape room and it was the most difficult one we’ve done. It's a fun night out where you actually have to think and figure out clues as a team! The crew there were awesome, very welcoming and gave us a tour after of how it all works. Check it out!

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Greatest Escape in Lancaster (CA)
review: Took my son and two of his friends to the escape room for his birthday in September. They chose 'The Apartment'. Even though they didn't escape, they had a lot of fun. I can highly recommend this, it is well thought out and challenging.

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Greatest Escape in Lancaster (CA)
review: My wife took me here for my birthday and we had an absolute blast. Even though we didn't manage to escape the apartment, but for our first time in an escape room, we almost made it out with no clues. Will be going again.

room_title: Escape room "Mummy Tomb" by The Wreck Room Escape Game in Denver
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Dark Altar" by Omescape in San Jose
review: We had a blast at this escape room. My friends and I just recently getting into this and so far this was one of our favorites. We did the Dark Alter and it had some pretty cool passages. I won't give clues to how to solve it, but let's just say you definitely feel like Indiana Jones with this one. A must try!

room_title: Escape room "Dark Altar" by Omescape in San Jose
review: This is the best escape room I've done. I did Dark Altar with a total of 6 people. I definitely recommend having 6 people, but you need 4 minimum. This room was super high tech and unlike any other escape room I've seen. The clues were all working, they were clever and tough, and the decorations were on point. We escaped in 61 minutes and used 3 clues. You get an unlimited number of clues, but we tried to do as much of the room as we could without hints. They take your photo at the end and airdrop it to you right then and there (again high tech!). Parking was a little weird since it was in a warehouse of a random street.

room_title: Escape room "Dark Altar" by Omescape in San Jose
review: We did the Dark Altar room and the tech in this escape room is amazing! I don't want to give anything away, but the use of gizmos is top notch. The escape room is also actually multiple rooms which is cool. The only thing I will say is that I think the last puzzle with the rotating numbers is a bit too difficult and not sure anyone would get that without a clue. We had to get clues several times and I doubt anyone has ever done it in time without using clues.My advice: don't waste too much time not getting a clue if you really need one.

room_title: Escape room "Dark Altar" by Omescape in San Jose
review: Having a lot of fun here!

room_title: Escape room "Dark Altar" by Omescape in San Jose
review: Great place to go.

room_title: Escape room "Dark Altar" by Omescape in San Jose
review: DARK ALTAR was so much fun! We really enjoyed this game, even though we were not able to escape within an hour.

room_title: Escape room "Dark Altar" by Omescape in San Jose
review: This was hands down the coolest thing ever!!!! Felt like I was in a movie. We didn't escape in time because we dropped a clue but we were so close!

room_title: Escape room "Clown" by Big Escape Rooms in Washington, D.C.
review: Our second escape room and we chose the clown theme. Great host and a fun experience. Highly recommend this escape room!

room_title: Escape room "Clown" by Big Escape Rooms in Washington, D.C.
review: Really sets the mood. Great host. It's our second time here and would definitely recommend the 2 rooms we've done so far. Definitely want to come and get the last one done.

room_title: Escape room "Clown" by Big Escape Rooms in Washington, D.C.
review: The clown room was the bomb! Our team had so much fun and there was a lot of mind exercising going on. Can't wait to do the Outbreak room now.

room_title: Escape room "Clown" by Big Escape Rooms in Washington, D.C.
review: Did the Clown room and it was awesome! Loved the experience and it was a great team building exercise. Would definitely come back again!

room_title: Escape room "Clown" by Big Escape Rooms in Washington, D.C.
review: We did the Clown Room and it was fun, didn’t escape but definitely will be doing it again! Super fun.

room_title: Escape room "Jail Break" by Escape Zone in Phoenix
review: Me and my husband did this for the first time together! We decided to do it for a date night as something fun and different from the regular dinner and movie! We were not disappointed! We had such a blast! We did Jail Break and cannot wait to bring family and friends to enjoy and try the other rooms

room_title: Escape room "Jail Break" by Escape Zone in Phoenix
review: One word: Amazing. I thought I would be able to escape the Jail room quickly, since I love crime novels and tv shows. Wow, what a great challenge!Working with your partners and unraveling clues definitely makes time fly! It's great for all ages, however the crawl spaces were a bit hard to climb into. The clues weren't too frustrating and we had a great laugh afterwards!

room_title: Escape room "Jail Break" by Escape Zone in Phoenix
review: It was awsome!! We made it out with 10 seconds left. The jail break was so realistic and hard but so so fun!! Can't wait to do another one

room_title: Escape room "Jail Break" by Escape Zone in Phoenix
review: Our group has done many escape rooms at a couple of places around the valley and this was BY FAR MY FAVORITE one. It kept everyone so busy and no one was standing around without a task. We also loved Diego. Definitely worth it. So much fun! We will definitely be coming back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Jail Break" by Escape Zone in Phoenix
review: It was so fun and amazing! My group and I had an amazing time! We did the jailbreak room and it lives up to its reputation of difficulty. We solved it but it took some teamwork! I recommend it to everyone, it was so fun! Can't wait to be back and try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Quest for the Throne" by Escape USA in Atlanta
review: This was a last minute choice to enjoy some quality time with some freinds...and it was GREAT! We chose to do the "Quest for the Throne" room. It was VERY challenging, but all four of us contributed and managed to get out with 12 minutes left on the one hour clock. The game was very exciting, adrenaline pumping and a great "bang for your buck". I HIGHLY recommend this place.

room_title: Escape room "Quest for the Throne" by Escape USA in Atlanta
review: Took my family to The Escape Room today. The staff is friendly and very helpful. I’ve done other escape rooms, but was pleasantly surprised to find one located in Douglasville. We did the Quest for the Throne. It was challenging and a lot of fun. We did escape, but we cannot wait to go back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Quest for the Throne" by Escape USA in Atlanta
review: Been to Escape USA twice now, did 1920s Speakeasy and Quest for the Throne. Loved both of them! While I only escaped once both rooms were a ton of fun and kept you thinking through the whole 60 minutes! I highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Myth Room" by San Jose Room Escape in San Jose
review: Among 50+ escape games I've played, this one is for sure worst.One small room, minimum decoration, simple furnitures, paper puzzles. I can't imagine who will enjoy this room.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Myth Room" by San Jose Room Escape in San Jose
review: Great great place!! Will visit again next time!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Myth Room" by San Jose Room Escape in San Jose
review: That was a blast. Can't wait to try the other room

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Myth Room" by San Jose Room Escape in San Jose
review: My friends and I had great time! The puzzles were challenging and very well thought out. Get yourself a smart team and come here! I'm already looking forward to the next room.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Myth Room" by San Jose Room Escape in San Jose
review: Our team members are all first time to experience real room escape. We had a great time there. And we all learned something we can do better next time. Looking forward to the next challenge.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Myth Room" by San Jose Room Escape in San Jose
review: Very Fun, and a better deal than Real Escape Game. Fewer people, more intimate, more chances to do more puzzles. We didn't get out in time, but instead of just telling us the answers, he asked if we wanted a few more minutes because we were so close. He gave us the extra minute or two that we needed to figure it all out. Awesome, and we're looking forward to doing another one with you.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Myth Room" by San Jose Room Escape in San Jose
review: We had a great time here. The puzzles were fun and challenging but not ridiculously difficult. The owner was super nice. We'll be coming back to try out their other game.

room_title: Escape room "CSI: Case Reopened" by Escape Room Entertainment in Melbourne
review: We played CSI. Great fun! Challenging, without being competitive. Doesn't work like anything I've ever played and I highly recommend it. Be warned, this could be addictive!Thanks Escape Room Entertainment for such a fun time doing something so totally different.

room_title: Escape room "CSI: Case Reopened" by Escape Room Entertainment in Melbourne
review: This was really fun! Since this was our first Escape Room experience, we did the easiest room (CSI). I was unsure if this was going to be fun or if we'd be bickering the whole time but it was a blast. It was simultaneously harder and easier than I expected; way more puzzles but when you have a bunch of people working on them they get solved pretty quickly. We are definitely interested in going back and doing the Shipwrecked room.

room_title: Escape room "CSI: Case Reopened" by Escape Room Entertainment in Melbourne
review: Today was my first visit to the Escape Room and I was not disappointed in any way.My family and I had a blast!!!!! We will be back, we are hooked.Thankfully we were able to solve the case with a little over 15 minutes to spare.I highly recommend this place if you are looking for a very fun experience. Our group ages ranged from 11 to 59 and each and everyone of us LOVED our time solving the CSI case.Thank you Escape Room Staff for such a fun experience!!!

room_title: Escape room "CSI: Case Reopened" by Escape Room Entertainment in Melbourne
review: Awesome time with my family. I have done two rooms and they have both been phenomenal. Can't wait to do all of them and hopefully solve a third one. I recommend this to anyone looking to have a great time.

room_title: Escape room "CSI: Case Reopened" by Escape Room Entertainment in Melbourne
review: One of the most craziest experience I ever had. Coming in I didn't know what to expect, but now that I have one run under my belt, I know what it's all about. I would recommend this to anyone! I have never done an escape room in till now!

room_title: Escape room "DEA Bust" by Escape Strategy in Tampa
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Tallahassee in Tallahassee
review: We did the Hostage room and it was so fun!! It was tough and we cut it close with the time, but we did make it out! I think this room is leaving soon, so get to it while you can!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Tallahassee in Tallahassee
review: Being held hostage and trying to solve the mystery to free yourself has never been so much fun!! Thank you to Naomy for not "just facilitating" but making it such a great experience for our daughters 13th birthday! Our daughter and her friends had a ton of fun!! We highly recommend Breakout Games Tallahassee, we've been there several times with friends and family.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Tallahassee in Tallahassee
review: So much fun - hostage was a great room and Lindsey was a great game master!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Tallahassee in Tallahassee
review: We went with a group of six to do the Hostage room. It was the second escape room for half of us and it was great. Definitely escape-able but not so easy we were ever bored. I highly recommend it for a first time experience.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Tallahassee in Tallahassee
review: We went on a double date to escape from Hostage room and had such a great time! Seriously challenging, but so fun... we will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Grove" by Brain Busters Escape Rooms in Daleville
review: Wonderful staff. You can tell that everyone really loves their jobs. Super friendly and very professional. Great price for such a well done room. Will highly recommend anyone here. Team building days are amazing. The owners are wonderful people. Very helpful. I would give 10 stars if i could. I have played other places but for this price you cant beat them.. I would choose them over anyone else in the wiregrass area. I will be back.

room_title: Escape room "The Grove" by Brain Busters Escape Rooms in Daleville
review: We where Driving by And seen the SIgn Glad we Stopped. The Staff was Nice and the Place is inside  A Magic Shop too!  The Price was Cheaper than Expected for the Room. We Failed to get out in 60min but the owner let us Play out the Game and 8 mins later We left the Room. It was Fun and all the Props and  Games Looked Build by the Owner but all Was FUn to Solve.it is upstairs that's the ONLY bad  Part about this Place. We will be Back to Play the Other Rooms for sure

room_title: Escape room "The Trap" by Baffled Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: Awesome place! Very clean. Awesome staff. Would've liked more jump scares but other then that great place we'll definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "The Trap" by Baffled Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: When we entered Baffled Escape Room we were greeted by friendly staff who encouraged us to check out the array of costume hats that we could wear during our escape room experience. So awesome if you really want to get into character. We had the honor of having Daniel as our clue master during "The Trap". He was super helpful and made our experience awesome! We will be back to try out the other rooms soon.

room_title: Escape room "The Trap" by Baffled Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: Came here for my Birthday with family and did 'The Trap' room. Had an amazing time and we were able to escape with 18 minutes to spare. Vince was super helpful and we definitely be back to try the other rooms

room_title: Escape room "The Trap" by Baffled Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: It was my first escape room challenge, but some friends joined in with previous experience. We had a blast... We needed some helpful hints to get through. Several different thought processes were needed to make the escape and enough to ensure everyone was able to play a part in our group success. We were able to make it with 10 minutes to spare. That's 50 minutes of searching, thinking and playing through scenarios. The teen that wanted nothing to do with it ended up having a blast. We are ready for the next challenge! Thank you Vince!

room_title: Escape room "The Trap" by Baffled Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: My friends and I had a fantastic time playing the Trap room. At first, the room doesn't look like there is enough going on to keep us busy for a whole hour. But as you start playing, you find out that the clues are complicated but fantastic and just the right amount of challenging.  We had a fantastic time and the staff was great.  I would definitely do it again.

room_title: Escape room "A Grand Illusion" by Epic Escape Game in Grand Junction
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Budapest Express" by Escapology Trumbull in Danbury
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Pirates Parlor" by The Cube Escape Rooms in Santa Barbara
review: Highly recommend the Cube for anyone in Santa Barbara that is looking for a fun group activity. Pirate Parlor room was awesome and is a must try. It was challenging and the same time a lot of fun. Glad we were able to escape!

room_title: Escape room "Pirates Parlor" by The Cube Escape Rooms in Santa Barbara
review: Just got done, it was our first escape room and it was great. The scenes and ambiance were absolutely perfect and really made us feel like we were on the pirate ship. The puzzles make you think but are solvable. Looking forward to checking out the other rooms these guys are putting together.

room_title: Escape room "Pirates Parlor" by The Cube Escape Rooms in Santa Barbara
review: Great room design and puzzles were at the perfect level, challenging but not too vague and open-ended. I really liked that they asked for feedback on our favorite and least favorite puzzles. It shows that they are always improving things.

room_title: Escape room "Pirates Parlor" by The Cube Escape Rooms in Santa Barbara
review: This was my first escape room and it was an awesome experience! Very good hospitality, clever puzzles and exciting tasks! The ambient and scenography were great! Can't wait to try out another room soon!

room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Augusta in Augusta
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Raft VR" by Two Bit Circus in Los Angeles
review: Amazing concept!

room_title: Escape room "The Raft VR" by Two Bit Circus in Los Angeles
review: Can't wait to experience! So excited

room_title: Escape room "The Gallery" by Escape New Haven in New Haven
review: The Gallery was great! We had a lot of fun. Very challenging.

room_title: Escape room "The Gallery" by Escape New Haven in New Haven
review: What an amazing time we had trying to figure out The Gallery! Can't wait to come back and try The Crypt (hopefully with better luck!) Thanks to all for an awesome experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Gallery" by Escape New Haven in New Haven
review: Absolutely amazing! Would love to go again if it was so far away...

room_title: Escape room "The Gallery" by Escape New Haven in New Haven
review: We had a great time!! Definitely would go back and solve another rooms mystery.

room_title: Escape room "MudButts Cafe" by Solve Who, LLC in San Diego
review: Last minute dare night choice and it was amazing!!!  We had an absolute blast!!!! You are given a starter story, taken through the crime scene, see the interrogation of suspects, comb through evidence, and try to figure out who dun it!!!  So much fun and things to keep you guessing!!! Can't wait to try the other room and see what else they come up with.........planning on expanding with two more areas!!!!  The guy running the "investigation" was really friendly and fun!!!!  Great job!!!!

room_title: Escape room "MudButts Cafe" by Solve Who, LLC in San Diego
review: This place is so freaking unique. The amount of work the owners have put into putting everything together is so visible. The creativity, effort, and hard work shows. The owners are also USN Veterans and I love supporting veteran entrepreneurs. The small business vibe is real and the passion is evident.As for the actual interaction. The crime scene is witty. I don't know anything about murder mystery but I do know that playing detective was super fun. The humor they add throughout the whole experience is a cherry on top. Take a date, a group of friends, or just do a meetup at Solve Who one of these days. You won't regret it! :) It's one of those activities that's really fun to do if you want to have an ice breaker too. It gets everyone working together and thinking collectively.

room_title: Escape room "MudButts Cafe" by Solve Who, LLC in San Diego
review: FUN FUN FUN!!!   Just go, you will not be disappointed.You don't have to be super puzzle solver guy/gal, anyone can join in.  Don't get me wrong, they can be challenging; the more effort you put it the more fun you'll have. You can play in groups or just one or two, personally I think the sweet spot is four people because there is a time limit.  My wife and I played and got though it just fine and it was fun from start to finish. The host (sorry forgot his name) is awesome, personable, professional and really created a unique and fun time.  The amount of detail and comedy is well thought out and everywhere you look.

room_title: Escape room "The Room of the Great Mysto" by Escape House Waterville in Orange Beach
review: My brother, 9-year-old niece and I went last Sunday to the Mysto Room. It was so much fun. We expected it to be a little over my niece's head, but she really enjoyed it and helped. That being said, we barely escaped... so it wasn't too easy either.

room_title: Escape room "The Room of the Great Mysto" by Escape House Waterville in Orange Beach
review: When I went in, I had experience with one other escape room, while my roomies had no experience. We went into Great Mysto, and while we got stuck and tried to power through, our Game Master gave us hints to move in the right direction. We escaped with a little over 2 minutes left, but it was enjoyable the entire way. We will be hitting the hurricane room....as soon as we get a bit more practice under our belt.

room_title: Escape room "The Room of the Great Mysto" by Escape House Waterville in Orange Beach
review: My family and I went to this escape house last night and absolutely loved it! We did the Mysto room and had an awesome time (mostly because we ended up escaping). Also, Cassidy did an amazing job and even stayed after to talk with us and answer all of our questions for an extra hour. She was so nice and made the experience even better than it already was. Would definitely recommend this escape house!

room_title: Escape room "Indiana and the Buried Key" by Unlock Escape Rooms in Fresno
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Collision" by One Way Out Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: Very well done escape attraction. Our group completed Collision with about 5 minutes remaining. It was challenging and themed very well with some new tricks we haven't seen at other escape attractions. Check it out when you get the chance! They also have a great bundle that includes some perks...

room_title: Escape room "Collision" by One Way Out Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: Wow what a great business! We did the Collision room and it was tough but it was fun. The challenge makes the escape room worth it. The owner came to talk to us afterwards and told us about the story behind the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Collision" by One Way Out Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: We came in tonight after completing another room down the road. We were in the "Collision" room. We have visited several escape rooms around town and this was by far the most fun and challenging room we have tried. They are clearly proud of their art and spent time talking to us after we finished to get feedback and make sure we had fun. We will definitely come back to try the rest of their rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Pipe Works: For Three and the Solemn Few" by Puzzle Effect San Luis Obispo in Grover Beach
review: We had a family outing last weekend and decided to reserve a room (Pipe Works) at Puzzle Effect’s. This place did not disappoint! The staff was super friendly and helpful throughout the whole process; challenging yet obtainable. Highly recommend this place for groups looking to build teamwork or families looking to bond.

room_title: Escape room "Pipe Works: For Three and the Solemn Few" by Puzzle Effect San Luis Obispo in Grover Beach
review: Had a great experience! We had 8 people in our group and we chose the Pipe Works escape room. The staff was friendly and the rooms were engaging.We’ll be back soon to try Curse of the Emerald Seas!

room_title: Escape room "Pipe Works: For Three and the Solemn Few" by Puzzle Effect San Luis Obispo in Grover Beach
review: Our family split into 2 teams and competed against each other in the Pipe Works escape room. Had a blast and will definitely be back for a rematch!

room_title: Escape room "Speakeasy" by Quicksand Escape Games in San Diego
review: It was the first time for me and my five friends, so we didn't really know what to expect but we were excited to try! We truly had a great time! First few minutes it was intimidating, then it became fun and exciting. Highly recommended! We escaped the Speakeasy with a little over a minute to spare and we'll be back to escape the Diner!

room_title: Escape room "Speakeasy" by Quicksand Escape Games in San Diego
review: Well put together and well thought through. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Speakeasy" by Quicksand Escape Games in San Diego
review: Great experience! We did Speakeasy and it was engaging, challenging and fun. Authentic items and interesting puzzles kept our entire team occupied every single minute. Definitely recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Date Night Disaster" by Premier Escape Adventures in Sarasota
review: We escaped their "Date Night Disaster"Everything about our escape was perfect. The facility is staged well, the clues and puzzles to solve are well planned, interesting and challenging. On top of that the staff is amazing. Very encouraging and supportive of your success. A must experience indeed!

room_title: Escape room "Date Night Disaster" by Premier Escape Adventures in Sarasota
review: Our family group of 6 (all adults) had a blast. We were all first timers and the staff eased all our apprehensions away quickly so the we felt more confident going in. The atmosphere is very well planned and so interesting. Great pricing, clean and very organized. Staff is fantastic - so encouraging and made everything fun from start to finish. We did Date Night Disaster and will going back for a new challenge for sure!

room_title: Escape room "Date Night Disaster" by Premier Escape Adventures in Sarasota
review: My husband and I were walking the East Bradenton plaza after dinner to find Premier Escape Adventures. We both were not ready to go home so we booked the 9 pm Date Night Disaster.- Before going into the room we were handcuffed together which was REALLY funny and without going into too much detail. The puzzles in the room were creative and unique! I have been in 8 escape rooms and there were puzzles I have never experienced before! - Thank you for getting us in and Lance and I are looking forward to trying out the Houdini room later in the month!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Axxiom Escape Rooms in Newark
review: Great place and awesome staff!! We had a blast in The Heist Room. Can't wait to come back to try another room.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Axxiom Escape Rooms in Newark
review: So much fun and we will totally be back! Everyone try The Heist Room best you can't get out!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Axxiom Escape Rooms in Newark
review: We robbed the Heist room blind! It was super challenging but our guide Hammond was excellent, giving us hints if we were crazy stuck and overall helping make for an awesome visit!

room_title: Escape room "Wizard Trials" by PanIQ Room in San Francisco
review: There were 3 adults and 3 minors in our group. It was super fun. 60 minutes went by super quick. Originally we thought there was only one room and we spent over 40 minutes in just that one room.There was a total of 3 rooms. We used the hint button 3 times. I highly recommend trying this out. The sole employee there was nice.

room_title: Escape room "Wizard Trials" by PanIQ Room in San Francisco
review: 6 of us did the Wizard room challenge which was not easy but we made it through the three rooms in 56 minutes The place is a little worn but clean and the guide was helpful It can take him awhile to respond to the hint call This was my first experience so I cannot compare to others but I will do it again Fun engaging group activity and a great way to spend an hour before dinner The parking is awful Go to garage on 16th and Hoff

room_title: Escape room "Wizard Trials" by PanIQ Room in San Francisco
review: I enjoyed the immersive quality of the room and how the decorations added to it, and my friend said they enjoyed it more than other escape rooms from different companies.Some symbols need to be repainted, but we still solved it easily enough.The music that played when you won helped award your group a sense of accomplishment!

room_title: Escape room "Oval Office" by Escape the Cape in Fort Myers
review: Had a blast! The Oval Office was worth it. I Cant wait to try the other rooms! If you have never done it before I highly recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "Oval Office" by Escape the Cape in Fort Myers
review: Our group had so much fun escaping the Oval Office. We are already discussing which room to do next.

room_title: Escape room "Oval Office" by Escape the Cape in Fort Myers
review: We did the "Oval Office" escape with a group of six adults ages 25-50. Had a great time! This was our second escape room, the first one here. We escaped after using our three clues. We will go back and do the other two they have!

room_title: Escape room "Oval Office" by Escape the Cape in Fort Myers
review: My husband and I took our two 11-year-old kids to the Oval Office room. Working together to solve the riddle was very fun! We will definitely be recommending this place to others!

room_title: Escape room "Cursed" by Escape Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: Went there with my family just now! Shout out to our gamemaster Griffin! It was challenging and fun for our party of 5. We finished with 3 minutes left and it was our first room ever 😅 i definitely recommend this placee!

room_title: Escape room "Cursed" by Escape Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: This was my first experience in an escape room. There were 4 of us who completed the Cursed room. I would definitely recommend to friends. Can't wait to go back for the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Are You Smarter than a 6th Grader?" by Fantasy Escapes in Tampa
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Mad Hatter" by Epic Escape Rooms in Valdosta
review: Absolutely loved it! We did the Mad Hatter room. Next up is the pirate escape!

room_title: Escape room "The Mad Hatter" by Epic Escape Rooms in Valdosta
review: We love Epic Escape Rooms! The puzzles were diverse and challenging. We escaped the Mad Hatter room with 6 minutes to spare. I look forward to returning and trying the other rooms in the near future. We had a lot of fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Mad Hatter" by Epic Escape Rooms in Valdosta
review: We had so much fun! We participated in the Mad Hatter room with part of our Girl Scout Troop. The girls had lots of fun and so did the adults! It was very challenging but glad we did it! Can't wait to return to try another room.

room_title: Escape room "The Mad Hatter" by Epic Escape Rooms in Valdosta
review: Decided to try this for my son's 18th birthday. They made a special trip to open up early for us, as it was by appointment. It was my first time doing anything like this, but let me tell you, we had the most amazing time! We will certainly be back the next time we visit Valdosta. Thanks again for the adventure..... oh and we made it through the Mad Hatter room!

room_title: Escape room "The Mad Hatter" by Epic Escape Rooms in Valdosta
review: We had a great time in the Mad Hatter Room. It was difficult, but we escaped! Great hostess! Good for all ages.

room_title: Escape room "Valley of the Kings" by Puzzle Room Tahoe in South Lake Tahoe
review: We just played their egyptian theme with our 3 kids. They loved it- it was entertaining and Im happy we were able to do that with the coronavirus situation. they kept the place very cleaned and we saw the game masters running around and disinfecting before and after our game. Good surprise and great experience

room_title: Escape room "Valley of the Kings" by Puzzle Room Tahoe in South Lake Tahoe
review: Excellent Christmas evening of fun for a couple, an older sister, her son who just graduated college & her 28 yr. old son. (ages 68-21) Each person participated in solving the hieroglyphics & puzzles. It took all of us, with under 5 minutes to spare. We'd have solved it 5 minutes sooner, but there was a short in one of the clues. It was actually a great highlight on our trip. Had so much fun, we purchased a package this summer in Texas so we can take his bother & wife as a "thank-you" gift for dog sitting. Their grandkid in high school may go with us, too. We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Valley of the Kings" by Puzzle Room Tahoe in South Lake Tahoe
review: Great rooms

room_title: Escape room "Valley of the Kings" by Puzzle Room Tahoe in South Lake Tahoe
review: Great escape room. We played more than 20 escape rooms and this one is in our top 5!

room_title: Escape room "Valley of the Kings" by Puzzle Room Tahoe in South Lake Tahoe
review: Great room- not our favorite out of the 3 we played, but we still had a good time

room_title: Escape room "Valley of the Kings" by Puzzle Room Tahoe in South Lake Tahoe
review: great room. Lot of fun and family friendly. staff was great

room_title: Escape room "Valley of the Kings" by Puzzle Room Tahoe in South Lake Tahoe
review: Friendly staff and a fun entrance greeted us in Tahoe as we came to try The Valley of the Kings room. It was amazingly well constructed and thought out. The game was thrilling and the hints gave you a nudge in the right direction without telling you the answers. This was a blast, I will certainly be back!

room_title: Escape room "Valley of the Kings" by Puzzle Room Tahoe in South Lake Tahoe
review: So cool- a great room. we entered in an egyptian hallway that really felt real. we had to move a statue to get our first clue. Me and my 3 friends had a blast!

room_title: Escape room "Valley of the Kings" by Puzzle Room Tahoe in South Lake Tahoe
review: We played all their room and this one may have been our favorite. the decor was very immersive and the game really good

room_title: Escape room "Hollywood Premiere - Destination Los Angeles" by ALL IN Adventures Milford in New Haven
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The San Andreas Earthquake Experience" by Clueology Rooms in Fort Collins
review: Went with a group of friends to the Earthquake room and I had a blast! The puzzles were neat, it needed a lot of collaboration and overall, was a great experience. I absolutely need to do Alcatraz, the story for that is so neat!

room_title: Escape room "The San Andreas Earthquake Experience" by Clueology Rooms in Fort Collins
review: Had a great time! We beat San Andreas with a minute to go! Can't wait to come do another room! Thanks!

room_title: Escape room "Maui Diamond Heist" by Hawaii Escape Challenge in Maui
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Private Detective Agency: Knight & Rook Investigations" by Puzzle Effect Denver in Denver
review: We've done numerous escape rooms in numerous locations & Denver Escape Room continues to be our favorite. We've done all of their rooms that are available right now & each one of them has been fantastic. Their puzzles are unique & perfectly challenging. Their sets are all thorough & realistic so you actually feel like you are wherever the theme says you are. If you need a hint they don't just give away the answer - they still allow you to solve the puzzles on your own. Every staff interaction we've had has been enjoyable too. Definitely 11/10 recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Private Detective Agency: Knight & Rook Investigations" by Puzzle Effect Denver in Denver
review: My husband and I are escape room enthusiasts, and we LOVED this escape room. The room we did (knight &rook) had great puzzles, the theme of the room was great and our game master was awesome. We will be coming back to do more!

room_title: Escape room "Private Detective Agency: Knight & Rook Investigations" by Puzzle Effect Denver in Denver
review: Super fun and the time flies. We took the whole family here and had to work as a team to solve the mystery! It was for my 17 year old's birthday. We did the Knight & Rook room. Everyone was involved and it was a bunch of fun. Our ages ranged from 10 to adults. It was a challenge and we really enjoyed it! Great time and we will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Return of the Pharaohs" by Paragon Escape Games in Phoenix
review: I've been to several escape rooms now, & this is by far the BEST!  The atmosphere is amazing- it doesn't look "decorated" as much as it feels like you get transported into the experience!  Everyone in our group was constantly needed, to help/search/solve the entire time- and the 12 & 14 year old in our group figured out things that the adults couldn't!  This escape room was a BLAST, you don't want to miss it!

room_title: Escape room "Return of the Pharaohs" by Paragon Escape Games in Phoenix
review: You have not been to an escape room until you’ve tried Return of the Pharaohs! The room is incredible. I felt like I was in an Egyptian tomb. The puzzles all went along with the theme and the attention to detail will blow you away. I can’t wait till their other rooms are finished.

room_title: Escape room "1960: History of the Future" by Room Escape DC in Washington, D.C.
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Dare 2 Escape in Orlando
review: Took my mother to experience her first escape room as I have done it before. This one far surpassed my expectations. We did the Dig and it was very immersive and set design was top notch for the value we paid. Challenges were creative. Even the two people we didn't know who joined us in the room had a blast. I think what set the bar is the friendliness of the game master. Will be back for the other two rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Dare 2 Escape in Orlando
review: Amazing time last night. We will be visiting again soon! The Dig was an amazing challenge and Melody the employee was what made it so amazing!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Dare 2 Escape in Orlando
review: We do a lot of escape rooms and will add Dare 2 Escape to our "must do". Today we completed The Dig but plan to go back and do the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by America's Escape Game in Orlando
review: We went to play the new Asylum game and it was really really cool and well done. The staff was really friendly and the room was awesome.

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by America's Escape Game in Orlando
review: We had an amazing time! I was creeped out by the sounds in the Asylum room. Will definitely do it again.

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by America's Escape Game in Orlando
review: We had an awesome time doing the Asylum! It was such a well put together room and followed the story line very well. We come down to Florida every year and always try new rooms here and are never disappointed!

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by America's Escape Game in Orlando
review: We had a great time! We did the Asylum and it was super cool! Kyle and Val were awesome to us!

room_title: Escape room "Teddy’s Lab" by Escape Room 104 in Pine Bluff
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci’s Office" by Escape Room Extreme in Tampa
review: I went to the Da Vinci's room with two friends who have never done an escape room before. We all loved it! The puzzles were challenging, but well thought-out, on theme, and a very cool mix of different brain teasers. Matthew was our guide for the room and he was super helpful and made the experience great. We were talking right away about going to try another room soon.

room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci’s Office" by Escape Room Extreme in Tampa
review: We did the Da Vinci room and had fun. Will be coming back to do the pirate room.

room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci’s Office" by Escape Room Extreme in Tampa
review: Awesome! Our family had an amazing time in the DaVinci room. Thank you for a great adventure!

room_title: Escape room "Mob Accountant" by Felix Games in Los Angeles
review: Fun room! We escaped with money to spare. Having a live actor in the room added a fun twist - he was dressed in period costume, friendly, and we gave him money for clues. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Mob Accountant" by Felix Games in Los Angeles
review: Best escape room I've been to, great experience, great actor a lot of fun and overall a great experience 10/10

room_title: Escape room "Mob Accountant" by Felix Games in Los Angeles
review: This is absolutely unbelievable! This is one of the most sophisticated yet fun and exciting games the proprietors Joy and Jeremy are unbelievably great at what they do.
