review: We had so much fun in the Sherlock room!! It was tricky but once we got going it was awesome! Everyone in the group was able to participate which made it more fun. We made it out in time!! We did get some hints on some of the clues. Also Daniel was so nice and helpful when booking our reservation and greeting us! Check it out!! I can't wait to go back to try another theme!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery of Sherlock" by Adventure Vault in Miami
review: Absolutely loved Adventure Vault! We did the Mystery of Sherlock room which was super fun and very challenging. This was my first time doing an escape room and I had a blast. Trying to solve all the riddles and clues was a lot of fun. This place is a MUST DO! Really recommend going with a group. The staff was really nice, friendly, and helpful. I can't wait to go back and check out the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Trouble in Tinseltown" by Lokey's Escape Rooms in Sarasota
review: We brought some friends and had a wonderful time. Great experience and loads of fun!  Will definitely be back.  The facility is challenging and everyone was great!

room_title: Escape room "Trouble in Tinseltown" by Lokey's Escape Rooms in Sarasota
review: We had a great time at the Tinseltown escape room. My brother came into town and it was a fun exercise to work through the puzzles with him and my husband. The owners were great and gave some assistance along the way without giving too much feedback. They were very animated and stayed in character, we were very impressed! We will definitely go back sometime in the future!

room_title: Escape room "Trouble in Tinseltown" by Lokey's Escape Rooms in Sarasota
review: Awesome experience, so much FUN! Our family of 5 was hooked from our very first room, and have since completed several rooms, we would highly recommend Lokey’s Escape Room! We escaped Trouble in Tinseltown; this room had a unique storyline, realistic props and decor, clever and challenging puzzles, and we LOVED the “in character” assignment intro! Another HUGE advantage of using Lokey’s is having a private room, we love being able to work together as a family.

room_title: Escape room "Trouble in Tinseltown" by Lokey's Escape Rooms in Sarasota
review: Everything about Lokey’s was amazing - from the fact that Richard worked with our group to accommodate us next day, to the email and follow ups that evening, to the INCREDIBLE room! Trouble in Tinseltown was beyond what we expected- awesome clues, fun and constantly moving AND the room was awesomely staged in all black and white! Our group had so much fun and we cannot WAIT to come back and try Detention and Press Start! Thanks again Richard!!

room_title: Escape room "The Queen Pin" by Huntsville Escape Rooms in Huntsville
review: The new room "Queen Pin" is very challenging but very fun. My 10-year-old was able to be a part of the team and helped out quite a bit. I really enjoyed the interaction with the staff and thought that the room was very well thought through. Great Job, Huntsville Escape Rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Queen Pin" by Huntsville Escape Rooms in Huntsville
review: We did the Queen Pin as our first room with Huntsville Escape Rooms, and it was fantastic! I've done 5 escape rooms now, and this one easily topped the list as my favorite. It was challenging and had some unexpected twists. We'll definitely be back to do the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Queen Pin" by Huntsville Escape Rooms in Huntsville
review: Excellent staff. They were very friendly and made my birthday party feel very welcomed. Queen Pin rules and yes we escaped! Thank you Jamie and R for your wonderful hospitality and superior customer service. BEST BIRTHDAY EVER!

room_title: Escape room "The Queen Pin" by Huntsville Escape Rooms in Huntsville
review: Queen pin was challenging, exciting, and unique. As self-proclaimed professionals, we highly recommend Huntsville Escape rooms! It was a fun atmosphere and the staff was great.

room_title: Escape room "The Queen Pin" by Huntsville Escape Rooms in Huntsville
review: Queen Pin lived up to our expectations! Fun room with a variety of challenges to make you think. Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Sector 13" by Trapped! Escape Room Upland in Pomona
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Wizard's Lair" by The Ultimate Escape Rooms in Ventura
review: My husband, myself and our 18 and 20 year old boys did this for some fun family bonding time. We escaped w 11 seconds to spare and only bickered a few times!!! We had a great time!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Wizard's Lair" by The Ultimate Escape Rooms in Ventura
review: Our group of 7 made it out of the wizards lair with seconds to spare. We loved it!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock" by Escape Room 5280 in Tampa
review: This place was one of the best escape rooms I had ever visit! At first, we were sketched out by the area (downtown Jax) and the safety of the room, but the game master assured us about our safety (not to mention that there was an emergency code to escape). A group of us reserved the Sherlock Game and enjoyed the challenge! We were left with 5 minutes left when we escaped and every one of us had a blast. I am most likely coming back and recommending this to everyone I know!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock" by Escape Room 5280 in Tampa
review: We have done many, many escape rooms all over the southeast, and we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves in the Sherlock room. All the puzzles made logical sense and fit well with the story. While the technology and scenery were fairly simple, there was a variety of hands-on puzzles beyond just finding 4 digit codes and keys. Sometimes escape rooms use fancy scenery to mask flawed game design and puzzles. This place is the exact opposite. The puzzles and game are the stars of the show. The old house located in the downtown area adds an intriguing twist that you won't find at your traditional strip mall escape rooms. We had to walk up the stairs to the second floor to get to the room. There are certainly flashier (and more expensive) escape rooms in the Jacksonville area. But if you want a fun and unique experience with solid puzzles and minimal distractions, I highly recommend giving this place a try. The owner was awesome as well. He took plenty of time to talk to us about our experience and definitely made us feel like welcomed guests.

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock" by Escape Room 5280 in Tampa
review: We did the sherlock room and really enjoyed it. The puzzles were logical and made sense. They were difficult but I didnt get frustrated like I had in some escape rooms before. This particular room was low tech, but really worked out better that way. Less distractions so I felt happier working the puzzles. The owner was very helpful and friendly. The outside of the building was under construction, so it didn't look like a business but the address was correct.

room_title: Escape room "Revenge of the Tomb" by America's Escape Game in Orlando
review: Danielle rocked as our assistant. Got out with 38 seconds to spare

room_title: Escape room "Revenge of the Tomb" by America's Escape Game in Orlando
review: Thanx to everyone working there--u r all fabulous!!! It was fun, exhausting and so unique! Organization is the key!

room_title: Escape room "Revenge of the Tomb" by America's Escape Game in Orlando
review: We had a lot of fun I highly recommend it!!

room_title: Escape room "Revenge of the Tomb" by America's Escape Game in Orlando
review: Awesome place!! We did the tomb of monthu and it was a blast. Our survival guide Stephanie was the best!!! Definitely coming back

room_title: Escape room "Revenge of the Tomb" by America's Escape Game in Orlando
review: 10 is too many for each room. Sorry, too easy and too many people for the size/difficulty.

room_title: Escape room "Revenge of the Tomb" by America's Escape Game in Orlando
review: Had a great first experience trying to escape the tomb. Our guide Justin tried as best he could to help us but we couldn't solve all the mysteries. We will definitely be coming back again.

room_title: Escape room "Revenge of the Tomb" by America's Escape Game in Orlando
review: It was $29 a person for Florida resident...You have a hour to solve the puzzles to escape the room! I chose the tomb of monthu room and had to solve the puzzles to get the gem it's harder than it looks...you are in a room full of people but this place was fun and worth it!

room_title: Escape room "Special Forces" by Play Live Escape in San Jose
review: The escape room was so fun that I came back a second time with my friends!  Chris is super nice and helpful and made the entire process (from booking to escaping) really smooth.  Thank you so much!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Special Forces" by Play Live Escape in San Jose
review: Me and boyfriend went today afternoon to Special forces room and special thanks to company that they support private bookings , also it was very challenging for us and fun ! The puzzles were high tech and very witty . Our hosts were very accommodating and we can't wait to try their other rooms, thank you so much, I can't wait to go back

room_title: Escape room "Special Forces" by Play Live Escape in San Jose
review: I went with my friends to Special forces room and we had a blast ! It's a brand new room with very creative puzzles , all of my team loved it! Also the staff team was very helpful and answered all our questions after the game.

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by MPower in San Jose
review: The puzzles in this escape room are great! We did The Cabin, and there were puzzles suited to the different skills of everyone in our group. I really enjoyed the atmosphere of the room, and I'm looking forward to their next room opening (early 2019, I think) so that we can go back for another round!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by MPower in San Jose
review: I took my entire family for fathers day and we had an amazing time trying to escape from "The Cabin". After nearly an hour we made it. It was such a great time because MPOWER was very cleaver in their designing of the room and all the things you needed to do to escape. I would definitely suggest you give MPOWER a try, you will not regret it.

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by MPower in San Jose
review: Had an amazing time here! Finished The Cabin a few months ago and just finished The Secret. I can't wait for more rooms! Would definitely recommend to anyone!

room_title: Escape room "Superhero's Adventure - Destination Darkover City" by ALL IN Adventures Waterbury in Southington
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Professor Moriarty’s Gameroom" by The Great Escape Room in Washington, D.C.
review: It was so much fun! We didn't escape, but the puzzles were really clever and we had a great time! Nothing was too frustrating or annoying, it was all really exciting and enjoyable! Highly recommend for a group of people to try it!

room_title: Escape room "Professor Moriarty’s Gameroom" by The Great Escape Room in Washington, D.C.
review: I came here for a friend's birthday and I loved the experience. We did the Gameroom and had someone who worked at the facility in the room with us as we solved the clues. There were 5-6  games we had to solve in order to escape the room. It was laid out pretty clearly but felt on the of clues were not really a clue that helped - it confused us even more. All in all we were able to escape with 6 mins left - so a success nonetheless.

room_title: Escape room "The Theatre" by Escape Room LA in Los Angeles
review: For 8 out of 10 people in my group, this was our first-ever Escape Room, and boy did we love it. We entered The Theatre (and escaped!), and it was such a blast, we wanted to do a second escape room immediately after completing the first. Definitely will be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Theatre" by Escape Room LA in Los Angeles
review: Love this place! I've done The Theatre (which we escaped) and The Cavern (which we didn't). They were both so detailed and fun and accommodated our group of 10.

room_title: Escape room "The Theatre" by Escape Room LA in Los Angeles
review: This was a blast.My favorite part was our "guide". He was helpful without leading. Know that these puzzles are difficult but engaging and doable. So much fun. We'll be back.

room_title: Escape room "The Theatre" by Escape Room LA in Los Angeles
review: First time doing an Escape Room ever, and our group of 12 had the best time! We did the "Theatre" game and finished in 38 minutes, which we were told is really excellent. Communication is so important, so I'd recommend getting a group of people you know to fill that particular room -- trying to communicate well with strangers would've been much more challenging. We are looking forward to doing another one soon. Also, our "stage manager" (the room's host) helped make the experience fun. She had her poker face on during the game, but during our recap afterwards was personable, energetic, and had been so observant about the details of how we solved the riddles. RECOMMEND!

room_title: Escape room "CDC Lockdown" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: What an amazing experience he had at urban escape. Innovative,entertaining, teamwork, challenge and above all fun. A must do activity for all

room_title: Escape room "CDC Lockdown" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: So much fun! Highly recommend for families or groups of friends!

room_title: Escape room "CDC Lockdown" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: I can not say enough great things about our experience at Urban Escape! The room was equally fun and challenging and the staff is amazing and so friendly! My group of friends and I are looking forward to going back very soon!

room_title: Escape room "CDC Lockdown" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Step aside, Sudoku. Catch you later, Crossword. I've found my new favorite puzzle game.Great upbeat, helpful staff. Highly recommend for team building. If you are competitive like me, you will be challenged by the clock. I already knew I was a puzzle person going into the CDC and Jewel Heist games, but I think I might have just found a dangerously addictive new hobby...

room_title: Escape room "CDC Lockdown" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: We're visiting family here from Ireland and we played this yesterday and it was so much fun! Such a clever idea! CDC room was amazing! So creative! Game master was awesome all the staff were so friendly. Can't wait to come back again! Bring it to Ireland please

room_title: Escape room "CDC Lockdown" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: My wife and I had a great time. We were grouped with two other couples (all strangers to each other) for the CDC experience. Despite not knowing anybody, we all had fun together and managed to escape in time. Ellis was our game master and did a fantastic job. All the staff were friendly, enthusiastic, helpful, and you could tell they enjoyed their work.

room_title: Escape room "CDC Lockdown" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: One of the best "things to do" in The Alpharetta area.Want to have fun with 7 of your closest friends?  Want to meet up to 7 new friends?  Want to work together to build a team or to strengthen relationships?  Urban Escapes is the place.$28 bucks.  1 hour.  Go.  You'll have fun.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: I went with a group of 7 tonight and did Museum Heist. It was so much fun and I will definitely be coming back soon! Our game master Preston was awesome! Thanks for a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: Conquered the Museum Heist room with my boyfriend (with 3 minutes to spare). It was an AWESOME experience!! Great staff. Definitely have to think outside of the box! Will be returning soon!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Revenge" by Exodus Escape Adventures in Sacramento
review: We were super impressed with Exodus Escape Adventures! It was our first escape room experience, and it was great family fun. The Pirate’s Revenge room was the perfect balance of challenge (we didn’t make it out in time) and fun (we still had so much fun). The lighting, the set, the props were all perfect fits to set the right atmosphere for a midnight adventure. Hope to come again soon!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Revenge" by Exodus Escape Adventures in Sacramento
review: This is our second time at this establishment and after doing over 50 rooms pirates revenge is one of our favorites. Not only was the set spectacular and immersive, the puzzles were challenging and our game master (forgot his name sorry!)was amazing. We will def be back for their new room in January!!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Revenge" by Exodus Escape Adventures in Sacramento
review: I've played well over 150 escape rooms and their Pirate themed room here is epic!!! You can't miss this amazing Pirate adventure. The set design here is phenomenal. You'll be experiencing an adventure in ways that other local escape rooms just don't offer. I brought my friend who had never played an escape room before, and he caught the bug and we can't wait until they open their new room so we can go back and check out what other amazing things they can create. Our game master was really fun and the backstory was very well themed too. A good time was had by all.

room_title: Escape room "Sabotage" by Train Escape in Birmingham
review: We've done many escape games and this is one of our favorites! We successfully completed Operation Sabotage. It was fun, surprising and challenging! It was clean and our host was very nice and helpful. One time, a key was shaken out of a lockbox and he reminded us 'you have to unlock the box to get the key,' so he was clearly watching what we were doing. (We weren't trying to cheat. Haha.) It was a great time and we will return to try another game!

room_title: Escape room "Sabotage" by Train Escape in Birmingham
review: Our group was there for a friends bachelor weekend and he wanted a unique escape room. Train Escape has their rooms in train cars and was great for what we were looking for. We had a group of 9 total. The couple at Train Escape managed to have us split into two groups and use both rooms. After talking with them, they told us about a third room they were opening that we would definitely try to come back for.

room_title: Escape room "Sabotage" by Train Escape in Birmingham
review: We had so much fun last night! We brought our kids and our niece and we came so close to breaking out of the Sabotage room. The owners were very friendly and made us feel right at home. Derrick even took extra time at the end to show our 4-year-old around the actual train. We are definitely coming back to do the other room!

room_title: Escape room "Sabotage" by Train Escape in Birmingham
review: My group of 4 absolutely loved Sabotage! It was somewhat linear while also leaving a lot of room for exploration of codes. The theme was awesome being smashed into a train car with everyone. It gave a real sense of urgency without having to do much to affect us mentally. There were enough red herrings to keep us going down a rabbit hole or two without overwhelming us with useless items and meaningless clues. It's so hard to gush about the room without giving away hints, but I'd say you'd be hard pressed to find something to dislike about Sabotage! Go try it!

room_title: Escape room "Sabotage" by Train Escape in Birmingham
review: Sabotage is an excellent room fun, challenging puzzles. The theming was well done and the story was fun, with a logical flow, and some very cool twists. The idea of an escape room in a train is original, and provides a great atmosphere, as the train element is thoroughly executed throughout the game. I recommend for beginners and enthusiasts alike, and I can't wait to go back to play the other room!

room_title: Escape room "Championship" by Hawaii Escape Challenge in Honolulu
review: Great fun, great staff, good memories

room_title: Escape room "Championship" by Hawaii Escape Challenge in Honolulu
review: Super fun. Good for bonding with your team/group. Fun mental challenge with a twist. I did it with my youth ministry team & used each other's strengths to finish the challenge. We completed the task in getting the championship trophy with just over 2min to spare. Would we do it again?! Of course!

room_title: Escape room "Championship" by Hawaii Escape Challenge in Honolulu
review: I had a great time doing the Championship room. It was very challenging and exciting. The customer service provided by the people running the game and the front was perfect. I will be back again to try out the other rooms available.

room_title: Escape room "Passengers in Peril" by Try'n Escape in Denver
review: None

room_title: Escape room "I.R.I.S." by Puzzah! in Denver
review: Stopped in while I was passing through because my four friends wanted to do it. I was kinda eh at first but I'm glad I joined in. We went into the Iris Room and without spoiling too much, it was a time travel room. It was actually quite realistic and the narrator really brought everything together. This ended up being a highlight on our trip. The staff was really helpful, both with helping us choose the room, and also giving us recommendations for other things to do in the area. See you guys at the end of the summer for sure!

room_title: Escape room "I.R.I.S." by Puzzah! in Denver
review: Awesome experience. Made for a very fun night for a great group of friends. I'll definitely come back again! I.R.I.S. was a real challenge, thanks PUZZAH!

room_title: Escape room "I.R.I.S." by Puzzah! in Denver
review: Try this! It's so fun! I.R.I.S was a good challenge, and you don't have to thank us for saving the whole world!

room_title: Escape room "I.R.I.S." by Puzzah! in Denver
review: What a really good time! I came here with my co-workers as part of a team building event and we had a blast! I'd love to go back to try out the other rooms. We did the IRIS puzzle and it was definitely challenging yet fun!

room_title: Escape room "I.R.I.S." by Puzzah! in Denver
review: Had a great time! Good clues! It really kept all of us engaged the entire time and we were able to get out! I think we only had two minutes left. Staff was very nice. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Lakeland Escape Room in Lakeland
review: This was my first ever escape room and I absolutely loved it! The two of us took on the Asylum and had a blast deciphering the clues before successfully escaping with time to spare. Will most certainly be back again with more people in tow! Thanks for a great day!

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Lakeland Escape Room in Lakeland
review: We took my 12-year-old daughter and her friends for her birthday, which fell on Friday the 13th. They worked together, got a little freaked out and a few were too scared to finish it. We finished with less than a minute left in the Asylum and they had a blast solving it! Unforgettable!

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Lakeland Escape Room in Lakeland
review: I organized a team-building party here for my coworkers and we had a blast! The owners were so friendly. We did the Asylum room and it was just creepy and challenging enough to keep us all on our toes. This was my second time and I plan to go again to try to escape the “Split” room next time!

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Lakeland Escape Room in Lakeland
review: We had a really great time. Asylum was challenging and exciting. The staff is friendly and informative, and we met Luna (she's adorable)! We'll definitely be back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Lakeland Escape Room in Lakeland
review: My friends and I had a lot of fun trying to escape. The Asylum was challenging but we managed to escape with less than a minute left, it was intense. A great place to go for a night out with friends or the family! We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Mutant X" by Think Escape Games in Miami
review: My Family and I were looking for something fun to do one Sunday afternoon and we came across Think Escape Games. This place blew our minds, we had such a blast. Their were 5 of us in total with ages ranging from 7 to 62. The Study room was super fun and had everyone involved. We will be back for sure. The staff were really friendly and answered all our questions after the game.

room_title: Escape room "Mutant X" by Think Escape Games in Miami
review: We were in Florida on vacation and decided go to Think Escape Games one night. We had a blast. We did The Laboratory game. It was difficult however we used our brains and worked as a team we got out.This is a great place the people there were friendly. Highly recommend going and engaging your mind and working as a team on these games.I am looking for an Escape Game place where I live and will be going frequently.

room_title: Escape room "Mutant X" by Think Escape Games in Miami
review: Had to be part of the new "buzz" around town. This was our first time and what a BLAST! I couldn't have asked for a better team. Solving the trivias for "The Laboratory" was a bit tedious, but you were so engaged and eager to solve the mysteries in each room you forget about the complexity of the game. Thanks to all the staff of Think Escape Games for making my birthday celebration different, fascinating and fun! Looking forward to "The Lounge". So we shall see you soon

room_title: Escape room "The Crypt" by Escape New Haven in New Haven
review: What a good time. Just had a game with three others in "The Crypt". It was really challenging but also fun. It was different but great. From the moment I walked in, I felt welcomed, the staff was friendly and inviting and helpful. I recommend this place to any and all who want to try it!

room_title: Escape room "The Crypt" by Escape New Haven in New Haven
review: Played the crypt with 2 other people and it was awesome! Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "The Crypt" by Escape New Haven in New Haven
review: Had a great time trying to escape 'The Crypt'. Interesting, challenging puzzles with a unique story line.

room_title: Escape room "The Crypt" by Escape New Haven in New Haven
review: We went yesterday and try the "Crypt". It was awesome and totally exhilarating and we had a lot of fun. Genius! Unfortunately, we didn't make it out on time . We shall return!

room_title: Escape room "The Crypt" by Escape New Haven in New Haven
review: Best hour you can spend with your friends locked in a room.

room_title: Escape room "The Virus" by Get the F Out in Los Angeles
review: The production value in this spot was amazing! Definitely a challenging room, but having the actor in the space was great to keep us on point, without giving hints away. The VR experience was the first I had tried as well, and it really helped to add to the whole room.

room_title: Escape room "The Virus" by Get the F Out in Los Angeles
review: Absolutely the coolest room I've ever done. LOVE THE OCULUS RIFT INTRO. Completely immersive. Felt like I was really a scientist out to save the world.....and my own life.We need more rooms as awesome as this one! Looking forward to the next one!

room_title: Escape room "The Virus" by Get the F Out in Los Angeles
review: I've done a few escape room experiences, and this is BY FAR the best!  Well thought-out, clever puzzles, and great effects!  Not really a beginner's escape room... I recommend you try a few others around town and save the best (this one) for a very special occasion.  We did not make it out...but totally loved the whole experience from the moment we arrived until we left.  We had 6 of us. I wouldn't do it with less because there are so many tasks to complete.

room_title: Escape room "The Virus" by Get the F Out in Los Angeles
review: WOW SERIOUSLY ONE OF THE BEST ROOMS, EVER! I can't wait for their upcoming submarine room. I would recommend booking max capacity since you'll be needing all the help. Our experience from beginning to end was fantastic. The production value, entertainment, puzzles, technology, and experience were all top-notch. It really doesn't get better than this. I cannot recommend The Virus enough.

room_title: Escape room "The Virus" by Get the F Out in Los Angeles
review: From start to finish, this was an amazing experience.Once your group is together, you're no longer customers, you're "doctors," brought together to save the world from virus that's destroying the planet. The whole experience reinforces that-- the VR presentation does a wonderful job of making you feel like you're entering a secret government lab, deep in the bowels of the earth. The room itself was expertly decorated, and while you recognized that this wasn't *really* a multi-million dollar lab, it also didn't feel like something that was thrown together in a weekend to cash in on the escape room craze...

room_title: Escape room "The Virus" by Get the F Out in Los Angeles
review: One freaking puzzle away! What an amazing time we had! It was soooo challenging and the puzzles were very thought out! Go do it!

room_title: Escape room "The Virus" by Get the F Out in Los Angeles
review: Holy crap!!! I just experienced the most awesome, challenging, amazing escape room!!!! Congratulations to the creators, bob and Larry for creating such a fun experience!!! I cannot recommend it enough!!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Escape Operation End of Days" by Mission Escape Games in Hartford
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Enter the Nether" by Escape-topia in Miami
review: This was by far the most creative escape room I've ever done, I did the new one "Escape the Nether" and it was amazing. So many creative and custom decorations/puzzles that I've never seen before!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock" by ROOM 5280 in Denver
review: This place was GREAT!! My family does escape rooms in every new state we go to and this one was by far our favorite! It was so great that we went back for the second day in a row!. The guys, In the picture and who run the place, are super friendly and want you to escape. They are helpful and give you help. We would definitely go back when and if In Denver. Thank you both for a great two day!!!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock" by ROOM 5280 in Denver
review: Very professionally done escape room. Clear instructions and when we got stuck on a particularly obscure clue, a note with a clue was slipped under the door. Lots and lots of locks to figure out how to unlock! You will not leave disappointed.

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock" by ROOM 5280 in Denver
review: Awesome atmosphere. The rooms are in a late 19th century building with a lot of original finishes. We did the Sherlock room, which had some unexpected and tricky clues, but was manageable for our group of four. Definitely the best room I've done in the Denver metro area.

room_title: Escape room "Expedition Unknown" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Escape Redding in Redding
review: Just did the prison break escape and it exceeded my exceptions by far! This was my first escape room and it was extremely fun. The workers were great and I look forward to doing the others soon!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Escape Redding in Redding
review: Wow. What a great place. I haven't had that much fun in a long time. I recommend the jail room, it is extreme! The staff is so nice and they explain everything in detail. I felt like I really was in prison. Very cool. I’d give 10 stars if I could.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Escape Redding in Redding
review: What a fabulous experience In Redding. None of our party had ever been to an escape room and we weren't sure what to expect, but the director put our minds at ease and gave us some fun hints for success. Our room was "Prison Break". The layout was so creative and accurate to how a jail might look. The director was in communication with hints which helped us through times we felt frozen. We actually got out with seconds to spare. Great price for a great experience.

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Orange - Beach in Orange Beach
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Excalibur" by Off The Couch Games in San Jose
review: A friend and I recently visited the Excalibur room and also sampled the VR experience at Off The Couch. We had an absolutely phenomenal time. I've done a few escape rooms in the past, and this one by far had the highest attention to detail and innovative puzzles. Additionally this was the first "extended" room I've done and it really felt like a complete experience. I would recommend this room to groups of any size.

room_title: Escape room "Excalibur" by Off The Couch Games in San Jose
review: STAFF WAS SO NICE AND EVERYTHING WAS GREAT!!!! Remember to check in for a free drink too! There were so many things to do in the lobby we never got bored! Excited to go do the rest of the rooms. We did Excalibur and it was so fun and different compared to the rest of the other escape rooms I've done!

room_title: Escape room "Excalibur" by Off The Couch Games in San Jose
review: This place is amazing. I have done over 15 escape rooms, mostly in the Bay Area, but also in Los Angeles, and the Excalibur room here is one of the best I have experienced anywhere. Amazingy immersive, the hosts are great, and the puzzles are truly integrated into the environment. It was an awesome experience, highly recommended.

room_title: Escape room "The Return of the Magician" by UNLOCKED: Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: I've done quite a few escape rooms in the past (around 15), but UNLOCKED still manages to impress me with unique puzzles I haven't seen before. Some mechanics/tech of the rooms were pretty awesome, too. The rest of my group were first timers but they all thoroughly had a super fun time figuring out the puzzles. 60 minutes went by so quickly!

room_title: Escape room "The Return of the Magician" by UNLOCKED: Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: The puzzles were varied in type and difficulty. Nothing felt unfair. You can tell a lot of thought went into the room. The staff is super friendly and the room is good for all ages. I would recommend it to anyone!

room_title: Escape room "The Return of the Magician" by UNLOCKED: Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: I've done quite a few escape rooms throughout so cal and this room did a great job of being both immersive in storytelling and impressive in its variety of puzzles and pacing - even during beta! Great job unlocked team!

room_title: Escape room "First Mission" by Golden Puzzle Room in Denver
review: We just hosted our son's 10th birthday party at the Golden Puzzle Room. The kids were boasting that First Missions would be too easy but it took them the entire hour and they had a BLAST. Couldn't stop talking all the way home and they want to do all the other rooms! :) The support was great & we loved being able to rent the party room for dinner and to watch the puzzlers on the closed circuit tv. We will be back for more, thank you!

room_title: Escape room "First Mission" by Golden Puzzle Room in Denver
review: We took our 3 grandkids (10 and 13) to the Golden Puzzle Room. They first did the First Mission Room and then we all did the Rocky Mountain Zephyr Room. We all loved the experience and had a great time. The room presented a very realistic setting I would definitely recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "First Mission" by Golden Puzzle Room in Denver
review: Amazing place! They were great with my kids too. We did the Zephyr room and the First Mission. My kids (13 and younger) did the first mission all by themselves and loved it! The puzzles were challenging and the staff was great. Will absolutely come back for more fun.

room_title: Escape room "The Gallery" by Escape Sacramento in Sacramento
review: Can't wait to go again! What a great adventure!

room_title: Escape room "The Gallery" by Escape Sacramento in Sacramento
review: The experience was fantastic. I was engaged the entire time. This is a great team building exercise for employees. I could also see this being a great idea for a first date. I will definitely be going back.

room_title: Escape room "The Gallery" by Escape Sacramento in Sacramento
review: So fun!!! Can't wait to do this again. We didn't even argue..... Much!!! Loved it!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Gallery" by Escape Sacramento in Sacramento
review: We had two teams of 6 go head to head in the Study rooms. My team didn't even win and at the end, I wanted to keep going because I was having so much fun. The rooms are mentally stimulating and this place is a great team-building activity for coworkers, friends and couples. I will definitely be coming back to attempt the Gallery! Bravo guys

room_title: Escape room "The Gallery" by Escape Sacramento in Sacramento
review: Service is wonderful ,I will be backThe sea breeze drives like a dream highly recommend pierson rentals

room_title: Escape room "The Gallery" by Escape Sacramento in Sacramento
review: RV was clean and easy to drive.  The owners were very nice and helpful. Highly recommended.

room_title: Escape room "The Gallery" by Escape Sacramento in Sacramento
review: Bret and Ashley at Pierson Rentals are professional and always quick to help with questions. It was our family's first experience with an RV, and although I was personally pretty nervous to drive one, Bret made it easy with his clear instructions. I felt like a pro by the end of our trip! The Suncruiser gets lots of second looks on the highway, as she is a beauty. Bret has updated the Suncruiser to be modern with a ton of cool amenities. It's perfect for a family of 4-6 or two couples

room_title: Escape room "Mad Mind VR" by ZScape Games in Livermore
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Detention" by Kuma Escape in San Jose
review: Went here for my girlfriend's birthday with a total of 11 people in our party. It was all of our first time doing the escape room, and the birthday girl chose the Detention room. It was so realistic, and we all had so much fun. We all talked about it and decided to come back eventually to try the Utopia theme.

room_title: Escape room "Detention" by Kuma Escape in San Jose
review: I came here with bf on my birthday not knowing what to expect.  I had so much fun! I agree it might've been even more fun if we had a full group of friends, but the experience was good even teaming up with strangers.

room_title: Escape room "Detention" by Kuma Escape in San Jose
review: This place is SOOO much fun.  You'll really have your head scratching from playing this.  It takes a while to get use to the idea.The secret is to get over convention and be open to taking things apart and being nosy.  I think this place would be perfect for training detectives/officers who investigate a crime scene.  I imagine that you must use the same skills.

room_title: Escape room "Guardian of the Scroll - Chapter 1" by Enchanted Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: We loved this place so much we did 2 challenges in 1 day. Literally finished one and we were so pumped we paid for another same day. Not so hard that it is impossible to escape, but challenging enough to make you brain work. We are actually planning on going again in a week for my bachelorette party! A must try if you want to do an escape room. There isn't enough words to explain how awesome this place is! It has never disappointed us!

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Alcatraz - Destination San Francisco" by ALL IN Adventures Milford in New Haven
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Orange - Beach in Orange Beach
review: My family and I had such a good time! We did "The Kidnapping". We didn't break out but we sure had a lot of fun trying. Would definitely recommend to anyone. Great family fun.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Orange - Beach in Orange Beach
review: We attempted "kidnapping" with two adults and three children (ages 5-11). It was exciting and challenging, and we had a fun time! The staff was friendly and helpful. We definitely plan to return to try the other experiences.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Orange - Beach in Orange Beach
review: Our group did the kidnapping one and we had the best time working together to solve the puzzles and managed to breakout with 5 minutes left. I would definitely recommend for anyone to try this and the crew was great.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Orange - Beach in Orange Beach
review: What a great time we had with our two adult sons in the "Kidnapped" breakout room! The puzzles were challenging, and we were two numbers away from escaping within the hour:). It was a fun experience, and we'll try another when we're together again.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Orange - Beach in Orange Beach
review: Had a great time!! Took my sister and nephew who were visiting. We did the kidnapped room. Broke out with a 1:33 left. Wasn't until we got out that our game master told us that we did it in the dark without turning the light on. That made it much more exciting that we escaped!! Will be coming back!! Thanks again.

room_title: Escape room "Wise Guys" by Planet Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: I have a lots of fun. HUNTER the guy that guide me and my friend was very helpful and nice!! I truly recommend it. Thank you!!! I will come back for the next level!! I am from Las Vegas!! 🤗

room_title: Escape room "Wise Guys" by Planet Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: We had a mind-blowing experience. Allen our host did a superb job getting us ready for our 60-minute adventure. The clues were challenging and not obvious. We got a preview of escape rooms being constructed. Heartily recommend the escape room for a unique outing.

room_title: Escape room "Wise Guys" by Planet Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Fun staff, good times with friends. We did the mafia one and it was pretty intense. WE WERE SO CLOSE! Compared to the competition, one of the better escape rooms out there.

room_title: Escape room "Wise Guys" by Planet Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: This is by far the best escape room around. Just when you believe you've got it - think again! The best part? Completely a private experience. Went here for a date night and left with all smiles. Thank you so much!

room_title: Escape room "Wise Guys" by Planet Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: I’ve done a lot of escape rooms and this one is at the top of the list. It was very creative and super fun. Loved the way the room was set up and had some creative surprises! Highly recommend two thumbs up!

room_title: Escape room "The Temple of the Laughing God" by Spellbound Escapes in Norwich
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Wizard's Challenge" by Legends Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: It was a challenge to get thru the room. It's best to have lots of people in your group to have all minds come together in order to escape. It's definitely worth the money so if your up for a challenge then this is the place to go and have fun

room_title: Escape room "Wizard's Challenge" by Legends Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: We experienced "Wizard's Challenge" - I went in hoping it wouldn't be too overwhelming for our group of four, which included my parents who had NEVER done any kind of escape room before... but love dragons and wizards, so we had to try it! The decor, sound effects and overall ambiance was perfect. The puzzles were challenging and fit 110% with the theme of the room! Sydney was our game host and was excellent! Clues were just right and when it was more of a technical adjustment rather than an incorrect answer, she was an amazing guide to "tweaking it to make it right". Our family had an awesome time and my mother (visiting from California) already wants Legends Escape Room on her "Must Do" for next time! If you are a Harry Potter fan, love wizards and dragons or just looking for an escape room "different" than the usual locks - try "Wizard's Challenge" for an A+ experience!

room_title: Escape room "Wizard's Challenge" by Legends Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: We had a blast and was excited how far we got for our first visit. We will go again. Staff was fabulous and was very patient with newbies. We did the Wizard room. It was tough but as time went by it was exciting to find the clues to race against time. Totally recommend to any family for a fun night.

room_title: Escape room "Wrong Place, Wrong Time" by Escape Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: We went this Sunday to finish up our girls weekend. We had a blast. We escaped the Jack the Ripper Room just in the nick of time. Highly recommend!!!

room_title: Escape room "Wrong Place, Wrong Time" by Escape Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: What a different way to spend an evening! Definitely recommend for a family, work group, or a few friends! Can't wait for the planned expansion of 2 additional rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Wrong Place, Wrong Time" by Escape Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: Thank you for your kind words! We loved hosting your group and can't wait for you to join us for "Wrong Place, Wrong Time" in just a few short weeks! Till then......

room_title: Escape room "Wrong Place, Wrong Time" by Escape Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: Inaugural attempt at solving our way out of an Escape Room. What a great concept! We are hooked! The owners were amazing! It was a great pleasure to have met them. The five of us will definitely be back to unlock another room! Thank you!!!

room_title: Escape room "Wrong Place, Wrong Time" by Escape Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: If I could give more than 5 stars I totally would!! This was the most fun I've had in a long time around this area! Especially if you're tired of just having the option of going to the bar. Something new and exciting! I recommend this outing for all groups!! I can't wait to go back and try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Classified" by Train Escape in Birmingham
review: We had a great time! Unfortunately, we did not break out, but we will definitely come back so we can redeem ourselves!

room_title: Escape room "Classified" by Train Escape in Birmingham
review: We had an awesome time at the Train Escape. The owners were friendly and helpful. This was our first experience in an escape room and although we didn't make it out, it was a lot of fun.

room_title: Escape room "Classified" by Train Escape in Birmingham
review: So far best date night of 2017!This was our first time attempting an escape room challenge. We honestly had no idea what to expect. We booked the "Classified Room" which I thought was great for first timers although we didn't escape :(

room_title: Escape room "Seaside Casino" by Hawaii Escape Challenge in Maui
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Buried Alive - the Curse of Octavia" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: YES DO IT - Friendly staff - great mystery - lots of fun. We made it out with a few minutes to spare. We would go again!

room_title: Escape room "Buried Alive - the Curse of Octavia" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Great place. Nice rooms great staff. This was our second time and we will definitely be back. Best escape room in denver

room_title: Escape room "Buried Alive - the Curse of Octavia" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Great experience with friends! Room was challenging, but not too hard and manager was very flexible.

room_title: Escape room "The Infected" by Locked In Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: My friends and I did their new infected room and it was awesome! We had 6 people in our group. The rooms were so unique and well put together and had enough space that we didn't feel too crowded.  I definitely like this place better than a few others I've tried in the springs!The owners are so nice and were doing everything to make our experience fun and awesome!!! We are definitely coming back for our next outing! Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Government Secrets" by Xscape Pods in Los Angeles
review: So excited to have a new entertainment option in Chino Hills!  The owners were friendly and fun to chat with, the decor impressive and authentic, and the game was difficult but SO MUCH fun!  We managed to beat the Government Secrets room with just over a minute to spare.  This was my first escape room experience and it was a fantastic one!  I can't wait to go back when the other rooms are completed.  If you like escape rooms, I highly recommend trying this one!

room_title: Escape room "Government Secrets" by Xscape Pods in Los Angeles
review: My 3rd local Escape Room experience and I have to say this was really cool! They did an awesome job with the decor and the room itself was well thought out and kept us interested! We were greeted by the owner and creator of the rooms! He was nice and welcoming. Overall the whole experience was great. Of the three rooms to choose from we did "Government Secrets" skill level was moderate lots of communication between participants is key! I would come back to this location to do the other two rooms and anymore in the future.

room_title: Escape room "Government Secrets" by Xscape Pods in Los Angeles
review: Had a great time with only 9 minutes left! We got it. Very exciting. Tried the Government Secrets. The Egyptian room looks pretty cool too.

room_title: Escape room "Toxicity" by A Narrow Escape in Orlando
review: The Toxicity room was intense, but so much fun.The puzzles worked with the theme and the ambience really added to the challenge.Visiting from Philly, but will definitely try the other rooms when we come back to Orlando!

room_title: Escape room "Toxicity" by A Narrow Escape in Orlando
review: Played Toxicity tonight and absolutely loved it. I've played almost all of the rooms in the area and this is for sure one of my favorites. Without giving anything away I'll say that the room is immersive with very well thought out puzzles. Can't wait to come back!

room_title: Escape room "Toxicity" by A Narrow Escape in Orlando
review: Great experience. I've done others. This is the best one. We did Toxicity. Highly recommend if you like difficult challenges.

room_title: Escape room "The Doll Room" by Gulf Coast Escape Room in Orange Beach
review: We completed the doll room today. So much fun!! It was just creepy enough, and the whole family had a great time.

room_title: Escape room "The Doll Room" by Gulf Coast Escape Room in Orange Beach
review: Just did the doll room and loved it - staff was great and everything was well organized.

room_title: Escape room "The Doll Room" by Gulf Coast Escape Room in Orange Beach
review: We just finished the doll room. Had a great time! The girls working there did a good job explaining everything. Would definitely recommend for a different change of pace from the beach.

room_title: Escape room "The Doll Room" by Gulf Coast Escape Room in Orange Beach
review: We were in town celebrating for a Bachelorette Trip. It was so fun! We did the "Doll Room". A great challenge that puts you in the investigator role for a short while. The staff was also very friendly and helpful.

room_title: Escape room "The Doll Room" by Gulf Coast Escape Room in Orange Beach
review: We loved escaping from the Doll room!! We all had to work together and we solved it !! We want to come back and escape from the Voodoo room when it's finished!!! Thank you to our great guide. She was fabulous!!!

room_title: Escape room "Abducted" by Escape Tuscaloosa in Tuscaloosa
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Race the Storm" by Mastermind Escape Games in Atlanta
review: One of the best escape rooms we've done! Very fun and immersive. The people that work there are awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Race the Storm" by Mastermind Escape Games in Atlanta
review: So fun! Our family had a great time and we will definitely come back again!

room_title: Escape room "Race the Storm" by Mastermind Escape Games in Atlanta
review: My first time and if you ever thought about doing this this is the place to come it great will do it again just one time is not enough

room_title: Escape room "Up in Smoke" by Ozark Escape in Fayetteville (AR)
review: Nice staff Fun puzzles. Great experience!

room_title: Escape room "Up in Smoke" by Ozark Escape in Fayetteville (AR)
review: Great fun! wonderful staff!

room_title: Escape room "Up in Smoke" by Ozark Escape in Fayetteville (AR)
review: We had a awesome time! The staff was amazing and the puzzle was challenging but tons of fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Missing Scientist" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Fort Collins
review: Enigma was great! Knocked out the "Missing Scientist" in about 45 mins. We had a group of 4 with only 2 of us ever doing an escape room before, and Mel explained everything really well for the couple of people who had never done an escape room. We needed a couple of hints at first because we stalled in the first room, looking for clues in the wrong places. But I think that's good because then once we got on a roll, we all kind of knew what to look for and did a good job of dividing tasks up between us. Solid first time, will definitely be back to do the "Facility" room soon.

room_title: Escape room "The Missing Scientist" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Fort Collins
review: Our family of four had an outstanding experience working our way out of the room. From the initial excitement of being locked in the room to the many ways the eight of us processed the clues- we were completely engaged and entertained. Can't wait to try the Missing Scientist Part II.

room_title: Escape room "The Missing Scientist" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Fort Collins
review: I wanted to do something fun with a group of friends for my birthday! We invited our closest friends and had so much fun!!! We came very close but were unable to escape. Our group spent the rest of the evening talking about doing it again somewhere and how much fun we had! I would recommend this for anyone!

room_title: Escape room "The Secret Gallery (Quest to the Forbidden Temple)" by Dynamic Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Pharaoh" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: This was great!!

room_title: Escape room "Pharaoh" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: We were visiting from out of town and stopped by and did the Pharoah room before we flew home. The room was decorated well and the puzzles were fun. A few of the mechanics were broken so not as fun as it could have been - but flowed well. The ac must have been broken, it was very warm in the room. They did add a fan but it didn't really help.

room_title: Escape room "Pharaoh" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: Did the pharaoh room and loved it! Escaped with one minute and 15 seconds left!

room_title: Escape room "Pharaoh" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: Had a lot of fun with the pod at the Pharaoh room with our awesome game guide Mandy! Thank you for the great night.

room_title: Escape room "Pharaoh" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: Had a great time at Big Escape Rooms escaping the wrath of the Pharaoh! Mandy Rocks!

room_title: Escape room "Pharaoh" by Big Escape Rooms in Atlanta
review: It was definitely a great experience. We did The Pharaoh room. Our guide Mandy was amazing and helpful.

room_title: Escape room "Central Bank" by Fox in a Box Orange County in Orange County
review: Super fun. First time doing escape room. Saw many great reviews and it didn't disappoint. Did the bank robber one. Super difficult but so much fun. We were so close too! Highly recommend for any group of folks that just want to have fun, team build, or for bday celebrations like in my case.

room_title: Escape room "Central Bank" by Fox in a Box Orange County in Orange County
review: The Bank Heist room was cool. They gave us some cool things to make us feel like we were robbing a bank which added to the overall experience.As far as design, the sound effects were nice, but the decorations could have been a little more immersive. Puzzles had a good flow to them. We got stuck on a few of them and one of the puzzles was missing a key but the game master caught the error right away and fixed it. Customer service was great. We escaped with a few minutes to go.

room_title: Escape room "Central Bank" by Fox in a Box Orange County in Orange County
review: Amazing night of fun! This was our first experience with an escape room and it lived up to the hype. We had the Central Bank room which was extremely challenging. Although we didn't escape the room ( 25% success per Fox in a Box) we made it into the vault and are now even more determined to go back and finish the job. Highly recommend for a fun night out!!

room_title: Escape room "Casino Heist" by EscapeWorks Denver in Denver
review: This place is great!!! Selina was a great host!! We did the casino room and it was fun and challenging.

room_title: Escape room "Casino Heist" by EscapeWorks Denver in Denver
review: Our family of 7 had a great time in the Casino Heist room. We did not succeed but we felt we did well all in all! The concept of these rooms are genius and we will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Casino Heist" by EscapeWorks Denver in Denver
review: It was a wonderful experience! We had the casino room and it was super tricky, but we figured out about 3/5 of it!! We were given hints when we got really stuck. Great bonding experience!

room_title: Escape room "Hut 51" by Back Alley Escape in Temecula
review: Awesome experience, and friendly staff! Love HUT51 escape room! Highly recommend this place

room_title: Escape room "Hut 51" by Back Alley Escape in Temecula
review: What are you waiting for ??? Don't miss the opportunity to play Back Alleys Escape rooms. The owners Simon and Angie are helpful and so fun to interact with. It's a family run business with such a fun vibe. The two rooms that they have are very challenging and well thought out. I think they make there own rooms. A ton of detail and fun is packed into each room. The Hut was challenging but we got out in time with the help of our game master. The Basement was a 9/10 in level hardest. We could not get though it. We are doing it again and hope to escape the next time. We have played 20 escape rooms to date and consider this to be one of the most challenging. Highly recommend you play here. Also the have VR escape rooms. And they are fun as well. We enjoyed both of them and will go back again just to play. One last bonus is the laxer tag room. My children enjoyed themselves and it's a great idea to take the whole family for a afternoon of fun or even a birthday party.

room_title: Escape room "Hut 51" by Back Alley Escape in Temecula
review: Really enjoying escaping from the ski hut - the best escape room I have been to yet.

room_title: Escape room "The Hacker's Lair" by Lock City Escape Games in Carrollton
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Mad Professor's Asylum" by American Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: This was our first escape room and it was an absolute blast. We did the room with 3 people and barely escaped with 1min30seconds left. Alexa was our game master and gave the perfect amount of guidance when needed. Will definitely return to attempt the other 2 rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Professor's Asylum" by American Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: We did the Mad Professor's Asylum and it was a blast! That time went really fast, but Jordan was a wonderful help to our group of 7. I will definitely be returning!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Professor's Asylum" by American Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: Came with a group of five to do the Asylum room and it was really fun. Made me wonder how in the word does Sherlock Holmes do this kind of stuff! But I would definitely recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "The Captain" by beat60 in Gadsden
review: We had such a great time in the Captains room. Can't wait to try another room soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Captain" by beat60 in Gadsden
review: We had so much fun playing "The Captain"! It was very challenging, but it felt awesome when we finished with only 1:57 left on the clock. This is a great place for some family fun.

room_title: Escape room "The Captain" by beat60 in Gadsden
review: Had a great time with the kids trying to solve The Jewel Thief and The Captain. These games are well designed and so entertaining! The Captain is very challenging!! Definitely need your thinking cap with this one! Highly recommend Beat 60!!

room_title: Escape room "The Captain" by beat60 in Gadsden
review: We had so much fun trying to beat "The Captain"!! We will definitely be back to try another challenge!

room_title: Escape room "Video Game Land" by Central Arkansas Escape Rooms in Little Rock
review: My group did the video game room and it was so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "Video Game Land" by Central Arkansas Escape Rooms in Little Rock
review: My group, which included a seven-year-old, just completed Video Game Land and had an absolute blast! This room was well-designed, with lots of fun surprises and challenges. The theme and story flowed well and they didn’t try to over-complicate things. Richard, our game moderator did a wonderful job and was helpful and funny. This room is one of the only in town I would say is truly appropriate for all ages. I will highly recommend this place to everyone!

room_title: Escape room "Caribbean Curse" by HD Escape Rooms Denver in Denver
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Area 51" by Twin Peaks Escape Room in Longmont
review: We took on Area 51 and had a blast! Owners are wonderful. We'll be back....

room_title: Escape room "Area 51" by Twin Peaks Escape Room in Longmont
review: We had a fantastic time working out all the challenging puzzles in the Area 51 room.We barely escaped with time left on the clock, about 11 min. Working the room took some creative thinking and everyone was happily engaged in the escape. The staff is friendly, welcoming and helpful with hints (only when requested).We will definitely return to escape the Yin/Yang room. And by the signs of some construction in the back, it appears more rooms are on the way.

room_title: Escape room "Area 51" by Twin Peaks Escape Room in Longmont
review: Great escape room!  We managed to find the secret of Area 51, but we cut it closer than we would've liked!Location is growing and is great for private events.  We love that they guarantee we'll have the room all to ourselves and that they have a point system to make it worth coming back to do the other room!We love this place and can't wait to come back!

room_title: Escape room "The Elixir of Immortality" by Escape Rooms FL in Miami
review: Great time! Excellent challenge for our team. A little bit of code-breaking, cypherin’, and anagram / scrabble, word-play needed to achieve success.

room_title: Escape room "The Elixir of Immortality" by Escape Rooms FL in Miami
review: Very interactive. Super clean environment and a super friendly staff. A refreshing take on the escape room scene. Definitely put this one on your list.

room_title: Escape room "The Elixir of Immortality" by Escape Rooms FL in Miami
review: I accompanied my 11 yo foster daughter and her 10yo friend to our first escape room experience. We loved the challenges and appreciated the clues. The staff members were very hospitable and provided us with a memorable experience. I would highly recommend this adventure for your family.

room_title: Escape room "Nikola Tesla - The Mad Genius" by Code To Escape in Daytona Beach
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Missing Scientist: Part I" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Longmont
review: This was an excellent experience and something so unique and different for my birthday. Everyone had puzzles to solve the entire time to get us out! Everyone should do this and we can't wait to do it again!

room_title: Escape room "The Missing Scientist: Part I" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Longmont
review: If you are looking for something fun to do as a group and tired of bowling, laser tag etc. you have to give this a try! It's pretty challenging and makes you "think" in order to find the clues to escape the room.

room_title: Escape room "The Missing Scientist: Part I" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Longmont
review: Our family of four had an outstanding experience working our way out of the room. From the initial excitement of being locked in the room to the many ways the eight of us processed the clues- we were completely engaged and entertained. Can't wait to try the Missing Scientist Part II.

room_title: Escape room "The Missing Scientist: Part I" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Longmont
review: Best escape room I've been to in the area - I have tried 5 different companies and Enigma is consistently the best at doing challenging, creative, immersive puzzles that don't feel remotely lazy or like they're intentionally trying to waste your time. Cannot recommend highly enough!

room_title: Escape room "The Missing Scientist: Part I" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Longmont
review: I wanted to do something fun with a group of friends for my birthday! We invited our closest friends and had so much fun!!! We came very close but were unable to escape. Our group spent the rest of the evening talking about doing it again somewhere and how much fun we had! I would recommend this for anyone!

room_title: Escape room "The Missing Scientist: Part I" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Longmont
review: Our team at Constant Contact went to Enigma last night as a team building event. It was fantastic. A great time was had by all, everyone worked together and I would highly recommend this event. Not only was it a great team building activity but also, it was a lot of fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Missing Scientist: Part I" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Longmont
review: Моя жена и я приехали сюда с друзьями! Не хочу сказать много, потому что я не хочу баловали все для будущих людей! Это было классные и очень хорошо соединяло! Удачи вам будущие приключения!

room_title: Escape room "Atlantis: The Lost City" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
review: We did the Atlantis room and we did escape. It was great fun and we would highly recommend this to everyone. We will be back.

room_title: Escape room "Atlantis: The Lost City" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
review: My family went and we didn’t escape but we still had fun while we were there. We did Atlantis we died.

room_title: Escape room "Atlantis: The Lost City" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
review: We were so close to escaping!! We had a great time solving clues in the Atlantis room! Staff was very friendly and helpful and we liked that there was varying difficulty in the clues so you could make progress and it was still a challenge! Will definitely be back to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "The Signal" by Hall Of Shadows Escape Games in Redlands
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by The Sleuth Box in Phoenix
review: Wow! A Hidden Gem of an Escape Room! My husband and I have done over 20 escape rooms, and we must say that this is our new favorite room. Megan did a great job as our cluemaster. We were lucky enough to do this room on our own which we prefer. (Too many cooks...and all that). This room had all sorts of unique puzzles and lots of good old-fashioned locks. And lots and lots of books, of course. This franchise allows you to take as long as you need to finish the game, which is always appreciated. We can't wait for their new room to open! If you like escape rooms, put this room at the top of your "must-do" list. You won't be disappointed.

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by The Sleuth Box in Phoenix
review: I've never had the opportunity to play an Escape Game before, but I'm glad my first experience was at the Sleuth Box!I don't want to give too much away, but every little detail was on point. From the look and feel of the room to the clues themselves, everything was done with attention to the finest detail.My co-workers and I who worked to solve the puzzle talked about our experience well after we were done and we are definitely eager to go back when the next room is available. Hey, we may even want to come back to solve the first puzzle since it was so much fun!A+ experience and would highly recommend to others!

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by The Sleuth Box in Phoenix
review: This was my first experience at an escape room, and I have to say, The Sleuth Box set the bar high!! It was such a fun experience, and so different from anything I've done before. The room was incredibly detailed, and the mystery was intriguing and challenging. I'd recommend this for a date night, or with a group of friends or family. I can't wait to go back when they open their second room.

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by The Sleuth Box in Phoenix
review: What a great time we had! The men in our group, of course did not want to go, and of course we made them! After we were done they started talking about attending another in our home town, that is how much fun we had. We all worked together and were able to get out. We were surprised how we all came together and worked so well! This establishment is recommended to everyone. This was our first experience and now we can't wait for the second.

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by The Sleuth Box in Phoenix
review: My experience here over the weekend was phenomenal and my family is still raving about this a few days later.  And this wasn't my first escape room, and I *thought* the other one was pretty good...The room was so richly appointed and well decorated, to the point that it becomes an immersion experience.  And the puzzles were challenging and engaging, but not so ridiculous that no sane person could ever conceivably ever reach that end conclusion on their own accord.  Plus, there are a couple of bonus action items in the game that made our group exclaim in delight and surprise!  This was an extremely well thought out room and a completely delightful way to spend an hour.  I will return and I can't wait until they open another room!

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by The Sleuth Box in Phoenix
review: My family took me here for my birthday this past year, and we had a blast escaping the Sleuth Box!  There's only one room right now, but it was so intricate and fun that I know the Cabin In The Woods (the room they're currently developing) is going to be a huge hit.  The Sleuth Box and Escape Zone AZ are probably my favorite two escape businesses I've visited so far, in regards to the atmosphere, the details of the puzzles, and how they're incorporated into the room.  I felt like I was Sherlock Holmes!

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Prohibition Era Bar" by Solve the Room Hawaii in Honolulu
review: Our favorite of the three. The theming was great. We really felt like we were in a bar. The puzzles were well designed. There was enough to do with our group size of five. We have done over 50 rooms and this room still had some puzzle that made us work, think, and wrack our brains for the solution! That is the mark of a nicely designed escape room! Great for 4-6 players. On the down side, the hint system used a tablet for receiving texts. Players should have their hands free. There are little red stickers on items “not to be interacted with.” -- mostly items on the walls. This just takes away from the immersion experience and these items should be propery secured in place. This is lazy room construction. I hope the company fixes these issues for their new rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Awakened" by Chronos Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: The room was good, but would probably be best for first timers. People who are experienced with escape rooms may find it too easy. The props and atmosphere were great and scary, but there wasn't much of a narrative as you went through. Some of the puzzles were innovative and had some cool technology involved, but the final puzzle was a bit simple and made the ending a little anticlimactic. It took us a moment to realize that we were done! I enjoyed that the room was really big, with a lot of smaller rooms that you progressed to. Overall it was a good rioo

room_title: Escape room "Awakened" by Chronos Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: The staff was awesome and very patient! The escape room (no spoilers) was fun and clever. Definitely requires critical thinking. Spooky theme and lots of fun!

room_title: Escape room "Awakened" by Chronos Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Went with my adult kids and we had so much fun! We did the Awakened room -  it was scary, fun and intense. Such a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Awakened" by Chronos Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Came with a full group of family. Glenn was in charge of leading our group. He was very fun and made us comfortable when we were all nervous. The escape room was not challenging here and there. I loved how it was different rooms and ways to get around. I lost my voice from screaming so much but that's me being a wuss.

room_title: Escape room "Awakened" by Chronos Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: This place easily deserves 5 stars! The Awakened room is definitely a challenge with a very interesting backstory to it and it makes for great fun with friends. The customer service was excellent. We were happily greeted by our host Aneca who gave us some really good hints and made our experience that much more enjoyable. Definitely coming back here again!

room_title: Escape room "Awakened" by Chronos Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: It was my first time ever going to an escape room and I'm so glad my first experience was here! Super creepy/eerie theme. It was extremely interactive and witty. Pleasantly surprised that I had enough courage to do it all. Dylan and Glen were super awesome and helpful throughout the entire hour. I would definitely come here again!

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerers' Quest" by Axxiom Escape Rooms Wilmington in Wilmington (DE)
review: Great time at Axxiom Escape Room! We did the Harry Potter room and escaped with 18 seconds to go! Definitely wanna come back for another room escape!

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerers' Quest" by Axxiom Escape Rooms Wilmington in Wilmington (DE)
review: I brought my 11-year-old daughter and some of her friends yesterday for her birthday. We did the Sorcerers Quest and it was a true Harry Potter experience! We all loved it! It was awesome and we can't wait to come back and tackle another room! Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerers' Quest" by Axxiom Escape Rooms Wilmington in Wilmington (DE)
review: same here

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerers' Quest" by Axxiom Escape Rooms Wilmington in Wilmington (DE)
review: That was so much fun, and the employees are great! Would definitely come back!

room_title: Escape room "Jack the Ripper - Solve the Mystery" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: Great way to spend an hour with friends and family! The escape rooms were challenging and employees helpful. We had a blast solving Jack The Ripper!

room_title: Escape room "Jack the Ripper - Solve the Mystery" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: We did the Jack the Ripper Room and it was amazing! We had an absolute blast! It was well worth the money, and Michael and Josh were wonderful! We had something much fun we decided to do the Prison Break Room as well!! Thank you guys for a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Jack the Ripper - Solve the Mystery" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: I love Escape Rooms, and Odyssey is by far the best one I have been to. I have done two of their rooms: Jack the Ripper and Titanic. Both were so well thought out with the riddles, super thought out with the room design, and just so fun. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Jack the Ripper - Solve the Mystery" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: I booked the Jack the Ripper room the other day and took my son and daughter to celebrate his 25th birthday. We were joined by four other adults and had a blast solving this room. We were able to escape with 7 minutes to spare and were informed our group was the first ones to successfully escape this themed room. It was very well done and challenged us all. We will definitely be back to try other rooms. Thanks for the fun.

room_title: Escape room "The Clue" by Great Escape Lakeside in Orlando
review: The Great Escape Lakeside is just one of the coolest places I’ve ever seen. Each room is literally a chapter of my childhood, with homages to Donkey Kong, Pac-Man, Operation of course CLUE, amount countless other game themes. AND THEY’RE ALL PLAYABLE. Every single room of those sprawling estate is full of literally every single game you’ll ever hear of, dating back to when you were a kid all the way up to modern classics. Video games, arcade games, slot machines, card games, a movie theater, a lazy river, a whole host of our door amenities including an actual private lake and dock, and, of course, the CLUE Escape Room make The Great Escape Lakeside a pure paradise dream come true for every member of the family.

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Jungle Safari" by Brainy Actz in San Diego
review: My kids had a blast at birthday party At brainyactz. Great host, safe and interesting for kids and adults. Loved the  jungle room.

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Jungle Safari" by Brainy Actz in San Diego
review: For my second escape room experience, I brought three 13 and 14 year old boys that I babysit. The four of us took on the jungle room and we all had a blast solving the clues. We did escape but the boys also took full advantage of the use of the walkie talkie and asking for hints whenever they got stuck for more than a couple of minutes. The hints were helpful, though, and we were able to quickly move on to the next task with a little nudge. I thought that the dim lighting in the jungle room provided an extra challenge as it made things a little more hidden and harder to see. There was a good mixture of easy to more difficult steps to solving the puzzles and I love how these rooms force you to communicate and work as a team. I'd definitely love to come back and try other rooms in the future.

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Jungle Safari" by Brainy Actz in San Diego
review: Omg so much fun! The gal that was assisting was awesome! This was my first time here and didn't know what to expect. She left us in the room with one clue. From there you look for the clue that she gives you and then you find another clue with one of the clues that you just found. We were in The Jungle Room and we had to find the gold skull. We did it under the our time but there were a few glitches that held us up due to someone putting a lock on backwards so there was no way we could ever get the lock opened to get another clue to move on to the next phase. She came in and helped us and figured out what was wrong and then gave us a free clue. You're allowed three Clues if you get stuck within the hour to help you move on. It was fun all of us got along and we did a lot of laughing. Looking forward to going back again.

room_title: Escape room "The Missing Professor" by ClueMasters Escape Room in Fort Smith
review: My daughter picked this activity for part of her birthday party and the girls had a blast! Ben was a wonderful host and was very helpful when they needed some clues. We will definitely be back. Thanks for a wonderful experience.
