review: Great place to go if you're wanting "something different " to do. I was in a room of 6 people, 4 of whom I didn't know and you would have thought we were long time friends by the end. I was in the kidnapping room and it took everyone working together to solve the mystery at 59:59 (whew). The staff was super friendly and helpful. Definitely will return.

room_title: Escape room "Shanghaied" by Escapology Fort Lauderdale in Miami
review: We had so much fun doing the Shanghai room. It was challenging but so much fun. The staff was very friendly and took care of us. A special thanks to Joey!

room_title: Escape room "Shanghaied" by Escapology Fort Lauderdale in Miami
review: We had so much fun that we did it twice. Great experience!

room_title: Escape room "Shanghaied" by Escapology Fort Lauderdale in Miami
review: These escape rooms are well set up and fun. The experience is enhanced by all the time and effort to detail that you can see when you play the game. Our team played 2 rooms that were excellent. I would recommend Escapology to anyone who wants a challenging and fun night out.

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Tampa Bay Escape Room in Tampa
review: Great experience!!! Would 100% recommend. Staff is so nice and helpful! Ended up being late and they stayed over for us anyway! First escape room and it was great! Will def do it again!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Tampa Bay Escape Room in Tampa
review: It was a great time! Just remember if you don’t fill the room, random people can join you. Which is kind of weird. But they accommodated my family and gave us a slot later on where no one else would be in the room. Yay!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Tampa Bay Escape Room in Tampa
review: We booked the Zombie Room in Largo to celebrate my niece's graduation and my mother's birthday. This has to be the best Escape Room we have every played!!!! Lots of laughs, surprises, and scares. Jessica and Brice were amazing hosts!!!!

room_title: Escape room "South Spy-cific" by The Escapist Denver in Denver
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Voodoo Cabin" by Gulf Coast Escape Room in Destin
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Orient Express" by Architect Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Back for the second time around and this time we did the Orient Express room! We escaped this room with 15 minutes left to spare. Although most of the puzzle are just basic locks and keys, this room uses some more higher tech puzzles than the Houdini room. With that being said I thought that the difficulty level was about same between both. There are lots of puzzles that keep you moving and thinking the entire time and there is never a dull moment. We did have to use our hints and the GM did a great job of pointing us in the right direction yet not blatantly giving us the answer, which I appreciate. 	I am also happy to report that the rooms now have countdowns them! Also the staff is still as amazing and friendly as they were last time. They do a great job explaining the rooms backstory, the rules, and ways to get help if you need it. This time we even got to see some magic tricks while we were waiting for our room. 	If you are looking for an escape room to do that is well themed and well priced, I highly recommend Theme Quest! Can’t wait to go back for the Bonnie and Clyde room!

room_title: Escape room "Orient Express" by Architect Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: My friends and I decided to do the Orient Express room last minute and I am so glad we did. We had just finished a room somewhere else that didn't quite fulfill our puzzle solving needs and found Theme Quest by chance. The room was full of fun, creative and interactive puzzles. I am very excited to try their other rooms. The hosts were friendly and Joseph, the magician, was awesome.

room_title: Escape room "Orient Express" by Architect Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Took my office here for a team building, holiday event. Did the Murder on Orient Express room. Super fun! People were super nice. While we waited we were entertained with magic tricks. Overall it was a great experience and the staff was great!

room_title: Escape room "Orient Express" by Architect Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I've done a good 30+ escape rooms and this one is a great example of one where good puzzles mean the rooms don't have to have a million bells and whistles and unreliable technology. We did the Orient Express room and we were definitely impressed by how much they managed to fit into this small room. We had just come off a room at a different company that was very spacious and had many rooms and lots of fancy technology, but we felt like solving the puzzles required too much guesswork and not enough logic. After that, this room was a total breath of fresh air. The staff was also super helpful and friendly. Magic tricks in the lobby was a fun bonus too! Definitely will be going back to try their other rooms. They also said they are expanding, which is great, because this place definitely has a lot of potential.

room_title: Escape room "Condemned 2" by NorCal Escape Co. in Yuba City
review: Great time, went with bunch of friends and did condemned 2. Had two randoms and was even better experience.

room_title: Escape room "Condemned 2" by NorCal Escape Co. in Yuba City
review: Had an awesome time it was fun and thrilling. One of the best date nights my wife and I have had. Enjoyed the time working together with friend to accomplish the tasks needed.

room_title: Escape room "Condemned 2" by NorCal Escape Co. in Yuba City
review: This was an amazing night. Super challenging and time flew by so fast, we didn't even realize where it went! Our group of 4 worked great together on Condemned2 but it was too much for us to escape. This is such a great thing to have in Yuba City and can't wait to try it again!

room_title: Escape room "Condemned 2" by NorCal Escape Co. in Yuba City
review: I did Condemned2 with my husband and some friends and coworkers. We were SO CLOSE to escaping! This room is absolutely superb, though; top notch set, immersion, puzzles, everything. The customer service is fantastic as well. Yuba City is a bit out of the way for us (an hour drive), but worth it! Definitely going back for Fox Tail and rooms to come!

room_title: Escape room "Condemned 2" by NorCal Escape Co. in Yuba City
review: We've done the NorCal escape rooms three times now (twice at Condemned and once at the Foxtail Saloon) and the newest Condemned two is top notch!! Super fun to get a group of friends to do it together! Already planning on going back when the next room opens!!

room_title: Escape room "Condemned 2" by NorCal Escape Co. in Yuba City
review: Loved the whole experience! The facility is really nice, the owners were great but most importantly the room was freaking awesome! We took a group of 10 for my husband's birthday to do Condemned 2 and it was so fun! The puzzles were difficult enough to really make you think and make it exciting! Can't wait to go back and try their other room!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter" by Tampa Bay Escape Room in Tampa
review: Great experience and great employees!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter" by Tampa Bay Escape Room in Tampa
review: This was seriously an amazing experience! It was so much fun and the staff there was awesome! So helpful without giving anything away and super friendly. I would recommend this place to everyone! If you haven’t tried an escape room yet you need to! And this is the place to go! We will definitely be going back to try all the rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter" by Tampa Bay Escape Room in Tampa
review: What an amazing experience! Hayden the manager made it so much better, he was truly great. I recommend this to anyone wanting to do something different and have a lot of fun.

room_title: Escape room "Kinoko" by The Clue Room in Denver
review: We did the Kinoko room and all came out as mushroom people! It was tough but so much fun. Teamwork and organization is a must with a big group. I will recommend this to anyone and everyone!

room_title: Escape room "Kinoko" by The Clue Room in Denver
review: We had a surprise party for our daughter's 18th birthday and sent her to the Clue Room with all of her friends. They had a fantastic time. Working with the owners to set up the surprise was easy and they were very professional. We have family coming in this summer and can't wait to take them here!

room_title: Escape room "Cat Burglar" by Complexity: A Puzzling Adventure in Hartford
review: A small group of us girls decided this would be a fun activity for a night out. We did the Cat Burglar room and had a blast. The puzzle room was well laid out and clues were well devised. We laughed, worked together and overall enjoyed solving the puzzles. I can't wait to go and try their other room.

room_title: Escape room "Cat Burglar" by Complexity: A Puzzling Adventure in Hartford
review: Awesome experience from beginning to end. This was our first ever escape room. Did the Cat Burglar room with my 12-year-old daughter. She was nervous at first but the staff put her at ease. Fully explained from start to final clue. Still talking about it! Can't WAIT to go back. Daughter wanted to do another same day!

room_title: Escape room "Cat Burglar" by Complexity: A Puzzling Adventure in Hartford
review: My family gave me an adventure at Complexity for my birthday! What a great gift!!! We did the Cat Burglar adventure. We completed our task with 3 whole seconds to spare!! I would highly recommend Complexity. Our group age ranged 10-44. I think our 10 year old found more clues than the rest of us! We will be back!!

room_title: Escape room "Cat Burglar" by Complexity: A Puzzling Adventure in Hartford
review: We have done many escape games and this one is top notch!! Clean professional environment with a state of the art communication device in the room, no need to worry about a hand held device. The puzzles were logical and FUN!! We are already planning our next trip.

room_title: Escape room "Cat Burglar" by Complexity: A Puzzling Adventure in Hartford
review: We had a party of 10 and the young lady (I believe it was Sarah) was so helpful on the phone when I booked the date. Michelle was so amazing, she spoke to everyone and answered any questions. We did the Cat Bugler room and it was an absolute blast! 1 out of the 10 in our group had experienced a puzzling room, they explained the rules clearly and everyone said they want to do another room when we left. Amazing job Complexity! Keep those rooms coming!

room_title: Escape room "Aunt Debbie's Apartment" by All Locked Up in Los Angeles
review: Absolutely loved it!!!Well done!Already booked my next adventure!10 out of 10

room_title: Escape room "Aunt Debbie's Apartment" by All Locked Up in Los Angeles
review: first of all ive done alot of escape room i did two here very!!! good room your going to love ! very nice and clean rooms . good location has parking . the tall dude is very nice a must try open late on a week day i promise your going to love it :)

room_title: Escape room "Aunt Debbie's Apartment" by All Locked Up in Los Angeles
review: We just did debbies apartment escape room it was great .we had so much fun really creative ideas .we were a group of 5   had so much they have a couple more room definitely going back to do another room all the locks were working good

room_title: Escape room "Magical Musical Mystery" by Cryptic Rooms in Pensacola
review: We had an awesome time helping Sid Stars escape from the maestro! The puzzles, clues and interactive maestro made it a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Magical Musical Mystery" by Cryptic Rooms in Pensacola
review: Was so much fun! We beat the maestro with little time to spare! First time doing an escape room and it was so much fun. If it's a toss-up between a movie or this, do this! It was just me and my husband and was great for a date night. Will was a great host! Plan on going back soon.

room_title: Escape room "Magical Musical Mystery" by Cryptic Rooms in Pensacola
review: We did Magical Musical Mystery, and we absolutely LOVED IT. The room was so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "Magical Musical Mystery" by Cryptic Rooms in Pensacola
review: Our family enjoyed completing both of the rooms. The music room was fun and interactive. If you are looking for fun and different, give them a try. Once the word gets out the wait will be long. This is not your typical escape room. It unique and exciting with a new modern fresh twist. Thanks again , Santa's Little Helpers. Beat maniac room 8/28 and music room 9/4.

room_title: Escape room "Magical Musical Mystery" by Cryptic Rooms in Pensacola
review: My husband and I had so much fun escaping from the Magical Musical Mystery room. It was a challenging experience that got both of us thinking and dancing a little too! This would be a great way to spend time with a group of 4-6 friends or family members.The owner is awesome and does a great job running the games. We will definitely be back to try out the other room!

room_title: Escape room "Mission To Planet X" by Fort Collins Escape Room in Fort Collins
review: Great puzzles. The way you get clues in the mission to planet X is all in theme. Staff was super friendly. Definitely want to come back and try the other rooms!!!

room_title: Escape room "Mission To Planet X" by Fort Collins Escape Room in Fort Collins
review: I have always loved The Fort Collins Escape Room. Escape from the Machine is my all time favorite puzzle room since I did it in 2015! Mission to Planet X definitely blew my mind as well! Between the amazing decor, well thought out puzzles, and the friendly staff and owners they are a well rounded 5 star experience. Everyone needs to check them out! Can't wait for the new summer/fall adventure I hear might be coming:-)

room_title: Escape room "Mission To Planet X" by Fort Collins Escape Room in Fort Collins
review: We had a visitor from Florida join us for this adventure. Our 6th, his 1st. We really enjoyed the room and the technicians were very helpful. The only down side to it was that the alligator clips were very small and difficult to use. Overall, a great adventure.

room_title: Escape room "Narco" by Escapology Orlando in Orlando
review: This is the second time my family and I have played here it has been a great experience both times.  The staff is extremely friendly and very attentive during your game play.  We played the Narco and Mansion Murder escapes and they were so much fun.  I definitely plan on returning to play more with my friends and family.  Everyone has loved the quality of the escape games and we all agreed this place is at the top of its game.

room_title: Escape room "Narco" by Escapology Orlando in Orlando
review: Staff is amazing, the rooms are amazing, theming is amazing!! My favorite rooms were Under Pressure and Narco. Narco had a lot of puzzles that were tactile, which were very fun. Overall, an amazing place!

room_title: Escape room "Narco" by Escapology Orlando in Orlando
review: First time trying this. It was a blast. There were 6 of us and we did Narco. Before we knew it the hour was ending and we escaped in time. Definitely going back.

room_title: Escape room "Black Ops - Destination Classified" by ALL IN Adventures Lawrenceville in Atlanta
review: We did the Black Ops room. Definitely do the practice locks in the front lobby. This will help you know how to open the different type of locks. This room is great for beginners.

room_title: Escape room "Black Ops - Destination Classified" by ALL IN Adventures Lawrenceville in Atlanta
review: I came with a group of friends from out of town. We were looking for something new and different. We enjoyed ourselves in the black ops room. We even came back the next day for the sherlock room. The staff was extremely friendly and cane to check up on us as promised. The Mgr was very pleasant always with a smile. We enjoyed our experience and like the location recommended to anyone who wants something different to do.

room_title: Escape room "Black Ops - Destination Classified" by ALL IN Adventures Lawrenceville in Atlanta
review: The manager was very good at explaining how things worked and getting us started. We did the Black Ops room, where we had to find and defuse a bomb. We started off slowly but then moved through the puzzles quickly. We ended up failing due to an unexpected surprise at the end (we didn't understand how the last puzzle worked), but we had a lot of fun nonetheless. We will definitely come back to try a harder room next time.

room_title: Escape room "Orbital Escape" by Ka-Ko Jo's in Fort Collins
review: Love this place! Have visited twice, once with a group of friends and once with my kids. Both times had a ton of fun, the lazer maze and the escape room are both worth checking out!

room_title: Escape room "Orbital Escape" by Ka-Ko Jo's in Fort Collins
review: This is a gem. The games are a blast, the food great, and the customer service is awesome. If we lived in Greeley, we would definitely do a birthday party here. We went there recently for a friends party and had a blast. Great for kids and adults. There are escape rooms and a glow and golf!

room_title: Escape room "Orbital Escape" by Ka-Ko Jo's in Fort Collins
review: I love this place! The people there are so nice and friendly. They have great activities that include glow golf, escape rooms, arcade games, and mini bowling. I would definitely recommend Ka-Ko Jo's for a party or for just plain fun.

room_title: Escape room "Fenn's Gold" by King's Escape Room Denver in Denver
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Interrogation" by One Way Out Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: My first time at an escape room! A group of us from all over the world came, experienced, and conquered the Interrogation room at One Way Out and from start to finish, both the professionalism and hospitality of the staff were outstanding. Homegrown entrepreneurs at their best--just awesome!! I think what made this room really special was the live actress. She was SO good! Since the rooms are all based upon a building story, it really adds to the depth of the experience. We'll definitely be going back for the rest of the story! A night out with friends at its best.

room_title: Escape room "Interrogation" by One Way Out Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: I've done escape rooms in many states, created by many gamemakers. This one was unique in that each room is connected to a larger story. I, along with 6 friends from literally around the world (we were in Jacksonville for a school session) did the Interrogation room. It had a live actor (who was amazing!) and the puzzles did not disappoint. We definitely want to come back next time and start from the beginning of the story!

room_title: Escape room "Interrogation" by One Way Out Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: Came with my family and for most of us, this was the first experience in an escape room. It was a great experience and we will be back for sure!

room_title: Escape room "Money Madness" by Try'n Escape in Denver
review: Money Madness was a lot of fun for the family. You get to choose how hard it is (you don't have to ask for hints). I will say that it sometimes gets crowded in some areas while everyone is trying to help.

room_title: Escape room "Money Madness" by Try'n Escape in Denver
review: Took my daughter and friends for a 15th birthday party. They did the bank vault room and had a great time. They escaped with 6 minutes to spare. The whole ride home they all planned their next time to go and try a different room. Highly recommend, the staff was very friendly as well.

room_title: Escape room "Money Madness" by Try'n Escape in Denver
review: We had a great time trying to find the loot in the Money Madness room. A fun way to spend time with family and friends. We are looking forward to trying the other rooms. Thanks for a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Money Madness" by Try'n Escape in Denver
review: My boyfriend and I did the Money Madness escape room. This was our first time. We didn't figure it out all the way, but the challenge was fun!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Autopsy" by Gulf Coast Escape Room in Destin
review: We had the most awesome time at the Escape Room. The employees were very competent and almost overly friendly. We would recommend it as easily one of the best attractions in Destin.

room_title: Escape room "FBI Interview" by Riddle Escape Room in Phoenix
review: Amazing! My husband and I had been talking about going to an escape room for a while now. We were on vacation and decided to try it out. We did the FBI Interview and had soooooo much fun. So much, that we immediately did The Heist right after we were done. Puzzles are challenging but not impossible. There is also hints given if you are ever completely stuck. Would definitely recommend. Staff is very personable.

room_title: Escape room "FBI Interview" by Riddle Escape Room in Phoenix
review: Definitely a 5-star experience. FBI interview was the bomb. We will be back definitely!!!

room_title: Escape room "FBI Interview" by Riddle Escape Room in Phoenix
review: Went here for a team building activity with 6 co-workers and it was great! We did the FBI room and it was fun and challenging. They also have earlier times (before 5) so it was perfect for leaving work a little early. We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "FBI Interview" by Riddle Escape Room in Phoenix
review: The FBI room is my favorite, but each room is fantastic! We have done close to 40 rooms now and nobody can match the room quality and friendly service that the guys at Riddle provide. We happily paid full price even when other rooms had discounts because the experience they provide is so much better! I can't wait for their 4th room to open!

room_title: Escape room "FBI Interview" by Riddle Escape Room in Phoenix
review: Did the FBI room with a team of friends from Arizona Camp Sunrise. Not only did we genuinely enjoy every second of the challenge, but we also found the owner, Tolga, to be an incredibly kind and generous guy. He helped us come up with some ideas so we can bring these types of puzzles back to our campers this summer.When you find something that is both highly entertaining and that is run by amazing people, you don't hesitate. You book your group ASAP!

room_title: Escape room "Atlantis" by Top Tier Escape Rooms in Oceanside
review: We played the Atlantis room and really enjoyed it! Our group had 2 enthusiasts and 2 first-timers, and the room kept us all engaged and properly challenged as we progressed. The design of the room is super cool and fun, and the puzzles are clever and unique. I would recommend this room for enthusiasts and newcomers alike. Can't wait to play the next room here!

room_title: Escape room "Atlantis" by Top Tier Escape Rooms in Oceanside
review: Really enjoyed the first room up here. Atlantis is unique, provides challenge and ample enjoyment to go with it. Our group of 4 enthusiasts were impressed with what is cooking up here at this newly opened venue. Nothing better to see than quality rooms joining the community with humble and customer-first owners.  Keep up the good work looking forward to the bright future of Top Tier Escaperoom!

room_title: Escape room "Atlantis" by Top Tier Escape Rooms in Oceanside
review: Top Tier was so much fun! I highly recommend Atlantis! It was very creative and well done! Our family really enjoyed it! It was just hard enough to make us all dig deep and exercise our minds! It was fun to see everyone using their strengths to find clues! Great fun!!

room_title: Escape room "A Winter Fall" by Bakersfield Escape Room in Bakersfield
review: Something new and exciting, that keeps you thinking and wanting more time. Funnest place I've been to in awhile... Check this place out. More rooms coming soon

room_title: Escape room "A Winter Fall" by Bakersfield Escape Room in Bakersfield
review: What a great addition to Bakersfield! So much fun. Stop what ever you are doing and go play these rooms right now. Go!

room_title: Escape room "A Winter Fall" by Bakersfield Escape Room in Bakersfield
review: It was a lot of fun, it's just hard enough to keep you from winning too quickly but if you get too stuck they help you out. It's really cool the way it's planned. I will definitely be going again very soon. Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "A Winter Fall" by Bakersfield Escape Room in Bakersfield
review: What a great experience we had! Winters fall was a challenge worth taking. All of us enjoyed the thrill of escaping. We can't wait to take on another challenge.

room_title: Escape room "A Winter Fall" by Bakersfield Escape Room in Bakersfield
review: This was a fun experience! We worked together as a team and had to use our brains and be creative! Definitely something new and fun to try!

room_title: Escape room "A Winter Fall" by Bakersfield Escape Room in Bakersfield
review: What a great addition to Bakersfield! So much fun. Stop what ever you are doing and go play these rooms right now. Go!

room_title: Escape room "A Winter Fall" by Bakersfield Escape Room in Bakersfield
review: Absolutely excellent. Whether with your family, friends, or co-workers this place is a BLAST!!! Professional and courteous staff. Highly recommend everyone try it!

room_title: Escape room "Clue-Dunnit?" by Escape Reality Games in Sarasota
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Brown's Manor" by EscapeIQ in Los Angeles
review: Went here with friends and played Dr. Brown's Manor. We were kind of intimidated by the low success rate. It was super challenging but very fun. I don't want to give too much away but the puzzles were well thought out and well designed. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Brown's Manor" by EscapeIQ in Los Angeles
review: Chose the most challenging room, Dr. Brown's Manor for our first ever escape room. It was challenging!! We went as a group of 7 and was given an hour. I need to know the end - what happened to Dr Brown! I'm down to try again soon!!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Brown's Manor" by EscapeIQ in Los Angeles
review: A lot of fun, super nice staff! Would definitely go again to try out The Vault.

room_title: Escape room "King Tut's Treasure" by Escape Modesto in Modesto
review: Sooooo fun!! Definitely start with King Tut's room if it's your first time. When they say easy it just means least difficult. Great for friends or work.

room_title: Escape room "King Tut's Treasure" by Escape Modesto in Modesto
review: Took the Escape Modesto challenge with some friends a couple of weeks ago. We did the King Tut room. Not to give much away but it was fun and very very challenging. We felt a little silly asking for help but fortunately the voice on the other end got us through the tough parts without giving anything away. Highly recommend if you have a mixed group of fun brainiacs, however you don't need to be a genius to contribute but being clever definitely helps. Can't wait to try the next rooms!

room_title: Escape room "King Tut's Treasure" by Escape Modesto in Modesto
review: My wife and I went to Escape Modesto for the first time on Saturday. It was our first attempt at an escape room so we tried King Tuts Tomb. We had so much fun. Katie was so professional and did a great job explaining the rules and how best to work together. Even though we were playing with several groups of strangers we worked well with each other and most importantly had a blast. Definitely will be back to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "King Tut's Treasure" by Escape Modesto in Modesto
review: We had a great time and a great experience! The staff is very friendly and professional. This is a Must if you live in the Central Valley. We are diffinly comming back.

room_title: Escape room "King Tut's Treasure" by Escape Modesto in Modesto
review: We had a blast doing this. We did king tut and we made it out with a minute to spare! Next up is the prison room. We will be going back. If you haven't done this you need to!

room_title: Escape room "Secret Mission" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: The Secret Mission and Lunar Mission are really great intricate puzzles. The story and way you get through the rooms is refreshingly different. They do a few things other escape rooms don't to make you feel completely immersed.

room_title: Escape room "Secret Mission" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Spy - Barely just a fortnight old, the production for this is the best in my opinion, edging out the castle by a bit. Stepping through the door, you really do get a feel as if you're in a 70s-80s apartment with puzzles cleverly lining throughout the room. The puzzles also blend together well, along with neat uses of several everyday items. Digging the vibe of this room.

room_title: Escape room "Secret Mission" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: My friends and I signed up for the Hotel Escape and were pretty disappointed with the experience, but were told afterward it was the easiest and dullest one to choose.  So we signed up for a later experience where you have to discover the identity of a Russian Spy.  That experience was AWESOME! The rooms were decked out in 60s mid century modern and everything about the clues and room made you feel like you were really into the story.  Even the guy who set us up intro'd it well.  Will definitely be going back to do some of their other more challenging ones!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter's Tea Party" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: This was my first escape room. There were 10 of us in total, which made it a little too crowded. We made it out with 14 minutes to spare, so I'd suggest fewer people. It was definitely a good first room, and I enjoyed all the puzzles!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter's Tea Party" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: I took my two daughters and granddaughter to the Mad Hatter room yesterday and we had a blast! Highly recommend! It was a challenge but we escaped!!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter's Tea Party" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: Took my daughter and some of her friends today for her 13th birthday. We escaped with 23 seconds to spare. Everyone had a blast and our Control Master Tony K. was awesome. Would definitely recommend them and am looking forward to trying out another room (we did the Mad Hatter room).

room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter's Tea Party" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: I went yesterday for a team building activity with some of my co workers. We did the mad hatters tea room and it was sooooooo much fun. I would recommend everyone come and experience the escape room!!!!The owner and her husband were sooooooo sweet. I look forward to going back really soon.

room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter's Tea Party" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: We did the Mad Hatter's Tea Party w/ a group of 6th grade girls for my daughter's birthday. The room monitor did an excellent job of not helping too much and gave clues when we needed them that still kept it challenging for the girls.....not too easy, but not too hard! Great experience for them!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter's Tea Party" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: Nice, clean location. Great, friendly staff. Mad Hatter's Tea Room was an excellent challenge. We had a group of 8 and managed to get out with some time remaining. I've been to other escape rooms and this is my favorite so far. They pay attention to detail, not just in the room but the overall company. I will most certainly return and try out their other rooms. Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Happy Campers" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Went with our friends and tried to escape the Camping Room. The hour flew by and before you know it our time was up! Didn't escape this time... but we all said we can't wait to try another room soon.

room_title: Escape room "Happy Campers" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: So much fun! We did the Happy Camper room. We didn't escape but we really enjoyed working through the clues. We absolutely recommend doing this if you are looking for something fun to do in Castle Rock!

room_title: Escape room "Happy Campers" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: So much fun! They have five exciting escape room themes to choose from. My group did “Happy Campers”, which we almost didn’t escape from — we had to burn our hints/clues to help us! Can’t wait to go back and try the other four.

room_title: Escape room "Happy Campers" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Excellent entertainment for the entire family. With four adults and three kids, we escaped the Happy Campers room with only 40 seconds to spare. Can't wait to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Happy Campers" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: We had a blast this morning with the “Happy Campers” room! It was a fun challenge and it came down to the last few minutes for us to escape. I look forward to trying out the other four rooms!!! We’ll be back again soon!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Mastermind Escape Games in Atlanta
review: The overall experiance was fun, but there was a broken fingerprint prop that stopped us from getting another key. The room was fun but it was definitely hard.

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Mastermind Escape Games in Atlanta
review: This experience was one for the books! I loved the high energy and tense environment that set the stage for trying to escape the room. My team did the room dealing with a bank robbery and it was a blast. The personnel overseeing my group, Kandice, was a breath of fresh air and she had great energy as well. I will definitely be attending again!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Mastermind Escape Games in Atlanta
review: I came to GA to celebrate the birth of a new family member, see some additional family and friends. Decided to take my grands to the Escape Room and we really had a ball. I like how realistic the rooms were set up. We did the Bank Heist and it looked very similar to a bank, teller windows vault and all. Great experience!!!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Mastermind Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Celebrating my daughters sweet 16 and all she wanted was to go here. I booked the bank heist room and the girls had a blast! They were so close to escaping! We will definitely go back for another room! Staff was fantastic to my group of teenage girls!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Mastermind Escape Games in Atlanta
review: This was my first time doing Escape Games and my family did Bank Heist...we were so close! But sadly, missed by just a couple clues! It was a great family bonding game and I highly recommend it! Masterminds was well organized & gave clear concise information on how to play for those who have never played before! Can't wait to go back and try it again!!

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Fort Lauderdale in Miami
review: This was such a great escape room! I loved it! I went with my friends and it was awesome. I loved all the special effects, props, and how they included science in it. I would recommend it to anyone who loves escape rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Fort Lauderdale in Miami
review: So much fun and challenging, can't wait to go again!

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Fort Lauderdale in Miami
review: Awesome place! Great puzzles and super cool designs! We will definitely be back to do more rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Fort Lauderdale in Miami
review: I went with my wife and 8-year-old daughter. This was our first escape room. The staff were super professional and friendly. We had a great time and I highly recommend this adventure.

room_title: Escape room "Escape The Lost Pyramid VR" by Insomnia Escape Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Baker Street Mystery" by Escape Games at The River in Rancho Mirage
review: This place was awesome! I am an avid escape room attendee and I thought this place was so well put together. The puzzles were challenging and the room was great! (We did the Baker Street one). I was just here to visit, but when I come back I will definitely be coming back!! Also, the staff was so helpful and nice!

room_title: Escape room "Baker Street Mystery" by Escape Games at The River in Rancho Mirage
review: The Baker Street Mystery room was the 23rd room for my husband and me, and it did not disappoint! It was definitely a challenging room but not impossible. The owner/game host was really nice, he even stopped the clock when he had to come in and assist with a lock that wouldn't open even though we had the right combination. It was a fun little stop on our vacation, we will come back to try their other rooms the next time we come out to Palm Springs.

room_title: Escape room "Baker Street Mystery" by Escape Games at The River in Rancho Mirage
review: This place is awesome! It was so much fun! You guys should try the Baker Street challenge, it's a challenge!

room_title: Escape room "Baker Street Mystery" by Escape Games at The River in Rancho Mirage
review: This was so much fun! Came for a bachelorette party of four girls, and all newbies to the escape room phenom. We were nervous because we didn't know what to expect, especially when the guy told us we picked the hardest room (Baker Street Mystery). But it was a BLAST! And it was challenging without being impossible, really had to use your brain but it was exciting and fun! Would love to come back to try the other rooms! A definite must do! :)

room_title: Escape room "Baker Street Mystery" by Escape Games at The River in Rancho Mirage
review: What a great time! Even tho we didn't "win" by the time limit, it was so much fun. I will definitely be trying the other rooms. Baker Boys was the one I did.....very hard!

room_title: Escape room "Patient 57" by Breakout Waikiki in Honolulu
review: Went in with my team from work. I've never done anything like this before, wasn't sure what to expect, and thought it would be interested at the least. Let me just say this was the most fun I've had in a very long time. We did Patient 57, which was the easiest (6/10 difficulty). 60 minutes to escape the room. 3 hints available. Unlock everything to get the codes to escape. This was perfect. Difficult enough to get me thinking but not too difficult that we couldn't figure anything out. Basically everything revolves around codes, phones, keys, and combination locks. Everything and anything can be relevant. Almost everything in the room is there for a reason. It's a progression from one code/lock/thing opened to the next until you get the code to leave the room. We finished with 23 seconds left. Unreal. Patient 57 currently has a 33% escape rate.

room_title: Escape room "Patient 57" by Breakout Waikiki in Honolulu
review: So our staff needed and break from overwhelming work on a daily basis.  We all decided to try out this place to build more workmanship and to test our communication to get away from all this.  We had two groups since their were 14 of us.  We did the Y2K and Patient 57.  Well, it was a really team building.  Everyone help each other to find clues and solve the mission.  It was perfect breakout to show our communication and teamwork as a team.  This place is great place to test your skills and work as a group.  Highly recommend for everyone needing a team building workshop or just for fun.  Great for everybody.  The location we did was in Beachwalk by Lewers.  There is a price per person or group.  The overwhelming from work was a paid off but we were overwhelmed from here.  But in a fun way...... Though none of us breakout.  Sad...

room_title: Escape room "Patient 57" by Breakout Waikiki in Honolulu
review: One of the best escape rooms we've ever played. Good puzzles with interesting twists. And fairly high tech. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "My Spy" by PanIQ Escape Room Miami in Miami
review: This was something that was totally out of the norm and I am so glad we got to experience it. My friends and I had an exhilarating time in the PaniQ room! I would highly recommend it for a group of friends. Thanks to Diana at the PaniQ room for making us feel nervous!!

room_title: Escape room "My Spy" by PanIQ Escape Room Miami in Miami
review: We loved it! We Definitely had a blast!!! Great time!

room_title: Escape room "My Spy" by PanIQ Escape Room Miami in Miami
review: Wow, Paniq Room Miami is the best! Very intense....a must go!

room_title: Escape room "My Spy" by PanIQ Escape Room Miami in Miami
review: This was a great experience. It takes faith,trust and a little bit of pixie dust! Teamwork is key.

room_title: Escape room "My Spy" by PanIQ Escape Room Miami in Miami
review: This was an amazing experience. I was in the spy room and it was intense! I can't say anymore because I don't want to spoil it. I can't wait to come back and try a different room

room_title: Escape room "My Spy" by PanIQ Escape Room Miami in Miami
review: It was a great experience and I couldn't stop talking about it after! I would recommend PanIQ room to all of my friends and I will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "My Spy" by PanIQ Escape Room Miami in Miami
review: My son picked the spy room and it was great! It is definitely challenging and worth it! I highly recommend this place!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Scientist" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: I did mad scientist with my boyfriend Ricardo and we had a great time even though we did not escape. I recommend this place to every one. :-)

room_title: Escape room "Mad Scientist" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: Super super fun would deff do it again ! Really recommend it if in the area

room_title: Escape room "Mad Scientist" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: Awesome time , we won mad scientist & cyber rooms. Can't wait to go back!!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Scientist" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: What a great experience! Staff were wonderful and helpful. We are already planning our next trip. Definitely recommend it for anyone wanting to their skills of escaping.

room_title: Escape room "Mad Scientist" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: It was so much fun. The best birthday adventure ever. Everyone is incredibly nice and the challenge we picked was so much fun. We can't wait to return for another challenge!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Scientist" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: Was fun. Great staff.. I think we accidentally called 911 in the mad scientist, careful

room_title: Escape room "Mad Scientist" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: Had a blast! The rooms are creative and challenging! Chris & Matt (staff) are awesome! Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Scientist" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: Played 2 games here, loved them both. I appreciate this place lets you keep the room to just your own group rather than share! Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Mad Scientist" by Escape Dalton in Dalton
review: After playing over 20 escape rooms, I would definitely rate this room in my top 5 favorites. We played Mad Scientist and will definitely be back for Carpet and as they open more rooms! It was on par with the better Chattanooga escape rooms and very well thought out and put together. The puzzles were challenging and the design was wonderful. You've got to check this place out!

room_title: Escape room "The Mad Scientist" by Escape Dalton in Dalton
review: We took our kids and we had a great time. The Mad Scientist was so fun. We did not escape, however, we will most definitely be going back!

room_title: Escape room "The Mad Scientist" by Escape Dalton in Dalton
review: I have never done one of these before but am already planning to go again! So much fun and very challenging! My group was in the Mad Scientist room. We escaped just in time! The employees were amazing!

room_title: Escape room "The Ghost of Mentryville" by Arcane Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We had a double date here last week and we had a great time! 5 stars from start to finish.  We got a little lost (note 405B is NOT next to 405A). We called and the front desk girl ran out and flagged us down.  My husband and I had done escape rooms before, but our friends had not. The girl who checked us in was very clear with her instructions and answered all questions.  She definitely made them feel more comfortable with the game.  I know it can be intimidating for people who don't know what to expect! We did the Mentryville escape room.  It was SO much fun, and I was really proud of our completion. First of all, thank goodness 4 people are the max. I have been to an escape room around the same size where they stuffed 8 people in and I honestly thought I would pass out. The puzzles were ingenious! And I have to say the ghost (Tony/Samuel) was excellent.  We would highly recommend this escape room and we look forward to doing another one sometime soon.

room_title: Escape room "The Ghost of Mentryville" by Arcane Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We loved the Ghost of Mentryville. It was part escape room and part interactive theater. Our "live" host helped guide us through the adventure. In some rooms, the live actor either jump scares you or gives you hints. The actor in this room really is part of the room and sets the eerie, but not scary mood.  The puzzles and tasks in this room are clever and some of the best integrated I have seen and experienced in any room. The set pieces and narration transport you to places well beyond the confines of the room itself and your imagination fleshes out even more details.  There is no strict time limit for this room and the guidance is generous. There is an urgency to complete this room because of the need to resolve situations and close the loop. Good things come in small escape rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Ghost of Mentryville" by Arcane Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Wow! Just finished The Ghost of Mentryville & it was incredible! Ghost story telling at its best, brilliant use of a prop! Clever, creepy and very original. Enjoyed the immersive element & not feeling the urgency to rush through it, but still enjoyed the excitement of progressing through the story. We loved everything about this experience!

room_title: Escape room "Blood on the Bayou" by Fort Smith Escape Room in Fort Smith
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Split" by Lakeland Escape Room in Lakeland
review: Our group did the Split room and it was amazing! The clues were challenging and fun to try and decipher. The room had a fun creepy feel with cool props and effects. I can't give away any secrets, but I jumped pretty good with one of them! Haha! So fun! Can't wait to try all of the rooms. The staff there were so fun and friendly and really cared whether we had a great evening as well. Overall, this is THE place to go!

room_title: Escape room "Split" by Lakeland Escape Room in Lakeland
review: Excellent experience, great staff! The new room, Split was the best!

room_title: Escape room "Split" by Lakeland Escape Room in Lakeland
review: My husband and I just played the Split room for our anniversary. It was REALLY fun!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Library - Destination London" by ALL IN Adventures Milford in New Haven
review: None

room_title: Escape room "No Vacancy" by West Palm Beach Escape Rooms in West Palm Beach
review: We just had a fantastic time here! We did the Secret Society Room, and set the new record with 4:33 seconds left! Go team Incredible's! The room was well kept and cleverly set. And the staff there is friendly and helpful (thanks again Ladies!) Cannot wait to try the other room next time!

room_title: Escape room "No Vacancy" by West Palm Beach Escape Rooms in West Palm Beach
review: Played two rooms and loved it! Can't wait to come back with my friends!

room_title: Escape room "No Vacancy" by West Palm Beach Escape Rooms in West Palm Beach
review: We had such a great time, escaped with 31 seconds to spare!! You've got to give it a try!

room_title: Escape room "Lights Out at the Museum: Art with a Twist" by Encryption Escape in Savannah
review: I have done both rooms. If I had 30 more seconds we would have been out of Shanghai room. However we completed the Museum with 2 minutes left. They were awesome and fun and I can't wait for the new room to open!

room_title: Escape room "Lights Out at the Museum: Art with a Twist" by Encryption Escape in Savannah
review: It was super awesome! The owner was very nice. The rooms were well done and the riddles were tough but solvable. I would absolutely go back!

room_title: Escape room "Lights Out at the Museum: Art with a Twist" by Encryption Escape in Savannah
review: We did the Art Museum Heist and had an awesome time! Very challenging but fun!

room_title: Escape room "Lights Out at the Museum: Art with a Twist" by Encryption Escape in Savannah
review: This was the most fun! We did the Art Heist and it was very challenging and well thought out. We will definitely be back the next time we are in Savannah!

room_title: Escape room "Lights Out at the Museum: Art with a Twist" by Encryption Escape in Savannah
review: Have been to escape rooms around the world but so far this has been the most creative. The space is amazingly decorated and the lights slowly went out the longer we were in there. Puzzles were challenging but fun to figure out. Very exciting and a must do if you're in city market Savannah!

room_title: Escape room "CSI: Search and Rescue" by Lock'd Escape Adventures in Putnam
review: We visited Lock'd Escape on Sunday afternoon for their CSI Room.. we were greeted by the great owners Mike and Tiny...Thank you for another great experience in an Escape room. Even though we did not make it out..this room had fun features and challenging puzzles, which is exactly what we look for in an escape room. We look forward to returning to another of your rooms in the future.

room_title: Escape room "CSI: Search and Rescue" by Lock'd Escape Adventures in Putnam
review: my daughter, my neighbors and I tried this out for the first time and we really enjoyed ourselves! The staff was very friendly and explained everything to us so we were ready when we went into our room. We did the CSI room and were informed that it was hard! That it was! We didn't make it.... next time!.... the only thing negative was that the room was very small. The scenario is set or 2-5 people but 4 of us plus the guide made us feel a bit claustrophobic. We are already talking about the next trip

room_title: Escape room "Area 52" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: Had a fun time with my roommates! We tried out area 52 and even though we failed, we still had a lot of fun c: great experience. It was our first time going to an escape room, and it's definitely something I'd try again!

room_title: Escape room "Area 52" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: We had so much fun!! First time and did very well with group of 6. Failed our mission in Area 52. We wanted a challenge so went for most difficult room first. Everyone is ready to try out a new room. We will definitely go back for more!

room_title: Escape room "Area 52" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: Lots of fun! Next time I'm back in Florida I'll definitely come back to try new rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Area 52" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: Loads of fun!! Challenging but the clues are so well thought out and fun to do... Can't wait to try out the new room in a few weeks!!

room_title: Escape room "Area 52" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: This was one of the most unique and fun entertainment experiences I have ever had. We had an amazing time working as a team and even though we could not complete the challenge the experience was truly rewarding.

room_title: Escape room "The Fallout Room" by Clueology Rooms in Fort Collins
review: A few of us did the Fallout room with a couple of people we didn’t know. We all needed up working really well together and finding all the clues. The amount of detail that goes into the room is amazing! We all had so much fun and will be returning again very soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Fallout Room" by Clueology Rooms in Fort Collins
review: My family and I recently played the Fallout Shelter room and had a great time. I've done over 30 rooms, my aunt has done over 20, and my two cousins have a few under their belts as well. We were all impressed with the scenic - it was incredible, very detailed, and immersive. The puzzles made sense in the story world, there were several puzzles that were new to us, and the staff was so helpful and welcoming. We enjoyed it so much, we booked another game before we left.

room_title: Escape room "The Fallout Room" by Clueology Rooms in Fort Collins
review: We did the Fallout Room this week. It was wonderful, very creative challenging and staff was great! We will be back.

room_title: Escape room "The Fallout Room" by Clueology Rooms in Fort Collins
review: 1st escape room we've ever been to and had a great time. We went to the Fallout Room, kids came too and everyone in our group contributed. We'll definitely go back and try another room.

room_title: Escape room "The Fallout Room" by Clueology Rooms in Fort Collins
review: The Fallout was an intriguing escape room, which had every detail thoughtfully planned out! My group of 12 worked very well together at solving the puzzles and accomplishing the goal within an hour, though it was not easy. Clueology takes great efforts in making quality rooms with unique twists you wouldn't expect. Definitely the best room I have done to date!!!

room_title: Escape room "Espionage" by Escape Room Florence in Florence (AL)
review: We tried the Espionage room. It was a great experience for our first escape room try. The kids enjoyed helping with the clues. We all worked together and used our 3 hint helps to escape.

room_title: Escape room "Espionage" by Escape Room Florence in Florence (AL)
review: We had a great time !!!! Escaped "Espionage" with approx 20 seconds left. A lot more challenging than we anticipated. We will definitely go back soon to attempt Lost Cabin. Highly recommend these guys at Escape Room ... Great overall experience

room_title: Escape room "Espionage" by Escape Room Florence in Florence (AL)
review: We had an awesome time! We did the Espionage room. I highly recommend it to anyone who likes to solve puzzles. We can't wait to do another one!

room_title: Escape room "Espionage" by Escape Room Florence in Florence (AL)
review: We loved the escape room! We did the espionage room, and it was a lot of fun! It keeps you thinking and putting together clues you find the entire time! Can't wait to try out their other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Espionage" by Escape Room Florence in Florence (AL)
review: Had a great time at the Escape Room!! We escaped the Espionage Room with 19 seconds left. This is a great place for family & friends. Staff was friendly & helpful throughout the experience. Looking forward to returning to try out the Cabin Room.

room_title: Escape room "Sparkle's Revenge" by Daytona Escape Room Experience in Daytona Beach
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Dark Sector" by Planet Deadline Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: We went yesterday and completed Dark Sector, it was so much fun! Would highly recommend this Escape Room! Can’t wait to come back and try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Dark Sector" by Planet Deadline Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: We had a blast! Adrenaline rush and lots of good team building/collaboration. We did the dark sector which we were in a spaceship trying to fix to get back on earth, while a creepy science experiment was still in the shuttle. Loved the props, set up, and displays. Great a creating a fun and realistic environment. We barely made it out by the hair of our chinny chin chin. The first 15-20 minutes were wasted because we couldn't figure where to begin, as all of us were new to escape rooms. Vague clues given so it was tough to get a grasp on things. Once we figured out first clue, things started rolling in more smoothly.

room_title: Escape room "Dark Sector" by Planet Deadline Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: I’ve done 16 different escape rooms now, I, a little addicted I suppose!  Anyway, dark sector is one of the best ambiance rooms I’ve ever done.  The puzzles are a little confusing, but we managed to escape and had a blast.  The environment and decorations are absolute top notch.

room_title: Escape room "Area Q" by Q: The Live Escape Experience in Fort Collins
review: Q's rooms have been our favorites since we started playing escape rooms. We missed the Pharaoh room, but Area Q, Salem, the Asylum, and (most recently) the Seance room are all incredible. One of the more unique aspects of Q is the way they integrate interactions with the moderator into the experience. Their themes are also quite clever and unique.

room_title: Escape room "Area Q" by Q: The Live Escape Experience in Fort Collins
review: Our family's second escape room! Loved it! Especially liked the live guard, added to the experience tremendously. Will be back to the other rooms in time!

room_title: Escape room "Area Q" by Q: The Live Escape Experience in Fort Collins
review: This was so fun! Easily one of the best birthdays I've ever had. The plot, the actor and staff were amazing. The room decorations and clues were great and it was such an adrenaline rush! We got out just in the nick of time and all out of breath by the end. The whole experience felt so real! I felt like I really was an elite secret agent trying to save the world! Highly recommend Area Q! I can't wait to try the others!

room_title: Escape room "Espionage Agent" by The Mansion Escape Room in Tallahassee
review: We had a group of 4 for the espionage room. Every person had a great time and left wanting to do more. We escaped with less than 5 mins to spare! Really great time. Will definitely come back and do another escape room.

room_title: Escape room "Espionage Agent" by The Mansion Escape Room in Tallahassee
review: Absolutely fun and amazing! Did the Espionage Room with my family, and finished with 55 seconds left. Ready for more.

room_title: Escape room "Espionage Agent" by The Mansion Escape Room in Tallahassee
review: Great experience! We chose the Espionage room, which I recommend. Make sure you bring someone along who knows about puzzle rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Jailbreak" by Flagstaff Escape Space in Flagstaff
review: The staff was incredibly accommodating with our development budget, as well as time availability and the rooms were a great experience for many of our staff members- especially those who have never done escape rooms before.Thanks so much for having us!

room_title: Escape room "Jailbreak" by Flagstaff Escape Space in Flagstaff
review: This place is awesome!!! Great quality rooms! They were so detailed and they were very challenging. We signed up for the jail break room which was crazy hard but soooo much fun I would totally recommend even if you can't make it out. We didn't and had so much fun we decided to do another room. We did the saloon room also which was awesome!!! You get unlimited hints but they make you wait at least ten min to try and work together. Great for team building. Our team, karly and Brooke, were outstanding and so helpful! They walked us through the rooms when we didn't get it and answered all questions we had. This was my first experience and it was a great one thanks t this place and these ladies!

room_title: Escape room "The Manor" by The Room LA in Los Angeles
review: Our group of 5 did The Manor a few weeks ago. It is a good mix of tech and traditional code/key locks. There are some reveals and elements that are reminiscent of the Haunted Mansion and The Munsters(for Boomers like me). Costumes(optional) are provided and add some comic relief and role playing aspects to this room. There are a few clues that are a little confusing, even after a hint. All in all, the three room here are definitely worth doing and are distinctively different experiences.

room_title: Escape room "The Collector's Warehouse" by Locked In Stuart in West Palm Beach
review: None

room_title: Escape room "SUBmerged" by Exodus Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: My family and I did the "SUBmerged" escape room and it was so much fun! Although we faced some challenges along the way, we were able to complete the escape room with some help. I will definitely be back! Alexandra really made it so much more enjoyable. She was attentive and enthusiastic, you can tell she really enjoys her job.

room_title: Escape room "SUBmerged" by Exodus Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: I love this place. We've done all 3 of their rooms and SUBmerged is for sure my favorite! Plenty to do and there's a nice mix of technology and hands on locks. The theme is well thought out and present throughout. Looks great and was fun to play!

room_title: Escape room "SUBmerged" by Exodus Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Went here with a group of my friends for my birthday. We all had never done an escape room before, but we ended up picking the hardest room: SUBmerged. It was really difficult.... but we had a blast! Alex was great and made the whole experience even better. Will be coming back!!

review: None

review: None
