review: Had so much fun doing Dr Riddlers lab! We will be back if we come back to Phoenix area!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Riddler's Lab" by Riddle Escape Room in Phoenix
review: Had so much fun today at Riddle Escape Room. I did Dr. Riddler's Lab with two of my co-workers as a team builder. We had a blast. The owners are great and very friendly. The room/clues were very creative. I will definitely come back here, can't wait to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "King Tut's Catacomb" by ​Kleen Escape Adventures in Hartford
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Marquise Heist" by Escape Room 104 in Pine Bluff
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Jekyll and Hyde" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: this place is awesome. People are so nice

room_title: Escape room "Jekyll and Hyde" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: We came in and did Jekyll and Hyde and Mad Hatter on the same night. These rooms were fantastic and you can tell that they are definitely made with love. Jack and Braden were awesome as control masters and the rooms were a lot of fun. It is tough to make the drive all the way out to Mesa, but we will definitely be back to collect the rest of those bracelets!

room_title: Escape room "Jekyll and Hyde" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: We did the 90 minute Jekyll and Hyde room. There were four of us. Two adults, two teens. It was a multiple room room. Lots of fun and excitement! Was one of my favorite escape rooms to do. The three people I was with were new to escape rooms. It said medium difficulty. A very well thought out room. We will be back soon to do the carn-evil room.

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by Stockton Escape in Modesto
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Enigma" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: What a FUN way to bring a group together in the ultimate mind game! Challenging all ages! Just go...you will LOVE it!

room_title: Escape room "Enigma" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: Extremely fair and logical. If you get stuck, you're missing something. Very well designed puzzle, and I'm hoping to try the others, even if we didn't beat the room.

room_title: Escape room "Enigma" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: We went as a family and it was super fun! We escaped with barely enough time! Definitely want to go back!

room_title: Escape room "Enigma" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: Excellent game room! We've done a few in Orlando, FL & this by far has been one of the best rooms we've done... Very well organized! Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Enigma" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: So cool! And so much fun. Plus the staff is fantastic. Go check it out.

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerer's Secret" by Mastermind Escape Games in Augusta
review: We did the "easiest " of the games available (The Sorcerer's Secret). Six adults with 11advanced degrees between us and it came down to seconds to get it done. We are already planning our next outing.

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerer's Secret" by Mastermind Escape Games in Augusta
review: We were joined by another family in the Sorcerer's Secret room. It was super fun and even though we didn't win, it was great to almost get there! Will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Patient 17" by Breaking Point Escape Rooms in Pomona
review: None

room_title: Escape room "International Thief" by Ace of Escape in Tucson
review: The best escape room experience I have found in Tucson so far! Did the International Thief room with my family while visiting for the holidays. Everyone (newbies and escape room veterans alike) had a great time. Fun, diverse puzzles and an awesome value... I would definitely return.

room_title: Escape room "International Thief" by Ace of Escape in Tucson
review: None of the eight of us had ever done an escape room. We had two 40 yo youngsters in the group; everyone needs youth!!! The hour in the International Thief Room passed swiftly and our team worked so well together.....we got out with 3 minutes to spare.Everyone agreed, this is really something to share, to keep in mind when entertaining,and do again.

room_title: Escape room "International Thief" by Ace of Escape in Tucson
review: My 11-year-old son and his friends had an AMAZING time in the International Thief room. Kathy was wonderful. Thanks!

room_title: Escape room "International Thief" by Ace of Escape in Tucson
review: We had a blast in the International Thief room. The puzzles were tricky, but solvable, and the tips were handy when needed. We'll definitely be back! Thanks for a great time!

room_title: Escape room "International Thief" by Ace of Escape in Tucson
review: I just had a blast doing the International Thief room with 3 strangers and my girlfriend. Ace of Escape strikes the perfect balance of fun and challenge. Our host (who runs the room) was incredibly gracious. This is a Tucson staple and a must do for anyone looking for a fun time!

room_title: Escape room "Alcatraz" by Hourglass Escape Rooms in Russellville
review: We did the Alcatraz room and it was a BLAST! Super fun and not terribly expensive, a really wonderful time.

room_title: Escape room "Alcatraz" by Hourglass Escape Rooms in Russellville
review: We had so much fun in Alcatraz! Even though we lost, we will definitely be back!!

room_title: Escape room "Alcatraz" by Hourglass Escape Rooms in Russellville
review: We did two rooms in one day bc we loved it so much. Lost was fun Alcatraz way harder but still so much fun not too hard tho we beat both rooms will go back again!

room_title: Escape room "Alcatraz" by Hourglass Escape Rooms in Russellville
review: For my birthday, my group did the Alcatraz room. It was excellent in design, difficulty and variety of challenges! I have done rooms in Denver and Las Vegas. This was just as good, actually better, than these. Uses an iPad to get clues, so more high tech than just a walkie talkie. A+.

room_title: Escape room "Alcatraz" by Hourglass Escape Rooms in Russellville
review: So we have been there three days in a row!! We love it and I think we have a new addiction! We escaped Alcatraz tonight, attempted yesterday but got stumped. I love how it makes you use your brain and we are a competitive family so this is so much fun for us!!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Plunder" by Arkansas Escape Rooms in Little Rock
review: Had a great time and loved that the room was truly a challenge. Bring your thinking cap for Pirate's Plunder - you're gonna need it! Will be back for sure.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Plunder" by Arkansas Escape Rooms in Little Rock
review: Had a blast with the family for date night in the pirate room! Much better than just catching another movie!! Highly recommend and we will be back for the spy room!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Plunder" by Arkansas Escape Rooms in Little Rock
review: Brought our family (ages 16-46) for the pirate room. What a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Plunder" by Arkansas Escape Rooms in Little Rock
review: We did the Pirate escape room, loved it!! Super fun!

room_title: Escape room "Duke's Revenge" by Scaventour in Honolulu
review: First time doing anything this. Had a great time and really surprised myself. Didn't even realized that I had a great physical workout as well as a mental workout. Highly recommend if you like a challenge and the outdoors. It's like the whole Escape Room phenomena done outside

room_title: Escape room "Duke's Revenge" by Scaventour in Honolulu
review: Excellent fun. I did the Duke's Revenge game and just had a blast. Greg is a great guide and the game is a perfect way to enjoy being outside in Waikiki for an hour or so. Good for the entire family. A bit challenging at times, but Greg will help you get through all of it, and at the end we got these cool coins. I look forward to playing the other games soon.

room_title: Escape room "Duke's Revenge" by Scaventour in Honolulu
review: Had the privilege to experience this new and creative game coming to Hawaii. It was really enjoyable with puzzles to solve, collaborative gameplay with your team, and a nice breath of air while taking in the sites. You will not find another experience like this on the island. I have lived here my whole life and have never really noticed some of the visuals in Waikiki till now. You will not be disappointed with this experience.

room_title: Escape room "Dragon Snack" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: Took my grandkids to Escape Rooms Mesa this weekend and we had a ball! Braden was awesome and made us feel so welcome. He really contributed to our experience. We did the Dragon Snack and escaped with 49 seconds to spare!! Great, great fun!

room_title: Escape room "Dragon Snack" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: We did the Dragon Snack room for our 11 year old's birthday party, and it was AWESOME! They were very helpful to ensure that we had a positive/successful experience.

room_title: Escape room "Jurassic Escape" by Escape the Room LA in Los Angeles
review: We did the Jurassic Park room for a friend’s birthday! It was SO much fun. Really interesting, complex puzzles. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. We will definitely be back!!

room_title: Escape room "The Christmas Key Catastrophe" by Codeword Escape in Hartford
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by America's Escape Game Gainesville in Gainesville
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by Escaped In Time in Colorado Springs
review: My girlfriend and I did the Attic room. We loved it! We have done 5 escape rooms in total, but the one at Escaped in Time was certainly one of our favorites. Well thought out and wonderfully decorated and executed. We will be back for sure.

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by Escaped In Time in Colorado Springs
review: We had a blast! It was easy to make reservations and everyone was very friendly. We tried out the Attic and it was so much fun. For most of us, it was our first escape room and we didn't make it out but were close! We did use clues and they were helpful. We can't wait to go back and try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by Escaped In Time in Colorado Springs
review: Lots of fun! We had a great time! The owners have been very creative and thorough in setting up Grandma's Attic.

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by Escaped In Time in Colorado Springs
review: We chose the attic...awesome family adventure...great time and great memories created! My oldest son came from Dallas/Ft Worth for Christmas. He has participated in several 'escape room' events back in the DFW area. He said this was one of the best experiences he's had! Our family group ranged in age from 72 to 24- and we all had a blast!! Can't wait to try another room!!

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by Escaped In Time in Colorado Springs
review: We came as a group of seven and they were able to accommodate us last minute on a Sunday afternoon - we played in 'The Attic' and had a fantastic time! It was difficult enough to seriously challenge all of our puzzle solving skills, but easy enough to where none of us became frustrated. They have clues that help you progress in the story, and clues that are meant to distract you - there are a couple really cool moments that no one expected and I can only imagine how funny it would be to rewatch all of our reactions! It's family owned and the people were so kind and helped us feel comfortable. Thank you Escaped in Time for an awesome family bonding experience!

room_title: Escape room "Riddle High" by Mystery Mansion in Little Rock
review: None

room_title: Escape room "A Broken Mind: Psych 102" by Panic Room CT in Stamford
review: My friends and I had a great time and truly enjoyed the mental stimulation that came with the challenging puzzles from the Broken Mind room. We are all excited to be going with a bigger group and hopefully making it out next time!

room_title: Escape room "A Broken Mind: Psych 102" by Panic Room CT in Stamford
review: I booked for the mind psych 102 room for my co-workers and I . We had to work with another group and it was awesome. It was cool how we all worked together to figure out the puzzles even though we didn't know each other. We didn't get out in time but we all had a blast. I'm definitely going again.

room_title: Escape room "A Broken Mind: Psych 102" by Panic Room CT in Stamford
review: This was my first Panic Room. I was nervous because I thought my anxiety would get the best of me, but my group was paired with another group and we worked well together. We did the Psych 102: Broken Mind room and actually got out with a record time for that room. It was amazing and I can say that it will not be my last panic room. The staff were great as well. They were friendly and gave great instruction for those of us who were new to the event.

room_title: Escape room "The Gate" by Will to Escape in West Palm Beach
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Dragon's Lair" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Dragon's Lair was fun and challenging! Went with a group of 6. It was my first escape room and it was a great experience. The Dragon's Lair had an awesome set. My friends and I all got super into it and worked as a team to solve the puzzles!

room_title: Escape room "The Dragon's Lair" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Came out with some friends to play Dragon's Lair and ended up staying to do Jack the Ripper as well. We had so much fun and Michael was super cool.

room_title: Escape room "The Dragon's Lair" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Been to a bunch of escape rooms and this one was one of my favorites. We did dragon's lair and it was so well put together with puzzles and cool effects. Michael was an excellent host!

room_title: Escape room "Ghostly Mayhem" by Try'n Escape in Denver
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Bank Robbery Escape" by Master Escape Room in Miami
review: A bit hard to find, but well worth it. The scenario my group did was the bank robbery. A room full of clues, locks, and all manner of strange twists and turns. The hour was full of challenges that tested every member of our team.The staff were very friendly and helpful. I recommend this experience. We're already talking about doing the Egyptian Tomb soon.

room_title: Escape room "Bank Robbery Escape" by Master Escape Room in Miami
review: We had a great time! There were 6 of us and we were paired with 2 others. We escaped with 5 minutes left! Not that easy but very fun!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Robbery Escape" by Master Escape Room in Miami
review: Took my two sons and 5 of there friends....We all had a blast!

room_title: Escape room "Shanghaied" by Escapology Montgomery in Montgomery
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Mafia Gallery" by ConTRAPtions Escape Rooms in Fort Collins
review: Excellent experience! Very immersive and well done. We did the Mafia room and it was super high tech and innovative. If you are looking for a fun activity to do with friends, check these people out.

room_title: Escape room "Mafia Gallery" by ConTRAPtions Escape Rooms in Fort Collins
review: Had a great time eluding the mob and escaping the room. THANK YOU!!!

room_title: Escape room "Mafia Gallery" by ConTRAPtions Escape Rooms in Fort Collins
review: By far the best escape room I have ever been to, with the coolest technology and craziest puzzles. This is EXACTLY what I was looking for in an escape room. We did the Mafia Gallery and just barely missed making it out alive. Great scenario, and very friendly staff! We will definitely be back to do Tiger's Eye!

room_title: Escape room "The Secret Society" by Escape Enterprise in Daleville
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Assassins" by Escape Room Salinas in Salinas
review: Such a fun/different activity to do on a date night or with a big group! Definitely coming back here again. The staff were very friendly and helpful!

room_title: Escape room "The Assassins" by Escape Room Salinas in Salinas
review: We just had our first experience in an escape room today. We had a party of seven and did the Assassins room and it was a lot of fun. We didn't get through it in time but we still had a great time. The staff is very helpful and informative. We would go back and try some different rooms it makes for a fun family hour. Put on your thinking caps :)

room_title: Escape room "The Assassins" by Escape Room Salinas in Salinas
review: Was here this Saturday for a work team building exercise.  This was my first time doing an "escape room" event. There was no wait and it was not busy, but then again we made an appointment for 11am.  They have a large waiting area and water bottles for sale for a dollar. We were a group of 10 but we were broken up into two groups of 5.  My group did the Assassin themed escape room and we had an hour to escape.  I have to say it was fun albeit the puzzles were challenging (so many locks!).  The room we were in was nicely decorated to the theme, and it had a nice "creepy" ambiance to it to set the mood.  I don't want to say too much and give it away, but overall it was nicely done. The owner is nice, and she also provides up to three hints if you get stuck.  The only downside is that they have a small parking lot.  I recommend carpooling especially if you are a big group like mine.I definitely recommend this place if you love solving puzzles with friends/family and/or as a team building exercise.  We definitely learned teamwork and how to quickly share ideas to get the task done.  It is too bad that I am not close by to Salinas because I would like to come back here again to do the other themes.

room_title: Escape room "Unlock The 80’s" by Amelia Island Escape Rooms in Jacksonville
review: After playing 50+ escape rooms throughout TN, GA, and the Carolinas and working at an escape room for 1.5 years, Amelia Island Escape’s “Escape the 80s” Room was my FAVORITE escape room I’ve completed yet.The set dressing was phenomenal, specifically for a locally owned in-house design. The dollhouse created by the owner was absolutely breathtaking (I do hope she’ll decide to encase the small rooms with a glass or acrylic barrier - the incredible attention to detail made me so nervous, as I know how easy it is for customers to get excited and forget what NOT to touch!) The variety of puzzle types was so impressive. Often, escape rooms are bogged down by repetitive puzzle types (translations, object-counting, etc) but this room had such unique puzzles, all perfectly woven into the logical storyline of the adventure itself. If you’re visiting Amelia Island and either enjoy escape rooms or are considering trying one for the first time, this adventure is well-worth the cash and, despite only lasting one hour, will give you something to talk about for the rest of the day!

room_title: Escape room "Unlock The 80’s" by Amelia Island Escape Rooms in Jacksonville
review: This room was the most challenging we have tried. You have to solve a room to get into the room! Wow that was great! It was a blast from the past for My oldest and myself. We were distracted by the 80's memorabilia in the room, so the younger ones really came to the game! This is our 3rd room and we plan on booking the last one to test our mental capacity. The Escape rooms are so much fun for the whole family or just a group of friends. Try it, you'll get hooked too!

room_title: Escape room "Unlock The 80’s" by Amelia Island Escape Rooms in Jacksonville
review: We called in advance to set up 2 rooms (Greybeard's and Unlock the 80's) for our family of 15. They were fantastic in accommodating us with a toddler in one of our groups. Sage and Natalie were very friendly and helpful as we played. We all had a wonderful time and enjoyed a little family competition as well! Thank you so much!

room_title: Escape room "The Quest" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: I've been to a number of different escape room places and this one is the best by far! I've taken other people to this one and they all say it's the best one they've done as well.

room_title: Escape room "The Quest" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: This was so much fun and really hard. Even with clues we maxed out our time. Call to find out which room is easiest and hardest. Then choose that way! We took the best picture afterward. Lots of fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Quest" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Had a great experience! Our host and Clue guy was amazing I recommend that everyone try this place at least once. Can not have asked for a better experience

room_title: Escape room "Resurrection" by Quest Room in Los Angeles
review: I'm an escape room enthusiast with 140 rooms under my belt. My group of 4 did both Amnesia and Resurrection. These rooms are absolutely amazing. Quest rooms production value is the best of the best. They did a great job utilizing the actor sparingly in the room which I much prefer than having them standing over your shoulder the whole time. These are must do rooms no matter what your escape room experience is. They have set the bar even higher!

room_title: Escape room "Resurrection" by Quest Room in Los Angeles
review: Incredible!!! I have played over 500 escape rooms and I see between 30-45 haunted attractions each year and Amnesia & Resurrection both impressed me! I highly recommend these experiences for anyone that loves story-driven escape rooms and/or haunted attractions. They are both a lot of adrenaline filled fun. Also Jasmine & Isaac were great! All the staff was great but they were our game masters.

room_title: Escape room "The Lab" by Escape Long Beach in Orange County
review: Finally a local escape room! The group had a great time. Drinks before and dinner after. Great location for a cool event. Highly recommend...

room_title: Escape room "The Lab" by Escape Long Beach in Orange County
review: What a great addition to Long Beach! We did both the queen Mary and the lab and had a lot of fun! Jack was very helpful and it's clear a lot of thought went into the escape rooms. It's especially nice that you are able to customize the level of difficulty for each room. We did the lab at intermediate difficulty and found that to be very enjoyable. We did the queen Mary at advanced and found that to be great too as it's the easier room of the two. Definitely worth a visit!

room_title: Escape room "The Lab" by Escape Long Beach in Orange County
review: We went to Escape Long Beach for my friend's bachelorette/ bday! I did not know what to expect as it was my first go at an escape room! We had so much fun! The staff were very friendly and accommodating!! They have a lounge/ party room where we were able to enjoy some wine and apps we brought while half our group tried to " escape" the "Lab"... It was a great time! There were plans made to return for their "Queen" room, which is opening soon!!

room_title: Escape room "Table for Two" by Epic Escape Rooms in Valdosta
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Laboratory" by Escape Room Delaware in Dover
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Steampunk" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: Terrible experience with my family. The owner/manager was very rude.. I recommend to go elsewhere. Too many escape rooms to be treated like that. They don't set the rooms back up properly either.. if you want to spend a lot of money to be stressed and cursed out be my guest. If you want to have a good experienced don't go to Mesa escape rooms

room_title: Escape room "Steampunk" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: We've done 3 different rooms at Escape Rooms Mesa. Great experience every time! We especially enjoyed Steampunk and Outbreak! They put so much effort into their rooms. You truly felt the experience. These rooms are not just lock and key. Great puzzles, and a decent amount of tech. So many other escape houses could learn a thing or two from this place.Worth every penny! You won't regret it

room_title: Escape room "Steampunk" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: I love this place. My friends and I have done several rooms and have never been disappointed. We keep coming back and they keep making new rooms! The latest one we did was Steampunk- the room was super cool! We had a blast!

room_title: Escape room "Steampunk" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: I really enjoyed my adventure at Escape Room. The Steampunk Room was well thought out and had some interesting puzzles. The only drawback was a couple of the puzzles had very small writing and that writing was in shadow, it made them difficult to read, thus solve.  The staff was friendly and helpful.

room_title: Escape room "Through The Looking Glass" by The Escape South Florida in West Palm Beach
review: We had an amazing experience getting Through the Looking Glass! We'll go back to tackle the other room!

room_title: Escape room "Through The Looking Glass" by The Escape South Florida in West Palm Beach
review: We did the Alice themed room. It was very challenging and frustrating in a good way. I definitely think this was one of the best rooms I did.

room_title: Escape room "Through The Looking Glass" by The Escape South Florida in West Palm Beach
review: This was one of the best escape rooms that I have ever done. It was very well paced, not so hard that you get stuck on one clue for a long time but not so easy that you're out quick. We did the Alice in Wonderland room and the amount of detail and whimsy that was put into it was fantastic. Now to go back and do the other room!

room_title: Escape room "Through The Looking Glass" by The Escape South Florida in West Palm Beach
review: Best escape experience (this is the third place I've been)!!! I did the Alice in Wonderland one, there were multiple rooms, the puzzles were challenging but not impossible. We completed the escape with a minute to spare. The owner was there and was super cool.

room_title: Escape room "Through The Looking Glass" by The Escape South Florida in West Palm Beach
review: We are on a family vacation and it was raining today, so we were looking for something fun to do.  We have always wanted to do an escape room but couldn't find one that felt the themes were appropriate for our 10-year-old. However, we found this adventure to be fun and exciting for everyone. Kevin, the owner was very helpful when we needed help. He was committed to helping us get through to the end and we felt a great sense of success in accomplishing the "Through the Looking Glass" room. This adventure was family friendly for our young teen and pre-teen family.

room_title: Escape room "Blood Shed" by Escape Room Entertainment in Melbourne
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Press Start" by Lokey's Escape Rooms in Sarasota
review: Owner was amazing. Super nice. Really liked the “in character” acting too! The room we did was Press Start and it was VERY WELL put together! Thanks for letting us play can’t wait to play the next two rooms :)

room_title: Escape room "Press Start" by Lokey's Escape Rooms in Sarasota
review: We did all three of the available rooms. Their newest room (Press Start), has a very unique hint delivery system. Additionally, all three rooms had a unique start to them that I was not expecting. None of the rooms have screens keeping time but they have a fun way of keeping the time for you. We will be going back once they open new rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Sherlocked" by The Clue Room in Denver
review: Was an awesome experience with our group of 6. We will have back!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlocked" by The Clue Room in Denver
review: Took a team of 13 year old soccer girls and they split them into two groups using 2 identical rooms. The girls loved it and it was a fun bonding experience for all of them! The staff and owners are fantastic to work with and very accomodating!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlocked" by The Clue Room in Denver
review: Did this with a group, we had two teams going head to head. So much fun!! Not as easy as it seems in the beginning, but can't wait to go back. Highly addictive!

room_title: Escape room "Rock n Roll" by King's Escape Room Denver in Denver
review: Rock & Roll is amazing. You utilize record players (!!!! Which our game master said they had to explain to people how to use), hampers, beer bottles etc. our group of two got out with 3 min to spare.

room_title: Escape room "Rock n Roll" by King's Escape Room Denver in Denver
review: Loved this place! Our group of 7 did the Rock n Roll room and had so much fun! The room was pretty challenging but we ended up finishing with 3 minutes to spare. Really creative! The owner, Steve, is also hilarious and makes the experience even more fun. Highly recommend going!

room_title: Escape room "Rock n Roll" by King's Escape Room Denver in Denver
review: My husband and I visited King's Escape Room yesterday. We did the Rock and Roll Room and had an absolute blast. i have done around 40 escape rooms and I can attest that this one is definitely up there among the top rooms I've done. The decor is on point and the puzzles follow the theme, something that I prefer when doing an escape room because I like how it allows the game to be a totally immersive experience. The owner was extremely personable and was definitely helpful when we needed a couple clues. Overall, it was a great experience and I can't wait to go back and try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Rock n Roll" by King's Escape Room Denver in Denver
review: My husband, daughter and I did the Rock and Roll Room. It was a blast! We would definitely go back and do the others! Challenging and fun!

room_title: Escape room "Rock n Roll" by King's Escape Room Denver in Denver
review: Kings was amazing! We did the rock and roll room and had a blast trying to figure out way out! The owners did such a great job with the rooms (the decor, the clues, everything) and we can't wait to come back and do another.

room_title: Escape room "Rock n Roll" by King's Escape Room Denver in Denver
review: I have done over 20+ rooms and I can honestly say this was a great experience. We chose the Rock and Roll room mainly because the theme was so inviting. When we stepped into the room, we really felt like we were transported into the 70's and in a swanky hotel. The puzzles and games to play were well thought out, challenging and very playable. I won't give too much away, but you better know your music as one of the puzzles tests your ability to listen to music carefully. Such a creative aspect to the room! The owner was very friendly and very hospitable. Wishing great success with Kings!!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Empire" by Action Hero Studios in Phoenix
review: We had my son's 9th birthday party there and him and his friends LOVED it!! It was a big hit with his friends too. The owner was very friendly and helpful, and explained things to the parents that were outside watching the video screens. I would highly recommend this place

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Empire" by Action Hero Studios in Phoenix
review: Thanks for a great experience and fun challenge! The room was one of the best we have seen and we have done a lot of escape the room challenges across the country! Good to see some new and creative ideas along with the well thought out technology!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Empire" by Action Hero Studios in Phoenix
review: The room was very well designed and it had many puzzles that I have never seen before. I have done many different rooms but this was definitely one of my favorites.

room_title: Escape room "Armored Truck Heist" by Southernmost Escape in Key West
review: Went as a group of four to do the Armored Truck room. This was my first escape room and I had a super fun time! A great place to visit in Key West. Staff was super friendly and welcoming. We are already planning to come back solve the others rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Armored Truck Heist" by Southernmost Escape in Key West
review: This is a great place. The owner is an awesome guy. Great family owned company. My wife and I did the armored car setup and really enjoyed it. Made it out with 20 minutes to spare! Looking forward to doing the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Armored Truck Heist" by Southernmost Escape in Key West
review: We had a great time and really enjoyed it! We did the armored truck and it was great to build teamwork. We escaped with 20 minutes left. Highly recommend for anyone and everyone to go out and take a shot at it!

room_title: Escape room "Love Divided" by Kingdom Keys NWA in Centerton
review: Great place, great service, awesome fun! Loved this and the kids were awesome at figuring everything out! Great night of fun for the whole family!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by The One 2 Escape Room in Miami
review: Best hour of my life. Uses teamwork and a lot of brain power to get out of a room! Fun themed rooms with twist and turns!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by The One 2 Escape Room in Miami
review: We did the first room and came back the next day for a second room! Had lots of fun doing this ( we definitely had to split the group inside the room to multitask against the clock) Looking forward to doing the next rooms!!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by The One 2 Escape Room in Miami
review: We did the Kidnapped room, and it was EXCELLENT! We’ve done many escape rooms, and this was one of the best. For the touristy area, One 2 Escape has the best prices, and since we were the first booking of the day, it was nice and quiet. A great break from the hustle of the beach. Staff was great too. Lots of fun!

room_title: Escape room "Ka Puka Bunker" by Maui Escape Rooms in Maui
review: My daughter, granddaughter and I were exploring the area during Christmas break and ran upon The Maui Escape Room. We registered for the "Ka Puka" experience. By far this was one of the best challenges and boy oh boy did it require some major puzzle solving.We managed to stop the explosion with quick thinking, major dance moves and 53 seconds left, lol!

room_title: Escape room "Ka Puka Bunker" by Maui Escape Rooms in Maui
review: What a blast! We did the bunker and the hour went by in the blink of an eye.

room_title: Escape room "Hungover" by AdventurEscape in Hartford
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by American Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: Such an awesome experience! I'm a huge escape room fan (I do one in every state I travel to) and living in Tampa, I try to support all of the local ones. First time at this one and hands down, one of the best rooms I've every played. Myself and a close friend did the zombie apocalypse room by ourselves (which is fine, we like the challenge) and had SO much fun. Shout out to our game master, Kristen for good hints and being super awesome during the game. We escaped! I'll 100000% be back to try the Cold War room and mad professor. Great quality games, good pricing and a very accommodating staff.

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by American Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: Had a great time! Clues were difficult but doable, and the hints were very helpful! We did Zombie Apocalypse (just two of us) and almost finished!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by American Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: My son (30), daughter (31), grand-daughter (13), a friend (21) and myself (61) went together and did the Zombie Apocalypse. We had an outstanding time! Our diverse ages made the experience even more fun as we laughed our way through puzzling out the clues. We highly recommend American Escape Rooms as a fun and exciting family activity.

room_title: Escape room "Black Beard's Brig" by Escape Blue Ridge in Atlanta
review: As an escape room owner, I visit escape rooms with a very critical eye. My family recently did the Black Beard's Brig room and we LOVED it! The room was beautifully designed, the puzzles were challenging, and the owners were absolutely delightful. Great experience!!

room_title: Escape room "Black Beard's Brig" by Escape Blue Ridge in Atlanta
review: My husband and I had never done an escape room before when we did Black Beards Brig. We loved it! The owners are super friendly and helpful which made the experience even better! This helped make our first wedding anniversary super fun!

room_title: Escape room "Black Beard's Brig" by Escape Blue Ridge in Atlanta
review: Thoroughly enjoyed it and will definitely be doing it again! Staff was very friendly and professional. Thanks for the memories!

room_title: Escape room "Black Beard's Brig" by Escape Blue Ridge in Atlanta
review: We loved escaping from Captain Black Beard! It's such a unique and fun experience and the staff and our game master were awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Storyworld" by Escape Room Entertainment in Melbourne
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Family Jewels" by Mind Games Clovis in Fresno
review: My aunt and mom really enjoyed themselves and the experience of finding the family jewel. Check in was easy and the staff was very helpful and nice. The challenges were hard and you had to use your mind to figure out the clues and good teamwork with each other. Afterwards the staff was able to show us future games coming up, which made us want to go to another game. Had a lot of fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Family Jewels" by Mind Games Clovis in Fresno
review: Celebrated my 12-year-old daughter's birthday there with 9 of her friends. They split up into two teams and did the Family Jewels competition. They were thoroughly entertained for the full hour. They had so much fun. They couldn't stop talking about it when they were done. Staff was friendly and accomodating! They want to come back for more!

room_title: Escape room "The Family Jewels" by Mind Games Clovis in Fresno
review: Never been in an 'escape room' before and I was presently surprised. The staff was very friendly and were very patient with us. Great sense of humor!! We had a good laugh.  Gave us enough clues to figure out locks. Come here for a good time then go have dinner and a drink or two!! We had 7 minutes to spare.

room_title: Escape room "The Family Jewels" by Mind Games Clovis in Fresno
review: The staff was amazingly friendly, and super helpful throughout. The puzzles they made for us were really fun and forced us to get witty and crafty. The room felt a bit small, but had an impressive amount of "stuff" around to keep us busy with everything. Definitely going to be trying to get a few other people to run another room with me some time.

room_title: Escape room "Alien" by Hourglass Escape Rooms in Russellville
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Archive" by Dare 2 Escape in Orlando
review: It was so much family fun... Had a great time. Staff was super friendly.

room_title: Escape room "The Archive" by Dare 2 Escape in Orlando
review: Wonderful rooms, especially the Archive, and extremely friendly staff. 💛💚💙💜

room_title: Escape room "The Archive" by Dare 2 Escape in Orlando
review: Mr and my friend did all of your rooms within 2 days. I absolutely love it. Amazing room and amazing staff. Can't wait to come back when you open the new rooms. Such an amazing experience :) I recommend Asylum even though I jump a few times and archive is also amazing

room_title: Escape room "The Atlantis Treasure Hunt" by Codebreakers in Oceanside
review: My brother, my husband, and I have been there a few times now and have had a blast every time. The Time Machine game was the first Codebreakers game we attempted. Although we did not escape the first time, we don't give up and kept trying until we escape which we did on our fourth try.My husband and I attempted the Atlantis game the day before our anniversary and again on my husband's birthday. We didn't escape either time (it was just the two of us which makes it more difficult) so we're trying again in a few weeks.The staff and owner are friendly and personable.

room_title: Escape room "The Atlantis Treasure Hunt" by Codebreakers in Oceanside
review: While visiting from Phx, I did the Atlantis Treasure Hunt with my sister. Codebreakers is a great escape room business. The lobby and restrooms are clean and neat. The game itself was neat, uncluttered and well lit, with plenty of room to move about. Our gamemaster was Corrine who was spot on giving us clues when we needed extra help. (Thx, Corrine!) The game was well decorated and challenging. This room is a great family room that would appeal to any age. (We are both over 60 and loved it!) I would recommend this business to locals and travelers alike.

room_title: Escape room "The Atlantis Treasure Hunt" by Codebreakers in Oceanside
review: This was our first escape room ever. We did the Atlantis themed escape room. Got to say, got the best of us  Luis, the employee, was very sweet and was very patient with us. Its also very clean in there! Time sure flies by! Many of us were so close and managed to figure some clues out but geez! Lol we overall had so much fun! And definitely recommend this place. We most likely be going back to try the time machine escape room!! great experience for us first timers!

room_title: Escape room "Battleship" by Red Door Escapes in Little Rock
review: Battleship was such a fun room! They have developed a really great back story and it flowed so well into the room. You can tell the owners put lots of thought into the room which made for a great experience! Can't wait until your other rooms open up

room_title: Escape room "Battleship" by Red Door Escapes in Little Rock
review: Awesome experience! We went as a family of four. (Kids age 9 and 11)We did the battleship room, but will definitely be back to do any others! The owner is amazing and was very helpful with clues when we got stuck. My youngest said it was more fun than a video game, so I'll say it was a huge success! Much more affordable than most as well. Thanks for a wonderful evening!

room_title: Escape room "Battleship" by Red Door Escapes in Little Rock
review: We did the Battleship room and it was a blast. The entire room is so well put together and the clues are so challenging to figure out! We were so immersed in the escape that it really felt like we were in that situation trying to save Captain Nemo! The owner was so awesome and we will definitely be back for the opening of the next room. Thanks for the experience!

room_title: Escape room "Battleship" by Red Door Escapes in Little Rock
review: We did this room with two adults and two kids ages 6 and 9. The room was really well set up and felt like we were in the Captain's quarters on a carrier . It was really well done and everything from the detail in the room to the sound really added to the ambience.The story was cool and drew us in and the puzzles were neat to figure out. The kids had a great time contributing and working the physical pieces while we did the tougher pieces (with some help when we needed it, which was nice :)). It was the perfect level of challenging vs fun to complete.Would do again and looking forward to what Red Door makes in the future!

room_title: Escape room "The Missing" by Fort Smith Escape Room in Fort Smith
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Fox Tail Saloon" by NorCal Escape Co. in Yuba City
review: At first I was iffy on going since it's almost an hour drive for me, but I am so glad I went! One of the best escape rooms I've done. The craftsmanship is incredible in the Saloon room. I cannot wait to return and try out Condemned 2. The staff is also amazing and super friendly. Our whole group couldn't talk about anything but how awesome the room was on the ride home.

room_title: Escape room "Fox Tail Saloon" by NorCal Escape Co. in Yuba City
review: Absolutely amazing and the best fun we have had in a long long time. The room captivated you and pulled you in the minute you walked in the door. So well built, great attention to detail and we found the treasure with 5 minutes to spare! Whew! I can't wait to go back for Condemned 2!

room_title: Escape room "Fox Tail Saloon" by NorCal Escape Co. in Yuba City
review: The Fox Tail Saloon was a lot of fun! Looking forward to trying Condemned 2 next.

room_title: Escape room "Fox Tail Saloon" by NorCal Escape Co. in Yuba City
review: I went to their last room (Condemned) and it was awesome! This time, coming to the Saloon, I wasn't sure what to expect and it turns out, my roommate and I were the only two who booked for our time slot. We didn't let that stop us! We still had an amazing time and loved all the authentic looking details and intricate clues. We didn't make it but we were close! We'll beat the next one!

room_title: Escape room "Fox Tail Saloon" by NorCal Escape Co. in Yuba City
review: We loved Fox Tail! First, the customer service is great. There are plenty of signs to ensure you can find them. Lobby is nice with comfy sofas, soda machine, and restroom. They also provide free lockers so you don't have to leave your purse/items in your vehicle. Our Host was fantastic. The game itself was challenging but fun. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: I went with 5 people, spent $150 and we didn't finish. This is a big disappointment. When we asked for help, the lady didn't know which stage we finished. No one guided us along to help us finish. This is why it has so many bad reviews that no one finished. In all the escape rooms I have been to, the guide made sure we didn't spend a lot of time on one thing to make sure we finished the mission. We expected it to be scary. It was far from scary. The decoration was awful. There was too many locks. It wasn't creative at all. You are basically opening locks the whole time. Will never come back again. Not worth the money, not a great experience. Go to another escape room. This is an honest review.

room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: Awesome school field trip! We took part of our ninth grade class (47 students) to Escape today and they had an awesome time. It was a great experience in critical thinking, analytical skills, and team work. They had an awesome time and didn't want to leave. Thanks to the wonderful group planning team and staff. They understood the special needs that come with coordinating a field trip for minors and even accommodated our bus. A+ from Newton High School!

room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: The Amnesia Room was a total trip!! Definitely worth it!

room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: Extremely fair and logical. If you get stuck, you're missing something. Very well designed puzzle, and I'm hoping to try the others, even if we didn't beat the room.

room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: Shannon! Was the Bomb! We had the BEST time and an Amazing experience...of course we picked the most difficult room to escape from but it was great working together trying to figure it out...Great couples night out....highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: Must try!!! Our team did the Amnesia room. It was definitely a challenge, and although we didnt escape, it was great teamwork and team building amongst us all. I will be trying other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: So cool! And so much fun. Plus the staff is fantastic. Go check it out

room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: Great fun!!!!! The best time I've ever had playing a game. This will test your mind to the fullest. The Amnesia Room is the most difficult of them all.....didn't know this before we selected it, but man did we have a blast. Each clue opens another level of excitement while the clock ticks away.

room_title: Escape room "Murder 101" by New Smyrna Beach Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: Our family of 7 had a great time with Murder 101.   Couldn't of done it without the help of our in room operator.   Highly recommended!!!

room_title: Escape room "Murder 101" by New Smyrna Beach Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: Went with coworkers and we had a blast! We escaped the Murder101 room with just seconds to spare! We will definitely be coming back! Great way to get out and just have fun! Thanks!

room_title: Escape room "Murder 101" by New Smyrna Beach Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: This was my family's first escape room experience. We loved "Murder 101". Melanie was a great guide, and we plan on escaping again when we return to NSB!

room_title: Escape room "Murder 101" by New Smyrna Beach Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: This experience was so awesome. First off, as a local, I am always on the hunt for new and different things to do around the area - and this is one of a kind! There's a few rooms, and we (8 of us) did Murder 101. It was challenging and fun at the same time especially when you solve a puzzle or find a clue. This was memorable and I will definitely be back to escape the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Special Agent - Destination Langley" by ALL IN Adventures Lawrenceville in Atlanta
review: Attempted the Special Agent Room last night with three friends. We weren't able to solve the puzzle in the 45 minute time frame, but it was a lot of fun trying. Apparently we picked the hardest room. It was really challenging and fun. The staff was very friendly and helpful in providing clues to our team. I recommend this as a great team building exercise for family, friends and coworkers. BTW, park at the Basspro. It is located across the hall.

room_title: Escape room "Dorm of the Dead 2" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: This room is hard as HELL. Three different rooms, having to feel blindly for things etc. Interesting but tough

room_title: Escape room "Dorm of the Dead 2" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: One of the best things I have ever done. EVER. DO IT. My sister and I started off with the Dorm of the dead, we actually were right at the last clue but we ran out of time! We loved it so much we booked another one for the same day immediately after! After that we did the Mustache Thief and NAILED IT with 15 min to spare! It was so fun! The Dorm of the Dead was fantastic, there were two other people with us in the room and a group of four was perfect! The design and set surprises were so amazing! Someone put a lot of time into the design! It blew us away! Because the Dorm of the Dead is the 2nd hardest and it was our first time I think we would have nailed it if we had done the mustache one first because we would have known a bit more what to expect.. But then again they are about the same difficulty and they are designed so differently.. We were in a group totaled up of 8 for the mouse ache thief and we had so much fun! We were cheering every clue we unlocked, laughed a lot and had so much fun working as a team! I can't wait to find more room escape games in the country! This is a must do! We are going to to the Pikes Peak (moderate) and the Other Side (hardest) next time I come back to visit!! I can't wait to come back to this place!! So much fun!! It's like a reality video/board game with great stage props and I wish they had these all the time everywhere!!

room_title: Escape room "Dorm of the Dead 2" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Epic Escape Game was challenging and fun, we had a blast. All the staff was friendly and we definitely want to go back and try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Dorm of the Dead 2" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Had an awesome Mother-Daughter bonding time at Epic Escape trying not to be zombie food. Although we didn't finish, we were within 3 puzzles of finishing - as just a 2some!!! Kudos to the guys for an awesome experience. First timers from out town, and if we get back, we'll do it again!!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Dorm of the Dead 2" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: So fun!!! I used to be a dating coach and matchmaker and always told people that activity dates are the best for getting to know each other and for generating attraction. This is perfect!!! What a great way to get to know someone!!

room_title: Escape room "Dorm of the Dead 2" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: I went to the epic escape game tonight for the first time ever going through an escape room. We went for my birthday and I took my kids, boyfriend and mom and dad. All though we had a blast, I would say for first timers we picked the wrong room. We did the dorm of the dead and it was very hard. I give it up to the people who made that room, it was not joke. The workers there were very nice and our clue master was very nice and patient with us. I will say if you have kids or it's your first time going choice the toy room. I can't wait to go back and try the easier room to really get the understanding of the room. Our clue master stayed with us 30 minutes after time had expired just to see and help us understand and get through the room. That was very nice of him. I would say everybody should try the epic escape game!!! I can't wait to go back and try it again!!!

room_title: Escape room "Dorm of the Dead 2" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: So fun!!! I used to be a dating coach and matchmaker and always told people that activity dates are the best for getting to know each other and for generating attraction. This is perfect!!! What a great way to get to know someone!!

room_title: Escape room "Dorm of the Dead 2" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: First escape room and didn't succeed but REALLY enjoyed the whole experience! Can't wait to escape next time. Everything was well thought out and it was a lot more challenging than I expected. When you hear "21% success rate", take it seriously and don't assume you're automatically smarter than 79% of the population (especially if you've never done anything like this before)!

room_title: Escape room "The Elf Cabin" by Unlock Escape Rooms in Fresno
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Brig" by Xscape Our Rooms in St. Augustine
review: We did the BlackBeards Brig room. The owners are so friendly and funny! We had an amazing time. Very challenging so you definitely have to work together. Communication is key. Can't wait to escape the other two rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Brig" by Xscape Our Rooms in St. Augustine
review: What a fun way to spend the afternoon. We had a great time working out the clues for Blackbeard's Brig. Thank goodness for my son and his clever friend. If it were left up to me, I'd be fish food by now ;-) Will definitely be doing this again.

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Brig" by Xscape Our Rooms in St. Augustine
review: I took my daughter and her friends for her birthday! We went to Blackbeard's brig and I can't say enough good things about the room and the men that own it. Such a wonderfully fun time! The girls all had a blast! Can't wait to do it again!

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Brig" by Xscape Our Rooms in St. Augustine
review: This place is absolutely amazing! Great addition to St. Augustine and we cannot wait to go back! Super affordable, very entertaining and all around great experience. The staff was friendly and informative. Blackbeard's Brig was so fun. The puzzles were the perfect difficulty level to keep it interesting without being too complicated. We had a great time! Definitely recommend this business!

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Brig" by Xscape Our Rooms in St. Augustine
review: We just left and we had such an amazing time escaping Blackbeard’s Brig! It was challenging, well thought out but also super fun. The staff is so friendly and nice. We will definitely be back!! Thank you guys so much!

room_title: Escape room "Weekend Get-AWAY" by Sprightly Escapes in Denver
review: Sprightly Escapes rooms are fun, unique, and the perfect level of challenge. Lucas and Kelly are fantastic hosts and my entire family had such a great time together. We escaped with two seconds to spare! We all left our adventure talking about how much we can't wait to come back, and we definitely will return to Sprightly!

room_title: Escape room "Weekend Get-AWAY" by Sprightly Escapes in Denver
review: Had 2 out-of-town visitors and needed something fun to do so we booked the later time for the Getaway room. There were 4 other people who joined. It was a blast! Way more fun than expected. It was not easy but after about 15 min you start getting the hang of it. We were soooo close to escaping..needed about 3 more minutes. Would be a great team building event. Will definitely do another room sometime.

room_title: Escape room "Weekend Get-AWAY" by Sprightly Escapes in Denver
review: Went with 5 co-workers for a team builder in the Weekened Get-AWAY room. It was a fun and unique way to spend time with my team. Some of us had done escape rooms before, others hadn't. Everyone had fun and would go again!

room_title: Escape room "Weekend Get-AWAY" by Sprightly Escapes in Denver
review: My wife and I came based on a recommendation from a friend who had been here. We attempted the Weekend GetAWAY and were not disappointed. While we didn't escape, it was a great experience. We had no idea what to expect but our hosts explained the game very well and set us up for success as best they could without ruining the experience. They were very welcoming and friendly. I would highly recommend this as a fun activity for a small group. We will definitely be back to attempt the other room and hopefully make our way out! Thanks Sprightly Escapes!

room_title: Escape room "Weekend Get-AWAY" by Sprightly Escapes in Denver
review: This is the third escape room I've done and it was the best by far. The owners and creators are onsite and involved, which is unusual in escape rooms. The Motel Room was perfectly designed; the clues and puzzles were challenging but we were able to make progress and feel satisfied. Highly recommended.

room_title: Escape room "Weekend Get-AWAY" by Sprightly Escapes in Denver
review: What a great experience!! Walked in not knowing what to expect because this was my first escape room. Kara and Denise were amazing hosts and made the experience exciting. I don't want to give too much away about the "weekend escape" but it was challenging and fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Patient" by Mindscape in Atlanta
review: We had a great time. We went with 8 people and everyone was able to participate and add something to the experience. Can’t wait to try the new room when it’s completed.

room_title: Escape room "The Patient" by Mindscape in Atlanta
review: Mindscape was awesome! This was our 7th escape room and we barely made it out with two and a half minutes to spare. Definitely challenging! Need to go back for more.

room_title: Escape room "The Patient" by Mindscape in Atlanta
review: It was fun and exciting! Highly recommend. Went with family, a variety of ages, all participated and it was a blast. We made it out just in time with a minute and 33 seconds left!

room_title: Escape room "Double Crossed" by Lockbox Escape Room in Miami
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Paper Company" by Dare 2 Escape in Orlando
review: We had a great time. 1st escape room ever. Fun time!

room_title: Escape room "Paper Company" by Dare 2 Escape in Orlando
review: Great time, great staff, amazing rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Paper Company" by Dare 2 Escape in Orlando
review: Played the paper company today - so much fun.I have played other rooms there and they have been a blast. It’s always on my todo list when we are in Florida to stop in and see what new game they have. Looking forward to seeing what they come up with next.

room_title: Escape room "Area 51" by HD Escape Rooms Westminster in Denver
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Heist" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: This was challenging yet fun, well-tuned and designed. Staff were friendly and helpful. There was a wide variety of puzzles, secrets and props that kept our team of 7 busy and engaged. We finished with only a few minutes to spare. Had a wonderful team-building outing and will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Heist" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: It was Fantastic and definitely loads of fun! The rooms were challenging and made the team work together! And I have to say the team there was pretty great!

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Heist" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Awesome experience...really challenging but in a super fun way! Recommend this to anyone for a fantastic team builder or just a fun time in general!

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Heist" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: What an awesome experience!!! Great family night out with Dawn, Ben, Laura, and Evan. It always helps when you win.

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Heist" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: 5 + STARS. Best time ever. We are coming back. The challenge was harder than we expected, which made it more fun.

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Heist" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: This was such an awesome and challenging experience! I would recommend this to anyone whose looking for a switch-up from a night at the movies or a way to spice up their weekend. Loved it!

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Heist" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Urban Escape Games hands down one of the most fun yet most challenging things I have done! Can't wait to do more!

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Heist" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Definitely worth doing with some of your close friends. We all were skeptical about it at first but ended up having a great time. Really makes you think and work as a team. The staff was very friendly and helpful. We'll definitely be doing this again

room_title: Escape room "Alice & the White Rabbit" by Unlock Escape Rooms in Fresno
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Matter of Time" by Exit Plan in Washington, D.C.
review: None

room_title: Escape room "At Odds With The Gods" by The Escape Effect in Orlando
review: Really enjoyed this escape room and the 90 minute game time! Jamie and Dan were great hosts and we are looking forward to doing their next room. We managed to escape and used a few hints along the way. The puzzles were cool and I like that there weren't too many padlocks. Great job!

room_title: Escape room "At Odds With The Gods" by The Escape Effect in Orlando
review: Great customer service by the owners, we had a great time. 90 minutes full of puzzles, not just a regular room with extra time to solve. The owners and gamemaster were extremely accommodating for the exhausted 4-year-old with us. We will be back again, what a great experience!

room_title: Escape room "At Odds With The Gods" by The Escape Effect in Orlando
review: My group has done 15 escape rooms thus far, and I can safely say that this business is now in my top 3 favorites. We tried their 90-minute At Odds With The Gods room, and we were so impressed. The decor was all awesome, it all fit the theme amazingly. All the puzzles were entertaining and fun, and their hint system was super cool. Dan and Jamie were awesome hosts. We will be back for their other rooms! Give them a try, you won't regret it.

room_title: Escape room "At Odds With The Gods" by The Escape Effect in Orlando
review: My friend and I are avid escape room players (over 100 between the 2 of us) and we thoroughly enjoyed At Odds room. It was the first 90-min room we’ve ever played and it definitely kept us on our toes! For two experienced players, this game definitely gave us some new puzzles we hadn’t seen and took us back to good old-fashioned mind puzzles. We can’t wait to go back and try the other games as we know we will love them too! Plus the owners are wonderful and definitely care about you having a great experience!

room_title: Escape room "At Odds With The Gods" by The Escape Effect in Orlando
review: Played 'At Odds with the Gods' and I have to say I loved it! The puzzles were well thought out and everything flowed together perfectly. Easily one of my top 5 favorites.

room_title: Escape room "Survivors vs Survivors" by Lights Out Escape Rooms in Denver
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Parental Advisory: Story of Sledge Dixx" by 3rd Day Escape in San Diego
review: Third day escape is awesome, with many different escape rooms for everyone to enjoy 😇👍🏼

room_title: Escape room "Parental Advisory: Story of Sledge Dixx" by 3rd Day Escape in San Diego
review: great experience meet awesome people! puzzles were Challenging but overall I had a great time!!

room_title: Escape room "The Great Carnival Challenge" by Brainy Actz in San Diego
review: While visiting from Phx, I did the Carnival Room with my sister. This was a challenging room for us, in that you sometimes couldn't move on until you won a carnival game. But we DID beat the games, and we escaped and had a blast doing it! Sean was our gamemaster, and he was spot on giving us help. (Thanks, Sean!) This is an amazing place, and I recommend it for the entire family. (We are both over 60 and loved it!) I highly recommend this room for locals and travelers alike.

room_title: Escape room "The Great Carnival Challenge" by Brainy Actz in San Diego
review: Really fun for the whole group. There were eight of us and we made it out in an hour but needed clues. Fun night, I would recommend it . Can't wait to try it again!!

room_title: Escape room "The Great Carnival Challenge" by Brainy Actz in San Diego
review: So much fun!! Did the carnival escape game and was surprised by how fun and interactive it was! Difficult enough to be a challenge for adult groups but not so much so that families with kids couldn't go and have a blast. Gaelin was our host and was fabulous. He was funny and made our hour in the room that much more memorable. Look forward to trying the other SD location's escape room!

room_title: Escape room "The Hangover" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: We had a blast! A group of us were on a get away for the weekend, and we thought we would try it out for something new and different to do. We did The Hangover Room. The puzzles were tricky but achievable. We were glad to have the option to get a hint if needed...we needed. We will definitely be back to try another one! Fun, fun!!

room_title: Escape room "The Hangover" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: The Hangover was a lot of fun. Booked it with 5 other friends, and we had a great time. Christina was very sweet and helpful, making sure to provide us with hints when we were stuck. I'd definitely like to come back and try another room.

room_title: Escape room "The Hangover" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: Super fun experience! We did this as a family for a Father's Day celebration and it was perfect! Highly recommend Escape the Place for everyone looking for a unique way to have fun with a group!

room_title: Escape room "The Hangover" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: Had a great time in The Hangover scenario. Went with a group of 3, and beat the room in just under 50 mins. The puzzles were pretty challenging but all were wicked fun. Will be going back!

room_title: Escape room "The Hangover" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: Just did the hangover room with my boyfriend and two other people. Awesome and super helpful staff. We definitely recommend it!!! Can't wait to go back and do the black site room!

room_title: Escape room "Cosmic Collision" by Time Travel Escapes in West Palm Beach
review: Amazing! This was my first escape room experience and our entire family had a great time start to finish. The level of detail and creativity was magical!

room_title: Escape room "Cosmic Collision" by Time Travel Escapes in West Palm Beach
review: Had a great time. clean environment, and friendly staff that kept a close eye on us incase we needed a hint. check them out.

room_title: Escape room "Cosmic Collision" by Time Travel Escapes in West Palm Beach
review: We did a team-builder in the Cosmic Collision room, and we have to tell all of the customers that this room was PHENOMENAL! The room was the perfect size for our group, everyone was able to participate and everything was just perfect. We had such a great time and can't wait to come back and do their other rooms. It's a must!

room_title: Escape room "The Tomb" by ESCAPE! Alaska in Anchorage
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Central Intelligence" by Down the Rabbit Hole in Tucson
review: We are big lovers of escape rooms, but this was easily the worst room we have ever tried. We did the CIA room, and it was so convoluted to the point that it was not even fun. We used all three of our clues and still couldn't progress without help. We are not stupid or incompetent, this room was just not designed well at all. I would not recommend this company to anyone. It was really disappointing too because we had some "first timers" with us, but the experience was so poor that they may never want to try another one. Very upset- total waste of money.

room_title: Escape room "Central Intelligence" by Down the Rabbit Hole in Tucson
review: We've done two of the rooms here and really enjoyed both experiences. We've done some rooms at other places as well, but we found some unique puzzles that we hadn't seen before. Our one quibble is having a gamemaster in the room with us. It's a little disconcerting (it's harder to argue over a puzzle solution with a stranger watching), but it's a minor point, and we look forward to trying more rooms (also trying to get a group together to do the Asylum...we are motivated to escape that room!).

room_title: Escape room "Central Intelligence" by Down the Rabbit Hole in Tucson
review: Friendly group. If you like brain teasers, you'll like this. We had a good time. Thanks "Down The Rabbit Hole".

room_title: Escape room "Central Intelligence" by Down the Rabbit Hole in Tucson
review: We've done two of the rooms by Down the Rabbit Hole, including Central Intelligence. We've done some rooms at other places as well, but we found some unique puzzles that we hadn't seen before, particularly while working on the Christmas room. Our one quibble is having a gamemaster in the room with us. It's a little disconcerting (it's harder to argue over a puzzle solution with a stranger watching), but it's a minor point, and we look forward to trying more rooms (also trying to get a group together to do the Asylum...we are motivated to escape that room!).

room_title: Escape room "Rightful Heir" by The Greatest Escape Games in Colorado Springs
review: We had an absolute blast working the room tonight. My daughter loved it as her birthday present. The staff worker was pleasant and the clues were fun! Will definitely return again!

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Lakeland in Lakeland
review: We did antidote. Not only is the room crazy entertaining but it was challenging and had us stumpped a bit.. overalll we had a blast. They were friendly, informative and complimentary trinkets to help remember yur time at this fantastic location!!! Soo worth it!!! Bring yur family. Yur kids!!! 5 minute friends!!! Hell bring a tinder date. Its sooo worth it!!

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Lakeland in Lakeland
review: I LOVED THIS ESCAPE ROOM. My boyfriend and I had gone to an escape room a year prior to this and we did not have fun. The room was very difficult and not put together well at all. We decided that we would try to go to another escape room and we found Escapology! We did the "Antidote" room and it was incredible! We felt like we were actually trying to find an antidote! The room was realistic and fun. It was set up so well! We're going to go again tomorrow :)

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Lakeland in Lakeland
review: We did the "Antidote" room with 2 adults, 2 teens and 2 4th graders. We escaped and had a great time doing it. The decor and theming is wonderfully immersive. I highly recommend Escapology.

room_title: Escape room "Locked Out!" by Unity Escape Rooms in Pomona
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Fah-king Space Grail" by Nightwalker Caverns Escape Rooms in San Diego
review: This was a great experience! It was my first time doing an escape room and they made it fun freaky!

room_title: Escape room "Fah-king Space Grail" by Nightwalker Caverns Escape Rooms in San Diego
review: First time visiting this place and all i can say it was AWEMAZING! Did the space escape room  with my boyfriend and i and it was super hard! You can tell that alot of hard work and cleverness was put into the escape room! Most definitely coming back to experience the other rooms !

room_title: Escape room "Fah-king Space Grail" by Nightwalker Caverns Escape Rooms in San Diego
review: We came here as a team building thing with some of my team teachers. We had so much fun. Having never done an escape room before, I was not sure what to expect. The puzzles were engaging and each unique. The story lines within each unique section of the puzzle kept our team active the entire time. We did the space themed room with 4 people and that felt about the right amount. I would highly recommend a trip to Nightwalker Caverns for any reason! I especially enjoyed that it is opened and operated as a family business. The father/daughter team were very passionate about the amount, variety, and complexity of puzzles. They're even traveled world-wide in their escape room quests. Again, highly, highly, highly recommend!!!

room_title: Escape room "Super Powers" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: We were looking for something to do with teens ranging from 12-18 for one night in Denver. The Epic Escape Game was the perfect solution. Stephen was a great game master and the puzzle was great fun. Thanks for a great night without kids focused on electronic devices

room_title: Escape room "Super Powers" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: We love this place! Last few times we've been in town visiting, the whole family will do an escape room and this place is exceptional. Great staff and great games! Highly recommended.

room_title: Escape room "Super Powers" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: This is one of my favorite puzzle rooms in town.  I have now done two of their rooms, and they are a good level of difficulty, with plenty of fun puzzles.  The production value isn't the highest (I have been to others that seem like they could be a real apartment that someone lives in), but I would much rather have high quality puzzles, and that is the case here.  We are going to keep heading back until we have done them all!

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: Last minute decision to try the escape room. We did the "playground" it was a lot of fun but definitely designed for more than four people. We would go again!

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: The experience was fun-filled, exciting, and thought-provoking. The playground is not to be underestimated. Although, it's a different type of escape room, it is still very much a fun-filled experience for the entire family.

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: We had a blast completing our “homework”. This was our first time doing an escape room. It was so much fun! We definitely want to try it again!

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: My wife, my teenage son, and myself recently did the playground. It was extremely fun, and required teamwork. I would definitely recommend this place.

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: This was my second time doing an escape room, and I was the only one in my party who’d done one before so I had an idea of what to do. We escaped with 3.40 minutes to spare. The game is fairly simple and they’ll give you a rundown on what your group should be looking for based on the theme. You’ll have 3 major hints that you can use throughout the game, and depending on location, you might have a screen to prompt occasional clues as time goes on or the attendant will be there for basic questions. You have the choice to rent out the whole room for your party or you can play with other bookers, which we did. All in all it was great fun! P.S. Always keep an eye out for the time and any hints!

room_title: Escape room "Missing" by Ozark Escape in Fayetteville (AR)
review: Took my staff to Ozark Escape for some team building and bonding. We did the "Blood Bath" room, and had a blast! The scenario was appropriately designed (creepy, but not too scary), the puzzles were creative, and our team managed to escape with four seconds left. The staff was clever and helpful, and we all left with the desire to do more puzzle rooms. I highly recommend Ozark Escape for any group wanting some fun. We'll be back!

room_title: Escape room "Missing" by Ozark Escape in Fayetteville (AR)
review: Our 13yr old's birthday "Blood Bath" party turned out awesome! The easy going staff was always right there to help us with our needs--they were great! We will definitely be back soon.

room_title: Escape room "Missing" by Ozark Escape in Fayetteville (AR)
review: My group had a GREAT time! The staff was very friendly and accommodating with our scheduling requirements. The puzzles were clever, challenging, engaging, and fun. On top of it all, the price was quite a bit cheaper than other places I've seen (granted, we had a large group, which helped). I'll be back!

room_title: Escape room "Missing" by Ozark Escape in Fayetteville (AR)
review: We came here to visit our boys in college and decided to try an escape room for the first time. The Blood Bath room was super challenging and a lot of fun. There is so much detail in everything from the props to the challenges and puzzles. We would definitely do it again!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Werewolf Village" by Two Bit Circus in Los Angeles
review: The funnest place in town! You can't find this level of high quality immersive tech and gaming experience anywhere! ❤😁😁🔥🔥🔥🔥💣💣💣

room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Werewolf Village" by Two Bit Circus in Los Angeles
review: Two bit circus a must go see in downtown LA

room_title: Escape room "Dead End" by Constant Evolution Escape Rooms in Cottonwood
review: They did such a great job preparing the rooms to make them challenging, but doable. So much fun. Can't wait to do it again when they get the new room.

room_title: Escape room "Dead End" by Constant Evolution Escape Rooms in Cottonwood
review: So fun! The puzzles are creative and challenging! We'll definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Dead End" by Constant Evolution Escape Rooms in Cottonwood
review: I brought three friends to the Double Crossed room for my birthday celebration. We had so much fun! The room was challenging but not too hard. We solved it just in time! I definitely recommend that anyone in the Northern Arizona area go check it out!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted Superheroes" by Code To Escape in Daytona Beach
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Espionage" by Escape Game Alaska in Juneau
review: I'm the Owner of Escape Game Alaska and regarding Julie's review, I just want to share this because I clearly remember the two of them as customers.
