review: None

room_title: Escape room "Cat Burglar" by Escape Artists in Orlando
review: Just finished Cat Burglar with my daughter. We had a blast! Looking forward to coming back for the other two rooms. Puzzles were appropriately challenging and fun. Well done guys!!

room_title: Escape room "Cat Burglar" by Escape Artists in Orlando
review: We did Cat Burglar. This is the first time I've ever turned to my teammates and stated that the room and puzzles were really cool, while in the middle of trying to escape. Going back soon.

room_title: Escape room "Cat Burglar" by Escape Artists in Orlando
review: My son and I had a great time there today. The Cat Burglar was a great experience. Very well thought out. Great props and accessories. Just enough guidance to get us through. We finished (partnered with another family) with 1:25 to spare! What a gem that was hiding right in front of us in downtown Sanford! This was my second escape room and my son's fourth. By far the best out of all that we've been too!

room_title: Escape room "Quest for the Throne" by Escape Games AZ in Phoenix
review: It was very fun! We really enjoyed the experience. The only thing I would change is the rooms need something else like background music or something to add more pressure to it besides the timer. But we will be back to try the other rooms! We did the quest for the throne.

room_title: Escape room "Quest for the Throne" by Escape Games AZ in Phoenix
review: Absolutely LOVED every minute. Engaging, fun, interactive and great decor which transports you to the era you're in, plus amazingly thought out clues! It was so much fun!!!. My teenage son wouldn't stop talking about It! Hats off to you for this amazing venue. I wish you the very best!! So much fun, I'm already thinking of a next date night!

room_title: Escape room "Quest for the Throne" by Escape Games AZ in Phoenix
review: We have done several escape rooms at other places and Quest for the Throne was by far the best one we have done. It was well thought out and had very and had very unique puzzles to work through. Great job

room_title: Escape room "Quest for the Throne" by Escape Games AZ in Phoenix
review: The Quest for the Throne room was lots of fun, had a decent level of challenge, but was reasonable enough to figure out most clues. The hints were helpful and timely. For the Groupon price, this room experience was a steal! Thanks for a fun family night out! We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerer’s Sanctum" by Omescape in San Francisco
review: My team and I went for our holiday party and everyone had a BLAST!! We played Sorcerer's Sanctum, which was quite challenging but definitely doable for experienced escape room players like ourselves. Puzzles were great and Matt was a phenomenal game master! Can't wait to try out some of their other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerer’s Sanctum" by Omescape in San Francisco
review: I came here as a team bonding exercise and I had an absolute blast. My group and I played the Sorcerers Sanctum game and it's was amazing. The design is incredible and, while it was quite difficult, we were able to escape! I would definitely recommend this place

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerer’s Sanctum" by Omescape in San Francisco
review: I've played all 3 rooms at this location (4 if you count the room they discontinued) and they are all good.  I was not a fan of the pirate / treasure themed room, but thankfully they replaced that with a room called Sorcerer's Sanctum, which is their best room yet.  The second best room is The Penitentiary and Omega is a distant third (but still enjoyable).   I would recommend the following head count for these rooms:Sorcerer's Sanctum: 6-10The Penitentiary: 4-6Room Omega: 3-5Sorcerer's Sanctum is the most satisfying of the rooms as the puzzles are straightforward and logical.  Penitentiary has one or two puzzles that make you roll your eyes when you finally get the answer because they just aren't quite fair.  Omega is a smaller room and probably better for people who are very analytical or math oriented.Overall, you really can't go wrong here.  I think this location has two of my all time favorite rooms and it even better than some of the pricier rooms in SF.

review: Go check it out this exciting, thrilling experience at Miami Quest Escape Rooms. You really gonna love it.

room_title: Escape room "Fort Knox" by Miami Quest Escape Rooms in Miami
review: Fun for the whole family. If you love puzzles and games you need to check this place out.

room_title: Escape room "Fort Knox" by Miami Quest Escape Rooms in Miami
review: So much fun! A unique and exciting adventure that keeps you guessing the whole way through!

room_title: Escape room "Fort Knox" by Miami Quest Escape Rooms in Miami
review: This was such an awesome place to visit, I can't wait to go back and try the other escape rooms...sending all my friends and family there for the great experience !

room_title: Escape room "Fort Knox" by Miami Quest Escape Rooms in Miami

room_title: Escape room "Fort Knox" by Miami Quest Escape Rooms in Miami
review: I wasn't sure what expect but it was the coolest place! High energy! Definitely worth visiting! And he offers free snacks and beer!

room_title: Escape room "The Initiative" by Elm City Escape in New Haven
review: Tried out the Initiative room at the Elm city escape room with 3 of my friends. We walked into the lobby, they explained the rules to us and then led us to the room. Was worried about trying to solve it without the maximum number of people but ended up alright since the group I was with were pretty good with puzzles. It was a fun time, there were 2 puzzles that I thought were really clever, and I got to make a big mess of the room. Will probably try the other room when it is ready.

room_title: Escape room "The Initiative" by Elm City Escape in New Haven
review: I've done a few rooms before, and The Initiative was as good as any rooms in the city. The game was immersive, the puzzles were cohesive, and most importantly, the experience was aptly challenging. Everyone in my group of 4 had a great time. The puzzles where plentiful and solving them require a good sense of deductive reasoning and critical thinking.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Maui Escape Rooms in Maui
review: What an amazing escape room! Our family broke out of jail with over 23 minutes to spare. This place is absolutely amazing and worth every penny. Thank you so much for a great experience!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Maui Escape Rooms in Maui
review: We LOVED Maui escape rooms. What a fun way to spend your afternoon doing something a little bit different. The whole set design was so creative and authentic. A challenging experience full of surprises! I would definitely recommend this activity!! Thank you for a super fun birthday party

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Maui Escape Rooms in Maui
review: This was worth the money. From when you check in - friendly, comfortable staff. We did the jail break it was very fun. Good job guys

room_title: Escape room "Pawn Shop" by ESCAPE:chandler in Phoenix
review: I've been to a couple of escape rooms, and really I've been lucky enough to have a great time at all of them, and this one is no exception.  I did their "Pawn Shop" room, which was lots of fun and I would consider pretty difficult - but in fairness most of the difficulty came from us overthinking the problems.  ;)  It's run by a husband and wife that are very passionate about it - and even go so far as to make the different gadgets in the rooms - any place that casually mentions doing things with Arduino's gets an automatic bonus from me.Overall a great location and a great place to take a date, family or company to do something a bit more memorable an interactive than just going out for drinks or a movie.  Can't wait to go try their next one...

room_title: Escape room "Pawn Shop" by ESCAPE:chandler in Phoenix
review: Our family had a birthday party here.. it was so much fun!! It was my first time at an escape room. The owners were a blast and really made the night fun. We did the Pawn shop room and barely made it out with seconds to spare. We can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "Pawn Shop" by ESCAPE:chandler in Phoenix
review: Me, my wife and two of our family members experienced ESCAPE: Chandler's first room "Pawn Shop" and we absolutely loved it! The theme was fun and the puzzles were awesome! Thank you ESCAPE: Chandler for the amazing experience and we will be back when you all have new rooms open soon!

room_title: Escape room "Night at the Museum" by Escape Artist DC in Washington, D.C.

room_title: Escape room "Night at the Museum" by Escape Artist DC in Washington, D.C.
review: Thank you so much for making my engagement possible. I am beyond amazed at how you were able to customize the experience just for us. That truly helped it become a day we shall never forget. It was an honor working with you. The communication and planning efforts was superb. It allowed me to focus on other pieces of the engagement. We will be returning here as now we have an unforgettable memory tied to an unforgettable place. I will keep highly recommending Escape Artist DC to everyone I know. Thank you for everything you have done for us.

room_title: Escape room "Night at the Museum" by Escape Artist DC in Washington, D.C.
review: AWESOME place and lovely decor! Thanks Milind for allowing us to Think Outside The Box! We had a great time! We will be returning to check out the other room

room_title: Escape room "Night at the Museum" by Escape Artist DC in Washington, D.C.

The staff still allowed us in although they were not open yet Great idea for a date. I defiantly want to come again for the next chapter! P.S Could you please post Team Archer pictures? Greatly appreciated!

room_title: Escape room "Night at the Museum" by Escape Artist DC in Washington, D.C.
review: It was a lot of fun and made us think. Very cool way to spend time with friends.

room_title: Escape room "The President's Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Orlando
review: I thought this was very well done. We were in the President’s Bunker. We made it out (and saved the world btw) but just barely! I would definitely go again to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The President's Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Orlando
review: We did The Bunker Room and had a great time! It was challenging but not impossible. Kids ages 19,17,16&14. Everyone enjoyed! Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "The President's Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Orlando
review: We had so much fun visiting this escape room! It's conveniently located downtown between Harp and Celt pub and Magnolia. Mather and Celine are across the street. We did the President's Bunker with was the hardest room, but we made it out in 51 minutes! It was very cool that doing one thing can open a box or a door or a wall, surprisingly very well done. I would come back again to do another room!

room_title: Escape room "Mind-Boggling" by American Escape Rooms in Orlando
review: If you like a billion locks and keys one after the other, then this is the place for you. Beware of faulty tools. We spent around 10-15 minutes on a single lock. We were extremely confused why it wouldn’t open! Come to find out that the lock was broken!  We did not get our time back And made us question every lock we came across (which were ALOT). The second room we encountered also had a wonky tool that wouldn’t work properly and that also took us around 10-15 minutes to move on. This was to the point we were asked if we needed someone to come in. It is unfortunate because the concepts were cool and interesting and the workers were enthusiastic and friendly. After 2 encounters with a faulty item, it is safe to say we will not be going back here.

room_title: Escape room "Mind-Boggling" by American Escape Rooms in Orlando
review: We escaped from Mind Boggling! It was fun and challenging. The staff was very nice. We will definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "Mind-Boggling" by American Escape Rooms in Orlando
review: Took my family visiting from Tennessee to try the Mind-boggling room tonight. We all had a great time. The room was challenging, but even my 8-year-old niece was able to participate and had a great time. We made it out with 27 seconds to spare. Hope to go back send try another room soon.

room_title: Escape room "Keeper of the Light" by Mystified - Escape Room Adventures in Stonington
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Perfumer" by Quest Room in Los Angeles
review: Oh yeah, it's just incredible! The first quest I played here in LA. It's a damn interesting game, very high quality, with excellent sound and great scenery. If you never played quests - you need to visit here. But if you are an experienced player, you should look at how the cool guys are doing a real cool room!

room_title: Escape room "Perfumer" by Quest Room in Los Angeles
review: This is only my second escape room experience BUT I can tell already that all other ones are going to pale in comparison now. I do think "quest room" is more apt because the focus is more on a real story solving a real problem and not simply just escaping. The attention to detail in the rooms and the storyline is so great. I tried the perfume room but I'd definitely go back to try the others in a heartbeat!

room_title: Escape room "Perfumer" by Quest Room in Los Angeles
review: Perfumer was awesome! It was my first escape room experience and it was beyond amazing! I didn't know what to expect and was a little anxious going in but once we entered, I was hooked. The story is so interesting and the escape room was so intricate and well designed. Loved it and I want t o go back to try out the others!

room_title: Escape room "The Wizard's Secret" by Lock City Escape Games in Carrollton
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Kraken Casino" by Escape Room Napa in Rohnert Park
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Prison" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: It was so much fun. Really well done!! I can't wait to do another of their rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Prison" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Refreshing fun for the curious kid in me! Somewhat challenging, but we made it out of the castle room in ~40 minutes. I can't wait to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Prison" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Had a great time! Challenging and fun at the same time! The only thing I can tell you, Don't overthink it!

room_title: Escape room "Prison" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: This was a phenomenal experience. I had so much fun with my family it brought us together, the clues and awesome interactive objects and puzzles within the rooms were amazing! We had to get out of three prison cells and there are clues everywhere

room_title: Escape room "Prison" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We had so much fun! Great staff, the room was more fun than we even expected. We're already planning to go back and try another room.

room_title: Escape room "Prison" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Amazing and fun experience!! If you love adventure, want to spent great time with friends, and you are looking for unique entertaining experience, - this place is for you. The design of the maze room makes you feel as if you were really locked in a medieval castle. The puzzles keep you challenged all the time. Every time you find a new hint, you feel truly excited! And when you finally unlock the very last door, and step out of "prison", you feel like popping a bottle of champagne.

room_title: Escape room "Prison" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Prison - The weak part of this room was certain puzzles could be better camouflaged to blend into the environment better, with one of the puzzles that could be subjective, which slowed our group down. Otherwise, this was an excellent and very fun room. We attempted to do something using our mouths which was the wrong way to go at it, but made us all laughed either way. Loved starting off in different prison cells and working together to escape. Both the Motel and Prison are located in the same location.

room_title: Escape room "Enchanted Zombie Apocalypse" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: I went with a group of 5 to Wonderland with TJ as our guide. He was amazing and made the experience very fun!

room_title: Escape room "Enchanted Zombie Apocalypse" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: This was my second escape room and it was very well done. It was not too difficult to the point where it felt impossible, but was defintely difficult enough to have to use hints. Tj was our gamemaster and did an amazing job with the introduction, hints, and overall game experience.

room_title: Escape room "Enchanted Zombie Apocalypse" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: This was my first ever Escape the Room challenge. And we escaped! After paranoia Quest Atlanta couple others and paranoia Quest is definitely at the top of the chart if you haven't tried it definitely put it on your bucket list

room_title: Escape room "Enchanted Zombie Apocalypse" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: We are vacationing in Georgia and love doing escape rooms wherever we go, and we have to rank Paranoia Quest as one of the top contenders. The two of us did the Zombie Apocalypse room with another couple that we did not know. First of all, just walking into the building you can tell that they put a lot of thought into the design, the lobby was cool, and they had puzzles for you to do while you waited. Obviously I can't give much away about the room itself, but the attention they put into decorations was great. I've been to a few escape rooms that were fun, but they were really just a plain room with puzzles in it.In the end we got out around 55 minutes! This is the first time we've done one with people we didn't know, but it was really no different, and we had just as much fun and got to meet some new people. Would definitely go back!

room_title: Escape room "Enchanted Zombie Apocalypse" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: Well......WE DIED! Haha It was awesome!   We came in to Atlanta for a short time and seen this opportunity for something to do while we were here, so so glad we took the time to do this!  We had a great time with the people we were paired with and truly had an enjoyable time!  It was a bit hard,  teamwork is definitely the key.  Staff was awesome as well.  If you have time and looking for some fun and brain stimulation this is the place to go for sure!  Will be back paranoia quest. ...will be back! :)

room_title: Escape room "Enchanted Zombie Apocalypse" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: Some of the clues weren't put back after the group before us, so when we tried to follow the clues, we were confused and had to call back a few times. Never got an apology for it. I would do it again, but I would ask if the clues are all in place before you begin.

room_title: Escape room "Enchanted Zombie Apocalypse" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: How many nurses does it take to unlock a door?? More than 7 because it took is forever to get it!!!! We had a fantastic time it was exciting is very challenging. I highly recommend this adventure for everyone..... the more, the scarier!

room_title: Escape room "Enchanted Zombie Apocalypse" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: Great game! I did the Murder Mystery room for my 22nd Birthday. It was a great bonding experience for my friends and myself.  It was very fun and very unique.

room_title: Escape room "Enchanted Zombie Apocalypse" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: Great idea for team building or family groups. Challenging and engaging for each person in our group which ranged from age 10 to 46. Would recommend & now interested to do more of these type activities!

room_title: Escape room "Enchanted Zombie Apocalypse" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: We had so much fun during Zombie Apocalypse at Paranoia Quest in Atlanta. This game was fun, challenging, and exciting. The way the rooms are designed makes the story-line feel realistic -- the environment is fully immersive and created a sense of drama. I will be booking with Paranoia Quest again soon!

room_title: Escape room "Enchanted Zombie Apocalypse" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: This was an absolutely creative and innovative way to celebrate my adult daughters' birthday ! Everyone in the group was able to contribute and have a great time, the clues were challenging the staff was excellent and the escape was GREAT ! This is an activity we plan to do again in the future...collecting those bands !

room_title: Escape room "Enchanted Zombie Apocalypse" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: Zombie Apocalypse Escape the Room was ultimate fun. I visited with my family. In the end, we got gassed and died... But were told we were only one step away from victory. I cannot wait to return. I'm ready to solve more mysteries.

room_title: Escape room "Enchanted Zombie Apocalypse" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: This is a very awesome place and we actually won the game . I was scared we wouldn't but still we had so much fun I plan to do the other quests as well !!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Cells" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Our kids did the Kings treasure for their first escape and thoroughly enjoyed every bit of it! We moved into the competition rooms next!

room_title: Escape room "The Cells" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: This location is amazing. They have a very large room - the biggest I have ever seen! The puzzles and set design were perfect! the rooms are not tech heavy by any means but have a good mix and when there isn't any, the puzzles and theme are so well designed you don't even notice!

room_title: Escape room "The Cells" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: We were greeted warmly, and provided the 'rules' of the Prisoner Cells. The facility is beautiful! The details in the props and clues were amazing. We had a great time and can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "The Cells" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: My wife and I have done a number of escape rooms over the past few years. We did "The Cells" and had a great time. Lots of great puzzles and great ambiance. We are planning to return and do some of the other rooms there

room_title: Escape room "The Cells" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: This was by far the best escape room we’ve been to in Marietta. The hosts were excellent and the rooms were great and very detailed. Will definitely be going back with friends.

room_title: Escape room "The City Morgue" by Xtreme Escape Game in Marco Island
review: Loved our experience at Xtreme Escape. We did the Cell Block room and successfully escaped. It was challenging and fun. Howie was great, very personable and helpful. We had 7 in our group - a mix of teens, 20s, 40s and 50s and fun was had by all. Will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "The City Morgue" by Xtreme Escape Game in Marco Island
review: These Escape Room Games have recently gained popularity around the country and all over the world, so I had to see what all the buzz was about. When my friends and I walked into Cell Block M, we were excited and freaked out at the same time. Slowly, we figured out one clue after another and luckily made it out just in time! What a thrill!This is definitely an activity for all ages. Whether it's for families, group of friends or coworkers, everyone will surely enjoy! I'm glad there's finally one in Southwest Florida! So instead of going to the usual: movies, mini golf, or the beach... Check this place out!Thank you to the staff for being so friendly, lively and accommodating!

room_title: Escape room "The City Morgue" by Xtreme Escape Game in Marco Island
review: These Escape Room Games have recently gained popularity around the country and all over the world, so I had to see what all the buzz was about. When my friends and I walked into Cell Block M, we were excited and freaked out at the same time. Slowly, we figured out one clue after another and luckily made it out just in time! What a thrill!This is definitely an activity for all ages. Whether it's for families, group of friends or coworkers, everyone will surely enjoy! I'm glad there's finally one in Southwest Florida! So instead of going to the usual: movies, mini golf, or the beach... Check this place out!Thank you to the staff for being so friendly, lively and accommodating!

room_title: Escape room "The City Morgue" by Xtreme Escape Game in Marco Island
review: This was the best time ever. Worth the 45 minute drive we did to get there. Very challenging and the owners are amazing. We can't wait to do it again! Thank you Xtreme Escape for not judging our crazy escape and for a wonderful time!

room_title: Escape room "The City Morgue" by Xtreme Escape Game in Marco Island
review: You guys! This game is amazing! This is perfect for kids and adults trying to have a fun time and escape the Florida heat for a while. It's more challenging than you would expect, which makes it all the more better. I'm going to recommend this to my friends, family, and coworkers because I know that this game will not disappoint!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by Tampa Bay Escape Room in Tampa
review: Fun, nice staff and just the right amount of difficulty. We did the kidnap escape. My nieces also really enjoyed it! What a great family fun time! Would definitely try one of the other rooms and do this again!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by Tampa Bay Escape Room in Tampa
review: I went with a group of 5 family members and we had a great time in the Kidnapped room. I would definitely recommend them for anyone looking for an exciting, out of the norm group outing! Our game master Bridget was awesome and took great care of us. The room was definitely challenging and felt like an accomplishment when we "escaped".

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by Tampa Bay Escape Room in Tampa
review: It was my birthday and my first time doing an escape room. It was the best and most fun ever! I did the Kidnapped room with my cousins and best friend. The staff was awesome the place was so clean and neat and it was just an all around unforgettable experience!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Montgomery in Montgomery
review: I had such a great time completing the Casino challenge! The staff and the actual room were both amazing. Great experience, I highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Montgomery in Montgomery
review: Had a great time doing my third room at Breakout Montgomery. Tony was a fantastic game master and the Casino game was incredibly well done. If you are looking for a great way to spend an afternoon or evening with friends, coworkers, family, or strangers, I highly recommend Breakout. Lots of fun surprises in the rooms and fantastic people.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Montgomery in Montgomery
review: I had an awesome time playing "Operation: Casino". It was very fun and I had amazing people in the room with me. I would definitely recommend for other couples looking for something exciting and different to do.

room_title: Escape room "Santa's Naughty List" by Escape Room Breckenridge in Breckenridge
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Hideout" by Escape Rooms Unlocked in Sarasota
review: It was an amazing experience. It was challenging but great.

room_title: Escape room "The Hideout" by Escape Rooms Unlocked in Sarasota
review: Everything about Escape Rooms Unlocked is a great experience. The rooms are addictive for puzzle lovers like myself and a combination of challenging but family friendly (I have done one of them with a 6 year old). Besides the rooms, the staff is a huge reason why we keep coming back- they are friendly, knowledgeable and accommodating. So thankful to have a recreational gem like this in Charlotte County/ North Port!

room_title: Escape room "The Hideout" by Escape Rooms Unlocked in Sarasota
review: We ABSOLUTELY LOVE Escape Rooms Unlocked! We have done all their rooms and we were excited to do the new one-- The Hideout. It was awesome and just what we expected from this wonderful business-- they do rooms that flow nicely and give you a great challenge! Us 3 escaped with 11 minutes left-- the record for this new room! We are honored! Keep up the great job ERU... we'll be waiting for your next awesome room!

room_title: Escape room "Crucifixus" by Escape Bradenton in Sarasota
review: This was our second time and it was scary awesome. We can't wait to do the rest of the rooms. Try it! You'll get hooked and want to do them all.

room_title: Escape room "Crucifixus" by Escape Bradenton in Sarasota
review: Great first experience with the family. Highly recommend you check this place out. Crucifixus was equally terrifying and fun!! The staff and owner were amazing!

room_title: Escape room "Crucifixus" by Escape Bradenton in Sarasota
review: So friendly and accommodating! Lovely people. Did the Crucifixus room. TERRIFYING! Loved it!

room_title: Escape room "Crucifixus" by Escape Bradenton in Sarasota
review: The 5 of us were escape room newbies and we had a lot of fun (and a few scares) during our time in Crucifixes. With only 2 minutes remaining, we successfully escaped and then had a few laughs with the great staff about our group's antics.

room_title: Escape room "Crucifixus" by Escape Bradenton in Sarasota
review: We had so much fun with the drug bust that we had to go back for Crucifixus. You guys are awesome and we had a blast. Thanks for the laughs and for scaring the crap outta our whole crew!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Time Travel Lab" by Quadra Escape in San Jose
review: This was our first escape room, but it won't be our last!  We weren't sure what to expect and our group of 6 adults, 3 teen girls and a 10 year old boy had a great time figuring out what to next.  Everyone enjoyed this activity.  This is a very manual room and an "intern" stays in the room with you, but there are lots of puzzles so definitely good for large groups.  We were close, probably about 3-5 minutes more and we would have solved it completely.  We've already got plans to do several more this year, but this one is great for large groups and first timers!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Time Travel Lab" by Quadra Escape in San Jose
review: These games are SO much fun! I just played my fourth game with friends and family and for the first time, we completed it!! These games would be excellent team-building events for employees because the only way to win is to use the diverse strengths among the team. The games put on by SCRAP Entertainment are flawless and very professionally done. Go do this, you won't regret it!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Time Travel Lab" by Quadra Escape in San Jose
review: My husband and I had a blast! We ended up being in it with a great group of strangers, which was awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Time Travel Lab" by Quadra Escape in San Jose
review: This was my first escape game so I wasn't 100% sure what to expect. It really is so much fun! The puzzles are very clever, kind of in the style of a Professor Layton game though obviously it's in the real word. I think this adds to the excitement as you're physically moving around and manipulating objects with the other players. One thing I was a little worried about was we were in a time slot with one other group. This ended up being really fun though, as the game is well set up for collaboration. I'd say the difficulty is just about perfect, as we really were "SO CLOSE!" Also, the staff are delightful. I can't wait to try another Real Escape Game!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Time Travel Lab" by Quadra Escape in San Jose
review: I absolutely love attempting the escape rooms here! They're super well organised, and have amazing puzzles. Every time I'm visiting from Australia I make sure to come by - can't wait for the prison break one to start! Yesterday I did the Time Travel Lab with a group of people I didn't know, because all my local friends had already completed that room - it was fine even though I only knew myself, so if you can't find anyone to go with, just book in with some randos!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Time Travel Lab" by Quadra Escape in San Jose
review: It was a blast. Our group missed it by about five minutes; more hints should be shouted by the staff or the fox. Fifteen percent is too low a number. It means they are too hard, especially if those in the room haven't done any game like this before. Would love to see a children's one happen, maybe based on (non brand name) Minecraft or Greek mythology. The history of the game in Japan and Hungary are fascinating. Will recommend to friends.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Time Travel Lab" by Quadra Escape in San Jose
review: I had so much fun. I want to do it again with the new room. A little pricey, but still worth it.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Time Travel Lab" by Quadra Escape in San Jose
review: The game was so exciting! Fun, difficult puzzles with interesting ways to solve them.

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Crisis" by American Escape Rooms in Orlando
review: This was my first Escape Room experience and I'm sad I waited so long to try one! The Cold War room was awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Crisis" by American Escape Rooms in Orlando
review: We had a good time doing Cold War Crisis. This was our first escape room and apparently we picked the hardest room. It was a little hairy at the end. We only used 3 clues and stopped the bomb with 11:52 left on our clock. We were told we were the best of the week. Can't wait to try another one.

room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy" by Off The Couch Games in San Jose
review: Did the conspiracy escape room. It has well done puzzles. Also the waiting room has some nice games and puzzles too. So get there early.

room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy" by Off The Couch Games in San Jose
review: We did conspiracy and it was super fun and challenging, the staff was wonderful and it sounds like they are thinking of some really great ideas for future rooms. Definitely have to try everything they have in the future

room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy" by Off The Couch Games in San Jose
review: Just did my first escape room for my birthday. We did "conspiracy" and our game master, Jeremy was fun and really helpful. The 6 of us had a great time and we (with a lot of help) ESCAPED!!

room_title: Escape room "The Stolen Relic" by Themescape Escape Rooms in Denver
review: Relic was a great game and we had excellent hosts.  Very challenging and unique!   Definitely recommend and will return for the other game.    Great find.

room_title: Escape room "The Stolen Relic" by Themescape Escape Rooms in Denver
review: So much fun. We did the room with the relic. Solid design. Challenging and definitely worth going.

room_title: Escape room "The Stolen Relic" by Themescape Escape Rooms in Denver
review: Had a blast here. Did the "Relic" room. Great storyline with the perfect amount challenge!

room_title: Escape room "The Cruise Ship" by Locked In Stuart in West Palm Beach
review: Escaped the cruise room. Had 8 people. May have been a few too many when we realized the clues were sequential. Had a great time though. Would prefer if the staff did not come in the room to give clues. Over the intercom much more preferred!

room_title: Escape room "The Cruise Ship" by Locked In Stuart in West Palm Beach
review: Had a great time. Did the CRUISE room. One of the things you need to do is very finicky. Won't give it away but we were doing for easily 5 min before employee came in and did something to get us next clue. They probably need to adjust it. All I'll say is you need a steady hand!

room_title: Escape room "The Cruise Ship" by Locked In Stuart in West Palm Beach
review: Cruise room was great. Only one room though. But still fun!!

room_title: Escape room "Dean's Diner Disaster" by Escape Rooms Unlocked in Fort Myers
review: We did Deans diner room and it was a blast. I went with my people 20 to 50+ and even my dad who usually stays home while the rest of us go off thought it was fun. We were all able to figure out different clues and work together to finish the mission.

room_title: Escape room "Dean's Diner Disaster" by Escape Rooms Unlocked in Fort Myers
review: Three out of 4 of us had never done an escape room. We found Dean's Diner to be perfect for us newbies as we had no idea what to expect. The room had enough challenge, but was solvable with team work. The staff was very helpful and friendly and I would recommend this activity for a group of all ages.

room_title: Escape room "Dean's Diner Disaster" by Escape Rooms Unlocked in Fort Myers
review: We had never done this before so we kind of came into it blind. Group of 3 of us did Dean's Disaster room. We did not finish we ran out of time. If we probably had about another 30 minutes we might have been able. He told us we were about 60 to 70 percent complete. We had to use all 3 clues. I don't want to give away anything from the room, so I will just say we had a great time and will be doing this again soon. Staff is very helpful and explains everything.

room_title: Escape room "The Burning Castle" by Time to Escape in Denver
review: I have done two of the escape rooms at this location, and both times I've had a blast! I love the details and knowing how much time was put into making everything feel so authentic. You'll have a great time at Time to Escape!

room_title: Escape room "The Burning Castle" by Time to Escape in Denver
review: Time to Escape offers games that use multiple rooms and stand out for their ability to transcend time through immersive design. The puzzles are challenging but not impossible to crack, they fit the theme well, and they keep you running back and forth between rooms for an active, engaging experience. When I played their time-traveling game"80's Flashback," I stepped into a bedroom with vintage teal and green carpet and realized we'd be using a boombox to play an actual cassette tape for a clue. It felt totally tubular to be sleuthing our way through the 80's. Time To Escape's other game transported me to 15th century Transylvania where I solved my way through the castle of Vlad the Impaler. This was the first time I'd ever used scent to solve a puzzle, or encountered props as authentic and unusual as a life size armor statue and historically accurate map of Romania.

room_title: Escape room "The Burning Castle" by Time to Escape in Denver
review: We had a great time at Time to Escape! The "burning castle" is just the right amount of spooky and the puzzles fit together really well. Made it out just in time!

room_title: Escape room "Dracula Experience" by Prescott Escape Room in Prescott
review: Did this for a team builder! So fun! Totally worth the time and the clues make you think.

room_title: Escape room "Dracula Experience" by Prescott Escape Room in Prescott
review: My wife and I had a great time here. I highly recommend this! It was challenging and very enjoyable.

room_title: Escape room "Dracula Experience" by Prescott Escape Room in Prescott
review: This was one of the most memorable things we have done as a family. The staff were friendly and we had a BLAST. The room was challenging but not so hard that you could become discouraged. Definitely telling my friends and returning for their new room soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Garage" by Epic Escape Game in Grand Junction
review: This was a total blast! We went last night and completed the Hunted room with seven minutes to spare. We had the best time and cannot wait to go back and do more rooms! I would definitely recommend the Hunted Cabin room it was very well put together and was surprising you all the way to the end of how everything went together.

room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Garage" by Epic Escape Game in Grand Junction
review: Had a great time. Played "The Hunted" game. The staff was friendly. Really looking forward to trying out the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Garage" by Epic Escape Game in Grand Junction
review: We had so much fun last night! Our group had a big age range and everyone had a blast! Cant wait to go back and try the other rooms! We barely escaped the hunted with 27 seconds left!

room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Garage" by Epic Escape Game in Grand Junction
review: We had an absolute blast doing The Hunted escape room! The staff was super friendly and this is a great way to spend some time with friends and work together! Everything was so well thought out! I can't wait to go again!

room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Garage" by Epic Escape Game in Grand Junction
review: My wife and I went for our anniversary with a couple friends. We did the hunted cabin and it was a very fun time! It was super hard and we barely made it out with 3min to spare! We will definitely be back for another room!

room_title: Escape room "Paranormal Mystery of Breckenridge" by Mountain Time Escape Rooms in Breckenridge
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerer's Secret" by Mastermind Escape Games in Jacksonville
review: We had so much fun playing Sorcerer's Secret! The puzzles were very clever, the room theme was amazing and the staff were extremely friendly and so much fun. If you're looking to do an escape room in Jacksonville, FL be sure to start here!

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerer's Secret" by Mastermind Escape Games in Jacksonville
review: Tons of fun! We did the sorcerer's secret and I really enjoyed the puzzles we had to crack. A great way to spend an afternoon.

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerer's Secret" by Mastermind Escape Games in Jacksonville
review: We did the Sorcerer's Secret room a had a lot of fun! Challenging without being impossible. Staff was very nice and helpful. I wanted to do another room immediately after escaping with 13 minutes to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerer's Secret" by Mastermind Escape Games in Jacksonville
review: Fun team effort in the Sorcerer room. We escaped in the nick of time!

room_title: Escape room " Castle Escape" by Escape Zone 60 in Panama City
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Exit Protocol" by SUBScape Games in San Diego
review: The last room we did was Exit Protocol.  We were told that this was the hardest room they had, and before we played, there were only 3 teams out of 25 that completed this room.  There is a lot to do in this room.  This is a great room for a diverse team.  There's something for everyone to do (puzzle people, people who are good at searching for things, etc).  It was definitely the most challenging out of the three we played.  We required 2 hints.  We did have an issue with one puzzle in the room.  Thankfully, our game master came into our room, helped us out, and gave us 5 extra minutes for our troubles, which was lucky because I believe we had 5 minutes remaining on our timer.

room_title: Escape room "Exit Protocol" by SUBScape Games in San Diego
review: Great escape room experience! My kids took friends to SUBScape and went through the Exit Protocol experience. They were talking about it for hours after it was over as they had a great time. The place was nice, clean, and the staff we're very attentive. Was the perfect birthday experience for teens!

room_title: Escape room "Baker Street Mystery" by Chico Escape Rooms in Chico
review: So fun! We solved the baker street mystery, definitely coming back

room_title: Escape room "Baker Street Mystery" by Chico Escape Rooms in Chico
review: Just completed Baker Street and had a blast!!! Missed solving it by just seconds and still had a great time.

room_title: Escape room "Baker Street Mystery" by Chico Escape Rooms in Chico
review: Such a great time, did the Baker Street Room for my boyfriend's birthday, perfect event and a we had a blast figuring out the puzzles. Look forward to completing another room soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Dark Room" by ROOM 5280 in Denver
review: My family and I had a blast at the Dark Room! Thanks for a fun time!

room_title: Escape room "The Dark Room" by ROOM 5280 in Denver
review: We had a team of 6 in the Dark Room! We had more than 7 mins left and we escaped! I highly recommend this place if you want to have an amazing experience with friends and family! I can't wait to go again!

room_title: Escape room "The Dark Room" by ROOM 5280 in Denver
review: First experience at this location and it will not be my last. The room we completed was The Dark Room, this room offered a twist to the escape room experience that was both fun and unique. I can't wait to be back and complete the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Dark Room" by ROOM 5280 in Denver
review: Did the Dark Room with my bf and his parents. It was fun, challenging, a great escape room concept, and told a good story. We will definitely be back to try out Sherlock.

room_title: Escape room "The Dark Room" by ROOM 5280 in Denver
review: From Denver but have lived out of state for 10+ years. Back visiting friends and picked this to do before dinner and have some fun. So glad we did! We did the dark room and it was a blast. Not scary, but added that extra element of difficulty. 100% would recommend this place.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break 2.0" by Escape Modesto in Modesto
review: Our group had a blast at Escape Modesto! So fun, and we were so close to escaping from prison!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break 2.0" by Escape Modesto in Modesto
review: Such a great experience with my coworkers yesterday evening escaping from Prison Break with 6 minutes left! It was a great team building experience, and I look forward to trying out the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break 2.0" by Escape Modesto in Modesto
review: The Jail Break Room was challenging and encouraged our group of ten to work together as a team to try to break the code.  The room was very well designed and made you feel as if you were in a real jail cell and booking area. We can't wait to go back and try to escape the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break 2.0" by Escape Modesto in Modesto
review: I Love Escape Modesto! My team was the first team EVER to escape from the Prison Break room and we had a blast!!! There were three separate groups that came together as a group of 9. We used our individual strengths to complete the escape with 10 minutes to spare! Everyone should come here, you won't be disappointed. The staff is super friendly and they are there to show you a great time. Cant wait to go back and try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Nate's Motel" by Fantasy Escapes in Tampa
review: Just did Nate's Motel for my birthday and LOVED it!! Clues were great. Definitely put our 6 brains to work! Had to have a few assists, but made it out before our time was up! We will definitely be back for another round!!

room_title: Escape room "Nate's Motel" by Fantasy Escapes in Tampa
review: The family and I had a great time!! We did Nate’s Motel. The puzzles were challenging and enjoyable. They encouraged us to combine our forces into working together!! We made it out with 8 minutes and 23 seconds to spare!! We went for our youngest’ birthday and will be back to challenge us again soon!!

room_title: Escape room "Nate's Motel" by Fantasy Escapes in Tampa
review: We did the Nate's Motel room and loved it! It was very creative, challenging, and just the right amount of creepy that we wanted. We loved that our game master watched us and didn't give us clues until he knew that we REALLY needed them. His name was Caleb and he was fantastic!! We can't wait to check out the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Convicted" by One Way Out Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: We are repeat visitors. We select a different room each time. This time was Convicted and it was a blast. It's awesome and super challenging. Not for the faint of heart. Keep up the awesomeness.

room_title: Escape room "Convicted" by One Way Out Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: Every time we visit One Way Out, we have such a great time! The rooms are exciting, the puzzles are unique and fun, and the staff is the best around! Everyone is so friendly and enthusiastic about escape rooms which makes your experience even better! Do all of the rooms, but Convicted is a challenging necessity!

room_title: Escape room "Convicted" by One Way Out Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: We will definitely be back to try the other rooms. Only one in our group had previous experience with Escape Rooms but we were ambitious. We totally underestimated the difficulty of Convicted. Very well recommended.

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Zone 60 in Pensacola
review: Just did the Asylum escape room. Didn't get out but it was a lot of fun, a little creepy. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who wants an amazing challenge. It derserves more than just 5 stars.

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Zone 60 in Pensacola
review: The Asylum was my first escape room and it was a blast! Many challenging puzzles but our group escaped. Christopher did an amazing job running the experience. Amazing birthday party and met some really nice people.

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Zone 60 in Pensacola
review: We took my SIL to "The Asylum" to celebrate her 50th birthday. We had a blast! We were punching in codes to escape when we ran out of time. It had some very interesting puzzles to solve and we were "shocked" by some,lol! I will go back again.

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Zone 60 in Pensacola
review: Asylum was fun and challenging. Asa was great with just enough help to keep us from going crazy and having to stay! Well done room with a variety of puzzles to really make you think and work for it. Will be back to try their other room for sure.

room_title: Escape room "Palace of Destiny" by Palace Games in San Francisco
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Mountain Ski Lodge" by Mountain Room Escapes in Big Bear City
review: Great for good family fun! Friendly staff and easy to get to. Had lots of fun with a 16 and a 11-year-old. Can't wait to come back again for some more fun!

room_title: Escape room "Mountain Ski Lodge" by Mountain Room Escapes in Big Bear City
review: Excellent fun, we had such a blast! I had done many other escape rooms in the LA area, but this was the first one for the other two people in our group. At the end, everyone was all smiles at the rush of puzzle solving and discovery. We plan on returning soon to do other rooms coming soon. Thanks again!

room_title: Escape room "Mountain Ski Lodge" by Mountain Room Escapes in Big Bear City
review: We have done around 10 escape rooms and finally made the trip from Inland Empire to check this one out. The owner is an enthusiast and it definitely shows in the thoughtfulness and creativity of the puzzles. Joan was friendly and accommodating when we got stuck in traffic. No spoilers but there's a unique element of fun for the early finishers. Worth the beautiful drive!

room_title: Escape room "Mountain Ski Lodge" by Mountain Room Escapes in Big Bear City
review: This was our first escape room experience. Had a great time with my wife and three kids (age 15, 13, 10). The staff was attentive and friendly and the theme of the escape room was perfect for the being up in the mountains. We are glad that we escaped, and the kids said it was the highlight of our short summer getaway!

room_title: Escape room "Mountain Ski Lodge" by Mountain Room Escapes in Big Bear City
review: We went as a group of eight with ages ranging from my 76 y.o in-laws to my wife and myself and our four kids ranging from 15 to 8. Everyone participated and had a great time. The theme was called "Escape from the Ski Lodge". It was very family friendly, no scary stuff at all. We've been to other escape places where it was a dark or supernatural theme and this one had none of that.The staff member, Sue, was very friendly and thorough, explaining everything to us and giving us clues if we wanted them. We escaped because everyone worked together and my kids absolutely loved it.

room_title: Escape room "Area Z51 - Zombie Escape" by Royal Escape Rooms in Panama City
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Area 53: Lunar Lockdown" by Escape Room Tucson in Tucson
review: Me and my husband went for our 18th anniversary, we had so much fun! We're definitely going back to conquer!

room_title: Escape room "Area 53: Lunar Lockdown" by Escape Room Tucson in Tucson
review: Good fun, definitely will be back to try another room.

room_title: Escape room "Area 53: Lunar Lockdown" by Escape Room Tucson in Tucson
review: This is so much better than going to the movies with friends or even a great way to break the ice on a date It's unique, twist and turns along the way, with a lot of laughter! I love the clever clues and puzzles you have to solve! I highly recommend Escape Room for a good time!

room_title: Escape room "Area 53: Lunar Lockdown" by Escape Room Tucson in Tucson
review: What a fantastic experience! The Area 51 room was well organized and looked like this would be the room my friends and I could beat but, looks can be deceiving! Super fun with great team building potential!!!

room_title: Escape room "Area 53: Lunar Lockdown" by Escape Room Tucson in Tucson
review: Great time, lots of fun and well worth it! Thank you!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Area 53: Lunar Lockdown" by Escape Room Tucson in Tucson
review: So much fun. And even though we didn't escape I will go back and try again. We got to meet new people and really use our brains. Do this.

room_title: Escape room "Area 53: Lunar Lockdown" by Escape Room Tucson in Tucson
review: My hubby and I have been 3 times now and have had so much fun... whether we escape or not. It can be a little challenging to find something new and exciting in Tucson, but this is always a blast! The owner is super friendly and personable. The rooms being at different levels allows you to find something fun for your group without being in over your head. We have such an enjoyable time whether we win or lose. So, if you are like me, a sometimes overly bored Tucsonan, get some friends together and try something new!

room_title: Escape room "Mayday" by Escapology Bethesda in Washington, D.C.
review: None

room_title: Escape room "MURDER CO." by Black Market Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Don't think twice about booking MurderCo Hardcore! It's easily one of the most fantastic horror experiences out there. From the actors to the scenery, this place has it all executed perfectly. If you decide to pick Sideshow don't forget to bring your brown pants...

room_title: Escape room "MURDER CO." by Black Market Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: **Murder Co Hardcore is an experience, keep that in mind**As a huge fan of horror, I was pretty stoked to try Murder Co. I do not jump or scare easily so I thought I had this in the bag...boy was I wrong. My heart was pounding and my anxiety was through the roof. The room was so immersive that I thought I was going to be the next victim of Maneater (the scare actor who played Maneater was absolutely amazing!!). Everyone involved in this room did a phenomenal jobs and scared the daylights out of my whole group. If you have the chance, do Murder Co. Hardcore! This was truly the best horror escape experience I have ever had. Thank you Black Market Escape Room for such an amazing experience and making me feel alive (ironically lol).

room_title: Escape room "MURDER CO." by Black Market Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: This is my favorite escape room I have ever done and I have done more then 20. I can't wait to come back again and bring different friends to see how they do and watch their reactions. It truly is an immersive experience. Great staff from the second we got there til the second we left. I wish I can give them 6 stars. Everyone did an amazing job thank you so much for your hospitality. Highly recommend this place!

room_title: Escape room "Witch Hunter" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: My daughter had her Sweet 16 party in Buford. She and her guests had a great time, and can't wait to go back again!

room_title: Escape room "Witch Hunter" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: We did the witch room and had a great time. I highly recommend it, great puzzles. My family all loved it.

room_title: Escape room "Witch Hunter" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: So much fun. Our group, the Atlanta Vikings, had a blast in the Witch Hunter room. Would totally go back!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage in Toyland" by Race 2 Escape in Albany (GA)
review: I am an avid lover of escape rooms and all kinds of brain puzzles so it was great to get to bring my 16-year-old niece and 10-year-old nephew into a world that I love. We joined a family of 6 others who also had young kids. We were in the Hostage in Toyland and we ended up beating the room with 6 minutes left. We had a ball!

room_title: Escape room "Santa’s Naughty List " by Mystery Mansion in Little Rock
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Polar Express" by Trapped in Tahoe in South Lake Tahoe
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Chamber" by Xscape Our Rooms in St. Augustine
review: The Chamber was a beast! Will be going back very soon!

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Venus II: Collision Course" by Room Escape DC in Washington, D.C.
review: For my boyfriend's birthday I surprised him with an escape room date! We did the Escape from Venus room, the only one that is designed for 2 people. Despite our pathetic performance (we needed multiple hints), we emerged from the room laughing and feeling closer. When it's just 2 people, you are forced to reconcile your differences in how you problem solve in order to escape the room. Given how different we are, had we done the challenge separately, we would've escaped much faster. The next time we do this, we are going to rock at this - at least that's what we tell ourselves!

room_title: Escape room "The DEEP" by Escape Rooms Unlocked in Fort Myers
review: We had a great time! Did all 3 rooms on our Spring Break vacation because we could not get enough. Thanks to the great staff for being so helpful and accommodating!!

room_title: Escape room "The DEEP" by Escape Rooms Unlocked in Fort Myers
review: It was sooo much fun and “The Deep” was a great room! Can’t wait to come back and try another room! Totally recommend it!!!!

room_title: Escape room "The DEEP" by Escape Rooms Unlocked in Fort Myers
review: We did the "Deep" room this week while we were down for spring break with my parents (in their 60s) and our 2 nine-year-old boys.  My parents had never done an escape room before - mom was skeptical and dad had no interest ("Can I just pay you for my ticket and wait outside?"). We all really had such a ball!!  The room was creative and clever and when we left, my mom just kept saying over and over, "That was so much FUN!" then "That was just SO much fun!"  And now my dad, two days later, still excitedly reminds us, "How about how I solved the first clue in that escape room!"  We have been to several escape rooms in different cities and this was by far our favorite. My kids declared it their most fun part of all of spring break, and asked for Escape Room birthday parties next year. Will definitely be back next year for spring break!Additional notes:- I was a bit worried about having to do any crawling (we've been in some rooms at other places in the past where we've had to crawl through tight spaces to get from room to room), but they assured us that all their rooms are grandparent friendly!  - I particularly love how they give you a clipboard with paper to work things out - first time we've had that!  - We all commented that there was something for everyone in the room to keep everyone engaged in solving the puzzle.  It was really so thoughtfully designed.

room_title: Escape room "Monologue Murder" by Escape This Live: Columbus in Columbus (GA)
review: Fun date! My husband and I have gone to Escape This Live: Columbus, GA two times (escaped both times, woot woot!). We have done one escape with just the two of us and one with 4 other people. It was challenging and fun each time. The staff if welcoming and friendly. Can't wait to do another one!

room_title: Escape room "Monologue Murder" by Escape This Live: Columbus in Columbus (GA)
review: Me and my boyfriend went this morning to the escape room for the Monologue Murder and we loved it so much! We've already made plans to visit another room of theirs. Great fun!

room_title: Escape room "Merlin's House" by Smart Escape in Washington, D.C.
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Facility" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Fort Collins
review: Decided, last minute, to do an escape room. We had previously completed the first room, The Missing Scientist, and wanted to solve The Facility. We had a BLAST! There was only 3 of us but we still escaped successfully. We really like the puzzles at Enigma even if a couple of them had us stumped for longer than we would have liked.The website was easy to navigate and we had no problem buying our tickets and signing the waivers online.The people who work there are very friendly and helpful. We are looking forward to the third room they are working to complete. I hear it will be quite the challenge but we are always up for a fun challenge!

room_title: Escape room "The Facility" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Fort Collins
review: So smart. So challenging. So fun! The puzzles were incredibly clever and well thought out, and the twists and turns and "aha!" moments were so satisfying. The production value is top-notch. You have to experience this for yourself! Do it!

room_title: Escape room "The Facility" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Fort Collins
review: I wanted to do something fun with a group of friends for my birthday! We invited our closest friends and had so much fun!!! We came very close but were unable to escape. Our group spent the rest of the evening talking about doing it again somewhere and how much fun we had! I would recommend this for anyone!

room_title: Escape room "Titanic - The Final Hour" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: Eleven of us boarded the Titanic and it was so much fun! We survived! We all learned things about ourselves, each other, and walked away on a mission to come back and test our teamwork skills again. Titanic is great for larger groups. The Odyssey staff and the owner, Michael, was amazing! I highly recommend visiting this tucked away gem in Alpharetta.

room_title: Escape room "Titanic - The Final Hour" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: We did the Titanic room and we were totally amazed not only at the awesome people who work there, but the authentic props and fun we had figuring out the clues! Totally worth the trip!

room_title: Escape room "Titanic - The Final Hour" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: This experience was the best of any I've done so far and I have completed more than 50 escape games.  The music, decor, games/puzzles were top of the line.  The staff and location accommodations far exceeded other such escape game businesses.  I highly recommend Odyssey Escape Game for corporate or family gatherings!

room_title: Escape room "Titanic - The Final Hour" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: This was my first escape room experience and it was amazing. The team at Odyssey was so friendly, and you could tell they are passionate at what they do. We took on the Titanic room this trip, the rooms were very detailed, you could tell they took time putting them together. I really liked how they tried to keep everything historically correct, it adds another level to the experience. I'll be back for sure!

room_title: Escape room "Titanic - The Final Hour" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: We went with a group of about 10 of us and we did the Titanic themed escape room! It was SO much fun! The whole escape room was challenging but not too difficult where you felt like giving up. This was my first escape room and I'm craving to go back and do the prison one and then the other ones as they come out. I'd highly recommend this place!!!

room_title: Escape room "Ivan’s Lair (Nightmare Part 2)" by Legends of Xscape in West Palm Beach
review: Very fun escape room. This is my 4th one I've ever done and needless to say detective Ryan was the highlight of it. I love that they didn't have radio and used the screen. It made it all the more interesting. We did Ivan's room and all the puzzles were interesting and all the clues were just right to solve it all. Welcoming us with Ryan and the other lovely lady were very nice and made our entire group comfortable enough to take on Ivan! Can't wait to come back for Area 51 and Houdini.

room_title: Escape room "Ivan’s Lair (Nightmare Part 2)" by Legends of Xscape in West Palm Beach
review: Had an amazing time here last night. We did Ivan's Lair. Very well done room!  It was challenging yet not frustrating. The room had a nice and logical flow which challenged you to use your third eye and abandon conventional thinking. Bravo for a well-structured game!  Jody was great to deal with when booking and Zak was an awesome game master. Thanks for a great time. EW LILW EB KABC!!  Decode that!

room_title: Escape room "Ivan’s Lair (Nightmare Part 2)" by Legends of Xscape in West Palm Beach
review: Just in love with these guys! Confirming Nightmare the best game ever.

room_title: Escape room "Ivan’s Lair (Nightmare Part 2)" by Legends of Xscape in West Palm Beach
review: Had a blast in the Nightmare on Datura St. So much fun.

room_title: Escape room "The Tavern - Chapter 2" by Enchanted Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: As a first time escape room player I went in completely unaware of the types of puzzles to expect. The puzzles were challenging and engaging which resulted in an extremely enjoyable experience. I would highly recommend this escape room and I will be back for another challenge.  The owners did an amazing job informing the group and myself about the rules and how to play the game. After being left to find our way out of the "TAVERN", one of the new rooms. All the electronics worked and we used the on screen clues successfully. As a group we had fun digging through the props trying to find and decode the next clue which lead to a challenging escape.

room_title: Escape room "The Undead" by Escape Room Entertainment in Melbourne
review: Had an absolute blast here! We did the Undead Room and it was incredibly challenging, which our group thoroughly enjoyed. The staff is friendly, helpful, and you can tell they enjoy their job. I am definitely going to come all the way back from Port St. Lucie to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Undead" by Escape Room Entertainment in Melbourne
review: We didn't make it but we had a lot of fun. The zombies were just quicker then we were. The guy kept saying that even though we were broken into 2 teams we had to work together and communication was the key. Apparently, we figured out how important that was just a little too late...like an entire room too late lol.

room_title: Escape room "The Undead" by Escape Room Entertainment in Melbourne
review: Awesome... even if you become zombie food! Will definitely go back to accomplish a successful escape!

room_title: Escape room "The Undead" by Escape Room Entertainment in Melbourne
review: We had an amazing time in The Undead room. It was a perfect mix of locks and physical puzzles that really added to the story and immersive experience! The size of the rooms were great and very detailed. It was an awesome time, cannot wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "The Undead" by Escape Room Entertainment in Melbourne
review: We did the zombie room...very challenging (we died) but what a great time we had. My first escape room event was better than I had hoped for. The staff was incredibly friendly and professional. More than worth the price. Great time and great place...sets/rooms were spot on and gave you the feeling you were actually there.

room_title: Escape room "Budapest Express" by Escapology Huntsville in Huntsville
review: I took 3 teenage girls to Budapest Express for my daughter's birthday and we had a great time! Our host, Chris, was excellent. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Budapest Express" by Escapology Huntsville in Huntsville
review: Megan was our game Master, and Ashley was our Host. Both did a fantastic job, considering it is a new experience for everyone. They made sure we knew the rules, gave helpful hints when needed, and took a photo at the end. Although we didn't complete the room except for one remaining clue, it is something we will revisit again. Thanks Megan and Ashley.

room_title: Escape room "Lord of the Swords" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Lord of the sword is a great room. Seemingly simple yet deeply complex. Always great to find a new room that presents a challenge without leaving you banging your head on the wall. Swords are cool.

room_title: Escape room "Lord of the Swords" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Did the Lord of the Swords room, very fun. The theming and the mechanics are great. Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Lord of the Swords" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We did the Lord of the Swords room and we had a blast. Really fun and challenging. Recommend it for teens and birthday parties.

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Gnomes" by Play Live Escape in San Jose
review: Had an awesome time trying to escape  from gnomes. Cool entertainment- finally something new. Hope every one can have this kind of experience. The staff was  nice and helped us with couple clues. Hopefully next time we won't need any help. The location on the second floor- and there is a lot of parking.must try it

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Gnomes" by Play Live Escape in San Jose
review: I was really impressed with their customer service , as they were very accommodating all the way from booking to our arrival at the place . We chose Gnome room and succeeded in our mission in getting back to the real world , it took us a bit over an hour . Overall we had the best time with our friends and will be back to try more of their rooms

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Gnomes" by Play Live Escape in San Jose
review: We reserved Escape from Gnomes with my friends and it was very entertaining evening for us .Booking was easy and the room was very well set .  We solved puzzles and whenever we were stuck the team member was calling us on walkie to give us a clue . Overall fun time with my friends and made it within 59 minutes . Yey

room_title: Escape room "Brandon's Totally Tubular Bedroom" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: Went to this room last year and it was absolutely amaze balls I went with some of my friends for my birthday and it was the best time I had had in a while

room_title: Escape room "Brandon's Totally Tubular Bedroom" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: So much fun! We did Brandon's bedroom and it was great! Highly recommend this to any and everyone!

room_title: Escape room "Brandon's Totally Tubular Bedroom" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: It was our first time ever doing an escape room so we weren't sure what to expect. We did Brandon's room. Loved the throw backs from the 80s. Felt it could have used more decor, but we werent really sure where to look or get started for that matter so I guess it all worked out. We didnt get out in time due to some math issues of our own, but we had a lot of fun and want to go back and try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Brandon's Totally Tubular Bedroom" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: It was an amazing experience! Kiera was such a great host, and was there at every turn if we needed a clue to get us moving! Brandon's room was laid out well and definitely gets you thinking. It will keep you on your toes. Make sure to look at everything in the room, everything plays a part in helping you solve it! Great way to spend time with friends, and spend the night out!

room_title: Escape room "Brandon's Totally Tubular Bedroom" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: Absolutely fun! Can't wait to do this again sometime!

room_title: Escape room "Brandon's Totally Tubular Bedroom" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: Had a great time!! Can't wait to go back again and try a new room!

room_title: Escape room "Area 15" by Escape the Place in Orange County
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Aftermath" by Exit Plan in Washington, D.C.
review: The scenario was a challenge. The room was intricate. The staff were very knowledgeable, enthusiastic, and invested in making the experience enjoyable. I highly recommend this adventure.

room_title: Escape room "Aftermath" by Exit Plan in Washington, D.C.
review: We loved it from beginning to end. We did the aftermath we did not think it would take is the entire time but it did. We actually failed in the last room. Will definitely do again.

room_title: Escape room "Aftermath" by Exit Plan in Washington, D.C.
review: We've done two rooms here now, S3RIAL and Aftermath. Having done over 10+ rooms total at 7 different locations between Virginia, Maryland and Pennsylvania Exit Plan very well may be the best we've done as a whole. Both rooms were absolutely spectacular. The attention to detail is incredible. The puzzles are intricate and just the right difficulty level. The staff have all been informative and kind. Every time we've been they have been extremely helpful. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for an overall excellent escape room experience.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Tallahassee in Tallahassee
review: Our group of 6 had so much fun with the casino room. Will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Tallahassee in Tallahassee
review: Just me and my 10-year-old, and we had a ball! (And made it out of our Casino-themed adventure with 7 minutes to spare!) Kennedy was an excellent Game Master. Can't wait to go back again!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Tallahassee in Tallahassee
review: Did the Casino room. We all loved it and broke out without any outside help in 56 minutes!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Tallahassee in Tallahassee
review: Had so much fun with my family and friends. Chase is such an amazing game master for Operation: Casino. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Tallahassee in Tallahassee
review: Great team building or family fun! The Casino game was awesome. Our game master was Chase. He was engaging and funny. Really made the experience better. I HIGHLY recommend Breakout Games Tallahassee.

room_title: Escape room "The Escape" by The Unlockables in San Diego
review: This was such a cool and fun experience! More than I expected and really a great time for all of us. I will definitely be going back to try another room. We did The Escape this time, it was definitely challenging and had a great story line. So glad we picked The Unlockables for my first escape room experience, cant say enough how much fun I had!

room_title: Escape room "The Escape" by The Unlockables in San Diego
review: We had an amazing time in this escape room. The story is great, the decoration and the effort that they put to create a scary ambiant is amazing !We were 4 friends and we did it ! It wasn't easy but it was so much fun. The puzzles are amazing and very original. Maybe 1 or 2 things that are 'too much' but it would be the only details. We only can recommend you to go. Staff is very friendly !

room_title: Escape room "The Escape" by The Unlockables in San Diego
review: So much fun. With group of 7 first timers ... This was such a great first room. We didn't make it in time but it was still so much fun!! They got us hooked for sure!!

room_title: Escape room "The Escape" by The Unlockables in San Diego
review: Went with my trusted group last week and really enjoyed the experience. There were a couple quirks/bugs but the GMs helped us through it. The first act of the game was quite unique (it's the second time we've seen it done in escape games). We passed and made leaderboard (yay!). We look forward to the future rooms from The Unlockables.

room_title: Escape room "There’s Something in the Woods" by Lost in Lutz Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: We did Something in the Woods with a group of 5 and had a great experience. The room was put together very well. The puzzles were very engaging and challenging, but not frustratingly so. We will definitely be coming back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "There’s Something in the Woods" by Lost in Lutz Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: We did the woods room. I loved the dark. The clues were well laid out and it inspired team work. I cant wait to try out vegas room and the xmas room too when they get that running. Thank you for an enjoyable evening. On a side note David was an awesome employee. Loved his personality and energy he gave!Go Connerton Crazies!

room_title: Escape room "There’s Something in the Woods" by Lost in Lutz Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: Sooo much fun and friendly staff that really care about your experience!!! We had such a great time in the woods themed room.

room_title: Escape room "The Seventh Stone - Secrets of Abydos" by Planet Deadline Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: INDIANA JONES!!  This room was so much fun, the ambiance was perfect.  I’ve done 14 rooms across the country and this was one of my favorites.  I’ve also done dark sector, and am planning on slaycation soon

room_title: Escape room "The Seventh Stone - Secrets of Abydos" by Planet Deadline Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: I've done quite a few escape rooms and this place absolutely takes the cake. The puzzles are clever, the ambience is epic and the overall care and attention they put into things really makes this company stand out! I strongly suggest the 7 Stones room.

room_title: Escape room "The Seventh Stone - Secrets of Abydos" by Planet Deadline Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: Took our entire family of six with four kids ages 11-17. It was a birthday present for our 17-year-old. We did the 7 stones escape room and it was a blast! They set the room up with great challenges and great assistance that everyone was able to participate and make a difference. We completed it with 30 seconds left. Our host was fantastic and made sure everyone had a great time and felt like they contributed. Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "The Seventh Stone - Secrets of Abydos" by Planet Deadline Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: I have done escape rooms all over the country and Planet Deadline is at the top of my list. The rooms are well thought out right down to the smallest detail. Our group of 5 came very close to solving the first room (Egyptian theme) so that motivated us to try the second room which has a serial killer theme. Josh was very accommodating and got us in right away. If you are looking for a fun, yet challenging activity for your group, check this place out! You won't be disappointed.
