room_title: Escape room "The Box" by Escape Port Charlotte in Fort Myers
review: The Box was our 20th room. It took the top spot on our fave list. Great puzzles, intuitive, just the right challenge - we're talking about it days after. We'll be back for sure to try em all.

room_title: Escape room "The Box" by Escape Port Charlotte in Fort Myers
review: My husband, aunt, uncle, and kindergarten son just escaped from The Box with 1’37” left. What an amazing, fun way to spend an hour! I highly recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "The Box" by Escape Port Charlotte in Fort Myers
review: We had a great time and I can’t wait to go back. The Box was very challenging but we made it out with 8 minutes to spare!

room_title: Escape room "The Society" by Escape Room Entertainment in Melbourne
review: Had a great time escaping The Society. Very clever puzzles to put your mind to work. Several clues to figure out the attempt to escape. Our entire group had a great time! Looking forward to returning to Elite Escape Room in the future!

room_title: Escape room "The Society" by Escape Room Entertainment in Melbourne
review: We struggled with figuring out a few of the items but Maddie was awesome with helping us out and we were able to escape with one second left!!! It was an awesome experience thanks to her patience with us, and the kids loved it. We will definitely be returning to try a different room and hopefully we’ll get her as our guide again. Thank You

room_title: Escape room "Chainsaw Bob" by QQuest Escape Games in Miami
review: Lucas was awesome, he made my daughter's 14th birthday really special. Both Chainsaw Bob and Amnesia rooms were amazing. Kids had so much fun, I am looking forward to doing an adult night out in the near future there. This place is a definite must see!

room_title: Escape room "Chainsaw Bob" by QQuest Escape Games in Miami
review: This place was so much fun! We first did the Chainsaw Bob room and we won! It was great for bonding and working together as a team! We all loved it so much we got the group back together and did the second room equally just as challenging. The group we went with all had a blast and the staff was amazing, friendly, and fun we really enjoyed our time.

room_title: Escape room "Chainsaw Bob" by QQuest Escape Games in Miami
review: The first time I came here was for a surprise team building activity and we did the Chainsaw Bob escape. That was the first time I'd ever tried one of these so I had no idea what to expect or how to compare it to others, but I've since been back to do Room Amnesia and I've also tried escape rooms at two other places - and the two I did here (QQuest in Pompano) were by far the best.I just learned about the new location and new storyline (The Laboratory), so I got tix for me and my boyfriend to check out later this week. We can't wait!

room_title: Escape room "Chainsaw Bob" by QQuest Escape Games in Miami
review: We did the chain saw bob room. Man was this hard, in the beginning they tell you only 10% of people make it in time. But we all thought, cmon how is that possible?! lol it's possible. The staff was super cool though and we got a little extra time to escape ourselves. The puzzles were all well thought of and the room was well decorated. The whole vibe from when you walk into their establishment is nothing short of DOPE.Loved it!!!

room_title: Escape room "Wallingford Five" by Quandary in New Haven
review: Enjoyed my first Escape room doing the Wallingford Five Room! Such a fun thing to do with a group of people! The owners are such nice people! So fun taking on different problem-solving tasks and all working together in the end to solve it! Loved it and can't wait to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Wallingford Five" by Quandary in New Haven
review: Awesome place! Great room great puzzles to make you think and definetly had a few ah-ha moments after! We did the Wallingford 5 and will be back next week for the Zodiac. I can't wait!

room_title: Escape room "Wallingford Five" by Quandary in New Haven
review: Never done one of these before, and had a really great time. We finished with 12 minutes to spare in the Wallingford Five room, the clues were clever and the solutions were fun. Our group of four was just the right size, someone was always busy working on something, maybe 5 or 6 would be OK but I think no more! Definitely coming back to try another room, fun and easy group activity and the staff are fantastic as well.

room_title: Escape room "Wallingford Five" by Quandary in New Haven
review: Quandary was a great time. We had two groups competing in the Wallingford Five rooms. Rich and Greg were very cool. Hope to go back and try the other room soon.

room_title: Escape room "Wallingford Five" by Quandary in New Haven
review: I visited Quandary for the first time and it was an excellent experience. I went on a daytime double date to do the Wallingford five. We were greeted by a friendly couple who would be overseeing our game experience for the day. They were helpful in explaining how the escape room would work, making us feel at ease for the coming challenge. You could tell the time and care that the owners put into developing the rooms. Wallingford five would be a great first room for anyone curious to try a room escape for the first time, or a group with a couple rooms already under their belt. I can't wait to go back and try their other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Haunted Hospital" by PanIQ Escape Room Miami in Miami
review: My family have a great time! we got out with 20 seconds left! There were some parts that were really scary!! but It was fun, I will be coming back to try the other rooms

room_title: Escape room "Haunted Hospital" by PanIQ Escape Room Miami in Miami
review: We did the Haunted Hospital and it was an awesome and challenging experience. Alejandro and Kelly made my brother's birthday a GREAT night. When I booked it, I told them it was his birthday and they welcomed us with birthday hats and balloons. How awesome are they?! Definitely will be back to check out the other rooms Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Haunted Hospital" by PanIQ Escape Room Miami in Miami
review: Awesome challenge for a brain boiled in Miami! You definitely have to check the Hospital room!Balas and Alejandro are aaaaamazing game masters! See you when we come back to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted Hospital" by PanIQ Escape Room Miami in Miami
review: So fun definitely will be back for the other rooms. We did the haunted hospital and it was a lot of fun.

room_title: Escape room "Haunted Hospital" by PanIQ Escape Room Miami in Miami
review: Took a visit to the haunted hospital during a bachelorette party. We were scared out of our minds but definitely had a great time. Thank you, Alejandro!!!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted Hospital" by PanIQ Escape Room Miami in Miami
review: We just left from experiencing the haunted hospital. We had such an amazing time and will be back next weekend with other friends and family members. If you get anything from this review is that I encourage you to give it a shot. If you like a challenge this is the place! Money well spent! What a great time, so much fun!!!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted Hospital" by PanIQ Escape Room Miami in Miami
review: We did the Hospital one and had so much fun that we came back a few hours later and did the spy. We can't wait to go back and do the pirate one now! It's awesome and the staff is amazing!!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted Hospital" by PanIQ Escape Room Miami in Miami
review: I had so much fun!!! I came here to celebrate my birthday and I'm really glad we did! The haunted hospital was awesome and the staff was amazing! Very nice and welcoming! I definitely recommend this to everyone who likes to be challenged while having a blast! Thanks paniq room for making my birthday one to remember!

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac Serial Killer" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: We did it was so good!! We wasn’t able to complete it.. we had a lot of fun.. will do again for sure!

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac Serial Killer" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: Monica set us up and pumped us up from the beginning for this 13% success rate room. We escaped with seconds left and it was awesome the adrenaline rush we got. Would definitely go again and ask for Monica. She did awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac Serial Killer" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: We escaped the Zodiac Killer and it was awesome. Really cool and unexpected. Monica was great and explaining the rules and getting us anxious and excited to go in. We had a blast with 5 people. It's the hardest room Fox in a Box have and it really is. Would definitely go again!

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac Serial Killer" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: Went there with my family and friend. We did the Zodiac escape room. This was a hard room indeed. Highly challenging, lots of critical and logical thinking along with teamwork. We made it with two minutes to spare. Juan our guide was a great host, I highly recommend this.

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac Serial Killer" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: Did the Zodiac Killer room the other day with some friends, and it was awesome! Will be definitely going back

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac Serial Killer" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: We did the zodiac room. Definitely one of my favorites, and I've done a few rooms. Monica was a blast and she made the experience all the more fun. Will 100% be back.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Mayhem" by trap't Escape Room Adventures in Stamford
review: My friends and I had so much fun at Museum Mayhem! We've done six escape rooms before and this place is definitely the most challenging! What's great is that they offer unlimited clues which is so helpful! They even offered us a few extra minutes to escape which was so nice since we were struggling. Felt like they cared more about you having fun and solving the puzzles than just taking your money and sending you home after 60 minutes unlike other places I've been.The owners were wonderful - so friendly and very helpful with the hints. We stayed after for at least 15-20 minutes just chatting. But what amazed me even more was the husband Stuart invented and built the rooms! If that's not talent I don't know what is.My friends and I will be going back to do the other rooms and because Jill and Stuart were such great people! Definitely recommend to other people!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Mayhem" by trap't Escape Room Adventures in Stamford
review: We had an awesome time at Trap't tonight! We celebrated my birthday in the Museum Room and we made it out with less than 2 minutes to spare. Highly recommend this adventure!!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Mayhem" by trap't Escape Room Adventures in Stamford
review: Had a great time with my sister, my son and his friend. Ended up unexpectedly teamed up with friends from church. Did the Museum Room which was challenging, well laid out and lots of fun. And we ended up setting a record for completing it because we worked really well together! Staff was absolutely amazing. Can't wait to come back and try the new rooms once they are ready!

room_title: Escape room "Jurassic Escape" by Colorado Escape in Denver
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Bad Blood" by Escape Room Long Beach in Los Angeles
review: Super fun night. 3 newbies and 3 veterans and everyone enjoyed themselves!

room_title: Escape room "Bad Blood" by Escape Room Long Beach in Los Angeles
review: This was my first experience with escape rooms and I loved it! Our group was warmly greeted by the staff, given thorough instructions and sent on our way. We were given an hour to complete the challenge and we almost made it in time... After we were done the staff came in to congratulate us on finishing the challenge and we took pictures and chatted with the staff for a bit. I look forward to returning when there are new challenges and will be sharing this with all my friends! Thank you for a fun evening!

room_title: Escape room "Bad Blood" by Escape Room Long Beach in Los Angeles
review: We had a great time! The staff was very friendly and seemed to enjoy what they were doing. The theme of the room was hilarious and entertaining, and the puzzles all made sense. It's great to finally have a local escape room that's easy to get to.

room_title: Escape room "The Path" by Puzzle Effect Denver in Denver
review: I've been wanting to try an escape room for some time now and it did not disappoint.I did "The Path" room with 4 others and we had a blast. Such an awesome brain teaser and while we didn't finish in time we came oooo-so-close and I can't wait to come back and try another room.If you're looking for a fun time for 6 or 10 people and interested in trying some different than the normal bar/restaurant then certainly give Denver Escape Room a try, it's sooo much fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Path" by Puzzle Effect Denver in Denver
review: We came as a group of 6 where half of the group never did an escape room. We completed The Path and they loved it! Can't say too much about the room obviously, but it was themed and a great experience. Definitely recommend.

room_title: Escape room "The Path" by Puzzle Effect Denver in Denver
review: We completed the path, and it was super fun. It was a linear room and once we figured that out it was awesome. Goid props, great design. We had a lot of fun.

room_title: Escape room "Tourist Trap" by Scaventour in Honolulu
review: This was overall a fun experience, but not really for hard-core or experienced escape room players. My wife and I played just the two of us. The puzzles were too simple, not at the complex puzzles in a well-designed escape room. This would be a great activity for families with kids maybe 6-14 years old.

room_title: Escape room "Tourist Trap" by Scaventour in Honolulu
review: Great concept and what an awesome way to see Hawaii and learn about some of their history.

room_title: Escape room "Tourist Trap" by Scaventour in Honolulu
review: I was lucky enough to test out Scaventour's Tourist Trap. The game was such a creative concept, forcing me to think outside the box with the puzzles and discover new sites around Waikiki that I had never noticed before. The course had us walking roughly around 1 1/2 miles, but we were having so much fun with the various puzzles and Waikiki scenery that we hardly noticed the distance we were traveling! This is definitely a one-of-a-kind experience that takes the concept of escape rooms to a whole new level. Definitely excited to see more to come from this company, and can't wait to share this experience with family and friends!

room_title: Escape room "Inside Job" by Escape Room Tucson in Tucson
review: Thank you escape room Tucson for making our team building event a fun one! Everyone enjoyed themselves! Thanks to the awesome helper that was in Inside Job with us!

room_title: Escape room "Inside Job" by Escape Room Tucson in Tucson
review: I spent my 30th birthday here. We did "The Inside Job" and had the best time. We didn't make it out but, I know who not to take with me when I rob a bank.

room_title: Escape room "Inside Job" by Escape Room Tucson in Tucson
review: I've been to Escape Room Tucson on 4 different occasions. Every room is so different. It's such a great time with friends every time! Can't wait to try their new rooms!!!

room_title: Escape room "Inside Job" by Escape Room Tucson in Tucson
review: My husband and I had an awesome time at Escape Room Tucson. The room we booked was a great challenge. The owners have definitely put a lot of work into making these rooms difficult but fun.

room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent" by iPanic Escape Room in Lakeland
review: I have done all 4 rooms. They are all so much fun and the staff is always amazing!! David is the bomb 💣💣

room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent" by iPanic Escape Room in Lakeland
review: My boyfriend and I decided to try a 20 minute room tonight and loved every second of it! We chose the spy challenge & it was a blast. David (I hope that’s right!) at the front desk was a delight and made the experience even better than we expected. We will definitely be back with our friends for a 60 minute room soon!!

room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent" by iPanic Escape Room in Lakeland
review: Went with my friend, we did one of the 20 minute rooms (Secret Agent). It was super fun! The guy working at the desk (wish we got his name!!) was SUPER helpful and made it a fun experience. His energy was great! We can’t wait to go back and try another room 😁

room_title: Escape room "The Red Wire" by PanIQ Room in San Francisco
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: My girlfriends and I completed Bank Heist Escape Room in Palm Springs. It was an amazing experience. Dominique and Emily were great and help us giving  hints. We will be back again to experience other rooms. It's sooooo much fun. We highly recommend Palm Springs Escape Room.

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Our first time doing an escape room. Took our 2 kids (age 10 and 13) and the entire family had a great time. We did the bank heist room which was quite challenging, but we received a lot of helpful hints form Eevee. She was very supportive and gave us just enough clues to “break the vault” with 4 minutes remaining.  We would definitely recommend the escape room here and hope to return in the near future.

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: The Bank Heist escape room was a lot of fun! Our game guide, Ty, kept us on track and was great with the family. We had a great time and will definitely be heading back. Thanks for the fun!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Have already tried two rooms here. Merlin's room is tech-friendly while the Bank Heist is keys and locks. Both rooms were fun but we absolutely LOVED robbing a bank!The staff and owner are so friendly and helpful! Plus you can't beat the price. Highly recommend

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: My group and I had the best time ever here. We did the Bank heist and it truly tested our mental abilities. Dominique deserves our highest graces for getting us in so quickly. Your customer service made my group feel so welcomed. Thank you for a great time!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Kingdom" by Pikes Peak Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: This was our first escape room experience and our family had a blast! We completed the Lost Kingdom room within 49 mins with one clue. The experience was so much fun and it was kid friendly and they loved helping. The staff was very friendly and even took a picture of us at the end. Thank you for a wonderful evening.

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Kingdom" by Pikes Peak Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: My daughter and her friends had a great time tonight trying to figure out the mystery clues together. It was a great bonding experience for everyone. They all said that was fun & hard, but anything from boring! Good times:)

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Kingdom" by Pikes Peak Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: We had a great time! This was our first time doing an escape room and it was so much fun. The puzzles were challenging and the story was fun (we did Lost Kingdom) and the owners were very friendly and helpful! We will definitely be back for the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Diplomat's Secret" by Escape Room 101 in Phoenix
review: Could not have better better! Perfect for a family with teenagers . We were three generations. The realm was one of the best that we have done so far.

room_title: Escape room "Diplomat's Secret" by Escape Room 101 in Phoenix
review: We celebrated our 1st annual Christmas party at the Escape Room. It was fantastic. Everyone had a great time and the staff went all out to make sure we had fun. Really appreciated the extra effort they took to accommodate our schedule. We look forward to going back to visit another room.

room_title: Escape room "Diplomat's Secret" by Escape Room 101 in Phoenix
review: My wife and I had a blast here! We did the diplomat secret room and it was fun to be spies for an hour and crack all the codes! Thank you for such a fun and entertaining time!!

room_title: Escape room "Treasure Island - Destination Bermuda Triangle" by ALL IN Adventures Waterbury in Southington
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Escape from The Old West" by The Crooked Key in Steamboat Springs
review: CJ was great with our family for our first escape room experience! We had so much fun and laughed so hard. It was challenging but not too hard. Already looking to book our next adventure!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from The Old West" by The Crooked Key in Steamboat Springs
review: We had so much fun doing the Wild West Jail escape room. I highly recommend Crooked Key Escape Room! We had so much we decided to do their other room tomorrow. The clues were insanely challenging in a fun way! We loved it!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from The Old West" by The Crooked Key in Steamboat Springs
review: We had big fun! Was an excellent family venue! We all worked together to escape from jail.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from The Old West" by The Crooked Key in Steamboat Springs
review: Such a fun experience! Our group loved solving the clues to find our way out of jail. I highly recommend checking it out!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from The Old West" by The Crooked Key in Steamboat Springs
review: So much fun! This was our first time in an escape room and can't wait to do it again. We did the Old West room. Challenging but we got out! Staff was great!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from The Old West" by The Crooked Key in Steamboat Springs
review: We had so much fun escaping from The Old West room and can’t wait to return to try out the other room. I highly recommend this to everyone!

room_title: Escape room "Pyrotechnic Peril" by Escape Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: Great time! Had to work as a team and bounce things off each other. Clues, locks, doors and body parts!!!!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Pyrotechnic Peril" by Escape Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: First evening out with my husband in a while. This was such a fun and neat way to spend some of the evening! The staff/owners made the night very special for us and did an amazing job in creating such a unique place!!! Can't wait to try the other rooms!! Thank you guys for a great night and the flowers!!! Amanda and Mike Milspaw

room_title: Escape room "Pyrotechnic Peril" by Escape Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: Staff was awesome. What a unique experience. Such a fun way to spend an evening. So well done!

room_title: Escape room "Pyrotechnic Peril" by Escape Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: Fun! Fun! Fun! Trying to solve the puzzles and figure out your next step was a great way to start our night!!

room_title: Escape room "Lethal Lab Level 3" by Mystery Quests in Colorado Springs
review: We had a blast trying to find and figure out all the clues! I would definitely recommend going for a fun night out.Fun for all ages.

room_title: Escape room "Lethal Lab Level 3" by Mystery Quests in Colorado Springs
review: My husband, teenage son and myself did the lab room. It was so much fun and the owners were great and helpful to us. This was our first time doing an escape room. Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Lethal Lab Level 3" by Mystery Quests in Colorado Springs
review: What a great way to spend a snowy day! They were one of very few escape rooms that can accommodate a group of 10 in one room. The puzzles were challenging and clues were super helpful. We will definitely be back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Sabotage" by EscapeSF in San Francisco
review: It was really cool. The game was super fun and challenging. We bring our inters there and they loved it. They do have a great Italian restaurant on the first floor of the building, so we went there right after our game.

room_title: Escape room "Sabotage" by EscapeSF in San Francisco
review: Never seen a game like this before. It’s like an escape game but need to get into this suitcase. It looks like a high end movie prop, with keypad on top, and you get some gadgets to pick codes and such. Than it opens to more puzzles and another level and another level. Very clever. The military guy on TV gave some story about evil corporation and we worked on 8 cases at different tables. Ended up helping each other otherwise we probably wouldn’t have finished it in time. Their “secret safe house” was a bit hard to find. Check the address in the email. we went to their main office first but it’s just a block away. No big deal.

room_title: Escape room "Sabotage" by EscapeSF in San Francisco
review: Great game - intelligent one! We were 75 ppl, the game was one of our team-building activities. Recommend for HR/Community managers to consider!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Room" by Great Room Escape in Denver
review: This was the first escape room my friends and I ever attended which propelled us into the whole scene. This is by far the best room we've done and the special things they've added to this room have separated them from the competition. If you get a chance to check them out are their new location make sure you do!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Room" by Great Room Escape in Denver
review: Wow! This is unlike anything I've ever experienced. Super interactive and fun. If you stay calm and think things through, you'll have a good chance of getting out. That is way easier said than done though. I'm excited to see what the future holds for The Great Room Escape.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Room" by Great Room Escape in Denver
review: Such a unique experience! Gets your adrenaline pumping, that's for sure! I can't wait to see what they do next! Makes for a fun night out with a group of friends. The actors/staff were so helpful yet so clever at the same time.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Room" by Great Room Escape in Denver
review: Literally just finished the cabin excellent experience highly recommend trying it out. So much fun!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Room" by Great Room Escape in Denver
review: This was an awesome experience. I was super nervous going in. But it was a blast!! I can't wait to go back and do other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Room" by Great Room Escape in Denver
review: This is the best! They have to hurry and make more so we can do this every month! I'm getting excited just thinking about it, but I don't know how to tell anyone how awesome this experience is without giving spoilers... just go, bring your friends and family, you will not be disappointed.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Room" by Great Room Escape in Denver
review: I took my 22 year old son and 16 year old daughter and we all had such a great time. It's hard to find something unique and fun to do as a family and we will definitely be coming back and trying another room.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Room" by Great Room Escape in Denver
review: Amazing! It was pretty difficult mainly because our group wasn't very organized. I would recommend this to everyone!

room_title: Escape room "Arizona Shootout" by Escapology Denver in Denver
review: My family and I(Baby Boomer, Gen X, Millennial, and Gen Z, so our bases are covered!) went for Father's Day, and had a blast! We did the Arizona Shootout (which is a little challenging for a group's first time), and ended up running out of time on the last clue. Sean, our incredible Game Master, let us take the extra minute to finish so we wouldn't be left hanging, which was super kind of him. When we're next in Denver, we'll definitely check it out again!

room_title: Escape room "Arizona Shootout" by Escapology Denver in Denver
review: Decor, food, and escape room was stellar! Will definitely be back for more! We did the Arizona Shootout room. It was easier than expected - but very fun and loved everything about the facility

room_title: Escape room "Arizona Shootout" by Escapology Denver in Denver
review: Our work team did the Arizona Shootout - lots of fun! Staff is friendly and helpful, the escape rooms are interesting, and the bar/restaurant has a great, adventurous vibe. We didn't have time to grab food or a drink, I'll definitely be back to try! Great place!

room_title: Escape room "The President’s Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Tampa
review: Had a great experience with the President's Bunker! Hunter was a great Room Master and was a joy to be around. Made it out with 15 seconds to spare Will definitely be back to try some other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The President’s Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Tampa
review: My coworkers and I participated in the President's Bunker and we got out with over 7 minutes to spare! Jeremy was a great host and kept our experience fun and humorous at times. We will be back! Thank you for a great team building experience!

room_title: Escape room "The President’s Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Tampa
review: I had an awesome time with my co-workers at the great escape, I plan on bringing my family and friends back for the next visit. We did the Presidents Bunker and the Library, we got out the bunker with 12 minutes to spare and barely made it out of the Library, that one was hard!

room_title: Escape room "Murder at Pier 38" by Room With a Clue in Honolulu
review: We did the Island Task Force. The room was very creative and had a lot of puzzles. We escaped with a little over 3 minutes left. Both rooms are highly recommended. What was awesome was the Island Task Force room is the hardest room outta all their rooms. Thank u so much to Room with a Clue for having helpful and friendly staff members like Tracy and Jeff who provided excellent service. Highly recommended to go.

room_title: Escape room "Murder at Pier 38" by Room With a Clue in Honolulu
review: Room with a Clue was so fun! We came for a work team building event. We did Island Task Force which was great, but we didn't make it out. It was really well organized and the room had plenty of difficult challenges. I have done a few other breakout rooms in Honolulu, and this one is just as good if not better. I can't wait to go back and try again next time!

room_title: Escape room "Murder at Pier 38" by Room With a Clue in Honolulu
review: This room is one of my favorite games on Oahu! Action packed games with many clever puzzles. You really need to use your brain and work together to figure our what everything means. I like how a lot of the puzzles thought outside the box and were not super obvious. There are a lot of puzzles and locks in the game, but it is just the right amount to challenge you.

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Alcatraz - Destination San Francisco" by ALL IN Adventures Orange Park in Jacksonville
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by Bolt NWA in Bentonville
review: My 4 grandkids ages 9-14 and myself enjoyed our visit to Bolt NWA. This was our first time to do an escape room. It was so much fun watching all of us working together to solve the mysteries.We 1st booked Grandma's Attic. We had such a great time, we decided to do Locked also! I loved that each one of us solved clues. I highly recommend Bolt NWA for families. We made wonderful memories and all of us agree, we are going back soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by Bolt NWA in Bentonville
review: What a great time! Been there twice. Day Dream beat us by 3 locks but we beat Grandma's Attic with 4min to spare! Super fun for the whole family!

room_title: Escape room "Treasure Hunters: Station 13" by Escape Games at The River in Rancho Mirage
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Oval Office" by Exithis Pensacola in Pensacola
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Orange - Beach in Orange Beach
review: We pulled off a daring rescue mission at the Casino Royale today. Despite 007 getting himself into a bad spot, we all escaped with our lives, armed with nothing but our wits and cunning (and a few key assists from GM Elijah). A great time was had by all.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Orange - Beach in Orange Beach
review: We loved our experience at Breakout Orange Beach!! Our game master Jessica was simply superb. The game was extremely challenging and so much fun!! Our 8 ages ranged from 13-40 something and all of us had a blast. We did Casino Royale and hope to go back soon for the other games. Definitely worth the money and time! Thanks Jessica for showing us a fantastic night and helping us breakout with thirty seconds to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Orange - Beach in Orange Beach
review: We did Casino Royale yesterday at Breakout. The staff were fantastic from start to finish. Friendly, helpful and went out of their way to provide excellent customer service. The game was so fun and very challenging! We all had a blast. Our ages ranged from 13 to 42. We did not escape, but came close and now can hardly wait to come back. Mike, our game master was fantastic. Do yourself a favor and go play.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Orange - Beach in Orange Beach
review: We did the Casino Royale with 5 people...2 adults and 3 children ages 9, 11, and 15. Everyone loved it!!! Everyone was involved and working together. We didn't breakout but in the end we didn't really care. Thanks for the experience!!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Orange - Beach in Orange Beach
review: You guys are awesome. Very professional staff. We really enjoyed casino royale. For having only two people we have currently made it the farthest two people have ever made it so far. That was per the game master for that room. We will definitely be back here the next time we are down here.

room_title: Escape room "Dying Love" by Epic Escape Rooms in Valdosta
review: My girlfriend and I booked the "Dying Love" room and it was awesome! The experience is really cool and the staff was outstanding! We have never had anything like this in our town before so I was pretty excited when I found out it was opening! There were four other people in the room with us that we had never met before but it was a great experience and they were super cool! We will definitely be going back!

room_title: Escape room "Dying Love" by Epic Escape Rooms in Valdosta
review: We went with a group of friends to celebrate our birthdays. None of us had ever been to an escape room. We tried the Dying Love room and it didn't disappoint! We will definitely go back for another try since we are "still trapped." We loved all the surprises, puzzles, and distractions. The owners were so friendly.

room_title: Escape room "Dying Love" by Epic Escape Rooms in Valdosta
review: We had an awesome time! Dying love was very challenging, but we escaped. Definitely recommend Epic Escape Rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Dying Love" by Epic Escape Rooms in Valdosta
review: We went to Epic Escape room as part of a bachelorette night for my sister. We booked the Dying Love room. It was so much fun! We had a blast! The staff was so nice. Will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Dying Love" by Epic Escape Rooms in Valdosta
review: So fun! Just finished the “Dying Love” room with my family. The storyline was interesting, the puzzles and clues were just hard enough to challenge you and keep you thinking without being impossible. Such nice staff, very warm and wonderful people working the rooms. Definitely want to come back and try all the other rooms soon!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by EscapeWorks Denver in Denver
review: We made it out with time to spare! Was a great time! Devon and Savanna were loads of fun.

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by EscapeWorks Denver in Denver
review: This room was a ton of fun, and Devon and Savannah made it a wonderful experience.  There were 12 of us, and they joked around and had fun with us.  There were enough puzzles for everyone to be working-highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by EscapeWorks Denver in Denver
review: My large family of 12 loved escaping from the outbreak room! It was difficult enough to keep is entertained yet we wer able to escape before the time was up. Devon and savannah were very entertaining and funny, we hope you get them as your escape room guides, they gave us extra laughs and fun! Definitely recommend this room!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by EscapeWorks Denver in Denver
review: This is one of the best rooms I've done in Denver, and my family has sampled at least one from all of the major players. I liked that it was a little more difficult, I also liked some of the less-common puzzles.  We had a group of ten, and there was plenty to keep each of us busy. Definitely not a room for newbies to cut their teeth on, unless they're with some seasoned players. We will return to this outfit to try some of the other rooms. A+

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by EscapeWorks Denver in Denver
review: I agree with the other reviews - this room is extremely difficult.  However, my group did escape.  A lot of the info was there - you just have to find it... it wasn't obvious like a lot of other rooms.  There was a lot going on in the room (probably need many players - our group of 10 was never bored).  It was a great experience.  Will be back.

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by EscapeWorks Denver in Denver
review: Not the worst escape room I've ever done but the room I did was near impossible to complete and there was more random guessing involved instead of a logical storyline progression through the puzzles.

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by EscapeWorks Denver in Denver
review: This room is considered to be one of the most challenging escape rooms in the city. With that said, it still seemed a little too hard even after they've explained how the puzzles should have been solved. Make sure you understand where you're going before you book, definitely do not recommend this for newbies. Otherwise, still had fun and will be back again.

room_title: Escape room "RabaBank" by Escape Room 831 in Salinas
review: When my family travels, we always try and find a good escape room.  We found Escape Room 831 and its one of the best, if not the best we've played.  Great fun for the family (2 boys!), and very well done with the design decor and escape scenarios.  Highly recommend this location if you're anywhere near the Bay Area or Monterey.

room_title: Escape room "RabaBank" by Escape Room 831 in Salinas
review: Great place with high production value! Very friendly with a professional team running the place. Love Barrie!

room_title: Escape room "RabaBank" by Escape Room 831 in Salinas
review: This was my very first Escaperoom experience and it was truly outstanding! The owner was so accommodating and fun and the room was brilliant. I cannot wait to go back and try out their other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Egypt: Ammon’s Passage" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
review: Celebrated my son's birthday by escaping Ammon's Passage. Had a blast!

room_title: Escape room "Egypt: Ammon’s Passage" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
review: We had a blast! We were in the Egypt room. The kids loved finding the clues!

room_title: Escape room "Egypt: Ammon’s Passage" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
review: I had so much fun solving the puzzles and escaping the Egyptian themed Ammon's Passage. Every aspect of the game was well thought out! We will be back to escape another room.

room_title: Escape room "Egypt: Ammon’s Passage" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
review: The Egypt room was perfect for my daughter's 13th birthday with friends. We used all the clues and escaped with only a few minutes to spare. It was very challenging and the girls had a blast. Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "Egypt: Ammon’s Passage" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
review: I had a blast in the Egypt room last night with all my friends! 8 of us all together, myself included decided to try this out. We are glad we did because had so much fun! I have to give a major shoutout to your employee John though because he was such a good sport helping us out and dealing with my crazy friends. We will definitely be coming back! Thank you for a great time and the coupon for Longdoggers! We went there after for a victory treat since we escaped with 6 minutes to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Forgotten Pharaoh Escape" by Xscape Pods in Los Angeles
review: We had an excellent time here for my daughter's 12th birthday. The Egyptian adventure room was perfect for their age and ability and they had a blast.

room_title: Escape room "Forgotten Pharaoh Escape" by Xscape Pods in Los Angeles
review: I took my and daughter and her friend for escape room fun for her birthday. We both have experienced other escape rooms. This trip was a first experience for her friend.  The staff was very friendly. We tried The Pharaoh's Tomb. We had so much fun that we returned the next day to experience more; Defenders of the Galaxy. We are also looking forward to the next adventure being added later this year and can't wait to come back and try out our skills. ;) Highly recommend this adventure!

room_title: Escape room "Forgotten Pharaoh Escape" by Xscape Pods in Los Angeles
review: This is my first time in an Escape Room and it was SO MUCH FUN! You can tell just from entering the lobby area that there is so much attention to detail and design and it's shown in the rooms as well. We did the Pharoah room. It really felt like an immersive experience. I enjoyed all the puzzles and how they each required different types of thinking with which to solve them. We got out with 4 minutes left (mostly because of my team - I was not as clever) and I definitely want to come back with a bigger team to try out the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Curse on the Emerald Seas" by Puzzle Effect Denver in Denver
review: We’ve been twice. The staff is great the rooms are fun and worth the time and not very expensive for some fun.

room_title: Escape room "Curse on the Emerald Seas" by Puzzle Effect Denver in Denver
review: My wife and I have done over 100 escape rooms in the last few years. This is by far the best escape room company we have gone to. High quality rooms, great story lines, and staff that is fantastic. They are professional, helpful, and friendly. I wish I could give them 6 stars.

room_title: Escape room "Curse on the Emerald Seas" by Puzzle Effect Denver in Denver
review: Great staff! Well worth the money!

room_title: Escape room "The President's Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Jacksonville
review: Chris was awesome. We went for two rooms making the Bunker but not passing the Library. We had 4 adults with two kids ages 6 and 2. This place deserves its 5 star rating including the kids and making them feel part of it (thank you Chris (Blue)). We will definitely be back to they our luck with the other two rooms. I have been to double digit escape rooms and feel these to rank with the best, not too easy and not impossible. Well done "The Great Escape Room!"

room_title: Escape room "The President's Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Jacksonville
review: I booked this as a work group team building event and it was perfect.  Easy to book online and they quickly responded via email to any questions I had regarding the process.  Location is convenient and there is plenty of parking.  You get there about 15 minutes early for them to explain the game and what will happen.  We did the president's bunker and it was both challenging and fun.  Don't want to spoil anything so won't give details on what we did, but I will say that you have to work together to get it done (proud to say we finished in about 56 minutes).  The guide (his name was Blue) was awesome, supportive but added some more twists to the game.  Pictures at the end with fun props.  All around great experience and highly recommend.  Tip: we did an early afternoon and did not have to book the whole room, but I'm not sure if that is the way the night time ones are.  We had the joint to ourselves so that was cool too.  Thanks!

room_title: Escape room "The President's Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Jacksonville
review: We just escaped form the Presidents Bunker at The Great Escape Room in 53:55 minutes. You must get your team together and get on down there.

room_title: Escape room "Wild West" by Escape Thrill in Tampa
review: Did the Wild West. Made it most of the way. Focus! So much fun. Recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Wild West" by Escape Thrill in Tampa
review: We had a great time with our family! We did the Wild West room and made it out with almost 14 minutes to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Wild West" by Escape Thrill in Tampa
review: We just did the Wild West room and had a blast! Will definitely come back and do another room!

room_title: Escape room "Bomb Squad" by Escape Room Yuma in Yuma
review: Had the pleasure of doing the Bomb squad room today. Sooo much fun! Will definitely come back and do the rest of the room. It's 60 minutes of just laughs and nerves lol

room_title: Escape room "Bomb Squad" by Escape Room Yuma in Yuma
review: 10/10 I had some family from out of town come down to Yuma for the weekend and we decided to try out the escape room we did “the bomb squad” and it was a very fun/tricky hour... we had a blast and are already planning our next one when my family is back in town! If you haven’t went yet... oh boy are you missing out! To top off our wonderful experience the staff was very friendly and helpful!

room_title: Escape room "Bomb Squad" by Escape Room Yuma in Yuma
review: We tried the bomb squad room with a large group. We were all having a blast with the room master. Candace was awesome! The room isn't overly difficult but it does make your brain work quite a bit. We had teenagers and adults so our crowd was mixed. If you are looking for something to do we recommend that you check this place it. It's something that you normally wouldn't do but you'll enjoy it!

room_title: Escape room "The Mine Shaft" by HD Escape Rooms Westminster in Denver
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: Played diamond heist and it was great! Can't wait to go back. But Morgan lied, there was no paper and pencil!

room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: So much fun! we did the diamond heist and you should see my bling! Definitely going back. Got a deal on Groupon. Hope they keep running those!

room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: This was so much fun!!! I highly recommend it!! We will be coming back!

room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: Super fun! I have been to other escape based venues in the Orlando area and this superseded by far. We were greeted by the owner, Lee and he gave us the background of escape games which I found very interesting. The rooms are too notch, challenging and very fun. We had so much fun yesterday, we are patiently waiting for them to open to go back again today! This is a definite must do!!!

room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: We did the diamond one and it was such an exhilarating experience! When we first walked in the tiny little room, I couldn't believe we were supposed to find a huge diamond in such a small room. But don't worry, I won't tell you anymore so you can find out yourself when you go. Can't wait to come back to do the Mad Scientist!

room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: This is a must try adventure, fun for the whole family. We loved it.

room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: This was a great find! Terrific experience, an excellent end to a wonderful family vacation! Thanks!

room_title: Escape room "Summer School Breakout" by Vector Escape Games in Redlands
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Vampire's Lair" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: I've done over a dozen escape rooms and can honestly say that the team at Escape Room Palm Springs is the best!! The rooms are well thought out and just soo much fun. I am such a fan that we've come back 3 years in a row. This is a must ... must.. must do if you are in Palm Springs. My favorite room is Vampire's Lair. Also all the employees here are top notch and truly care. I love this place.

room_title: Escape room "Vampire's Lair" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: So much fun. Everyone is so nice. The vampire room was fun and perfect for us to try with my 11 year old son. I will definitely come back and try their other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Vampire's Lair" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: We had the absolute pleasure of going through the Vampire escape room as a large group and Brandi was an awesome game master. It was such a well thought out escape room and super fun. I would recommend to anyone!

room_title: Escape room "Vampire's Lair" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Did two rooms today, the Titanic Room and the Vampire Room. Just the right balance of difficulty and fun...cleaver without being ridiculous...with a staff that was really top notch. Thanks to Emily and Evee for all your insight and guidance. Good time for all.

room_title: Escape room "Vampire's Lair" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Had a blast. Went with our adult children and did Vampire's Lair. We are first timers except for my 22 yr old son, who has been to several places. He said it was one of thy he best ones he has been to. Kay and all the staff very friendly and helpful. We will definitely be back to check out the other rooms. This is a must do!

room_title: Escape room "Noelle’s Nightmare" by Escape Room 104 in Pine Bluff
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Las Vegas" by Exit Artists in Los Angeles
review: this was a 90 minute las vegas themed room, which was appropriate for our group of 4 adults and 3 kids the way we divided it up. we finished with just under 4 minutes to spare. the room was chock full of super fun puzzles and had amazing props and clever tech. alan our gamemaster was very cool and gave us just the right amount of help. i forgot to give him a tip, i feel bad. anyway go here for a great time with friends. 5 stars!

room_title: Escape room "Las Vegas" by Exit Artists in Los Angeles
review: Just did the Vegas themed escape room it was so much fun, the puzzles were challenging and the game master was super cool and very fun to talk with. I highly recommend this if you're looking for a fun activity to do with friends.

room_title: Escape room "Las Vegas" by Exit Artists in Los Angeles
review: Johnny and Herm have done an amazing job with their escape room! The staff is extremely knowledgeable and social!Their Vegas themed room is both challenging and fun. It is very visually appealing and intellectually stimulating. My tip - look for patterns  Perfect experience for first timers. You will not be disappointed!

room_title: Escape room "The Book of Souls" by Mystic Escape Room in Denver
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Sweet Dreams" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Top 5 room in Denver. Sweet Dreams is SO inventive, so much fun and will have you looking for clues in places you never thought of. Our group of 2Needed about 8 more minutes and we did not escape

room_title: Escape room "Sweet Dreams" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Came here with 7 of my grad school classmates to commemorate the end of a long semester. Peter and the rest of the staff at Epic Escape Game were really wonderful. Polite and professional from start to finish. Some of our players had done escape rooms before (me included) but other ones were first-timers. Peter suggested that we play Sweet Dreams (only moderately difficult) since not everyone was familiar with the process. I was worried that it would be too easy for those of us who weren't new to escape rooms, but it was great - plenty challenging and super fun. Will definitely be coming back here!

room_title: Escape room "Sweet Dreams" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: This was super fun. I can't wait to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Sweet Dreams" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: My kids and I had a great time. We liked it so much we went right back in to try the next level. Can't wait to go back.

room_title: Escape room "The Clock Tower" by Escape The Room Chandler in Phoenix
review: My group had a fun time at the escape room, everyone participated and everyone took the room serious. We will return and try some of the other escape rooms real soon. Be prepared you will get into the game and have lots of fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Clock Tower" by Escape The Room Chandler in Phoenix
review: I walked into Escape the Room with my wife on a whim. Neither of us had done this before and thought we should take a look. We weren’t planning on signing up, but, after hearing a great sales pitch, we figured we’d go for it. We signed up for the Clock Tower room, and, as it happened, we were the only 2 in the room. It was a blast. The puzzles were hard, but the hints were very helpful. We made it all the way to the very last puzzle where, sadly, we ran out of time. The experience defintely whetted my appetite for another room escape. Hopefully we’ll get to do this again before long.

room_title: Escape room "The Clock Tower" by Escape The Room Chandler in Phoenix
review: What a fun experience we had there. Got a group of tattooed hooligans together to have a bit of fun Tuesday night and decided to give the new place a try. It was my first experience ever doing an escape room while some of the group do them all the time. Dj was our host for the clock tower room. It's brand new so they ran on to some technical difficulties while dj was left there alone and we could tell DJ was getting a little frazzled but she did an amazing job and made it to where we will for sure be back  she gave clues when we needed them and took charge like a natural leader when the room went down. All and all we had an amazing fun experience and we will be back. DJ keep your head up kid you did awesome and made our time there awesome. Someone give this kid a raise she deserves it.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Bay" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We did Pirate Cove. The place was a bit confusing to find but it was great! Great theme, really well put together, Ivan was so nice and we really had a great time.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Bay" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I went to the pirate room on Thursday night with my boyfriend and some of our friends. Absolutely loved it! The theme was fantastic and well done. We love going to these rooms and this was my favorite theme by far. Great puzzles too! Really fun technology. It's a must go if you're ready to escape a (fictional) pirate gang who's going to murder you if you cannot escape their lair within the hour!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Bay" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Supper fun game, highly recommended. Ppl working there are so cool and they are trying to make it even better

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Bay" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We have done the FBI room and now the Pirate Bay, we escaped both with just minutes to spare. So much fun! We are already planning our next room! Keep the rooms coming guys!!!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Adventure" by Limitless Escape Games in Livermore
review: We visited Limitless Escapes on Saturday. We have done other escape rooms but this was by far the best experience we have had. We escaped The Pirates Adventure with just seconds to spare. It was challenging and so much fun! The staff was very helpful and enthusiastic. Can't wait to try the next room. Would highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Adventure" by Limitless Escape Games in Livermore
review: First escape room. We did the Pirate Kraken room. It was 9 of us I believe. We didn't escape but that was lack of communication on the teams part. We only had one final puzzle and we failed. Forever sentenced to Davy Jones locker! The staff was totally patient and helpful, they had fun laughing at us all I am sure. We cannot wait to do it again. Thanks Nathan for putting up with us!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Adventure" by Limitless Escape Games in Livermore
review: Great place to hang out. The Pirate room is my favorite!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Adventure" by Limitless Escape Games in Livermore
review: Loved this place! I've done over 70 escape rooms and I had an absolute blast here. The staff is incredibly friendly and nice. The puzzles are well thought out and fun. I especially loved the decor of the Pirate themed room and the unique puzzles in their Sherlock themed room. I highly recommend this escape room.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Adventure" by Limitless Escape Games in Livermore
review: Great staff, fun experience, family and friends had a blast and managed to escape the Kraken! Will be back to try out the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Bank" by Escape Zone 60 in Pensacola
review: We absolutely loved the Bank Heist. Can't wait to do another one!

room_title: Escape room "The Bank" by Escape Zone 60 in Pensacola
review: Awesome time! The host was terrific and explained everything very well. The bank heist is tough and teamwork is essential! I would definitely recommend this for a family group looking for something fun and challenging!

room_title: Escape room "The Bank" by Escape Zone 60 in Pensacola
review: The best things about escape rooms are the puzzles and the people. The Crime Scene Bank Robbery was my fifth escape room and I was worried that I would start to see some of the same clues and puzzles. I was extremely excited to find that all the puzzles and clues were new to me. I loved the challenge. Our host was wonderful. He had a great sense of humor and made sure we had a great time. I can't wait to go back and escape the Asylum.

room_title: Escape room "Time Chasers: Race for the Cure" by trap't Escape Room Adventures in Stamford
review: Our group of eight recently took on the most difficult room at Trap't and had a blast. The room design was pretty amazing, really transporting you, and all the puzzles were very clever, and lots of fun! This was our second trip here and it did not disappoint. The staff here are also wonderful - very helpful, friendly, etc. Overall great experience.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Summer Vacation" by School of Hard Locks in Oceanside
review: There were 6 of us and we had the room to ourselves. We did Summer Vacation. It was very close but we escaped! I thought it was well thought out and put together. I've only done a few of these so I'm not world worthy but we had a GREAT girls night out. The staff were very friendly (and funny!) and added to our night.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Summer Vacation" by School of Hard Locks in Oceanside
review: This was given to me for my birthday and we had a blast! There were 4 of us who had never been in an escape room doing the Summer Vacation level 7 difficulty. Get your thinking caps on and think outside the box! The staff was accommodating with our time and very friendly! Would definitely recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Summer Vacation" by School of Hard Locks in Oceanside
review: Fabulous time yesterday. Working as a team brings you closer together as friends and I admire the skills of all my friends and new friends. Definitely a positive experience. Owner and mastermind behind it all was so cordial and fun. You can tell this is her passion and her enthusiasm puts the icing on the cake! Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Lost Treasure" by Back in Time Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I totally thought they were manually controlling the locks in the back while they laughed at our attempts, but the lady insisted that the locks are all player-controlled. Hm... if so, that's amazing because I was like...how did it know we got it right? I was with 3 other people that never did an escape room before so we had unlimited clues. w00t! I'd recommend this place. It's so much fun.

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Lost Treasure" by Back in Time Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Had a great time! Just want to thank Brandon and his whole team for their great customer service...great customer service means everything to me! Thanks for making this experience exceptional! They were very accommodating, helpful and friendly. My whole group had a great time can't wait to experience the other rooms they have to offer.

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Lost Treasure" by Back in Time Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: This place is SO great!! Booking is easy and quick to do online. Just pick a date, location, and which room you want to do. They tell you the size of the room and difficulty level. The staff is so friendly, welcoming, and entertaining!So far I've tried 2 of the rooms and they were both AWESOME! Great themes with a lot of creativity, detailed puzzles and sets/props, and a good level of difficulty to challenge you while keeping it fun! They allow you a certain number of hints during the game, too. (They were even very generous to offer a few extra ones for us - they want you to succeed!) Definitely recommend this place and can't wait to try escaping another room!

room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Trumbull in Danbury
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Alchemist" by Insomnia Escape Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: The Alchemist is one of the best escape rooms I have been to (and it's been a lot.) Just go, you won't regret it.

room_title: Escape room "The Alchemist" by Insomnia Escape Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: We did the alchemist room. The clues were clever, the room was surprising and we escaped with thirty seconds to spare! This was my first one and I would highly recommend. I hope to return to Insomnia Escape Room to try another.

room_title: Escape room "The Alchemist" by Insomnia Escape Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: So much fun! My whole family had a blast. The alchemy room was well thought out challenging, and extremely creative. This was our first escape room. I will definitely be coming back for more. Thanks for a great evening!

room_title: Escape room "The Alchemist" by Insomnia Escape Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: This was our first escape room ever and we are hooked. We did The Alchemist room, which was incredible... challenging and fun. Everything was of excellent quality... the room, props, etc. And the staff was extremely personable and helpful.We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Alchemist" by Insomnia Escape Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: One of my favorite Escape Rooms I have played. We did the Alchemist room and it was really awesome. I highly recommend it as one of the top games in the D.C./NOVA area. Played it as the second part of a double header coming from another companies big expensive room right down the street. Insomnia blew them away in terms of game quality.

room_title: Escape room "Side Show" by New Smyrna Beach Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: Took my daughter and her 5 girl friends for her 10 birthday. They did Sideshow and had a blast. Staff is amazing and the room was full of fun puzzles. Can't wait to come back and do it again.

room_title: Escape room "Prof. Pittsburgs' National Treasure" by EXIT Escape Room Adventures in Modesto
review: Our family had so much fun solving the puzzles in Kingdom of Exitia! Can't wait to go back and try the other room!!

room_title: Escape room "Prof. Pittsburgs' National Treasure" by EXIT Escape Room Adventures in Modesto
review: The National Treasure Room is amazing! I can't wait to do the Saloon! Everyone needs to experience an escape room! Great team building.

room_title: Escape room "Prof. Pittsburgs' National Treasure" by EXIT Escape Room Adventures in Modesto
review: It was so much fun. Just did the National Treasure room and had my mind blown. I definitely want to go back and try my hand at the Saloon room. I will be a repeat visitor!

room_title: Escape room "Prof. Pittsburgs' National Treasure" by EXIT Escape Room Adventures in Modesto
review: Extremely fun. This game kept everyone on their toes. Played the National Treasure room which was very well made. A lot of thought was definitely put into making the puzzles. Managed to get out with just a little over a minute left! The owners are very nice and shared in our excitement. Definitely going to try the exit saloon next time.

room_title: Escape room "Wonderland" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: This was my first time doing an escape room and it was awesome! We did the “Wonderland” room and TJ was super helpful and made the experience even better!

room_title: Escape room "Wonderland" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: Tj was amazing! He had GREAT attitude and stayed in character the entire time! 11/10! We did the wonderland escape room!

room_title: Escape room "Wonderland" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: Tj was an awesome clue giver and loved his bubbly personality. We did the Wonderland room and it was so fun. Highly recommend him. We escaped!!!

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Room Raiders in West Palm Beach
review: We all had a fantastic time trying to figure out how all of the clues went together to solve each area. My 10, 17 and 28 year olds ALL loved it and we worked together really well as a team! So much fun! We’ll definitely be back to try the other rooms. Thank you JAMES for helping to make our experience fun and successful :) See you soon!

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Room Raiders in West Palm Beach
review: The best escape game I've played so far. The game was fun and very creative. The design of the room was very detailed and of good quality. I felt completely immersed into the theme of the room. Plus they had some really cool features that I've never seen before.

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Room Raiders in West Palm Beach
review: This is honestly one of the better escape rooms I've done. The creepiness factor is off the charts. Everything is well done from the music to the room setup. Highly recommended.

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Room Raiders in West Palm Beach
review: Definitely not your average escape room! They make you think outside the box and we all had a great time. Can’t wait to do their new room in January!

room_title: Escape room "Mysterious Stranger" by Steal and Escape in San Diego
review: Wow! What a fun and challenging room! Denzel was extremely nice and helpful! He let us know about the other room option and will be back again very soon!

room_title: Escape room "Mysterious Stranger" by Steal and Escape in San Diego
review: Fantastic gameplay, well thought out theme, and immersive decor. The owner, Jason was encouraging and his fun demeanor was contagious. Anyone in the San Diego area must come try!

room_title: Escape room "Mysterious Stranger" by Steal and Escape in San Diego
review: Had a wonderful time with my escape room team! This was my 25th room and my teams 7th and it certainly didn’t disappoint. Loved the room, wonderful immersion, unique puzzles and passionate owners who love what they do. Couldn’t ask for anything more!

room_title: Escape room "Mysterious Stranger" by Steal and Escape in San Diego
review: This was definately the best way to spend a friday afternoon! Very challenging and rewarding! Owner is the nicest and you can tell he really enjoys his job! Makes the expierence that much better!

room_title: Escape room "Mysterious Stranger" by Steal and Escape in San Diego
review: Mysterious Stranger room - Played the escape room with 2 of my escape room partners in crime. The set and prop designs are beautiful, the flow of the game was smooth, and the transitions between the zones adhered and added to the story line. This has to be one of the top escape rooms in San Diego!

room_title: Escape room "Mysterious Stranger" by Steal and Escape in San Diego
review: This is a fabulous room well designed and great hospitality!!

room_title: Escape room "Deep Space" by Beat the Room in Sacramento
review: Had a blast doing Deep Space! Love the two new rooms! Great puzzles with a good variety. Everything in good shape and explanation of game/goal easy to understand. Huge plus...we made it out!! We did it with only four of us and loved doing it as a small group. Great fun!

room_title: Escape room "Deep Space" by Beat the Room in Sacramento
review: A friend and I came here to experience the Deep Space room and loved it! The room was very atmospheric, the puzzles were challenging but not impossible, and our "Mission Control" was very helpful! We didn't escape the room before the timer ran out but we did have a blast! This place is definitely recommended for a good time regardless of whether you win or not.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Tropic Escape in Fort Myers
review: Great exciting challenging concept! We did the Museum Heist and had a lot of fun! Staff was very friendly and helpful!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Tropic Escape in Fort Myers
review: Had a great time. Museum Heist was so cool! I felt like I was in movie Entrapment or Thomas Crown. We'll be back cant wait to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Tropic Escape in Fort Myers
review: We had a great time doing the Museum Heist room! Very challenging but so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Frankenstein's Laboratory" by Excido Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: This was a lot of fun. The staff was great. We are going back!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Frankenstein's Laboratory" by Excido Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Best 45 minutes of fun! Died while trying to figure out the last clue...

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Frankenstein's Laboratory" by Excido Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: This is our third time, we've taken different friends and family every time. Great team building experience. You really get what you put into it. We will go again!

room_title: Escape room "The Illuminati Box" by UFO VIDEO in Gainesville
review: Amazing decoding experience. Completed the Illuminati room in 70 min! The room is extremely difficult but a lot of fun to complete. I would highly recommend coming here.

room_title: Escape room "The Illuminati Box" by UFO VIDEO in Gainesville
review: This place is awesome! I highly recommend it. We did the Illuminati Box scenario and it was a ton of fun. This was my 5th escape/puzzle room and it was by far the most unique. There was a computer glitch with our reservation and Will completely understood and created a time slot just for us so we could play before leaving town. I wish we were around for the Video Store scenario. It sounds awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Plunder" by Make a Break Escape in Tampa
review: Our family of four completed the Pirate Plunder room and had a great time. The puzzles were challenging and fun, which led up to a satisfying ending and our escape.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Plunder" by Make a Break Escape in Tampa
review: Clean with awesome props!  The smartest people will feel stupid as you overthink the clues.Fun and frustrating for our family. Lots of laughs in the Pirate room.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Plunder" by Make a Break Escape in Tampa
review: We did the Pirate Plunder room. It was very interesting and different. We needed like 10 more minutes and we would have escaped! I want to come back and have my stepdaughter's birthday party here.

room_title: Escape room "The Lab 51 - Version 2" by Exit Game in San Diego
review: Incredible production value. Difficulty spikes require some really sideways thinking, but each room is unique with unique puzzles and real attention to detail. We've done every room here and they were all worth it, absolutely recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "The Lab 51 - Version 2" by Exit Game in San Diego
review: My wife and I visited Exitgame last week and it did not disappoint whatsoever. Upon arriving we were treated by our game host Drew where he made us feel very welcome and was very easy to talk to. We did the Lab 51 room and it was a good mixture of difficulty with the challenges. The only thing I would say was a little frustrating was being tall lol. Without spoiling anything I would recommend my tall friends out there stretch before doing this room. We have done between 20-25 rooms and this was definitely in the top echelon. I look forward to doing the other rooms they have, and I am pretty sure they are going to rock as well. Great job Exitgame, you deliver a legit experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Lab 51 - Version 2" by Exit Game in San Diego
review: I've done about 20 escape rooms and I was really surprised how good their AI room is in terms of decor, theme-related puzzles and how high quality the tech was in this room. Then I came back to do the Lab 51 room and also had a blast doing it. You can count on me to be first in line whenever they open up a new room. Would recommend to intermediate or experienced players!

room_title: Escape room "A Quiet Place" by HD Escape Rooms Westminster in Denver
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Th3 C0d3" by Escapology San Diego in San Diego
review: The Code was a lot of fun! We barely got out but we definitely wouldn't have gotten out without the help of Kris, Oscar, and Azhane!! Thanks so much for a great experience!

room_title: Escape room "Th3 C0d3" by Escapology San Diego in San Diego
review: This was my first time and I'm sure I will come again!!! Kris and Miranda were great workers, introducing us to our room and all that! Definitely recommend doing TH3 COD3!

room_title: Escape room "Th3 C0d3" by Escapology San Diego in San Diego
review: This was my first escape room! I had a great experience and it was totally challenging. Miranda and Kris were really good game hosts, teaching us how to play and pretty much everything we need to know. We finished our game (COD3) in just 40 minutes which was pretty impressive for us haha. This escape place makes me want to try out other escape places. Def coming back here in the near future!

room_title: Escape room "Th3 C0d3" by Escapology San Diego in San Diego
review: We had a blast! Oscar and Augustus were the absolute BEST. They made the experience so fun and memorable. I highly recommend this to everyone! We did "Th3 C0d3" and got out in 50 minutes!

room_title: Escape room "Th3 C0d3" by Escapology San Diego in San Diego
review: We took the family for the C0d3 and had an absolute blast. Game master Augustus was the best. Great personality and made our visit very memorable. The props and decor totally immerse you into the puzzle. Suttle hints were nice touch without giving the solution away. Everyone came away excited we escaped with 2 minutes.... even the 7 and 10 yr olds had a blast and was able to contribute. We will definitely visit again should we make it back to San Diego or another of the franchise locations.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: Breakout Mobile was our fifth escape room and one of my favorites. We did the Museum Heist, a very fun and brain-teasing room. The Breakout crew was super and the facilities were set-up very well. We made it out at 48:56 and will be back to do another room.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: Took my daughter here for her 18th birthday did the Museum Heist and that was so fun! Me and my family will be back and do the other ones.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: We played the museum heist game for one of my buddies birthdays recently and we had a blast! There were 9 of us in the room and there was still plenty for each person to do!! Also, we finished in the Top 10 times!! We were pretty proud!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: We had 3 adults and 5 kids, ages 9-13. The 9 year old may have been a bit young and therefore, frustrated because he couldn't figure out clues, but the others (11, 12, 13) had a blast and really got into it. We had a great time working together on how to break out of the museum heist.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: My family and friends had a friendly competition. The ladies did museum heist and the men did hostage. Of course the ladies broke out. We all had a blast. Great way to celebrate my birthday.

room_title: Escape room "The Haunt" by Lost in Lutz Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: The puzzles were neat and fun to find. It was a bit challenging at parts but not too hard at all. The room had a great atmosphere. Will definitely be back to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "TEG Unlocked: The Heist - Vol. 1: Chasing Hahn [DIGITAL]" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Dragon's Belly" by Fort Smith Escape Room in Fort Smith
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Project Fallout" by Novus Escape Room in West Palm Beach
review: None

room_title: Escape room " Matter of the Mad Hatter" by The Clue Room in Denver
review: Alice in Wonderland room was awesome! Very challenging. We escaped but took advantage of the hints! I can't wait to do another!

room_title: Escape room " Matter of the Mad Hatter" by The Clue Room in Denver
review: The Clue Room on Havana was awesome! It's family owned and operated and it was obvious they wanted you to have a good time. We did the Alice in Wonderland room and were paired with a family of 6 which were very pleasant and fun to play with. The pricing was fair and the clues were challenging. The experience was great. I'll definitely be coming back!

room_title: Escape room " Matter of the Mad Hatter" by The Clue Room in Denver
review: Great time! Went with 6 friends, maybe a bit too much for this room, but still had fun. Completed the WonderLand room with 3 min to spare... Cant wait to try the next level up room another time.

room_title: Escape room "The Butcher" by Escape the Place in Orange County
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Rescue from Voodoo Island" by Locksmith Escape Games in Orlando
review: Very well put together escape room. Staff was pretty cool.

room_title: Escape room "Rescue from Voodoo Island" by Locksmith Escape Games in Orlando
review: Great staff and fun game! 😊

room_title: Escape room "Rescue from Voodoo Island" by Locksmith Escape Games in Orlando
review: Fun time. Very unique and friendly game master. Thank you. Will definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "Casino Heist" by Paradox Escape Room in Phoenix
review: This place is great! The puzzles were challenging, but not frustrating. The staff were super friendly which made it even more fun!
