We actually didn't finish the casino heist, but there were only two of us and we were so close! The end when we lost was almost the best part because it was so funny! Totally worth the money!

room_title: Escape room "Casino Heist" by Paradox Escape Room in Phoenix
review: Great group of people running this fun place! The casino theme was a lot of fun and am looking forward to trying out the other rooms. I would definitely come back again!

room_title: Escape room "Casino Heist" by Paradox Escape Room in Phoenix
review: AMAZING fun! The owner was so much fun and really made the difference from other escape room companies! We did the casino heist and can't wait to go back and try the bunker. Thanks for a fun night out!

room_title: Escape room "Casino Heist" by Paradox Escape Room in Phoenix
review: We had an awesome time together stealing the loot from the casino :) Ages 8-69 all worked together and everyone had a blast and had no trouble contributing in different ways. Highly recommend for all ages!

room_title: Escape room "Casino Heist" by Paradox Escape Room in Phoenix
review: Soooooooooo fun!!! We did the Casino Heist room and now I want to go back and do the Bunker. Highly recommended if you're looking for a group activity!

room_title: Escape room "The Armory" by Kingdom Keys NWA in Centerton
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Cabin 13" by Legacy Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Some escape rooms make you solve puzzles that mean you go like, "okaaay... I guess..." but the puzzles in this room were fun, clever, and very doable. Julie was very friendly and made it super accommodating for the 6 of us.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin 13" by Legacy Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: This room was so fun! Just the right amount of spooky without me flinching at everything I unlock in case of a jumpscare. I don't want to give away any spoilers, but I will say I started in a mini room. The puzzles were challenging but not frustrating, and above all I they were fun. There were many puzzles where I thought "wow, that's clever!"--and i have probably done about 20 escape rooms at this point. Decorations were great, and our game master Julie was SO good at explaining clues. Go here!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin 13" by Legacy Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Cabin 13 was a great escape experience.  I love the format and puzzles of this room.  The staff and game masters do a great job with your group and creating an awesome experience.The experience is well crafted and we had a great time escaping!  I look forward to visiting again for a new experience.

room_title: Escape room "Beat the Clock" by Ace of Escape in Tucson
review: Our family was looking for something fun to do out of the heat that we hadn't done before. This fit the bill. We got to work as a team to solve puzzles and escape the room. The 15 year-old had as much fun as the 9 year-old, and everyone begged to go solve another room as soon as we'd finished. Highly recommended. They even opened just so we could fit them in our trip!

room_title: Escape room "Beat the Clock" by Ace of Escape in Tucson
review: The best date night ever! We did the clocks room which was very fun!We are going back for more this weekend and bring more people to join in on the good times.Can't wait

room_title: Escape room "CSI : ATL" by Brainstorm Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Had the best time! CSI Atlanta was very difficult. Will be back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "CSI : ATL" by Brainstorm Escape Games in Atlanta
review: I had a blast at the CSI room even though we didn't make it out in time. I had so much fun on my birthday. Very professional, great atmosphere, and very pleasant. I highly recommend Brainstorm Escape for a great experience.

room_title: Escape room "CSI : ATL" by Brainstorm Escape Games in Atlanta
review: We love escape rooms and Brainstorm did not disappoint. Super-friendly staff and a "just hard enough" escape room. Great for girls night out, families and corporate team-building. Highly recommended.

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Tactics in Fort Myers
review: I went today with coworkers and solved the Bank Heist. It was a blast! I'd definitely come back and give one of the other rooms a try. If you come here with a group of people you know, you'll have an amazing time and make great memories.

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Tactics in Fort Myers
review: Our first experience with escape room adventures. We made it out just as the alarm was sounding. What FUN! The Bank Heist was beautifully done with antiques and period novelties. The staff was AMAZING! They made the experience!! We are already getting friends together to do The Speakeasy. Worth the ticket price!!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Tactics in Fort Myers
review: It was SO much fun! I would definitely recommend it. If I had more time in Ft. Myers, I would go again and try the Speakeasy room (I did the bank heist). Also, David was fantastic! He was very encouraging and explained everything very well.

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Tactics in Fort Myers
review: Awesome, awesome, awesome... staff was so enthusiastic, genuine, and authentic.. they set up the scene and theme very well and were just so nice. Did the Bank Heist room and beat it BARELY! What an amazing time.. The owner was so enthusiastic about our win; she legitmately was ecstatic for us that we escaped with the loot! Over and above helpful both before, during, and after the game. Brought my wife as a surprise and she didn't know what to think at first but left in love with it and we felt so goof about ourselves that we had the communication to get through it.

room_title: Escape room "Shadow Menagerie" by Hall Of Shadows Escape Games in Redlands
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The JetSki Escape" by The Jet Ski Escape Room in Miami
review: This was my second time to an escape room experience this was way better than my last as they have way cooler locks and creativity. The people gave us hints as needed and helped us but it is very unusual.

room_title: Escape room "The JetSki Escape" by The Jet Ski Escape Room in Miami
review: First escape room ever. Had a blast. Family of 4. Sam was great a and gave us clues as needed. Would recommend and do again.

room_title: Escape room "The JetSki Escape" by The Jet Ski Escape Room in Miami
review: My group and I enjoyed this room soooo much!!! Karina was our host. She explained everything to detail. Was very helpful and the entire theme and puzzle/clues and all made sense.  We were 3 and shared the room with a couple and it was just enough people. Everyone figured something out and we helped each other as a team even though we didn't know each other.It had 3 sections but we didn't know that til we figured out the clues, obviously. It's by far the best one I've done, the most organized, nothing broken, best time ever!! We've done a few already, this one is worth spreading the word.

room_title: Escape room "Budapest Express" by Escapology Lakeland in Lakeland
review: So much fun... almost escaped! We did the hardest one Budapest Express. Loved figuring out how to get from room to room. Want to go back and do another one.

room_title: Escape room "Budapest Express" by Escapology Lakeland in Lakeland
review: Our family did the Budapest Room. First time we did an escape room. Had a Fantastic time! Everyone should try this place out!

room_title: Escape room "Budapest Express" by Escapology Lakeland in Lakeland
review: My mom came for a vacation and we wanted to do something different so we decided on the escape room. Best decision, ever! We all had such a blast trying to escape Budapest! The room is decorated so well, we really got immersed into the story. Thank you and I'm so glad y'all are in Lakeland!! Definitely coming back for another room.

room_title: Escape room "Budapest Express" by Escapology Lakeland in Lakeland
review: My group did the most difficult room, Budapest Express, and had a fantastic time. The room was elaborately decorated and very immersive. I loved the whole experience. The staff was very friendly and the entire vibe of the place was fun and inviting. Can't wait to try out more rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The One 2 Escape Room in Miami
review: Great place! Did "The Heist" with friends and enjoyed it immensely. Owners were friendly and enthusiastic, and I loved my experience there. Hoping to go back to do "Quarantine" soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The One 2 Escape Room in Miami
review: This place is awesome. We did "The Heist" challenge and it had the perfect balance of challenge and fun to go along with the storyline. The puzzles were put together perfectly. It's also great that the owner and staff are awesome too. I will definitely be back for the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The One 2 Escape Room in Miami
review: We did the Heist with our children and had a great time. Kimberly was a sweetheart and explained everything thoroughly. Thank God for her hints. A great bonding experience with the kids! Props were very authentic and the rooms were decorated perfectly.

room_title: Escape room "Vacation Vandals" by Key Quest in Los Angeles
review: Took my son and a few friends here. Had a Blast!!! The staff is friendly. Will definitely come back soon.

room_title: Escape room "Vacation Vandals" by Key Quest in Los Angeles
review: Giving 3 stars because I'm being a hater haha took my son and some friends here for his 14th birthday. I am being a hater because the vacation vandals is HARD. It was a lot of fun but disappointed we couldn't solve it. We got about 3/4 done and got stuck. We probably should have asked for help sooner. We wanted to solve it on our own so we didn't call for a help clue till we were down to 15 minutes and by then it was too late we didn't have enough time to finish. But all the workers were super nice and the boys had fun doing a few games of laser tag beforehand. I will check back here seeing if anyone has solved it though.

room_title: Escape room "Vacation Vandals" by Key Quest in Los Angeles
review: I had an excellent experience here last night with my grandkids, thanks!!

room_title: Escape room "Mirror Mirror" by Brainstorm Escape Room Bonita Springs in Fort Myers
review: This was my first Escape Room experience. I had a really great time in the Mirror, Mirror room. It was perfect for 4 to 6 people.I really loved that the actual upstairs lobby was themed and part of the story before entering the room. The music added to the suspense and the clue communication tech was really great. I would definitely go back and recommend this to anyone interested in trying. From what others told me Dinner Party is their star attraction.The con that took away from the experience was that that Breakout remove price tags and refresh some of the props. Also, some of the puzzles would have been impossible without someone who had been to an Escape Room before.

room_title: Escape room "Mirror Mirror" by Brainstorm Escape Room Bonita Springs in Fort Myers
review: Loads of fun! Went with a group of girls from work, did the Mirror Mirror room. Failed miserably but not for lack of trying on the game-master's part! Very helpful with the clues, we were so close at the end but time just ran out. We will definitely be back to try our luck again!

room_title: Escape room "The Rise of Excalibur" by Brainy Actz in Los Angeles
review: This is really cool place!!! Really save, really, interesting for any ages. My kids want to return more and more!

room_title: Escape room "The Rise of Excalibur" by Brainy Actz in Los Angeles
review: Challenging, fun...truly a great time, with teamwork and comarderie!

room_title: Escape room "The Rise of Excalibur" by Brainy Actz in Los Angeles
review: Had a blast and the host was wonderful. Bringing my kids with me next time.

room_title: Escape room "The Spaceship" by The Room LA in Los Angeles
review: Loved this place, went with friends and we had such a great time, just the place alone gives you a spaceship vibe and outstanding work!

room_title: Escape room "The Spaceship" by The Room LA in Los Angeles
review: WOW! Had the BEST time! Our first experience in an escape room and it was even more fun than we expected! We did the Spaceship experience and will be going back soon to do the Cabin.

room_title: Escape room "The Spaceship" by The Room LA in Los Angeles
review: We had one hour to get out of a space module. Had to decipher many clues and riddles manually and electronically. Our family plus 2 got out with about 40 seconds to spare. We found life on planet Zoe and lived to tell about it! Easier to open locks would improve rating.

room_title: Escape room "The Spaceship" by The Room LA in Los Angeles
review: Super fun, and the interior of the spaceship room was really cool - it looked and felt like we were in space! The storytelling was a little bit confusing though (hard to figure out what exactly the point of each puzzle was) and some of the props were really challenging to work with which cut into our time. But overall it was very fun, the woman who worked with us was so nice and professional and helpful, and we had a great time! And we escaped with 3 minutes to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Denver in Denver
review: We had a great time doing the Bank Heist room. There were 4 of us and that was plenty but I could totally see it being more fun with more people. Morgan was great at giving us clues when we needed them. The bank room was challenging yet a lot of fun. I would definitely go back if I lived in the area.

room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Denver in Denver
review: This was our first escape room and it was so much fun! The staff was fantastic! We did Western Bank Heist and had an absolute blast! We want to go back for the Submarine!

room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Denver in Denver
review: We loved the room. We did the bank heist!! It was fabulous. It was difficult but we managed to escape. The gals running the place were very professional. We will be back. So many rooms to try!!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break - Walk the Mile" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: Our first time with escape rooms and it could not have been a better experience. We did the Prison Break room. Staff is great and we will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break - Walk the Mile" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: Booked our Odyssey Escape Game, Prison Break - Walk the Mile, for our first family escape game adventure. We chose Odyssey Escape Game because all ages can attempt the challenge. Our 6yr old was so excited because he could go!! The team at Odyssey Escape Game are super friendly and made our experience perfect even though we didn't escape. We will be booking our next adventure, Titanic - The Final Hour, in the near future.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break - Walk the Mile" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: BEAUTIFUL, spot-on, roomy, and immersive rooms, right difficulty, and amazing customer service. Honestly, I'm so happy and tired that I can't think of any more positive adjectives to describe how much I enjoyed the Prison Break room and overall experience here. I will be recommending Odyssey to everyone and also be back to try out all rooms eventually. Thank you for putting obvious thought and effort into your rooms. Odyssey really stands out among the competition. Also, Josh and I think Sydney (sweet girl with glasses!), you two were absolutely wonderful to interact with. Thank you for making our experience so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "Fortune's Favor" by Escape Sacramento in Sacramento
review: What a fun night! You must do this! Josh was our guide and he did an awesome job!! He explained what we needed to do and put us at ease. He was super positive and didn't make us feel"stupid".This was a change of pace from out every other month bookclub gather and we all had a blast! We solved many of the clues and unlocked the treasures. We really enjoyed this and I highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Fortune's Favor" by Escape Sacramento in Sacramento
review: Super fun times solving Fortunes Favor! This one is a cool cave/forest feel. Really beautifully constructed to transport you into another place. I have previously done The Seance, Gallery, and Heist here and each challenge presents new solutions and methods that I've never experienced before. They really go the extra mile here. We had a great time with five of us in the room. The premise was fun and played on cultural knowledge. It had a mild level of creepiness/darkness which I personally prefer to heighten the excitement. Caitlyn (sp?) was a great hostess. Having the 8pm time slot, I think she let us have an extra 15min because we were on a roll. We really appreciated that because it let us fully discover the room and succeed rather than cue the lights and open the door with remaining unsolved puzzles. We will definitely be back here for another challenge next month. Maybe The Space Station... Our team can't wait!

room_title: Escape room "Fortune's Favor" by Escape Sacramento in Sacramento
review: just tried their newest room fortunes favor and it absolutely rivals the best rooms I've played in sac!!! This room is most definitely fun, themed, and challenging. You will have a great time taking in the challenge of fortunes favor!

room_title: Escape room "Red Sled Redemption at the Holly Jolly Holiday Hubcap Repair" by Doldrick's Escape Room in Orlando
review: Red Sled Redemption was my 44th room and the 3rd room we completed at this place. Doldrick's is by far one of the best escape room businesses in central Florida. Everything from the decor to the puzzle progression, from the lobby to our game master, it was all excellent. While we absolutely loved Red Sled Redemption, my absolutely favorite is Spoopy Bones, but honestly you can't go wrong with any of their games. This place is an excellent escape room for beginners and enthusiasts alike. ENJOY!

room_title: Escape room "Red Sled Redemption at the Holly Jolly Holiday Hubcap Repair" by Doldrick's Escape Room in Orlando
review: We did the Red Sled Redemption room with our two kids (ages 10 and 6) and we all had a great time. Nothing was scary or inappropriate for the kids but the puzzles were still very challenging and engaging for the adults. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Red Sled Redemption at the Holly Jolly Holiday Hubcap Repair" by Doldrick's Escape Room in Orlando
review: We did Bomb Squad and Red Sled. Both amazing! The technology in the rooms was better than anywhere we've ever been. And they both hit the perfect balance of high difficulty and legit abilitiy to finish. Great stories and flow. The game masters always knew where we were, and knew exactly how to gently nudge us when needed. Well done!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Black Site" by One Way Out Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: This was a great place we will definitely do this again.

room_title: Escape room "Black Site" by One Way Out Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: It was really hard but they did give us a few more clues on the first room. The second room one was a little more easier and more self explanatory

room_title: Escape room "Black Site" by One Way Out Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: Just did Black Site. It was my fifth escape room and by far the most challenging. Absolutely loved it and look forward to trying more rooms here in the future. Matt was a great with giving us hints too.

room_title: Escape room "ESC201" by One Way Out Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: My work team did ESC 201 as a team building exercise. We had so much fun working together to find the clues. The room is very interactive and one of the best escape rooms I've done. Our host, Amanda, was awesome! We already bought our tickets for the next room!

room_title: Escape room "ESC201" by One Way Out Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: My friends and I had a blast trying to solve the puzzles in ESC201. We were about five minutes from breaking out. I appreciate how One Way Out uses story-driven rooms that build on one another. The Patient is next up for our team.

room_title: Escape room "ESC201" by One Way Out Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: Went and did the ESC room for our first escape room. It's amazing and definitely worth it - so so much fun. We were so close to getting out! The best time ever.

room_title: Escape room "Magic Academy Mystery" by Real Escape Game in San Francisco
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Saloon 66" by Flagstaff Escape Space in Flagstaff
review: Went to the escape room on very little notice (we wanted to do something fun, yet none of us planned anything) after confirming they had availability. I'm so happy we went to this one. It was fun and detailed and different from any escape room I've been in before! We completed the Saloon Room, and I can say that it was difficult to make all of us think, but also just easy enough for us to get out with 7 minutes to spare. Please please go here! Book a room online or call ahead, the price is well worth the hour given to play and if I'm ever in Flagstaff again I'll be trying to hit this place up.

room_title: Escape room "Saloon 66" by Flagstaff Escape Space in Flagstaff
review: Our family LOVES Escape Rooms and we've done rooms in several different states and we really enjoyed this room! We booked last minute due to the weather changing our spring break plans and this was definitely a silver lining of that!! We did the Saloon 66 room it was challenging and fun we unfortunately didn't escape but we had a great time trying!! Would definitely recommend this company to anyone looking for Escape Rooms in Flagstaff!!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Subway" by Escape Room Clearwater Beach in Tampa
review: This escape game was amazing. There are TVs mounted in the walls that look like windows as the escape subway goes barreling down the tracks. All of the clues and puzzles were incredible as they activate mechanisms and lead you to the next clue. 5 stars!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Subway" by Escape Room Clearwater Beach in Tampa
review: This would be a great experience for first-timers. We had a group of 8 people, including 3 teens. Everyone had a blast, but it only took us 22 minutes to complete it. It would be better if it had a few more puzzles to stretch the time to be closer to an hour.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Subway" by Escape Room Clearwater Beach in Tampa
review: This was an awesome experience! We did the Subway room and I loved how immersive this was.If you have done an escape room before; you will absolutely respect the production value of this one. This is also a heck of a way to break into this awesome niche of entertainment.Drew was our game controller and he's as fun and as professional of a man I've met. He will ensure you have the tools to enter, and an experience you'll talk about to friends and family afterwards!Enjoy and good luck making it out!

room_title: Escape room "The Bunker" by Puzzle Room Tahoe in South Lake Tahoe
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Blood Thirst" by Epic Escape Game in Phoenix
review: Totally didn't know what to expect but ended up having great fun! 'Blood Thirst' is totally clever.. high recommendations for sure!

room_title: Escape room "Blood Thirst" by Epic Escape Game in Phoenix
review: The six of us failed the Dracula room. While we had a ton of fun and completed over 60%, we were constrained by the linear progressive design. It was well designed. Great times.

room_title: Escape room "Blood Thirst" by Epic Escape Game in Phoenix
review: While Dracula may have defeated us that evening, our spirits and adrenaline were high on into the night! Bloodthirst was definitely challenging (we probably should have started with an easier room) but the puzzles were well thought out and very satisfying when we were able to solve them.The staff was friendly and the experience was great overall even though we failed in our mission! We will definitely be back to attempt some of the other rooms. Thanks for a great time.

room_title: Escape room "Blood Thirst" by Epic Escape Game in Phoenix
review: This was definitely fun! Though we lost Blood Thirst, we had a great time. Kicking ourselves for not listening to our gut about asking for the 1st clue early on, but we did not have a whole group vote on it since our foursome was paired up with another foursome & they did not want it. We almost made it! Ugh! Definitely a return in the works for another room! Staff was super friendly and helpful! Go here, peeps!

room_title: Escape room "Blood Thirst" by Epic Escape Game in Phoenix
review: I played the Dracula game with 4 other people, I felt it was very well crafted. It really is very challenging because it is not intuitive, the game had far too many steps, which were hard to follow. More people do not help because the game stops completely at points while you figure out one particular step. Good luck to any who dare to try it!

room_title: Escape room "Mardi Gras" by Get a Clue in Orange Beach
review: We did both the crime scene and the Mardi Gras room and LOVED both of them! We have done 9 escape rooms and these are in the top for sure!! Definitely give them a try, you will not be disappointed!

room_title: Escape room "Mardi Gras" by Get a Clue in Orange Beach
review: My family and I had a great time working our way through the clues in the Mardi Gras room. We loved the way the room was set up with great decor and interactive props. It was challenging and exciting. We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Mardi Gras" by Get a Clue in Orange Beach
review: We had a great time trying to escape the Mardi Gras room! Definitely something everyone should try! Thank you Mark and Sharon for a great evening!

room_title: Escape room "Mardi Gras" by Get a Clue in Orange Beach
review: We loved it! I took my two children 8 and 11 years old. We did the Mardi Gras room. When we didn't know what to do next we were helped with clues. This was fun for my kids and me. We will be back to do the crime scene room next!

room_title: Escape room "Alien Autopsy" by New Smyrna Beach Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Terminal" by Themescape Escape Rooms in Denver
review: I did the Sector X room and returned for The Terminal, both experiences were so fun! They put so much effort into building a quality room, the puzzles are challenging but make for an experience you'll want to come back for!

room_title: Escape room "The Terminal" by Themescape Escape Rooms in Denver
review: The Terminal is a super fun room. You really feel like you're in a NY subway station and the puzzles are really cool - they use loads of technology! Really unique and entertaining. Turned me on to escape rooms - can't wait to try more!

room_title: Escape room "The Terminal" by Themescape Escape Rooms in Denver
review: Our group of 5 did The Terminal room and had a blast. We were so close to finishing! I liked that it was just our group, so we were working with only people we know. Three of the five of us had no experience in an escape room and two of us had a little experience – like one or two times. This was a tricky one – especially finding that first clue. I will say there were a couple of items in the room that had NOTHING to do with the progression of the escape and that threw us because we were sure they were some sort of clue and actually caused us to miss the most important clue. But, the people are super nice and do a great job of explaining what to expect and are good with providing clues when we got stuck.

room_title: Escape room "Six Shooter Bunk House" by Ace of Escape in Tucson
review: Went with a group of 5, and we are all old hats at escape rooms. We've probably done about 20 so far in Vegas, St. Louis, Orlando, Phoenix, etc. This room was okay for a Tucson escape room. It was better than two other Tucson rooms we tried last weekend. The decor was very good - It did get you feeling like you were in the old west and there were some fun trinkets to look at. The downside for my group was that the puzzles/clues did not seem realistic - they were quite random and left us wondering things like, "Why on earth would a person write that bit of info on that item??" "Why would a person ever hide that thing in this way?" The puzzles and clues just weren't realistic at all. So if you are particular about authentic scenarios, you may be a bit underwhelmed here.If you don't care about practical story-lines and game play, then you will probably really enjoy this room!

room_title: Escape room "Six Shooter Bunk House" by Ace of Escape in Tucson
review: We have done a room at each location, and both were so much fun. The 6 shooter room was great! We were a group of four which was perfect for the difficulty level and size of the room. We made it out of this one with seconds to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Lost City" by Escapology Lakeland in Lakeland
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Escape Truck" by NorCal Escape Co. in Yuba City
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Rift" by Time to Escape in Denver
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We decided to attempt this room because my boyfriend is a huge Fallout fan. I personally didn't think this room was too challenging, as everything was pretty linear and straightforward for the most part. High production value, and overall fun experience. Would recommend to anyone who likes Fallout or is looking to do an escape room with a smaller group since the max is 4 for this room.

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: My sister and I did Outbreak, which was our first room. Neither of us knew what we were doing but with the help of Felicia, our host, we finished with 7.49 minutes to spare! Great fun can't wait to do another one. Fun for all ages.

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I booked the Outbreak room for my husband's Father's Day gift and I am so glad I did! I love the player-friendly style (unlimited hints, delivered via loudspeaker), the incredible attention to detail in the room, and Special Agent Crystal was an awesome element to the story-telling!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I organized a group event for my company here. It was a fun to try to work out way out of the rooms. Damien and the rest of the staff were incredibly helpful. Puzzles were challenging but worth the experience so I highly recommend 60 out. They were in the process of building two new rooms so it looks like we'lol probably be back soon for another round.

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I have done 2 of 60out's escape rooms and they were both amazing! The puzzles were challenging but not impossible. I loved the sets in both the rooms. The game masters were fun, friendly, and helpful. A great way to spend an hour! I have already booked my third room with them. Thanks to 60out I'm completely hooked on escape rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Houdini's Secrets" by New Smyrna Beach Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: The NSB escape room was the funnest thing I've done in this town lately. The Houdini room had a mix of puzzles and teamwork which kept on our toes and as a team we escaped! This is a must try attraction that everyone has to experience.

room_title: Escape room "Kazam!" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: We disarmed the bomb with 1 1/2 minutes left. Phew...... We had so much fun. Great interactions with clues and listening clues. The room was decorated nicely and easy to manuver in. The employees were very very nice and seemed like they were having a great time too. We can't wait for the next theme to come out. We will be back and am telling friends. What a fun time for all ages.

room_title: Escape room "Kazam!" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: This was an awesome experience. Next time we are in Denver we will be back for more!

room_title: Escape room "Kazam!" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: Fun activity that will either strengthen or end your relationships! Be mindful of who you take with you. In all seriousness we had a great time, thank you!

room_title: Escape room "Kazam!" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: Loved it! Great backstories on the puzzles, the staff member there was great and passionate about the place, and my group had a blast! Glad we beat Kazam with 4 seconds left

room_title: Escape room "Kazam!" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: My family and I (3 generations) beta-tested Kazam and it's so much fun!! The look of the room is fantastic and the technology used in the room is clever and sophisticated. For those with steady hands, I recommend the Heist. You'll need them to solve the puzzles to grab the priceless coin.

room_title: Escape room "Kazam!" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: I am worthy magicians apprentice! Just did Kazam with 3 of my coworkers. A combination of Goonies/Indiana Jones and National Treasure is how I would describe this room. 10/10 would kazam again

room_title: Escape room "Kazam!" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: Super fun and mind boggling in the best way possible. Will definitely come back and tell all my friends about it.

room_title: Escape room "Key to the Throne" by Game the Room in Rohnert Park
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Escape Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Budapest Express" by Escapology Destin in Destin
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Hacker of Silicon Valley" by BreakoutStudios in San Jose
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Space Heroes VR" by ZScape Games in Livermore
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Time Warp" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Save the Queen" by Team vs Time in Hartford
review: My fiancé and I love doing escape the room games. Save the Queen was one of my favorites! This is a true form of unique and immersive entertainment. I would definitely recommend this for people of all ages. Gamers especially... if you like solving puzzles and playing video games.... you'll enjoy this! We will certainly be back to try all the puzzles!

room_title: Escape room "Save the Queen" by Team vs Time in Hartford
review: I went twice just this week for the Book of Lost Spells and Save the Queen and couldn't be happier. The time and effort they put into making the sets and making sure it is an enjoyable experience is above all others. I cannot wait to come back and finish the others! 10/10 would recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Save the Queen" by Team vs Time in Hartford
review: Best escape rooms I've ever been to!! The attention to detail is unparalleled, there's a HUGE variety of puzzle types which makes it so much fun and the staff are far and way the most wonderful and friendly people I've ever met. Save the Queen was awesome and I'm dying to come back and visit so I can try out Gangsters Gamble!

room_title: Escape room "Save the Queen" by Team vs Time in Hartford
review: This was my first adventure/escape room experience, so I am unable to compare to others.  I will say though that I was impressed by the room we did. I felt immersed in the game and the theme. We did "Save the Queen" which is the hardest one.  We escaped with 17 seconds to spare.The staff was great.  I look forward to returning in the future.

room_title: Escape room "Titanic" by Escape Room Live in Washington, D.C.
review: My family & I had so much fun doing the Titanic themed room today. We made it out with just 30 seconds to spare. Taylor...our guide was fantastic! The place even has a bar & lockers for your belongings.

room_title: Escape room "Titanic" by Escape Room Live in Washington, D.C.
review: Did the Titanic. Hard going but well worth it. Had a great time. Well organized and v good staff. Would go again.

room_title: Escape room "Titanic" by Escape Room Live in Washington, D.C.
review: I arranged this for my sister's 50th birthday. I loved the ambiance and the decor, very classy. We were in the titanic room, very challenging. We didn't make it out in time, but we were able to find all the clues with help. Staff were very friendly and answered all our questions. Loved the photo op and debrief after. Loved my first escape room experience and my sister and friends had a great time.

room_title: Escape room "Titanic" by Escape Room Live in Washington, D.C.
review: Had an awesome time! Staff was very friendly and the Titanic room was a well put together with a few convincing red herrings.

room_title: Escape room "Titanic" by Escape Room Live in Washington, D.C.
review: My daughter hosted a 16th Birthday Party in the Titanic Room at the Georgetown location. We could not have been happier from start to finish! The staff was welcoming to all - and the facility was spacious and beautiful. The girls remained excited and engaged throughout their "voyage" - and were quite challenged by the experience. My husband and I were able to relax with a beverage in the lounge while the girls tried to escape; it was a fabulous experience for all!

room_title: Escape room "Salem Gallows Hill" by Time Travel Escapes in West Palm Beach
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Safe Cracker 2" by New Smyrna Beach Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: 6 family members in a small room solving clues to escape. What could possibly go wrong? Seriously, we had a great time in the Safe Cracker room. Go team!

room_title: Escape room "Safe Cracker 2" by New Smyrna Beach Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: Great time tonight with family trying to escape the Safe Cracker!

room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by Hawaii Escape Challenge in Honolulu
review: Soooooo much fun! I would call it an entry level escape room which is to solve easily in the 60 min with 3 people minimum. The “aha”-moments are awesome. Wish the map was less detailed!

room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by Hawaii Escape Challenge in Honolulu
review: The Diamond escape room was very challenging but fun. The staff was super friendly and helpful in accommodating to my baby gender reveal surprise. They had really good ideas and worked with our ideas also. My friends and I definitely want to do this again!

room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by Hawaii Escape Challenge in Honolulu
review: We completed the Diamond Heist room. It was challenging but we had lots of fun!

room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by Hawaii Escape Challenge in Honolulu
review: I had a great time today at the Diamond Heist in the Pearl Ridge Mall. The staff was extremely friendly and gave awesome clues when needed. I have been to a couple different breakout rooms in Hawaii and this was was definitely unique. I had a great time and we were able to finish with just over two minutes left! Thanks guys for the awesome experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Toy Shop" by Get A Clue Room Escape in Temecula
review: Highly recommend this escape room!  We did the Toy Shop and really enjoyed it.  The owners and staff are so friendly and helpful!  Cannot wait to come back to do the Attic.

room_title: Escape room "The Toy Shop" by Get A Clue Room Escape in Temecula
review: I went for the first time to try an escape room for my birthday. My friend and I were put into the toy story room and had a terrific time. We were able to escape with less than a minute left. The owners were very helpful and gave clues and assistance when needed. It was a lot of fun and I highly recommend this.

room_title: Escape room "The Toy Shop" by Get A Clue Room Escape in Temecula
review: Wow can't say enough nice things about these rooms. Playing these rooms where hours of fun. We got out of the toy shop but not the attic that was a highly detailed room. And we wish we had more time to finish but the owner was so kind in letting us get to the end and helping us with the clues we did not see. All and all a great room and it just got better and better as we played. Can't wait for their next adventure coming soon. Don't miss this place. Fun for a date night or a group of friends. Bring your thinking caps. You'll need them.

room_title: Escape room "Game Master" by Escape Room Ft Myers in Fort Myers
review: It was such a fun room. Had a lot of twists and turns. We did game master and loved it! I recommend... it was pretty tough but we did it in 55 min

room_title: Escape room "Game Master" by Escape Room Ft Myers in Fort Myers
review: We went for my aunt's birthday and we had a blast doing the Game Master room! We will definitely come back again!

room_title: Escape room "Game Master" by Escape Room Ft Myers in Fort Myers
review: Enjoyed the “Game Master” room! Great design and clues. The owners are always friendly and accommodating! Can’t wait for their next room to open!

room_title: Escape room "POD" by A Narrow Escape in Hot Springs
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Terror in Tinseltown" by Mighty Awesome Escape Rooms in San Marcos (CA)
review: Great team bonding/team building activity! We managed to solve the mystery with a few minutes to spare. If you have never experienced an escape room, this is the place to go. We will be coming back for more fun!

room_title: Escape room "Terror in Tinseltown" by Mighty Awesome Escape Rooms in San Marcos (CA)
review: I did both rooms at the Mighty Awesome and the master behind putting the rooms together is so clever! In a world were be are so connected by technology, go play with your friends and use your brains together, you'll bond in a healthy way!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak: Find the Cure" by Mastermind Escape Games in Jacksonville
review: I had a wonderful experience at Mastermind! Britney and Dana were great hosts. We did Outbreak and managed to finish in under an hour with no clues used. Woohoo! I can't wait to come back and try the sorcerer room.

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak: Find the Cure" by Mastermind Escape Games in Jacksonville
review: We loved our visit. We were celebrating my husband's birthday and it made it that much better that we beat the room. We did the CDC room and it was great. Escape with 7 mins to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak: Find the Cure" by Mastermind Escape Games in Jacksonville
review: We went here for a team building event. Our group was split into two teams. One team went into the Outbreak room and the other in the Bank Heist room. We were all challenged and entertained. It was a blast! Booking the event was easy and the staff was awesome.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Atlanta in Atlanta
review: I had soon much fun. Everyone just try this. The staff is amazing. They greated us with joy. Cody was our gane guide. He has very informative with the rules. When you think you figure it all, think again. It is loads of fun with each and ever turn!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Atlanta in Atlanta
review: The Escape Game is absolutely amazing, from the ultra modern interior to the out of this world set design of the escape games. I have been to quite a few escape rooms and I have to say this establishment has been the best so far. I have been to this location twice since it’s open to play The Heist and Gold Rush and my friends and I were able to escape both. I can’t wait to come back and collect more cool t-shirts!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Atlanta in Atlanta
review: To Zach, Josh, Courtney, and Brianna, thank you from both Dylan and me!! This staff will bend over backwards to make sure you enjoy your time in their rooms! It is absolutely clear that this group of employees is close knit and well managed. Each personality shines in it's own way, adding to the fun of each visit! These are some of the best rooms available. We've played escape games in at least five major cities and after having played 'Heist, Gold Rush, and Spec Ops' these are some of the best!! The sheer ingenuity of each room is astounding! We were challenged in ways we'd never before seen in a room. If you're seriously considering taking up the escape room challenge, do yourself and a favor and book here! It may be just a bit more expensive than other places, but it is ABSOLUTELY worth it.Again, thank you to Zach, Josh, Courtney, and Brianna for making our experience fantastic! Trust and believe we'll be back with reinforcements to take on Prison Break!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Atlanta in Atlanta
review: This location just opened, but as an escape room enthusiast I can say this location is one of the best escape rooms I've been to. Even the business as a whole is just nice, modern, and so well put together. My crew played Heist and we were able to make it out. The puzzles were amazing and I cannot wait to come back and experience the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Now that was fun.  I am lucky to have friends that enjoy escape rooms, and we've tried them all over the city.  (Undefeated!)  I must say The Escape Game Atlanta was a lot of fun.  We did The Heist.  The whole thing was very professionally put together.  Very clever puzzles.  Very clean presentation.  Fun story line.  And staff was very helpful and friendly.  I wouldn't mind going back to try the other rooms.  Holler if you're coming with.

room_title: Escape room "Captain Spoopy Bones and the Magnificent Quest for some Other Pirate's Treasure" by Doldrick's Escape Room
review: Completely blown away. We have done well over 100 rooms and captain spoopy bones is by far the best game we have ever played! The flow, the game guides and the customer service are all exactly what you would expect and want out of an escape room. If you have the chance to play this game, DO IT. Thanks for such a wonderful date night!

room_title: Escape room "Captain Spoopy Bones and the Magnificent Quest for some Other Pirate's Treasure" by Doldrick's Escape Room
review: This room was off the charts with the technology it used. The puzzles made logical sense. The staff wants you to succeed! There are no limit to clues they give. We solved Captain Spoopy Bones with time to spare and no clues with six of us. We can't wait to go back again!!!

room_title: Escape room "Captain Spoopy Bones and the Magnificent Quest for some Other Pirate's Treasure" by Doldrick's Escape Room
review: Great room. Good use of technology and puzzles were challenging, but not impossible. Staff were lovely, and the games in the lobby were a nice way to pass the time.

room_title: Escape room "Dracula: The Final Hour" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: My team and I came out here to try Dracula, after hearing it is an original game created by the owner of the location, and we couldn't be more impressed. The set design, puzzles, immersion was on point. Perfect game for a max of 4-6 people. I would definitely recommend it to everyone!

room_title: Escape room "Dracula: The Final Hour" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: Wow. First time doing an escape room at this location and will def be back. The Dracula room is difficult, very well designed and beautiful. Not your average escape room. They do help you if you need it and even if you're a seasoned vet of escape rooms you're gonna have a great time. Thank you!!!

room_title: Escape room "Dracula: The Final Hour" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: Shout out to Teri!!! Dope GM for Dracula and Zombie lab! Loved the rooms especially Dracula! I loved the ending to it and the room itself wasn't super easy either. Will comeback to do Tesla at some point to collect my passport stamp!!!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Home" by Chamber Escapes in Miami
review: Just left the escape room and we had a blast. There were four of us and my niece suggested we try something new. Todd and his sister were amazing - super accommodating and friendly. We finished the last puzzle in a mad rush. Very interesting to see everyone's personality under pressure! I would absolutely recommend this!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Home" by Chamber Escapes in Miami
review: An absolutely amazing experience! A full hour of puzzles to solve and escape!  The owner, Todd, is amazing. His attention to detail in the room and the well thought out puzzles kept our group energized and entertained for the full hour, escaping with only a few seconds remaining.

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Home" by Chamber Escapes in Miami
review: Had a blast! Went for a date and got paired with strangers, which wasn't awkward at all. The staff is super fun and engaging which made the experience even better. Totally recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Lab: Resurrection" by Great Room Escape San Diego in San Diego
review: This was SO scary!!! We arrived with a group of 10 and did the mad lab. It was everybody's first time so we didn't know what to expect. We all had to sign a waiver and listen to instructions beforehand. You are not allowed to bring phones and purses. You will have to put it in a bin that will be in the same room with you. For the actual escape room, most of the times, we were screaming and scrambling so it was very hard to think while a chained up radioactive professor was chasing you. My heart was pumping pretty fast and my adrenaline was rushing. The mad scientist who was supposed to be our helper and guide, scared us even more! This was definitely not an easy escape room. We didn't make it in the 1 hr limit but it was still so much fun + SCARY! Definitely  check in yelp for the free extra hint because you will need it! Kudos to you if you can solve this escape room with no hints!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Lab: Resurrection" by Great Room Escape San Diego in San Diego
review: A friend and I did the zombie lab with a few other groups and it was such a fun experience. I thought it might be kind of awkward doing it with strangers but once the timer started we easily got into the groove as a team. I definitely enjoyed my time and will be going back to try another one. Whether you're going for a date, girls night, or team building I highly recommend Great Room Escape!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Lab: Resurrection" by Great Room Escape San Diego in San Diego
review: I've been to several escape rooms and this one was one of the best! We had a great time. The level of difficulty was challenging but not impossible. We did the "Mad Lab" scenario. There is a zombie on a chain and as time ticks by, the chain gets longer. If he touches you they put you in a cell and you have to answer questions to get out. Having this element added to the game definitely made it interesting and kept us on our toes!The staff was nice and helpful. I would definitely recommend this one!

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard’s Brig" by Escape Rooms FL in Miami
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Carcel" by Escape Room Delaware in Dover
review: Double date night with friends and it was such an awesome way to spend the evening! The prison kept us guessing but so much fun! We made it out with 15 minutes to spare. Definitely worth it! And the staff were great... very pleasant! We are def coming back!

room_title: Escape room "Carcel" by Escape Room Delaware in Dover
review: Went with a group of 11 last night to celebrate a retirement, figured she had finally escaped from working daily so sticking with that theme. It started with all of us being handcuffed together as a chain gang. We had to figure out how to escape a Mexican prison. We didn't escape in the 60 minutes but everyone laughed and had a great time. It was a fun activity at a reasonable price before heading to dinner with the group. Definitely recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "Speakeasy Nouveau" by Quicksand Escape Games in San Diego
review: We played the Speakeasy Nouveau as a family. It was my husband and I and our two 10 year old boys.We have played a couple of escape rooms in the past as a family, so we have a little experience. This rooms is by far our very favorite ever. The story, variety of clues and puzzles, and props were all very well done. We also love the fact that its more than one room, you are led into more rooms with more clues which adds so much to the excitement! We found the clues sufficiently challenging, as we had to ask for a couple of hints along the way. The number of puzzles was perfect as we escaped with literally no time to spare. We had such a great time we came back the next night, while we were still in town, and brought another family along with us. The eight of us solved the Diner room. Again, great fun, great puzzles, and a large enough space so we all fit very comfortably and had plenty of different puzzles to work on simultaneously. They are also very competitively priced. Less expensive than some rooms we have visited, yet so much better!We highly recommend Quicksand Escape Games.

room_title: Escape room "Speakeasy Nouveau" by Quicksand Escape Games in San Diego
review: Me and my family booked a trip to the Quicksand escape room while on our family vacation in San Diego. I came recommended from a friend and did not disappoint. I had not been to an escape room before so did not know what to expect. It was engaging, challenging, and a lot of fun. Would highly recommend for anyone that likes a challenge and is looking for something different/fun to do.

room_title: Escape room "Speakeasy Nouveau" by Quicksand Escape Games in San Diego
review: The location is right in the middle of busy pacific beach. The hosts are amazing and extremely accommodating as we were running late. They were very professional and knowledgeable and absolutely made the experience so much better! We attacked the Speakeasy Nouveau and got out with minutes to spare. There were a few minor hiccups however the hint system and the quick response by Andy kept the game flowing! All in all, Quicksand Escape is one of my top favorite escape rooms! I've completed The Diner, the Speakeasy, and Chinatown to date!

room_title: Escape room "Crisis at 1600" by America's Escape Game in Miami
review: We had a blast doing the "Crisis at 1600" room. It is kid-friendly compared to some of the other rooms there. I've been to other escape rooms before, but this one was tougher. They allow you 3 hints during the hour and we needed them! Getting out with just over a minute to spare. Wasn't expecting it with 4 kids, but they all did a great job. Can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "Crisis at 1600" by America's Escape Game in Miami
review: The staff was fantastic. Very nice, very amenable. The game was very challenging. There were 8 of us, and it took all eight to finish the room in 50 minutes. We're DEFINITELY coming back to do those!!!

room_title: Escape room "Crisis at 1600" by America's Escape Game in Miami
review: First experience at an escape room and what an awesome time!! Escape Artists Clarissa, Nadji, and Siggy were awesome! Crisis at 1600 was so much fun and definitely left me with a headache in a good way! I am moving out of state shortly but when I visit I will definitely be back!!! Thanks ladies!

room_title: Escape room "Professor Moriarty's Game Room" by The Great Escape Room in Miami
review: Just finished going with the team from work. It was a really great experience. We did the game room. The puzzles were really innovative and challenging. At first, things don't make sense but then it all comes together. The staff was wonderful. I would recommend this to anyone.

room_title: Escape room "Professor Moriarty's Game Room" by The Great Escape Room in Miami
review: My group had a wonderful time looking for clues and solving puzzles. We will definitely return to give the new room a try!

room_title: Escape room "Professor Moriarty's Game Room" by The Great Escape Room in Miami
review: An exciting and great way to spend time with friends and family or colleagues. This clues can be tricky and you really got to think. The staff are excellent and can be helpful. It's a wonderful creation. :-) Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "Turing Test" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Rooms are fun, challenging and very immersive. Fun for the family!

room_title: Escape room "Turing Test" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I had a great time here!! This experience taught me the value of teamwork. The staff is great! Rose is great and should get a raise!!

room_title: Escape room "Turing Test" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Great venue. Interesting rooms with great attention to detail and awesome effects. Had a great time getting two rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Mutiny: Skull Island" by Escape Games at The River in Rancho Mirage
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Curse on the Emerald Seas" by Puzzle Effect San Luis Obispo in Grover Beach
review: We had a blast! Went as a girls party to the curse of the emerald sea, and it was harder and even more clever then I thought! So much fun! Also Kristen was amazing and so helpful. Definitely going again!

room_title: Escape room "Curse on the Emerald Seas" by Puzzle Effect San Luis Obispo in Grover Beach
review: I did not realize that I had booked the most challenging room they offered. The Emerald Curse was pretty tough. Puzzles were very creative and fun. The room followed the theme very well. The staff member was very friendly and helpful. Would definitely go again, but would do an easier room. Lol

room_title: Escape room "Curse on the Emerald Seas" by Puzzle Effect San Luis Obispo in Grover Beach
review: We had a great time trying to escape the Curse of the Emerald Sea! Challenging, exciting, and well decorated. Left us guessing down to the last minutes! Will be back for other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Morgue of Dr. G. Reaper" by Trapped In Decatur in Huntsville
review: Lots of fun! Definitely going back! We did the "Escape from Morgue" and had a great time. I would recommend this to everybody!

room_title: Escape room "The Nuclear Event" by Cold War Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: I got to do both the rooms that Cold War Escape Currently has. I would recommend both but I would tell everyone and their brother that the Nuclear Event is a fantastic room for people new to rooms and a great story. You will have fun here. The location feels safe as well which I can't say for every room in Daytona.

room_title: Escape room "The Nuclear Event" by Cold War Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: My friend and I did the Nuclear Event today, and we were very impressed and entertained. The owner walked us through the briefing and we were off, solving puzzles to get the combinations to various props, each leading to the next step in the scenario. The clues are well done, and the plot flows from step to step in a logical and consistent manner.The rooms are very well constructed and staged and the props look and feel realistic and substantial. It is clear that a lot of work went into the design and execution of these escape rooms.I highly recommend Cold War Escape. Great fun, and we were completely engrossed in the puzzles. We completed the room with just minutes to spare

room_title: Escape room "The Nuclear Event" by Cold War Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: Excellent theming! We loved Nuclear Event! My mom had never done an escape room before and it was a great first experience for her. My fiancé and I have done a few before this and Cold War Escape is definitely one of our new favorites. We can't wait to go back and try the interrogation room.

room_title: Escape room "The Nuclear Event" by Cold War Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: My girlfriend bought me and my sons the Nuclear Event. Both my boys and I loved it. She had a blast too! We will be back to do the Interrogation Room in the near future.

room_title: Escape room "Memento" by Cubic Escape Room in San Jose
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Gauntlet: The Hunt for DB Cooper's Treasure" by Escape Woods in Atlanta
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Den of the Occult" by Escapedom in Los Angeles
review: So much fun! Did the den of the occult with 4 people and got pretty far but didn't finish. No regrets it was still awesome. I'll definitely be going back!

room_title: Escape room "The Den of the Occult" by Escapedom in Los Angeles
review: Escaped the Den of the Occult on Monday, June 12th in 42+ minutes. Very good room with lots of clever puzzles and physical contraptions, all of which made for a fun game.

room_title: Escape room "The Den of the Occult" by Escapedom in Los Angeles
review: We tried the Den of the Occult. The staff was very cool. The clues were imaginative and there were some innovative effects. A great way to spend time with friends and get to know people.

room_title: Escape room "The Den of the Occult" by Escapedom in Los Angeles
review: Had a wonderful time visiting "Den of the Occult" from the UK. Great mix of traditional and technology, some very clever clues to figure out combinations. The climax had fun interactions which were a brilliant addition to the room and gave the wow moments that make escape rooms so enjoyable. We look forward to visiting you again in the future when we return to California. Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "The Den of the Occult" by Escapedom in Los Angeles
review: Difficult and challenging puzzles! Fun to do with a group of friends. Teamwork is key! Also at a great price!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape The Room Scottsdale in Phoenix
review: What an annoying time, the whole room was tired to the ability to solve a freaking slide puzzle.  Every thing else you can piece it together, but if none in your team can do it good luck. Highly disappointed and would not recommend this room just based on the slide puzzle.  I would give the other rooms a try.

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape The Room Scottsdale in Phoenix
review: Had an amazing time solving the Dig with my family! Amazing puzzles and will definitely recommend and will do more again soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape The Room Scottsdale in Phoenix
review: Very cool. Definitely a different way to spend a Saturday night! Our room was like an archeology, "Indiana Jones"-type room. We spent the hour trying to decipher hieroglyphics and codes to try and find our way out but came up a few minutes short. Our Clue master was great and guided us well. We will definitely go back and try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape The Room Scottsdale in Phoenix
review: Came here with my wife and 8 friends for "The Dig" and had an absolute blast! The escape is challenging in that you all have to work as a team while receiving clues. While one person may interpret a clue one way, another person may have a different approach to things. If you want to get out within the allotted 60 minutes, you need to work as a team. Luckily, we got out in 58:59!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape The Room Scottsdale in Phoenix
review: I went with my team at work we all had a great time. It was super fun and we got out with 4 minutes to spare. It makes you "dig" deep (ha!), get creative and really look beyond the norm. I would definitely suggest it for a fun night!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape The Room Scottsdale in Phoenix
review: I came here to celebrate my birthday with my co-workers and we had so much fun!!! Loved the Dig, I thought it was really kind of difficult and the whole thing was really intense. However, it was definitely a lot of fun and exciting every time we figured out a clue. We ended up getting out with two minutes to spare!! It's a bit pricey but I definitely want to come back to try the other rooms!!

room_title: Escape room "Caged" by Beach Escape Game in Tampa
review: What a great place. We really enjoyed the adventure. We did the cage escape room. It was a blast. We made it with 13 minutes to spare. Can't wait to try another room next time.

room_title: Escape room "Caged" by Beach Escape Game in Tampa
review: We had a great time and the staff was really friendly. We tried Caged. Unfortunately, we didn't make it out but the game truly tested our reasoning skills and teamwork. It's also a great outing for when you meet new people, everyone gets to relax and just have fun.

room_title: Escape room "Caged" by Beach Escape Game in Tampa
review: My boyfriend and I did the Caged Escape room! We actually finished with just over 10 minutes to spare. We definitely could have spent more time on it though if we weren't as careful. We had such a wonderful time, they gave us just enough information to get you to the next clue without it being super obvious. Definitely challenged our minds. Will definitely come back and try the harder ones!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Face Off" by America’s Escape Game in Orlando
review: What a blast!! I seriously want tocome back and do all the rooms!!! We attended my sister's birthday party here and had so much fun!! Can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "Face Off" by America’s Escape Game in Orlando
review: Thanks Katie! We had an awesome time. Way to go Team StoneTemplePiolots!!!

room_title: Escape room "Face Off" by America’s Escape Game in Orlando
review: This is so much fun. I died in one room and booked another one for tomorrow!

room_title: Escape room "Face Off" by America’s Escape Game in Orlando
review: I've played two rooms at your company and both times my groups escape artist was Steven I. He did such a great job helping us solve puzzles if we needed a clue and made the experience even more suspenseful and fun! Definitely will be coming back for more!

room_title: Escape room "Face Off" by America’s Escape Game in Orlando
review: We had an amazing time! It was thrilling and the staff made it so fun. Thanks Brett and shanna!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Face Off" by America’s Escape Game in Orlando
review: Great time, staff is very friendly and helpful, rooms are full of clues and puzzles, its a great way to challenge your team problem solving skills, we will definitely be coming back for another challenge.

room_title: Escape room "Face Off" by America’s Escape Game in Orlando
review: One of the best things I did on vacation! It was so good, we went back the next night to do anther game. Would recommend to anyone with problem solving skills!

room_title: Escape room "Atlanta" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: Wow! What an amazing experience we had last evening at the Ultimate Escape Game Atlanta. With just 1 minute and 5 seconds to spare we completed The Vault and found the Faberge egg. There were 7 of us all family members. This business was highly organized from the moment you registered to the end of the game. It was challenging, but so much fun. We will definitely return to try other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Atlanta" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: I had an amazing time with my friends for my birthday at Ultimate Escape Game Atlanta! Angela, the manager was awesome and I plan to book another attempt to escape a room with UEGA!The game room was very well planned and put together and it motivated us to work together. Angela set up a birthday surprise for me and my friends after our Vault experience! Brent our room guide was awesome sauce as well!!!Five stars all the way!!!

room_title: Escape room "Atlanta" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: We had the best time! So much fun.I can't wait to go again. I highly recommend everyone to experience this game!

room_title: Escape room "Atlanta" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: My son (15) and daughter (13) and I had a great time today! Though we didn't escape the Atlanta room, it was a lot of fun trying and we can't wait to return and try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Atlanta" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: We did the Atlanta room with 12 people. There was not enough space for all 12 of us to be involved in the clue solving so it was really fun for some and really not fun for others. We were a group of 8 and got partnered with a group of 4 - this part you can't control...and because it was obvious that there were too many people, it "felt" like they were willing to sacrifice a player's experience to put more people in the room for $$$.

room_title: Escape room "Atlanta" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: OMG!! This was so much fun. If you think you are smart and have great problem solving skills this is the place for you. Our team did this as a team building exercise. It was loads of fun. We really jumped right into the experience. It was great working to together to solve clues. I would definitely do this again. It was awesome.

room_title: Escape room "Atlanta" by Ultimate Escape Game in Atlanta
review: Our family had a great time at Ultimate Escape. It was fun and challenging and the surprises were nonstop in solving the mystery. I've been twice and had a great time both times, in different mystery rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Crisis at the North Pole" by Premier Escape Adventures in Sarasota
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by ESCAPE:chandler in Phoenix
review: 5/5 stars for Escape:Chandler! We’ve done The Cabin and The Pawn Shop. Both rooms are immersive and have great designs. It’s clear the owners put much thought into their themes and room decoration. The owners also exude passion for what they do and make the experience even better. The puzzles flow well and are fun to solve. I would recommend this place to anyone. Thanks for the great time!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by ESCAPE:chandler in Phoenix
review: Just spent a fun hour here. The Cabin is just the right amount of spooky and creepy suspense. The owner/gamemaster was so good at her job, so we felt the experience was amazing. We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by ESCAPE:chandler in Phoenix
review: I booked this as a team building activity for myself and my management team. We did the cabin theme and had SO much fun! Zuzu was great, super friendly and explained everything really well. We escaped with 23 seconds left! We definitely want to come back and do the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Confusionism" by Gone In 60 Minutes in Longmont
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Finders Keepers" by Frisco Escape Room in Breckenridge
review: So much fun and pretty tough! We finished with 24 seconds left and we will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Finders Keepers" by Frisco Escape Room in Breckenridge
review: This place is amazing! Their rooms are built based on true stories of local Frisco area history, and when you step into the rooms you forget about everything else and become a part of the story. The staff/owner is fantastic! I can't say enough good things about this place!Took my 3 children ages 8, 10 and 11. We did the Finders Keepers challenge and were blown away with how much fun it was! Definitely a well deserved 5 stars!

room_title: Escape room "Geneva Trail" by Evolution Escape Rooms in Miami
review: Awesome activity for first date. Geneva trail is very hard. We made it to the last room but never would have figured out how to get out after being shown how.

room_title: Escape room "Geneva Trail" by Evolution Escape Rooms in Miami

room_title: Escape room "Geneva Trail" by Evolution Escape Rooms in Miami
review: The attention to detail on the Diner and the Cabin rooms are incredible! I went with family and friends and had a blast. I can't wait for the third escape room to open.

room_title: Escape room "High School Detention" by House of Hints in San Diego
review: Visited House of Hints as a work team building exercise. There were enough of us to split into two groups and compete in escaping high school detention. We had a blast. Will definitely visit in the future.

room_title: Escape room "High School Detention" by House of Hints in San Diego
review: House of Hints was so fun! The detention room was super challenging, but still very fun. Matt enhanced our overall experience with his humor and upbeat attitude. I would definitely recommend this place to others. I can't wait to go back and try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "High School Detention" by House of Hints in San Diego
review: Pretty good room with some fun twists. I would recommend it to anyone and would give it a 7/10 based on the rooms I’ve completed. My main downside was that I thought the main story didn’t necessarily flow throughout the entire game but still fun and unique puzzles.

room_title: Escape room "Apartment A.I." by Rock Ave Escape Room in Tampa
review: Loved the challenge - the host was great and the story line was cool. We completed it, but once the other rooms open we’ll have to come back because the story doesn’t end in the apartment!

room_title: Escape room "Apartment A.I." by Rock Ave Escape Room in Tampa
review: I’ve been to many escape rooms and Rock Avenue was definitely one of my favorites. The owners were very friendly and you could tell they put a lot of thought into the room. Would recommend this escape room great experience!

room_title: Escape room "Apartment A.I." by Rock Ave Escape Room in Tampa
review: This was our first time to an escape room and it was awesome! I brought my 8 and 6-year-old and it was definitely family friendly! It was still challenging but they could work along with us to solve the clues! Thank you for creating something super fun that the whole family can enjoy together!

room_title: Escape room "Apartment A.I." by Rock Ave Escape Room in Tampa
review: If you're looking for the coolest escape room in the Tampa Bay Area, this is the place. This place will be fun for anyone, especially sci-fi fans :) Went here with a group of friends and had the most fun time in a long time, I seriously can't recommend it enough!

room_title: Escape room "Apartment A.I." by Rock Ave Escape Room in Tampa
review: This was one of my favorite escape rooms so far. It's got this unique single storyline throughout all the rooms! They only have one room open so far, but the rest are coming soon and will continue the epic storyline they've created! My girlfriend, Kristin and I pulled through with 17 minutes and some change left to go! We had an awesome time solving the puzzles and cannot wait for the other rooms to open up so we can save Dominic from the evil AI! We definitely recommend Rock Ave, so head on over and try to beat our time! Thank you, Mayor Rob, for an awesome time! We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Ghost Chamber" by Wizards & Wires Studios in Redlands
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Pirate's Den" by MagIQ Room in Los Angeles
review: it was awesome !!!!!!!!!!!! the codes were fun and the puzzles too! my team made it out with 7 minutes to spare!!

room_title: Escape room "The Pirate's Den" by MagIQ Room in Los Angeles
review: I did this room with a group of 3, and felt that it was a good number although the GM told us that it would be more tough attempting this room with such a smaller number of people. We felt that the room was okay overall, good for those who are new to escape rooms. It was literally just locks and keys, as we felt that room didn't have a high production value because some of the clues and props just looked out of place. On top of that, when we were inside the room we could hear people talking really loudly outside, which broke our concentration from the room. We had to ask for hints for certain puzzles because we literally had no clue how to solve them, but overall this is a learning experience that I will be taking with me to the next escape room I do. We escaped with about 3 minutes to spare.

room_title: Escape room "The Pirate's Den" by MagIQ Room in Los Angeles
review: Went with a small group of 4 to do the Pirate Den. It was our first trip to a room escape and we had a blast! The puzzles felt complicated yet beatable and there were many different types. The room was immersing and very well designed. Staff was friendly and helpful. I can't wait to go back and try out the Pharaoh room!

room_title: Escape room "The Pirate's Den" by MagIQ Room in Los Angeles
review: Loved it! We escaped but with less than a minute to spare! (From Pirate room). The lady working was really nice and very helpful both before and during our experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Pirate's Den" by MagIQ Room in Los Angeles
review: Challenging but a lot of fun. Made it out of the pirate room with seconds to go. Clever puzzles and great rooms. Can't wait to try other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Pirate's Den" by MagIQ Room in Los Angeles
review: Our family had a great time and escaped the pirate room in the nick of time!

room_title: Escape room "The Pirate's Den" by MagIQ Room in Los Angeles
review: Birthday party perfection for adults and children alike!!!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: Introduced some newbies to the game and enjoyed my third round. Best time yet in the Casino room. Our game master [Jack] was AWESOME! Thanks for great night! Can’t wait to go back.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: We did the Casino game and it was so fun!! We had to figure out many different logic games. The staff was very nice and offer hints if you get stuck. Definitely want to go back and try all of them!!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: My husband, myself and two other couples did the casino! Very challenging, but we were able to break out!! Can't wait to go back!!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: This was so soo much fun! We had a blast. We were a little surprised to be paired with strangers to reach capacity, but it turned out fine. It was such a challenge and we broke out of casino Royale in 58:54! I hear that this is the hardest one!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: A group of 7 of us played the casino room today & had a blast! We didn't break out but it was fun & our game master Ashton was fun to work with! Will definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "Houdini" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I've been to three different 60out locations and each as been wonderful. The rooms are decorated to feel realistic and the clues are clever. Staff has been friendly and professional. We just keep going back. One of these days we will finish without assistance! No way.

room_title: Escape room "Houdini" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Fantastic staff. Easily the best production value in an escape room I've ever seen. Definitely worth your time and money!

room_title: Escape room "Houdini" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: best escape room out there! highly recommend to everyone!

room_title: Escape room "The President's Briefcase" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Great fun, nice service, challenging. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The President's Briefcase" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: It was very fun to do but very complicated but so much fun I thought it was a little to hard but I would recommend you doing this

room_title: Escape room "The President's Briefcase" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
