review: We did the Murder Express escape room, it was fun and we appreciated the level of detail they put into the room.

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Mastermind Escape Games in Augusta
review: We had a blast at Escape Rooms!! We completed the "Bank Heist" on our first try and were so pumped about it that we went for the second room. Fantastic place and great staff who are very knowledgeable! Well worth the money!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Mastermind Escape Games in Augusta
review: Did the Bank Heist because we had a big group with several engineers. Took us too long to get going because we didn’t know what to expect, l guess. Once we started rolling we collected enough cash but ran out of time before we could get out of the door. A good challenge and we’ll definitely come back again.

room_title: Escape room "VR: Mission I" by Red Door Escape Room in Sacramento
review: I love this place! Amazing detail put into the design and layout of the rooms!! There are 5 rooms and 3 VR games available and I can't wait to work my way through all of them!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Becoming Houdini" by Puzzling Escape in Phoenix
review: We spent the evening escaping from the Houdini room! My team of seven were warmly welcomed to a clean and friendly lobby. Our game master Janey was fun and professional! When we beat the room record she was excited with us. The overall experience was awesome! The room itself was a 9/10 difficulty and it was pretty complex. We’re fairly experienced escapists and this room was truly difficult. I totally recommend Puzzling Escape!

room_title: Escape room "Casa Segura" by Escape Bradenton in Sarasota
review: We did the Casa Segura room and we had so much fun! Can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "Casa Segura" by Escape Bradenton in Sarasota
review: Went to Escape Bradenton as a year-end celebration/team-building event and it was a great experience. We split the group and did Casa Segura and Crucifixus... Both received rave reviews. Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Casa Segura" by Escape Bradenton in Sarasota
review: Our group of 7 had a great time last night in the Casa Segura room! What a blast! Highly recommend Escape Bradenton!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Watson’s Infirmary" by The Great Escape Room in Tampa
review: We escaped from Dr. Watsons Infirmary and it was a blast! This is a great team building event! Q is hilarious and adds fun to the room! We enjoyed you Q!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Watson’s Infirmary" by The Great Escape Room in Tampa
review: The great escape room was so much fun, and Q was the best surgical assistant ever! Highly recommend doing this with nine people you know and love to have fun with! Will totally be back again!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Watson’s Infirmary" by The Great Escape Room in Tampa
review: Great experience at The Great Escape Room the Dr. Watson's Infirmary. We are veteran escapees and have done many rooms around the area and this was one of the more challenging rooms. The tech and design were top notch and we had a great facilitator in Faith, she was awesome (highly recommended). Will definitly be going back to attempt some of their other rooms soon!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Watson’s Infirmary" by The Great Escape Room in Tampa
review: Q was awesome!!!! This place is awesome!! The infirmary was an awesome room to try and figure out. We will be back.

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Watson’s Infirmary" by The Great Escape Room in Tampa
review: My family and I went on 5/25/17 to celebrate my birthday. It was so much fun! It's challenging and exciting! We would definitely go back. The infirmary beat us but we'll be back! Harley was amazing!

room_title: Escape room "The Shed" by Dare To Escape AZ in Phoenix
review: the rooms are fun and challenging and the employees are awesome!

room_title: Escape room "The Shed" by Dare To Escape AZ in Phoenix
review: So much Fun and well crafted rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Shed" by Dare To Escape AZ in Phoenix
review: Great experience. Most definitely will go back!

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: The Zodiac room was everything. Staff was very nice and very clear about rules. Extremely fun, the setup of the room really puts you in the atmosphere of the story behind it.

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: Oh I have been looking forward to this room for awhile! I volunteered to be the first victim in, and was rewarded by being handcuffed down. Be warned there's a lot of blood and it has a definite creep factor. These puzzles were not as challenging mentally, but because of the handcuffs and clear physical limitations, proved to be pretty difficult to finally escape.

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: I did the Zodiac room with my girlfriends and had so much fun! I would definitely recommenced it if you like horror and scary and interactive! I was thoroughly impressed by this room and the puzzles involved! Also our game master Danny was so funny and sweet and cute! I cannot wait to come back and do their other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Shattered Kingdom" by Locked In Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: We did the Shattered Kingdom Room. It was so much fun. We almost made it out. We will definitely return to try another room.

room_title: Escape room "Shattered Kingdom" by Locked In Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: I did the Shattered Kingdom with my 22-year-old son and had a BLAST! We were paired with another father-son duo. We started off a little slow as it was all of our first time but once we got rolling it was intense with the clock ticking. I would highly recommend Locked In Escapes. We can't wait to go back and try a different room!!

room_title: Escape room "Shattered Kingdom" by Locked In Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: We booked the Shattered Kingdom room and are so glad that we did. This was our first time at Locked in Escapes and we had a great time. Only had 29 seconds left but we made it! It was a very fun and challenging room. Highly recommend it. Thanks for the fun Locked in Escapes! We will be back to do more of the rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Shattered Kingdom" by Locked In Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: Went with family, and it was a blast!We were really blown away by the props and imagination in Shattered Kingdom.The staff was fantastic and welcoming, the system of communication was intuitive, and all in all it was a great experience.

room_title: Escape room "Shattered Kingdom" by Locked In Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: Locked In Escapes is by far my favorite escape room place that I've visited! The Shattered Kingdom was fun with a good amount of difficulty, we finished with 22 seconds left! Definitely recommend and we will be back to do the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Hollywood Dreams" by Escape Room Long Beach in Los Angeles
review: My friends and I had a really great time! I have done several escape rooms in the LA area and this by far was the most creative and challenging. You can tell they put alot of energy into creating a fun and exciting atmosphere. Great job guys!

room_title: Escape room "Hollywood Dreams" by Escape Room Long Beach in Los Angeles
review: Tried the easiest one and failed. Will return to pick up where we left off.They would of showed us the solution but we said save it we will be back.

room_title: Escape room "Green's Garage" by Map Dot Escape Room in Atlanta
review: Very fun and challenging. We're already planning on doing it again to see if we can get farther than we did the first time.

room_title: Escape room "Green's Garage" by Map Dot Escape Room in Atlanta
review: What a great experience and some really great family time. Very well done. This is the type of fun activity and business our city needs. Everyone should try it and support this local business.

room_title: Escape room "Green's Garage" by Map Dot Escape Room in Atlanta
review: My family had so much fun escaping Greene's Garage! I've done one other escape room, and Map Dot is high quality with lots of fun surprises. I'm excited for their new rooms to open and will definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Escape" by Escape-topia in Miami
review: A great night of fun and mental exercise and ZOMBIES!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Escape" by Escape-topia in Miami
review: We did the Zombie Escape tonight. Had a great time and Chris and the staff were amazing! What a fun experience, we will definitely be back to do the other rooms!!! Thank you for a great evening!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Escape" by Escape-topia in Miami
review: We did the Zombies with just me and my girlfriend. We escaped, the puzzles were fun yet challenging. Kraig was very informative and helpful he is a great asset to the establishment. We enjoyed ourselves we will be back for the other rooms soon.

room_title: Escape room "Social Ranking" by Kuma Escape in San Jose
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Thief" by beat60 in Gadsden
review: We absolutely loved our experience here! We had booked The Captain, and loved it so much we stayed and did The Jewel Thief! Honestly, if we had the time that day, we probably would have gone ahead and done The Darkness! It's a great addition to the Gadsden area. Thank you so much for bringing this experience to Gadsden!

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Thief" by beat60 in Gadsden
review: Had a great time with the kids trying to solve The Jewel and The Captain. These games are well designed and so entertaining! The Captain is very challenging! Definitely need your thinking cap on this one! Highly recommend Beat 60!!

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Thief" by beat60 in Gadsden
review: Very laid back place! We tried "The Jewel Thief" and it was definitely challenging but fun.

room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci's Secret" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: This room is definitely challenging. I went with a group of 6 and I felt like I wasn't doing anything in certain parts of this room because there was no space for me. I admit that some of the puzzles I could not figure out but luckily for me my teammates were really smart about this. I would recommend this room for anyone who is looking for a challenge because this room definitely got me thinking a lot.

room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci's Secret" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I did the Da Vinci room with my friends last night and had a blast. This room is extremely challenging and sooooooo good. The puzzles felt really unique and the decor was top notch. Plus, if you finish under the time limit with 2 clues or less you get a prize. Sheryl was our game master and she was super helpful and nice. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci's Secret" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Just did the Da Vinci room and it's excellent. The puzzles are very challenging but never unfair. Some of them are pretty ingenious and they all stuck with the theme very well. Basically if you want to feel like Tom Hanks in the Da Vinci Code but without the awkward mullet, this is the place to go. I did this with 6 other experienced escapees and we still got out right at the 75 minute mark (or so the game master Sheryl tells us. She definitely played up the drama and was very helpful overall). I'm looking forward to trying the two other rooms at this location.

room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci's Secret" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I recently did the Da Vinci room with my friends and it was easily one of the best rooms I've ever done.  I thought the 75 minutes might feel too long but it was perfect considering the huge amounts of amazing/difficult puzzles which perfectly fit the theme of the room. Sheryl was definitely one of the best game masters I've ever had at any escape room I've been to.

room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci's Secret" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: This is a beautiful room but it is really hard. Since the puzzles are so different, it took us some time to understand what to do. We spent a lot of times on puzzles we thought we could solve faster. I don't even think 75 minutes is enough time to get through this but there are plenty of others who have finished this room within that time frame. We had a group of 6 and when time ran out we were told we still had a few more puzzles to complete. Even though I am salty about the loss, I still highly recommend this room to the seasoned escape room goer.

room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci's Secret" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We have done about a dozen escape rooms (from 60out as well as a couple other companies) and this is honestly the hardest room that I have ever done. The room had tons of unique puzzles, not just lock and key. I don't even think 75 minutes is enough time to solve all of the puzzles. Even though we got tons of hints we were unable to escape. Despite this, we still had a lot of fun. I would recommend Da Vinci for escape room pros and bigger groups (maybe 4-6 people) so that each person can work on different puzzles at the same time.

room_title: Escape room "Doll House V.2" by PuzzleMazement in Los Angeles
review: We did the "Doll House"! This was our 6th Escape Room, and it was easily one of the best! This is the only one I have ever done that had 3 different levels of rooms that needed to be cleared. It was like unwrapping a present to find another present that needed to be unwrapped, and I loved that! The back story was creepy, but fun...which added its own special element to the whole experience! Jake was an excellent host, and I am excited to go back to try another room! Definitely money well spent!

room_title: Escape room "Doll House V.2" by PuzzleMazement in Los Angeles
review: Great fun doing the doll house! We had a group of 9 girls and the puzzles were challenging, creative, and fun to solve. Highly recommend this for a group.

room_title: Escape room "Doll House V.2" by PuzzleMazement in Los Angeles
review: It was amazing! First time doing one and Ariel really helped a lot! She was able to guide us through some beginner rooms. We did 2 rooms, Dr. S (a steam punk room) and the doll house. Doll house was 3 stories and with 8 people we were able to make it with a minute to spare! Great team building exercise and super fun. Especially for the price. Definitely going to be doing more in the future.

room_title: Escape room "The Dark Sector" by North Valley Escape Room in Phoenix
review: Give this place a 100% approval!! Friendly, knowledgeable, helpful, and best of all FUN!! Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "The Dark Sector" by North Valley Escape Room in Phoenix
review: Visited the North Valley Escape Room with our out of town guests. We had an amazing time! It was so much fun for all. We have done other escape rooms across the Valley and this is by far the best!

room_title: Escape room "The Dark Sector" by North Valley Escape Room in Phoenix
review: This was the first time we had ever done this and it was so much fun. Somebody had told us this one was the best in the area and we were glad she did. A great experience. My only criticism was that we were told all the clues we had missed and if they hadn't told us we would probably do the same one again. A missed opportunity for more business.

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Dare 2 Escape in Orlando
review: My 2 friends and I escaped the Asylum today and had a blast! This was my first escape room experience and I highly recommend it. I will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Dare 2 Escape in Orlando
review: This whole experience was fantastic! Customer service was great from the moment I called to book, the staff were friendly, fun, and passionate about visitors having a great experience. We did the Asylum and it was great! Thank you so much for making my first escape room awesome!

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Dare 2 Escape in Orlando
review: Second time here. Having done the Ringmaster room with just my husband, we brought some friends to try The Asylum. The theming was great! There were a great variety of puzzles so it didn't feel all like just trying to open some locks. We escaped but it was close. We had a great time and will probably be back to tackle The Dig.

room_title: Escape room "The Professor's Basement" by Unlocked Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Best escape room ever! Had such a blast!! And the owners are great! We did the Professor's Basement and we will definitely be back to do the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Professor's Basement" by Unlocked Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Excellent escape room! We did The Professor's Basement - challenging puzzles (but not overwhelmingly so), great set up and production value, and wonderful staff. Had a fantastic time!

room_title: Escape room "The Professor's Basement" by Unlocked Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: This place is fantastic! Our family came here and did the Professors Basement and had such a great time we came back and did the Sheriff's Office. Both rooms were so much fun for all of my family and we all contributed and haven't stopped talking about how fun it was. We are hooked on escape rooms now and Dave and the team here at UNLOCKED are great and have amazing customer service and really enjoy with they are doing here which makes it that much more fun. They gave us great hints and really kept the fun going! You really need to check this place out if is so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Queen" by Escape Long Beach in Orange County
review: Fantastic. Really tested us. That was a blast!

room_title: Escape room "The Queen" by Escape Long Beach in Orange County
review: This was my first experience with an escape room and I had a blast trying to escape the Queen. The host was very helpful and explained the process nicely. The theme of the room was super fun! Highly recommend and I look forward to escaping the Lab next.

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: We went the other night as a group of four (42,14,11,9) and had so much fun! This was our first escape room, and we hope to do many more! We were pared with a group of three, and our teamwork was great! We started off kind of slow, but managed to finish Gold Rush with over 9 minutes left and one clue left! It is worth the fee, but if it was cheaper it would be good as well. Enjoyed it very much, and hope to do many more in the future! The staff was very nice and helpful.

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: We escaped the Gold Rush game and it was great fun! From the moment we arrived, the employees shared an "excited to see you" attitude. It appeared as though everyone really enjoyed working there, which added to our positive experience. The game provided a variety of interesting, unique challenges that our eight member group worked together to solve. We all agreed that it was an hour well spent!!

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: Our family and I were visiting from Pennsylvania, so we went to the escape game Orlando and did 4 of their rooms. I have done many rooms and these were some of the best I've ever done. Would definitely recommend Gold Rush, as this was my favorite room we did.

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: My friend and I went to Escape Game Orlando with our two grown daughters for a fun day out. It was far more than we expected. We did the Gold rush game and found it to be very challenging. A lot of creative thought went into this place. I would encourage anyone to go who wants a completely different experience and lots of fun to go. We are going back again soon to try our hand at a more difficult room. We are bringing some new people for the experience.

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: Our family had a great time escaping the Gold Rush room! The Escape Game is a well-organized, family oriented, wonderful place to visit. Staff is friendly and welcoming. I highly recommend this for families and organizations interested in team building activities! Great fun!!!

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tock" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: Puzzah downtown is hands down the most fun escape room company in Colorado. Tick Tock is fun and semi challenging...we got out with approx 3 min toSpare with just two people

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tock" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: So much fun!!!!!! Had a blast, and our 5 month old slept through half then got to tag along for the second half! Thanks puzzah! Please build one in Boise

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tock" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: Challenging and fun puzzle rooms! We have done 2 so far and enjoyed them both.

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tock" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: Super fun and mind boggling in the best way possible. Will definitely come back and tell all my friends about it.

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tock" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: This was my first ever doing something like this and it was awesome! The staff was great too!!

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tock" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: We surprised my sister with the Tick-Tock room for her birthday as part of our girls day and it was a total success! We LOVED it! I want to do another!

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tock" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: We wanted something different to do on a night out and this was a great option. Lots of laughter as we set off the alarm 28 times! We want to come back and try and cut that in half!!!

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tock" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: I took a group of twelve to Puzzah! for a team-building event, and it was a 100% success. Everyone enjoyed the challenge and we all learned a lot about puzzles, problem-solving and working together. AND, it was just a lot of fun. This place is great for corporate team-building, but it would also be great for date night, Friday night out with friends, etc. We will be back, for sure.

room_title: Escape room "The Highland Multiverse VR" by Digital Escape Rooms in Orlando
review: It was a very fun and challenging event. I highly reccomend tackling the Escape Room with a group of friends.

room_title: Escape room "The Highland Multiverse VR" by Digital Escape Rooms in Orlando
review: Had a blast in this escape room. Can't wait to come back and see more. Thanks again!

room_title: Escape room "The Highland Multiverse VR" by Digital Escape Rooms in Orlando
review: We had my daughters 9th birthday party here. The kids had a great time and the staff was really helpful. The space is nice to accommodate parties. They have a variety of video games there for down time in between doing the escape challenges. I would definitely recommend this escape room! Especially for parties....close to home, easy, and fun!

room_title: Escape room "Miami Nightmare" by Escape Hunt in Miami
review: Awesome! We enjoyed the escape room on our visit! Don't be shocked by the surrounding area it's in, it help add to the mood. But we had an amazing time and we were able to Escape! The people there are so kind and would definitely go back if in the area!

room_title: Escape room "Miami Nightmare" by Escape Hunt in Miami
review: Very friendly staff who takes their time with everyone. Hospitality is definitely their priority. Also, an awesome escape room! Highly recommend for anyone looking for something fun and challenging to experience in downtown Miami.

room_title: Escape room "Miami Nightmare" by Escape Hunt in Miami
review: it was really fun i enjoyed a lot we did all three room and our favorite was the miami nightmare which was more immersive. i recommend it to everyone.

room_title: Escape room "Miami Nightmare" by Escape Hunt in Miami
review: Excellent experience going to Escape Hunt for the 2nd time.By far my preferred Escape room in Miami.1st time with 4 teenagers for Black Beard Treasure. All could participate, thanks to a couple of hints from the Game Master, we succeeded and the kids are looking forward to coming back.2nd time with 6 colleagues. Super fun, finished in 53’, still with some hints, but in advance to enjoy drinks and tapas that were organized. Cheers, excellent team building.

room_title: Escape room "Miami Nightmare" by Escape Hunt in Miami
review: Excellent! We’ve been to many escape rooms and this is one of the best! Family owned and they’re the nicest people!We’ve done all three rooms, the one we liked the most was Miami Nightmare, but the rest are also very good with great scenery and clues.We’ll definitely come back for new rooms and experiences!

room_title: Escape room "Sector X" by Themescape Escape Rooms in Denver
review: I absolutely enjoyed the themes of each room because they are unique and equally challenging. What a great team building exercise. I cannot wait for the upcoming Sector X and hope to be one of the first to try and escape.

room_title: Escape room "Sector X" by Themescape Escape Rooms in Denver
review: Such a great experience from start to finish! Sector X was nothing like what we had experienced at other escape rooms. It had really cool effects, sounds and incredible games to figure out! No doubt an out of this world experience that you won't soon forget. You can tell these folks are passionate about what they do by the attention to detail they put into everything!

room_title: Escape room "Sector X" by Themescape Escape Rooms in Denver
review: Sector X was awesome! Great team building experience.

room_title: Escape room "Sector X" by Themescape Escape Rooms in Denver
review: The room was so much fun! Sector X was immersive and challenging. My whole group loved it! The staff was friendly and made us feel welcomed.

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops: Mysterious Market" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: I have done a decent amount of these and picked this place out of production quality standards. The best. Collin...can’t say enough about how amazing of a job he does. I worked with them to propose to my now fiancé. They went above and beyond any expectations, helped me through every part of it, and made it incredibly special for us. Go here, have fun.

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops: Mysterious Market" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: Out of all the escape rooms I've done, this maybe the best as far as really setting the atmosphere. It is amazing how much detail they put into the room! We did the Spec Ops room and it was a lot of fun. The clues were put together well and you didn't have to be a mind reader to get out. The only reason I'm not giving this place 5 stars is because our room did have some technical difficulties. We didn't know if we were doing something wrong or if it was the room. At the end of the game, a manager came and apologized. He even gave us a free game for another day. I would come back even if it wasn't free, can't wait to try a new room!

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops: Mysterious Market" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: This place is awesome! The staff is friendly, and professional. The whole feel of the place is very modern, especially the use of technology in the games which was very impressive. They do seem to be a little more expensive than other escape rooms, but I definitely think the price is worth it. We played special ops and escaped with only 2 minutes, we had a group of 6 and were definitely challenged but still had a blast!! They also do a great job with letting you know you can always hit a button to leave the room for a restroom break, which is perfect for anyone who is anxious about the general concept of these games.

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops: Mysterious Market" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: For my first time going to an escape room it was really fun. The staff was amazing in the fact that they asked if we had any questions about the rooms and helped us decide which room to go to. Me and my family had a lot of fun in the special ops room. I recommend this for an activity for all families to enjoy.

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops: Mysterious Market" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: We successfully escaped special ops: mysterious market and dared to do prison break the next day! The staff was very friendly and considerate and helped us from the time we checked in to the time we checked out. After our first escape game they offered to take our picture and we also were offered a discount for our next game which made us more inclined to come the next morning. If I ever stop by again I'm definitely going to try out their new playground room!!

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by Mission: Escape Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Super fun game! We went in a group of 6 and had were paired up with another 4 and had a blast. We can't wait for the other rooms/games to open!

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by Mission: Escape Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Had a blast! Can't wait to come back for the room coming up!

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by Mission: Escape Atlanta in Atlanta
review: AMAZING time there at Mission Escape. I would recommend this to everyone of my friends and family.

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by Mission: Escape Atlanta in Atlanta
review: So amazing! Best hour with all my friends! Very good for team building and just simply having fun! CAN NOT WAIT TO GO BACK!

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by Mission: Escape Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Super awesome!! Great way to spend some free time with good friends!

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by Mission: Escape Atlanta in Atlanta
review: We had a great time with our wedding group and we ESCAPED!!!! We escaped the Study With 0.01 secs left! Our Detective was helpful and we were the first group he ever had to escape. We are taking down that 23% escape rate one room at a time. We are coming back to do the hotel next!

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by Mission: Escape Atlanta in Atlanta
review: This place is awesome! If you're looking for a mind-stimulating group activity, then this is the activity for you to try out. Price: $28Parking: Located in a little office strip behind Atlantic Station, so there really isn't much worry about parking on the weekend (not sure about weekdays though).This was my first time in an escape challenge and I enjoyed it a lot! The max. number of people for a time slot is 10. We had 6 people in our group (all new to the escape challenge concept), and another party of 4 bought the remaining 4 tickets (quite experienced with the escape challenge). I think 10 people is a bit much since the actual room is not that big, but I guess it makes sense from a business perspective. I suggest going in a group of around 6 people, although you cannot control whether other people buy the remaining tickets in your time slot. The staff are great and friendly and the guy who plays the detective is super into his role, which sets the mood for the challenge. They're working on "The Hotel" where individuals have to escape their individual rooms before they join their group; I look forward to coming back to try that then!

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by Mission: Escape Atlanta in Atlanta
review: So definitely one of the better escape games I've played, what I loved was the fact all the puzzles were relevant to the scenario - they even added a few that were totally new and funny. Most of the clues were really logical if not always intuitive (that's a good thing) - so a super prepared group could definitely have gone through the room without burning up a single clue/ hint (you are given 3). In all great experience - I did it with a totally new'b group and they had the time of their life.Suggestions - The PA system needs to be louder, and maybe not so many hints? (but that's just me).

room_title: Escape room "Wanted in the West" by Brainy Actz in Temecula
review: Being a working mom usually means hoping to survive the day. When I called brainy actz the day before to schedule a surprise visit for my husband, Kevin made my reservation so smooth and accommodating. From start to finish, our first family escape room adventure was a blast. The challenges were fun and really tested our smarts. Our kids ages 9 & 7 were so involved and excited to find some of the clues. Nathan was our host and made us feel confident on taking on this endeavor. We didn't beat the clock but we made it out of the western escape room. We can't wait to try the rest of their rooms!!!

room_title: Escape room "Wanted in the West" by Brainy Actz in Temecula
review: Really good time here. We did the Western room and it was a blast. Four of us (my 2 teenage sons and my dad joined) managed to make it out. Maaaaaay have needed an extra couple of minutes minutes but what are you gonna do. Tabatha was really helpful and friendly. I think we'll be coming back!

room_title: Escape room "Wanted in the West" by Brainy Actz in Temecula
review: First time doing an escape room and we were not disappointed!!! Came for girls night out and we had so much fun!!! The room was awesome and the girl at the front desk was super sweet (I believe she was pretty new so definitely a good hire). We will be going back for the other rooms for sure!!!

room_title: Escape room "Prison" by Amazing Escape in Atlanta
review: We tried the Prision Escape and also the Night in Vegas. It was a blast, the staff was great and helped make our adventure even more fun. If your in Atlanta this is a must do.

room_title: Escape room "Prison" by Amazing Escape in Atlanta
review: This was my second escape room but first one here. Had a blast. Did the prison one, the jumpsuits really do add a little flair to the experience. Also, Cesar gave great advice and was very helpful. I will definitely be there again with friends and family.

room_title: Escape room "Prison" by Amazing Escape in Atlanta
review: Had a blast! We did both Prison and Virus. The story lines were clear and the rooms were very detailed. We had a group of 5 and all of us had a great time!

room_title: Escape room "S.C. Labs Inc." by Ruse Escape Room in Fort Collins
review: The escape room my friend and I participated in today was pretty fantastic. I got to do puzzles and say science a whole hekin lot it was pretty great.

room_title: Escape room "Cell Block 4" by Lara's Labyrinth in Hartford
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Sassafras Saloon" by Clues & Wits Escape Rooms in San Marcos (CA)
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Gallery Heist" by Lockbox Escape Room in Miami
review: So much fun! My son and 8 of his friends (ages 15-16) did the Gallery Heist and they had a blast. Looking forward to coming back soon for another one!

room_title: Escape room "Gallery Heist" by Lockbox Escape Room in Miami
review: I thought the Gallery Heist Escape Room was so much fun and so creative. The staff at Lockbox was friendly and very helpful. I would definitely go again!

room_title: Escape room "Gallery Heist" by Lockbox Escape Room in Miami
review: My friends and I did Gallery Heist last night and it was super fun! I prefer rooms that aren't scary so this was very enjoyable. We were able to escape rather quickly and even got 2nd fastest time (for now)! The building / rooms / lobby were very clean and the owners were very nice! I definitely want to come back to do House of Pawns!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Mountain Room Escapes in Big Bear City
review: This was a great fun place for a family to work together. The hostess made it fun and we escaped with 13 minutes to spare.

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Mountain Room Escapes in Big Bear City
review: This is my 8th escape room with my friends and we did the Cabin escape. The puzzles were very well made and intuitive. The room had a very nice eerie feel. There were no jumpscares but it had many psychological scares.

room_title: Escape room "Paradox" by Rabbit Hole Recreation Services in Denver
review: Last year I went to this company’s ruin room, and this time we went to the Paradox room. It was a fun evening to spend with my friends. And as always it was fun, and the aesthetics were on point

room_title: Escape room "Paradox" by Rabbit Hole Recreation Services in Denver
review: Paradox was so much fun. We had two newbies to the escape room scene who absolutely loved their experience. Challenging and stimulating, this room is full of beautifully imagined clues and props that are perfectly designed. Brian our gamemaster/host was so cool and really made the experience that much better. We will be back for the Mystic Temple!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Paradox" by Rabbit Hole Recreation Services in Denver
review: Great experience! Our group of 7, ages 10-65, enjoyed the Paradox challenge. It was just the right amount of difficulty, though we did benefit from some hints along the way. And though only a few members of our group led the way in terms of puzzle-solving, there were little ways that each person could be involved and contribute. The attention to detail throughout the rooms was impressive and really enhanced the experience. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Katelyn or K$ was an awesome host. today for team building 7 of us tried this for the first time ever. Some clues were harder than others and a few hints along the way but we all worked together and escaped.

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Such a fun and exciting experience! It was a nail biter to the end, making it out with only 16 seconds to spare. My group did the Locker room and it was challenging and required all of our combined effort. Definitely would recommend to anyone in the Palm Springs area. Shoutout to our room assistant Lyssa, she was fantastic and helpful when we needed!

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: We had so much fun with the bank heist we decided to do the locker room. Both rooms had great hosts. The locker room victim played the part well.When we return to the desert we will do the others.Definitely a good time.

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Had a great time with my family an Em was great to work with. We were able to escape the locker room. Can't wait to go back and do another escape room!

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: We have done over 30 escape rooms and we had a great time escaping the Locker Room. Cristina (OG) our game master was great, our kids (11-year-old twins) liked the room and we escaped with almost 7 min left.We will be back for sure to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Escape Room was fun for the whole family. Our group of 9 had a great time working together to solve the Locker Room puzzles. Everyone was engaged and played a part in our escape success. It was challenging and the mind bending puzzle promoted team work and outside the box thinking. We all had a part in our successful escape. The hints they gave along the way were thought promoting and helpful without being obvious. Martha, our "hostage" was a critical part of solving the puzzle. Our family thoroughly enjoyed the experience and we'll be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: Went yesterday as a group of four friends. The most fun I've had in a couple of years on an outing! We did the Kidnapping and broke out in 56 minutes. If you want a challenge and an outright rush of adrenaline, I highly suggest doing these games! The staff was great as well. Overall a thrill!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: We had a great time being Kidnapped! Staff was friendly, the facility was nice, room was neat and the clues were interesting and challenging. Met our expectations and we can't wait to go back to try out the other scenarios.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: Excellent outing!! Kidnapping was very challenging. I'm amazed we made it out!! Will definitely be back to try a different room!!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: We came to play the breakout games as a group activity with my coworkers. It is an excellent team building activity! It was soooo much fun. We did the kidnapping but I'm already planning a visit back for a different game!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: A great atmosphere! The kidnapping was super fun, and the staff helped us out along the way! Will definitely be back trying all the different rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Overbrook Asylum" by Xcape Flagstaff in Flagstaff
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Undercover Alley" by Breakout Games - Birmingham in Birmingham
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Private Eye" by Chronos Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Great EscapeRoom! We escaped, really fun!!! I recommend this for all ages! Affordable and very exiting!!! You can win a free game by spinning a roulette!!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Private Eye" by Chronos Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Awesome escape room! Definitely recommend! A bunch of rooms to choose from! We had a blast and solved it with 2 minutes to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Private Eye" by Chronos Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Great experience! Definitely recommend if you're looking for a challenge! They have so many rooms can't wait to do them all!

room_title: Escape room "The Principal’s Office" by Lockbox Escape Room in Miami
review: Principle's office is great for all ages!We took our nieces and nephews and they loved it! Everyone, of all ages, were able to help solve the puzzles and participate!

room_title: Escape room "The Principal’s Office" by Lockbox Escape Room in Miami
review: My family and I went for my daughter's birthday and did the principal's office. We had a great time working together! Staff was welcoming and nice. Would definitely go again!!

room_title: Escape room "The Principal’s Office" by Lockbox Escape Room in Miami
review: We had a great time on a rainy day. It was 2 families of 4 doing the Principal's Office escape. We had 2 girls age 8 & 10 and the other family had a 10yo and 12yo. We all worked together and the kids had a great time. We used a few hints but finished with 5 minutes to spare. We will definitly do another room in the future.

room_title: Escape room "Shawshank v2" by Axxiom Escape Rooms Wilmington in Wilmington (DE)
review: We did the Shawshank room and had a blast! Our escape attempt was unsuccessful, but the staff was awesome and the room was fun. We'll definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "Shawshank v2" by Axxiom Escape Rooms Wilmington in Wilmington (DE)
review: It was amazing! My group did the Shawshank room and escaped with 5 minutes to spare. It was well constructed and a lot of fun! I can't wait to do it again!

room_title: Escape room "Shawshank v2" by Axxiom Escape Rooms Wilmington in Wilmington (DE)
review: Shawshank room at the Wilmington location was a mind puzzle that we almost cracked. Awesome family experience to work together as a team and move through the clues. Definitely will be doing again.

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Bunker" by Fox in a Box Orange County in Orange County
review: Looks small and simple but the tasks can be very difficult at some points. You really need to use teamwork. My friends and I had a blast and had 4 seconds remaining in the Cold War Bunker. It was crazy!

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Bunker" by Fox in a Box Orange County in Orange County
review: Played the Bunker room at this location and it was my first time ever playing this kind of game, had an awesome time trying to solve the various themed puzzles all around the room. This would be Ideal with 4-5 people when you experience the rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Bunker" by Fox in a Box Orange County in Orange County
review: We saved the world from a nuclear meltdown! Our group had a lot of fun. The room was incredible and totally immersive. Definitely coming back to do the other two rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Bunker" by Fox in a Box Orange County in Orange County
review: What a blast! We had a great time experiencing our first escape room as family. With 3 minutes left, we were able to disable the nuclear warhead. I loved the fact that each of us brought different skills and observations to help figure out the clues. I can't wait to go back and experience the other rooms. Jackson was a great host!

room_title: Escape room "Alice in Wonderland" by Lock'd Escape Adventures in Putnam
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Return to the Throne" by King's Escape Room Denver in Denver
review: My husband and I attempted to escape from the medieval-themed room. We were unsuccessful but that did not ruin our fun. This room was very well put together and kept us on our toes the entire hour. It gives your brain a good hour of thinking without becoming overwhelmed or frustrated. We can't wait for the other rooms to open!

room_title: Escape room "Return to the Throne" by King's Escape Room Denver in Denver
review: Me and my wife had a great time. We did the "return to the throne" and "rock n roll" rooms. Each room was professionally designed and well thought out. I will go back.

room_title: Escape room "Return to the Throne" by King's Escape Room Denver in Denver
review: I did my very first escape room at King's. We did Return to the Throne and we actually beat the room with 3 minutes left. It was such a rush! The difficulty level was just right for our group. The hint system worked really well for us (we rang a bell when we needed a hint). The puzzles were varied (some math, some word, some physical). The theme was really cool. I really want to do the Rock n Roll room next!

room_title: Escape room "Return to the Throne" by King's Escape Room Denver in Denver
review: This escape room was awesome! We had so much fun. We loved the Game of Thrones theme. Looked great. Had a really good variety of puzzles with a good level of difficulty. We were able to solve it but did need a few hints. Fabulous!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Return to the Throne" by King's Escape Room Denver in Denver
review: This was my first experience in an escape room and it was amazing! Going into it, I was so nervous I would get claustrophobic or that it would be way too difficult to solve but I was having so much fun trying to figure everything out that I never even thought about it! My co-workers and I did the Return to the Throne room for a holiday party and I would definitely go back to try their other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Experiment" by Escape Room 5280 in Tampa
review: We have done several escape rooms around town and this is by far our favorite place! We’ve completed 2 rooms and can’t wait to do the rest. The rooms are well-planned, clean, and FUN! Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Experiment" by Escape Room 5280 in Tampa
review: This was our first time in an escape room. They were very helpful in providing guidance while maintaining the puzzle and fun of the room. We had a great time and were extremely pleased with the experience. We will return for some more escapes!

room_title: Escape room "War Games" by EscapeWorks Denver in Denver
review: Fantastic escape room. War Games was very challenging, but they gave us help when we needed it. Great staff. Great design. Would definitely recommend for anyone visiting Denver. (We were a 6 person bachelor party and chose this as one of our activities)

room_title: Escape room "War Games" by EscapeWorks Denver in Denver
review: I've been here twice and completed nine escape rooms total - this place does not disappoint! War Games and the updated Egyptian Tomb room were fantastic and we look forward to coming back to complete the others.

room_title: Escape room "War Games" by EscapeWorks Denver in Denver
review: Really fun did the war games escape room and had Trace help us out super nice people and super fun and challenging room!

room_title: Escape room "Tiki Island" by Escape The Netherworld in Atlanta
review: Tiki Island was so much fun!!! Same quality you'd expect from Netherworld but way more tame than the other rooms so even a wuss like me could enjoy it. The special effects were amazing and you really get pulled into the story of the room. My husband and I escaped with :32 left (just the two of us) with a little help from game master T who is an absolute angel. She was incredibly helpful and encouraging through our game play and genuinely wanted us to succeed. Tiki Island is definitely a challenge as there are a lot of puzzles to complete. I recommend having a group of 4 seasoned players to get out in time. A new room is opening up so we will absolutely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Disarmed" by Exit Strategies in Redding
review: The Idea was good but the lighting was very soft. Not recommended for older people as my grandparents had the worst time because of the lighting

room_title: Escape room "Disarmed" by Exit Strategies in Redding
review: Our group had such a blast trying to figure out the "Disarmed" room. I recommend this for a fun night out with family or friends.

room_title: Escape room "Disarmed" by Exit Strategies in Redding
review: Super fun and challenging, we blew up! (oops) But we want to do it again asap!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Limitless Escape Games in Modesto
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Deadly Double Agent" by Arkansas Escape Rooms in Little Rock
review: Had a great time in the "double agent" room! Look forward to coming back and trying the other rooms. Bring your friends and try it out! It is awesome!

room_title: Escape room "The Deadly Double Agent" by Arkansas Escape Rooms in Little Rock
review: Tried out the Double Agent room and it was difficult in a fun way! There were multiple puzzles that I've never seen before! Will be back for other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Chopper Down" by Lockbusters Escape Game in Orlando
review: I had always wanted to do an escape room for some time now. There were 7 of us and we did the "Chopper Down" room. It was soooo much fun - kinda like being inside a video game. There were so many puzzles, everyone got to participate. It truly does take team work to finish in time, and many of the puzzles were challenging. The staff was super friendly, and had great senses of humor. I definitely want to come back and try the other rooms. Highly recommended!!

room_title: Escape room "Chopper Down" by Lockbusters Escape Game in Orlando
review: We did two games, Collector and Chopper Down. Great experience! Will be back to try the other rooms! Excellent set up!

room_title: Escape room "Chopper Down" by Lockbusters Escape Game in Orlando
review: Rooms were fantastic! Well done. Chopper Down was great.

room_title: Escape room "Contagion" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Surviving the Earthquake" by Southside Escape Room in Atlanta
review: The owner was exceptional and we had the absolute best time!!!! Definitely worth the visit!!!!❤️

room_title: Escape room "Surviving the Earthquake" by Southside Escape Room in Atlanta
review: Chic who ran this on 1/26 was awesome, super friendly and encouraging. We did the baseball room and although we used our 3 clues, we managed to get out with 8 mins left.

room_title: Escape room "Surviving the Earthquake" by Southside Escape Room in Atlanta
review: We had a great time in the escape room! ItWas baseball themed and was very challenging. We were a 3 person team and we were one clue away from finishing. It was a great time and we will be back soon !

room_title: Escape room "The Garage" by All Locked Up in Los Angeles
review: A group of friends and I tried the Garage and we left thoroughly satisfied with our experience. We weren't expecting to find such a gem in such a quiet location especially considering there isn't much to do in Canyon Country, but we couldn't have had more fun. We will definitely be coming back to try out the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Garage" by All Locked Up in Los Angeles
review: My daughter has been telling me she wanted to go to an escape room for the last few months. I finally booked our first experience at All Locked Up. We made it a family night and had a terrific game in The Garage. We will definitely be back. Thank you so much for the fun evening.

room_title: Escape room "The Garage" by All Locked Up in Los Angeles
review: This was my first experience with Escape Rooms...and I totally LOVED it.  They built a legit Garage complete with a regulation garage door, all inside their facility.  There were some surprises I did not expect at all, and I don't want to give anything away, but it was a blast collaborating with my family and friends.  I totally want to do it again, so I can't wait for them to build out their others rooms.  They had lockers to stash your stuff and they provide a keyed lock that you keep on your possession so you know your stuff is safe.It was nice to have something like this in Canyon Country.  Shout out to Betitos next door if you love Mexican food.

room_title: Escape room "Meltdown" by Escape the Room Denver in Denver
review: We had so much fun in the nuclear meltdown room! We won... but not by much! Kept us guessing and working together to complete the escape. Would definitely recommend!!

room_title: Escape room "Meltdown" by Escape the Room Denver in Denver
review: I took my staff of 6 here for a team-building evening and we had such a great time! The hostess was great and we all had a great experience! I would definitely go back in the future with family, friends or my staff again!

room_title: Escape room "Meltdown" by Escape the Room Denver in Denver
review: We did the Meltdown room. It was a Challenging room. Had a great time!! Makes you really think outside the box. Team work is a must. Will definitely go back and try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Victim No. 7" by Escape 101 in Danbury
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Nautilus" by Project: Escape in Atlanta
review: We had 7 people in the Nautilus room, which was a good fit. The puzzles were intriguing and the room was full of surprises. It was tougher than I expected, but we escape with almost 9 minutes! Had a great time and would definitely go again.

room_title: Escape room "Nautilus" by Project: Escape in Atlanta
review: The escape rooms at Project Escape have been very entertaining and challenging ( my friends and I have done the Nautilus and Saw Rooms). The puzzles fit the theme, the decor helps to immerse yourself in the setting and the Game Masters are very friendly and informative. We will definitely be visiting Project Escape again.

room_title: Escape room "Nautilus" by Project: Escape in Atlanta
review: My husband and I went to this escape room with his parents and had a blast- honestly I liked Nautilus the best! We cannot wait to try to other rooms. The decoration and themes were on point!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Escape Zone 60 in Destin
review: My husband and I took my teenage daughter and her friends to Escape Zone 60 as part of her birthday celebration. They had a blast! They did the zombie room. Jake with Escape Zone 60 was AWESOME and made the visit so enjoyable. They were scared to death - but in a fun way. They will never forget it! We'd love to go back and try another room.

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Escape Zone 60 in Destin
review: Very creative and challenging way to have fun, we did the zombie apocalypse room and did not want it to end. We definitely will be back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Escape Zone 60 in Destin
review: We had a great time. The zombie room was different from any other escape room I've done. Lots of clues to figure out. This was the most we've ever paid to play out of 4 states though.

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Escape Zone 60 in Destin
review: Not everyone is up to the task of escape, however this group of 6 individuals banded together as one in order to escape. Challenged but not defeated. We are awesome and the place of operation is clearly set up for an optimal experience. The staff is top notch and on game. Would recommend this experience for anyone wanting a mental challenge

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Escape Zone 60 in Destin
review: We absolutely had a blast, and very highly recommend this for family entertainment!! Worth every penny...even though we didn't escape...LOL!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Save Christmas" by Exodus Escape Adventures in Sacramento
review: Our family had such a great time in the Christmas Escape room. Very creative & FUN!!Thank you for a wonderful experience!!

room_title: Escape room "The Curtain Call" by Mystified - Escape Room Adventures in Stonington
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The News Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: So much fun! The people who work there are great and the game itself is a lot of fun. We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "The News Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: I had so much fun. It was great watching my teammates pull together to figure out the clues. We all cheered as we found various keys. I love my team because no idea was rejected. There was so much respect for everyone's suggestion.

room_title: Escape room "The News Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Had a blast. Recommend this awesome and unique experience to everyone.

room_title: Escape room "The News Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: This was a lot of fun! I would definitely do it again!! Challenging hour and we got sooooo close!!

room_title: Escape room "The News Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: So much fun!! We will definitely be back for another adventure!

room_title: Escape room "The News Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: We love these experiences - and Escape the Room is one of the best of these with attention to detail. We did the News Room which was fun and engaging, but largely linear. Three adults and two kids had a great hour and then walked to Hard Rock!

room_title: Escape room "The News Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Went to Escape the Room during a family "girls weekend" in Atlanta. There were 9 of us, ranging in age from 20's to 70's. Several of us had done an escape room before and loved it so wanted to share it with the group. Unfortunately I didn't really care for the "News Room". This room wasn't as logical compared to previous rooms I had done which I found frustrating. I can't include more specifics without giving away details of the room! Staff was friendly and helpful, I just didn't care for this particular room. We lost of course, but I don't think that's clouding my judgement! =)

room_title: Escape room "Terminator 2 Escape" by Escape Westgate in Phoenix
review: Super fun and exciting!! Gone to two of the rooms, gotten out both times on some sort of luck hahah! Definitely recommend

room_title: Escape room "Terminator 2 Escape" by Escape Westgate in Phoenix
review: Highly recommend the Terminator II room!  Great problem solving puzzles for the youngster and the more mature.  Check out the T-1000!  So AWESOME!

room_title: Escape room "Terminator 2 Escape" by Escape Westgate in Phoenix
review: My team from work came here for a team builder, and we had a blast! Did T2 and although it was difficult at times, we were able to save humanity with about 5 minutes to spare! Thank you for providing a fun at times stressful 55 minutes of an exciting time! We'll definitely be back to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Fun! Really enjoyed playing here! Was not so easy that we breezed through, which was great! We had to work hard to figure it out. Will go back and do another adventure. Fun!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Our hostess, Ang, was awesome and very helpful! Our group of teenage girls had a blast and they escaped the island! Very challenging, would like to see better-decorated room though... a bit bare.

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: We had an awesome time! The room was full of surprises and the staff was so helpful and friendly! Can't wait to go back again!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: So much fun. Very friendly staff. If you're looking to do something different this is the place. Thanks again for the great experience

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: If you are looking for something new, fun and exciting to do, Breakout is the place to go! Whether its your friend group, coworkers, sports teams, or family, you're guaranteed to have a great time! The rooms are super challenging and the staff really go above and beyond to provide a great experience for everyone. I can't wait to go back and try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Inside Area 51" by Back in Time Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I did the Area 51 room with a small group of friends from work. We are a moderately experienced escape room group, and we found this room to be quite difficult. We needed several hints to make progress but we were finally able to get out of the room. If you love puzzles and a tough challenge and have a few buddies with similar mindsets, this is a great place for you!

room_title: Escape room "Inside Area 51" by Back in Time Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I really enjoyed my experience at these escape rooms. They were thoughtful and I think on par with the ones I've tried before. If you are going to do one, try Area 51! That one is amazing and takes extreme teamwork to get through it. Try it! It's a lot of work for your brain but it's also a lot of fun. I definitely recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "Inside Area 51" by Back in Time Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: So much fun! I did both Salem and Area 51 in one weekend. Although my team didn't make the 60 minute mark for Area 51, they were kind enough to give us more time to finish up and escape. Very excited for their upcoming rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Silicone Sky VR" by PanIQ Escape Room San Jose in San Jose
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Ctrl + Alt + Reality" by Planet Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: I had a good time if you like to solve things this is the place for you highly recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "Ctrl + Alt + Reality" by Planet Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: If you want a little challenge Try out CTRL+Alt+Realty. Well designed room by a talented team. super fun

room_title: Escape room "Ctrl + Alt + Reality" by Planet Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: So fun! Incredibly detailed ambiance. Puzzles where difficult but host helped us work our way through. Tons of fun and highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "It's Mine" by Avalanche Escape Rooms in Anchorage
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Sector X" by Will to Escape in West Palm Beach
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Chasm" by Beat the Room in Sacramento
review: We had 6 family members working together and having a great time! It was a first for all but one of us. We all loved it and will definitely come again 😎

room_title: Escape room "Chasm" by Beat the Room in Sacramento
review: I want to go again try other rooms thanks to my sister in- law for the invite fun family and friend get together
